Sentence: Do you remember your lessons? Who built the Iron Throne?

Name: sansa stark
Sentence: Aegon the Conqueror.

Name: septa mordane
Sentence: And who built the Red Keep?

Name: sansa stark
Sentence: Maegor the Cruel.

Name: septa mordane
Sentence: And how many years did it take to build...

Name: sansa stark
Sentence: My grandfather and uncle were murdered here, weren't they?

Name: septa mordane
Sentence: They were killed on the orders of King Aerys, yes.

Name: sansa stark
Sentence: The Mad King.

Name: septa mordane
Sentence: Commonly known as the Mad King.

Name: sansa stark
Sentence: Why were they killed?

Name: septa mordane
Sentence: You should speak to your father about these matters.

Name: sansa stark
Sentence: I don't want to speak to my father, ever.

Name: septa mordane
Sentence: You will find it in your heart to forgive your father.

Name: sansa stark
Sentence: No, I won't.

Name: janos slynt
Sentence: It's the Hando s tournament that's causing all this trouble, my Lords.

Name: eddard stark
Sentence: The King's tournament. I assure you the Hand wants no part of it.

Name: janos slynt
Sentence: Call it what you will, Lord Stark Ser, the city is packed with people and more flooding in every day. Last night we had a tavern riot, a brothel fire, three stabbings and a drunken horse race down the Street of Sisters.

Name: varys
Sentence: Dreadful.

Name: renly baratheon
Sentence: If you can't keep the King's peace, perhaps the City Watch should be commanded by someone who can.

Name: janos slynt
Sentence: I need more men.

Name: eddard stark
Sentence: You'll get 50. Lord Baelish will see it paid for.

Name: petyr baelish
Sentence: I will?

Name: eddard stark
Sentence: You found money for a champion's purse, you can find money to keep the peace. I'll also give you 20 of my household guards till the crowds have left.

Name: janos slynt
Sentence: Thank you, my Lord Hand Ser. They will be put to good use.

Name: eddard stark
Sentence: The sooner this is over, the better.

Name: varys
Sentence: The realm prospers from such events, my Lord. They give the great a chance at glory, and the lowly a respite from their woes.

Name: petyr baelish
Sentence: And every inn in the city is full and the whores are walking bow-legged.

Name: eddard stark
Sentence: I'm sure the tourney puts coins in many a pocket. Now... If there's nothing else, my Lords?

Name: grand maester pycelle
Sentence: This heat. On days like this, I envy you northerners your summer snows. Until tomorrow my Lord.

Name: eddard stark
Sentence: I've been hoping to talk to you about Jon Arryn.

Name: grand maester pycelle
Sentence: Lord Arryn? His death was a great sadness to all of us. I took personal charge of his care, but I could not save him. His sickness struck him very hard and very fast. I saw him in my chambers just the night before he passed. Lord Jon often came to me for counsel.

Name: eddard stark
Sentence: Why?

Name: grand maester pycelle
Sentence: I have been Grand Maester for many years. Kings and Hands have come to me for advice since...

Name: eddard stark
Sentence: What did Jon want the night before he died?

Name: grand maester pycelle
Sentence: He came inquiring after a book.

Name: eddard stark
Sentence: A book? What book?

Name: grand maester pycelle
Sentence: I fear it would be of little interest to you, my Lord. A ponderous tome.

Name: eddard stark
Sentence: I'd like to read it.

Name: grand maester pycelle
Sentence: The lineages and histories of the great houses of the Seven Kingdoms, with descriptions of many high lords and noble ladies and their children.

Name: eddard stark
Sentence: Harkon Umber, first of his name, born to lord Hother Umber and lady Amaryllis Umber in the 183rd year after Aegon's landing, at the last hearth. Blue of eye, brown of hair and fair complected, died in his 14th year of a wound sustained

Name: grand maester pycelle
Sentence: As I said, my Lord, a ponderous read.

Name: eddard stark
Sentence: Did Jon Arryn tell you what he wanted with it?

Name: grand maester pycelle
Sentence: He did not, my Lord. And I did not presume to ask.

Name: eddard stark
Sentence: Jon's death...

Name: grand maester pycelle
Sentence: Such a tragedy.

Name: eddard stark
Sentence: Did he say anything to you during his final hours?

Name: grand maester pycelle
Sentence: Nothing of import, my Lord. There was one phrase he kept repeating

Name: eddard stark
Sentence: The seed is strong"? What does that mean?

Name: grand maester pycelle
Sentence: The dying mind is a demented mind, Lord Stark. For all the weight they're given, last words are usually as significant as first words.

Name: eddard stark
Sentence: And you're quite certain he died of a natural illness?

Name: grand maester pycelle
Sentence: What else could it be?

Name: eddard stark
Sentence: Poison.

Name: grand maester pycelle
Sentence: A disturbing thought. I don't think it likely. The Hand was loved by all. What sort of man would dare...

Name: eddard stark
Sentence: I've heard it said that poison is a woman's weapon.

Name: grand maester pycelle
Sentence: Yes. Women, cravens... and eunuchs. Did you know that lord Varys is a eunuch?

Name: eddard stark
Sentence: Everybody knows that.

Name: grand maester pycelle
Sentence: Yes, yes, of course. How that sort of person found himself on the King's Council, I will never know.

Name: eddard stark
Sentence: I've taken enough of your time.

Name: grand maester pycelle
Sentence: No trouble at all, my Lord. It's a great honor...

Name: eddard stark
Sentence: Thank you. I'll find my own way out.

Name: arya stark
Sentence: Syrio says a water dancer can stand on one toe for hours.

Name: eddard stark
Sentence: It's a hard fall down these steps.

Name: arya stark
Sentence: Syrio says every hurt is a lesson and every lesson makes you better. Tomorrow I'm going to be chasing cats.

Name: eddard stark
Sentence: Cats? Syrio says…

Name: arya stark
Sentence: He says every swordsman should study cats. They're quiet as shadows and as light as feathers. You have to be quick to catch them.

Name: eddard stark
Sentence: He's right about that.

Name: arya stark
Sentence: Now that Bran's awake will he come live with us?

Name: eddard stark
Sentence: He needs to get his strength back first.

Name: arya stark
Sentence: He wants to be a knight of the King's Guard. He can't be one now, can he?

Name: eddard stark
Sentence: No. But someday he could be Lord of a holdfast or sit on the King's Council. Or he might raise castles like Brandon the Builder.

Name: arya stark
Sentence: Can I be Lord of a holdfast?

Name: eddard stark
Sentence: You will marry a high Lord and rule his castle. And your sons shall be knights and princes and lords.

Name: arya stark
Sentence: No. That's not me.

Name: sam tarly
Sentence: Hello. Ser Alliser said I'm to be your new watch partner. I should warn you, I don't see all that well.

Name: jon snow
Sentence: Come stand by the fire. It's warmer.

Name: sam tarly
Sentence: No, that's all right. I'm fine.

Name: jon snow
Sentence: You're not. You're freezing.

Name: sam tarly
Sentence: I don't like high places.

Name: jon snow
Sentence: You can't fight. You can't see. You're afraid of heights and almost everything else probably. What are you doing here, Sam?

Name: sam tarly
Sentence: On the morning of my 18th nameday, my father came to me. "You're almost a man now," he said, "but you're not worthy of my land and title. Tomorrow, you're going to take the black, forsake all claim to your inheritance and start north. If you do not," he said, "then we'll have a hunt and somewhere in these woods your horse will stumble and you'll be thrown from your saddle to die. Or so I'll tell your mother. Nothing would please me more." Ser Alliser's going to make me fight again tomorrow, isn't he?

Name: jon snow
Sentence: Yes, he is.

Name: sam tarly
Sentence: I'm not going to get any better, you know?

Name: jon snow
Sentence: Well… You can't get any worse.

Name: petyr baelish
Sentence: I hear you're reading a boring book.

Name: eddard stark
Sentence: Pycelle talks too much.

Name: petyr baelish
Sentence: He never stops. Do you know Ser Hugh of the Vale? Not surprising. Until recently, he was only a squire... Jon Arryn's squire. He was knighted almost immediately after his master's untimely death.

Name: eddard stark
Sentence: Knighted for what? Why are you telling me this?

Name: petyr baelish
Sentence: I promised Cat that I'd help you.

Name: eddard stark
Sentence: Where is Ser Hugh? I'll speak to him.

Name: petyr baelish
Sentence: A singularly bad idea. Do you see that boy there? One of Varys's little birds. The Spider has taken a great interest in your comings and goings. Now look there. That one belongs to the Queen. And do you see that Septa pretending to read her book?

Name: eddard stark
Sentence: Varys or the Queen?

Name: petyr baelish
Sentence: No. She's one of mine. Is there someone in your service whom you trust completely?

Name: eddard stark
Sentence: Yes.

Name: petyr baelish
Sentence: The wiser answer was no, my Lord. Get a message to this paragon of yours... Discreetly. Send him to question Ser Hugh. After that, you might want him to visit a certain armorer in the city. He lives in a large house at the top of the street of Steel.

Name: petyr baelish
Sentence: I have my observers, as I said, and it's possible that they saw Lord Arryn visit this armorer several times in the weeks before his death.

Name: eddard stark
Sentence: Lord Baelish, perhaps I was wrong to distrust you.

Name: petyr baelish
Sentence: Distrusting me was the wisest thing you've done since you climbed off your horse.

Name: jory cassel
Sentence: Ser Hugh? Ser Hugh!

Name: hugh of vale
Sentence: As you can see, I'm busy.

Name: jory cassel
Sentence: I'm here on behalf of Lord Eddard Stark, the Hand of the king. I'm the captain of his guard.

Name: hugh of vale
Sentence: I'm sorry. I didn't catch your name, Ser...

Name: jory cassel
Sentence: No "ser." I'm not a knight.

Name: hugh of vale
Sentence: I see. Well, it just so happens that I am.

Name: jory cassel
Sentence: He said he'd be glad to talk to the Hand himself. He's a knight, you see.

Name: eddard stark
Sentence: A knight. They strut around like roosters down here. Even the ones who've never seen an arrow coming their way.

Name: jory cassel
Sentence: You shouldn't be out here, my Lord. There's no telling who has eyes where.

Name: eddard stark
Sentence: Let them look.

Name: tobho mott
Sentence: The former Hand did call on me, my Lord, several times. I regret to say he did not honor me with his patronage.

Name: eddard stark
Sentence: What did Lord Arryn want?

Name: tobho mott
Sentence: He always came to see the boy.

Name: eddard stark
Sentence: I'd like to see him as well.

Name: tobho mott
Sentence: As you wish, my Lord. Gendry! Here he is. Strong for his age. He works hard. Show the Hand the helmet you made, lad.

Name: eddard stark
Sentence: This is fine work.

Name: gendry baratheon
Sentence: It's not for sale.

Name: tobho mott
Sentence: Boy, this is the King's Hand! If his lordship wants the helmet...

Name: gendry baratheon
Sentence: I made it for me.

Name: tobho mott
Sentence: Forgive him, my Lord.

Name: eddard stark
Sentence: There's nothing to forgive. When Lord Arryn came to visit you, what would you talk about?

Name: gendry baratheon
Sentence: He just asked me questions is all, my Lord.

Name: eddard stark
Sentence: What kind of questions?

Name: gendry baratheon
Sentence: About my work at first, if I was being treated well, if I liked it here. But then he started asking me about my mother.

Name: eddard stark
Sentence: Your mother?

Name: gendry baratheon
Sentence: Who she was, what she looked like.

Name: eddard stark
Sentence: What did you tell him?

Name: gendry baratheon
Sentence: She died when I was little. She had yellow hair. She'd sing to me sometimes.

Name: eddard stark
Sentence: Look at me. Get back to work, lad. If the day ever comes when that boy'd rather wield a sword than forge one, you send him to me.

Name: jory cassel
Sentence: Find anything?

Name: eddard stark
Sentence: King Robert's bastard son.

Name: jory cassel
Sentence: This is for the King from Lord Stark.

Name: jaime lannister
Sentence: Listen. Do you hear them? How many do you think are in there with him? Guess.

Name: jory cassel
Sentence: Three? Four?

Name: jaime lannister
Sentence: He likes to do this when I'm on duty... He makes me listen as he insults my sister.

Name: jory cassel
Sentence: Forgive me, my Lord...

Name: jaime lannister
Sentence: Why do I have to forgive you? Have you wronged me?

Name: jory cassel
Sentence: We've met before, you know.

Name: jaime lannister
Sentence: Have we? Strange, I've forgotten.

Name: jory cassel
Sentence: The siege of Pyke. We fought side by side one afternoon.

Name: jaime lannister
Sentence: That's where you got your scar?

Name: jory cassel
Sentence: Aye. One of the Greyjoys nearly took my eye.

Name: jaime lannister
Sentence: Vicious sons of whores.

Name: jory cassel
Sentence: They like their bloodshed.

Name: jaime lannister
Sentence: They stopped liking it at the end. That was a proper battle. D'you remember Thoros of Myr charging through the breach?

Name: jory cassel
Sentence: With his burning sword? I'll remember that till the day I die.

Name: jaime lannister
Sentence: I saw the youngest of the Greyjoy lads at Winterfell. It was like seeing a shark on a mountaintop.

Name: jory cassel
Sentence: Theon? He's a good lad.

Name: jaime lannister
Sentence: I doubt it.

Name: robert baratheon
Sentence: I'll bet you smell of blackberry jam! Let me smell it. Come here.

Name: jory cassel
Sentence: Can I leave this with you? The message from Lord Stark.

Name: jaime lannister
Sentence: I don't serve Lord Stark.

Name: grenn
Sentence: Where have you been?

Name: jon snow
Sentence: Watch duty. With Sam.

Name: pyp
Sentence: Prince Porkchop. Where is he?

Name: jon snow
Sentence: He wasn't hungry.

Name: pyp
Sentence: Impossible!

Name: jon snow
Sentence: That's enough. Sam's no different from the rest of us. There was no place for him in the world, so he's come here. We're not going to hurt him in the training yard anymore. Never again, no matter what Thorne says. He's our brother now and we're going to protect him.

Name: rast
Sentence: You are in love, Lord Snow. You girls can do as you please. But if Thorne puts me up against Lady Piggy, I'm gonna slice me off a side of bacon.

Name: jon snow
Sentence: No one touches Sam.

Name: alliser thorne
Sentence: What are you waiting for? Attack him! You, get in there.

Name: grenn
Sentence: Hit me. Go on, hit me! I yield! Yield yield. I yield.

Name: alliser thorne
Sentence: You think this is funny, do you? When you're out there beyond the Wall with the sun going down, do you want a man at your back? Or a sniveling boy?

Name: viserys targaryen
Sentence: You send this whore to give me commands? I should have sent you back her head!

Name: doreah
Sentence: Forgive me, Khaleesi. I did as you asked.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Sentence: Hush now. It's all right. Irri, take her and leave us.

Name: irri
Sentence: Yes, Khaleesi.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Sentence: Why did you hit her?!

Name: viserys targaryen
Sentence: How many times do I have to tell you? You do not command me.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Sentence: I wasn't commanding you. I just wanted to invite you to supper.

Name: viserys targaryen
Sentence: What's this?

Name: daenerys targaryen
Sentence: It's a gift. I had it made for you.

Name: viserys targaryen
Sentence: Dothraki rags? Are you going to dress me now?

Name: daenerys targaryen
Sentence: Please.

Name: viserys targaryen
Sentence: This stinks of manure. All of it.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Sentence: Stop - stop it.

Name: viserys targaryen
Sentence: You would turn me into one of them, wouldn't you? Next you'll want to braid my hair.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Sentence: You've no right to a braid. You've won no victories yet.

Name: viserys targaryen
Sentence: You do not talk back to me!

Name: viserys targaryen
Sentence: You are a horselordo s slut. And now you've woken the dragon...

Name: daenerys targaryen
Sentence: I am a Khaleesi of the Dothraki! I am the wife of the great Khal and I carry his son inside me. The next time you raise a hand to me will be the last time you have hands.

Name: sam tarly
Sentence: I know for a fact that some of the officers go to that brothel in Mole's Town.

Name: jon snow
Sentence: I wouldn't doubt it.

Name: sam tarly
Sentence: Don't you think it's a little bit unfair? Making us take our vows while they sneak off for a little sally on the side?

Name: jon snow
Sentence: Sally on the side?

Name: sam tarly
Sentence: It's silly, isn't it? What, we can't defend the Wall unless we're celibate? It's absurd.

Name: jon snow
Sentence: I didn't think you'd be so upset about it.

Name: sam tarly
Sentence: Why not? Because I'm fat? But I like girls just as much as you do. They might not like me as much. I've never... been with one. You've probably had hundreds.

Name: jon snow
Sentence: As a matter of fact, I'm the same as you.

Name: sam tarly
Sentence: I find that hard to believe.

Name: jon snow
Sentence: I came very close once. I was alone in a room with a naked girl, but...

Name: sam tarly
Sentence: You didn't know where to put it?

Name: jon snow
Sentence: I know where to put it.

Name: sam tarly
Sentence: Was she... Old and ugly?

Name: jon snow
Sentence: Young and gorgeous. A whore named Ros.

Name: sam tarly
Sentence: What color hair?

Name: jon snow
Sentence: Red.

Name: sam tarly
Sentence: I like red hair. And her... Her...

Name: jon snow
Sentence: You don't want to know.

Name: sam tarly
Sentence: That good?

Name: jon snow
Sentence: Better.

Name: sam tarly
Sentence: Oh no. So why exactly did you not make love to Ros with the perfect...

Name: jon snow
Sentence: What's my name?

Name: sam tarly
Sentence: Jon Snow?

Name: jon snow
Sentence: And why is my surname Snow?

Name: sam tarly
Sentence: Because... You're a bastard from the north.

Name: jon snow
Sentence: I never met my mother. My father wouldn't even tell me her name. I don't know if she's living or dead. I don't know if she's a noblewoman or a fisherman's wife... Or a whore. So I sat there in the brothel as Ros took off her clothes. But I couldn't do it. Because all I could think was what if I got her pregnant and she had a child, another bastard named Snow? It's not a good life for a child.

Name: sam tarly
Sentence: So... You didn't know where to put it?

Name: alliser thorne
Sentence: Enjoying yourselves? You look cold, boys.

Name: sam tarly
Sentence: It is a bit nippy.

Name: alliser thorne
Sentence: A bit nippy, yeah, by the fire, indoors. It's still summer. Do you boys even remember the last winter? How long has it been now? What, 10 years? I remember. Was it uncomfortable at Winterfell? Were there days when you just couldn't get warm, never mind how many fires your servants built?

Name: jon snow
Sentence: I build my own fires.

Name: alliser thorne
Sentence: That's admirable. I spent six months out there, beyond the Wall during the last winter. It was supposed to be a two-week mission. We heard a rumor Mance Rayder was planning to attack Eastwatch. So we went out to look for some of his men... Capture them, gather some knowledge. The Wildlings who fight for Mance Rayder are hard men. Harder than you'll ever be. They know their country better than we do. They knew there was a storm coming in. So they hid in their caves and waited for it to pass. And we got caught in the open. Wind so strong it yanked 100-foot trees straight from the ground, roots and all. If you took your gloves off to find your cock to have a piss, you lost a finger to the frost. And all in darkness. You don't know cold. Neither of you do. The horses died first. We didn't have enough to feed them, to keep them warm. Eating the horses was easy. But later when we started to fall... That wasn't easy. We should have had a couple of boys like you along, shouldn't we? Soft, fat boys like you. We'd have lasted a fortnight on you and still had bones leftover for soup. Soon we'll have new recruits and you lot will be passed along to the Lord Commander for assignment and they will call you men of the Night's Watch, but you'd be fools to believe it. You're boys still. And come the winter you will die... Like flies.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Sentence: I hit him. I hit the dragon.

Name: jorah mormont
Sentence: Your brother Rhaegar was the last dragon. Viserys is less than the shadow of a snake.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Sentence: He is still the true King.

Name: jorah mormont
Sentence: The truth now

Name: daenerys targaryen
Sentence: No. But the common people are waiting for him. Illyrio said they're sewing dragon banners and praying for his return.

Name: jorah mormont
Sentence: The common people pray for rain, health and a summer that never ends. They don't care what games the high Lords play.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Sentence: What do you pray for, Ser Jorah?

Name: jorah mormont
Sentence: Home.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Sentence: I pray for home too. My brother will never take back the Seven Kingdoms. He couldn't lead an army even if my husband gave him one. He'll never take us home.

Name: petyr baelish
Sentence: Lover's quarrel?

Name: sansa stark
Sentence: I'm sorry. Do I...?

Name: septa mordane
Sentence: Sansa dear, this is Lord Baelish. He's known...

Name: petyr baelish
Sentence: An old friend of the family. I've known your mother a long long time.

Name: arya stark
Sentence: Why do they call you Littlefinger?

Name: sansa stark
Sentence: Arya!

Name: septa mordane
Sentence: Don't be rude!

Name: petyr baelish
Sentence: No, it's quite all right. When I was a child I was very small and I come from a little spit of land called The Fingers, so you see, it's an exceedingly clever nickname.

Name: robert baratheon
Sentence: I've been sitting here for days! Start the damn joust before I piss myself!

Name: sansa stark
Sentence: Gods, who is that?

Name: petyr baelish
Sentence: Ser Gregor Clegane. They call him the Mountain. The Houndo s older brother.

Name: sansa stark
Sentence: And his opponent?

Name: petyr baelish
Sentence: Ser Hugh of the Vale. He was Jon Arryn's squire. Look how far he's come.

Name: robert baratheon
Sentence: Yes, yes. Enough of the bloody pomp. Have at it!

Name: petyr baelish
Sentence: Not what you were expecting? Has anyone ever told you the story of the Mountain and the Hound? Lovely little tale of brotherly love. The Hound was just a pup, six years old maybe. Gregor a few years older, already a big lad, already getting a bit of a reputation. Some lucky boys just born with a talent for violence. One evening... Gregor found his little brother playing with a toy by the fire... Gregor's toy, a wooden knight. Gregor never said a word, he just grabbed his brother by the scruff of his neck and shoved his face into the burning coals. Held him there while the boy screamed, while his face melted. There aren't very many people who know that story.

Name: sansa stark
Sentence: I won't tell anyone. I promise.

Name: petyr baelish
Sentence: No, please don't. If the Hound so much as heard you mention it, I'm afraid all the knights in King's Landing would not be able to save you.

Name: jory cassel
Sentence: My Lord, Her Grace the Queen.

Name: eddard stark
Sentence: Your Grace.

Name: cersei lannister
Sentence: You're missing your tournament.

Name: eddard stark
Sentence: Putting my name on it doesn't make it mine.

Name: cersei lannister
Sentence: I thought we might put what happened on the Kingsroad behind us – the ugliness with the wolves. And forcing you to kill the beast was extreme. Though sometimes we go to extremes where our children are concerned. How is Sansa?

Name: eddard stark
Sentence: She likes it here.

Name: cersei lannister
Sentence: The only Stark who does. Favors her mother, not much of the north in her.

Name: eddard stark
Sentence: What are you doing here?

Name: cersei lannister
Sentence: I might ask the same of you. What is it you hope to accomplish?

Name: eddard stark
Sentence: The King called on me to serve him and the realm, and that's what I'll do until he tells me otherwise.

Name: cersei lannister
Sentence: You can't change him. You can't help him. He'll do what he wants, which is all he's ever done. You'll try your best to pick up the pieces.

Name: eddard stark
Sentence: If that's my job, then so be it.

Name: cersei lannister
Sentence: You're just a soldier, aren't you? You take your orders and you carry on. I suppose it makes sense. Your older brother was trained to lead and you were trained to follow.

Name: eddard stark
Sentence: I was also trained to kill my enemies, Your Grace.

Name: cersei lannister
Sentence: As was I.

Name: marillion
Sentence: Seven blessings to you, goodfolk!

Name: catelyn stark
Sentence: And to you.

Name: rodrick cassel
Sentence: Boy! Bread, meat and beer, quickly.

Name: marillion
Sentence: Good idea, grandfather. I'm starving. A song while we wait or?

Name: rodrick cassel
Sentence: I'd rather throw myself down a well.

Name: marillion
Sentence: Grandfather, may be your last chance if you're heading north. The only music the northerners know is the howling of wolves!

Name: masha heddle
Sentence: I'm sorry, my Lord, we're full up. Every room.

Name: tyrion lannister
Sentence: My men can sleep in the stable. As for myself, I don't require a large room.

Name: masha heddle
Sentence: Truly, my lord, we have nothing.

Name: tyrion lannister
Sentence: Is there nothing I can do... to remedy this?

Name: bronn
Sentence: You can have my room.

Name: tyrion lannister
Sentence: There's a clever man. You can manage food, I trust? Yoren, dine with me.

Name: yoren
Sentence: Aye, my Lord.

Name: marillion
Sentence: My Lord of Lannister! Might I entertain you while you eat? I can sing of your father's victory at King's Landing!

Name: tyrion lannister
Sentence: Nothing would more likely ruin my supper. Lady Stark! What an unexpected pleasure. I was sorry to have missed you at Winterfell.

Name: masha heddle
Sentence: Lady Stark.

Name: catelyn stark
Sentence: I was still Catelyn Tully the last time I stayed here. You, Ser... Is that the black bat of Harrenhal I see embroidered on your coat?

Name: knight of house whent
Sentence: It is, my Lady.

Name: catelyn stark
Sentence: And is Lady Whent a true and honest friend to my father... Lord Hoster Tully of Riverrun?

Name: knight of house whent
Sentence: She is.

Name: catelyn stark
Sentence: The red stallion was always a welcome sight at Riverrun. My father counts Jonas Bracken amongst his oldest and most loyal bannermen.

Name: knight of house bracken
Sentence: Our lord is honored by his trust.

Name: tyrion lannister
Sentence: I envy your father all his fine friends, but I don't quite see the purpose of this.

Name: catelyn stark
Sentence: Knight of House Frey

Name: catelyn stark
Sentence: This man... Came into my house as a guest and there conspired to murder my son, a boy of 10. In the name of King Robert and the good Lords you serve, I call upon you to seize him and help me return him to Winterfell to await the king's justice.

Sentence: My father once told me you were the best he'd ever seen. I never knew the man to be wrong about matters of combat.

Sentence: Your mother was a dumb whore with a fat arse. Did you know that? Look at this idiot! One ball and no brains. He can't even put a man's armor on him properly.

Sentence: You're too fat for your armor.

Sentence: Hmm... A bloody idiot... But Cersei insisted. I have Jon Arryn to thank for her. "Cersei Lannister will make a good match", he told me. "You'll need her father on your side." I thought being King meant I could do whatever I wanted. Enough of this! Let's go watch 'em ride. At least I can smell someone else's blood.

Name: bran stark
Sentence: And then she left!

Sentence: When you were born, I was the one who pulled you from your mother. I placed you in her arms. From that moment until the moment she dies, she will love you. Absolutely. Fiercely.

Name: theon greyjoy
Sentence: Shh... Keep it down. You're not supposed to be inside the castle walls.

Name: ros

Name: theon greyjoy

Sentence: Might surprise you.

Name: theon greyjoy

Name: ros
Sentence: He's good with his fingers too. And his tongue.

Name: theon greyjoy

Name: ros

Sentence: He'll never walk again.

Sentence: But his mind is sound?

Name: eddard stark
Sentence: So they say.

Name: varys
Sentence: A blessing then. I suffered an early mutilation myself. Some doors close forever... others open in the most unexpected places. May I?

Name: varys
Sentence: If the wrong ears heard what I'm about to tell you, off comes my head. And who would mourn poor Varys then? North or South, they sing no songs for spiders. But there are things you must know. You are the King's Hand and the King is a fool... your friend, I know, but a fool... and doomed unless you save him.

Name: eddard stark
Sentence: I've been in the capital a month. Why have you waited so long to tell me this?

Name: varys
Sentence: I didn't trust you.

Name: eddard stark
Sentence: So why do you trust me now?

Name: varys
Sentence: The Queen is not the only one who has been watching you closely. There are few men of honor in the capital. You are one of them. I would like to believe I am another, strange as that may seem.

Name: eddard stark
Sentence: What sort of doom does the King face?

Name: varys
Sentence: The same sort as Jon Arryn. The tears of Lys, they call it. A rare and costly thing, as clear and tasteless as water. It leaves no trace.

Name: eddard stark
Sentence: Who gave it to him?

Name: varys
Sentence: Some dear friend, no doubt. But which one? There were many. Lord Arryn was a kind and trusting man. There was one boy... all he was he owed to Jon Arryn.

Name: eddard stark
Sentence: The squire, Ser Hugh?

Name: varys
Sentence: Pity what happened to him, just when his life seemed to be going so nicely.

Name: eddard stark
Sentence: If Ser Hugh poisoned him, who paid Ser Hugh?

Name: varys
Sentence: Someone who could afford it.

Name: eddard stark
Sentence: Jon was a man of peace. He was Hand for 17 years -- 17 good years. Why kill him?

Name: varys
Sentence: He started asking questions.

Name: varys
Sentence: He's found one bastard already. He has the book. The rest will come.

Name: illyrio mopatis
Sentence: And when he knows the truth, what will he do?

Name: varys
Sentence: The gods alone know. The fools tried to kill his son. What's worse, they botched it. The wolf and the lion will be at each other's throats. We will be at war soon, my friend.

Sentence: What good is war now? We're not ready. If one Hand can die, why not a second?

Name: varys
Sentence: This Hand is not the other.

Name: illyrio mopatis
Sentence: We need time. Khal Drogo will not make his move until his son is born. You know how these savages are.

Name: varys
Sentence: Delay," you say. "Move fast, " I reply. This is no longer a game for two players.

Name: illyrio mopatis
Sentence: It never was.

Name: varys
Sentence: The first to arrive and the last to leave. I admire your industry.

Sentence: You do move quietly.

Sentence: We all have our qualities.

Sentence: You look a bit lonely today. You should pay a visit to my brothel this evening. First boy is on the house.

Name: varys
Sentence: I think you're mistaking business with pleasure.

Sentence: I'm a purveyor of beauty and discretion, both equally important.

Name: varys
Sentence: Though I suppose beauty is a subjective quality, no? Is it true that Ser Marlon of Tumblestone prefers amputees?

Name: petyr baelish
Sentence: All desires are valid to a man with a full purse.

Name: varys
Sentence: And I heard the most awful rumor about a certain lord with a taste for fresh cadavers. Must be enormously difficult to accommodate that inclination. The logistics alone... to find beautiful corpses before they rot.

Name: petyr baelish
Sentence: Strictly speaking, such a thing would not be in accordance with the King's laws.

Name: varys
Sentence: Strictly speaking.

Sentence: Tell me. Does someone, somewhere, keep your balls in a little box? I've often wondered.

Name: varys
Sentence: Do you know, I have no idea where they are? And we had been so close. But enough about me. How have you been since we last saw each other?

Sentence: Since you last saw me or since I last saw you?

Name: varys
Sentence: Now the last time I saw you, you were talking to the Hand of the King.

Sentence: Saw me with your own eyes?

Name: varys
Sentence: Eyes I own.

Name: varys
Sentence: Everyone's well aware of your enduring fondness for Lord Stark's wife. If the Lannisters were behind the attempt on the Stark boy's life and it was discovered that you helped the Starks come to that conclusion... To think... A simple word to the Queen...

Name: petyr baelish
Sentence: One shudders at the thought.

Name: varys
Sentence: Oh.

Sentence: But you know something? I do believe that I have seen you even more recently than you have seen me.

Name: varys
Sentence: Have you?

Sentence: Yes. Earlier today, I distinctly recall seeing you talking to Lord Stark in his chambers.

Name: varys
Sentence: Was that you under the bed?

Name: petyr baelish
Sentence: And not long after that when I saw you escorting a certain foreign dignitary... Council business? Of course you would have friends from across The Narrow Sea. You're from there yourself, after all. We're friends, aren't we, Lord Varys? I'd like to think we are. So you can imagine my burden, wondering if the King might question my friendo s sympathies… To stand at a crossroads where turning left means loyalty to a friend, turning right, loyalty to the realm.

Sentence: The Eyrie. They say it's impregnable.

Sentence: I like you.

Sentence: Lord Stark, your presence has been requested in the small council chamber. A meeting has been called.

Sentence: The King is at the small council meeting, my Lord. He has summoned you.

Sentence: No, my Lord. I believe it concerns Daenerys Targaryen.

Name: robert baratheon
Sentence: The whore is pregnant.

Name: eddard stark
Sentence: You're speaking of murdering a child.

Name: robert baratheon
Sentence: I warned you this would happen. Back in the North, I warned you, but you didn't care to hear. Well, hear it now. I want 'em dead, mother and child both. And that fool, Viserys as well. Is that plain enough for you? I want them both dead.

Name: eddard stark
Sentence: You will dishonor yourself forever if you do this.

Name: robert baratheon
Sentence: Honor?! I've got Seven Kingdoms to rule! One King, Seven Kingdoms. Do you think honor keeps them in line? Do you think it's honor that's keeping the peace? It's fear! Fear and blood!

Name: eddard stark
Sentence: Then we're no better than the Mad King.

Name: robert baratheon
Sentence: Careful, Ned. Careful now.

Sentence: You want to assassinate a girl... Because the Spider heard a rumor?

Name: varys
Sentence: No rumor, my Lord. The princess is with child.

Name: eddard stark

Name: varys
Sentence: Ser Jorah Mormont. He is serving as adviser to the Targaryens.

Name: eddard stark
Sentence: Mormont? You bring us the whispers of a traitor half a world away and call it fact?

Name: petyr baelish
Sentence: Jorah Mormont's a slaver, not a traitor. Small difference, I know, to an honorable man.

Name: eddard stark
Sentence: He broke the law, betrayed his family, fled our land. We commit murder on the word of this man?

Name: robert baratheon
Sentence: And if he's right? If she has a son? A Targaryen at the head of a Dothraki army… What then?

Name: eddard stark
Sentence: The Narrow Sea still lies between us. I'll fear the Dothraki the day they teach their horses to run on water.

Name: robert baratheon
Sentence: Do nothing? That's your wise advice? Do nothing til our enemies are on our shores? You're my council? Counsel! Speak sense to this honorable fool.

Name: varys
Sentence: I understand your misgivings, my Lord. Truly, I do. It is a terrible thing we must consider, a vile thing. Yet, we who presume to rule must sometimes do vile things for the good of the realm. Should the gods grant Daenerys a son, the realm will bleed.

Name: grand maester pycelle
Sentence: I bear this girl no ill will, but should the Dothraki invade, how many innocents will die? How many towns will burn? Is it not wiser, kinder even, that she should die now so that tens of thousands might live?

Name: renly baratheon
Sentence: We should have had them both killed years ago.

Name: petyr baelish
Sentence: When you find yourself in bed with an ugly woman, best close your eyes, get it over with. Cut her throat. Be done with it.

They leave us in our castles. They go from town to town, looting and burning, killing every man who can't hide behind a stone wall, stealing all our crops and livestock, enslaving all our women and children. How long do the people of the Seven Kingdoms stand behind their absentee King, their cowardly King hiding behind high walls? When do the people decide that Viserys Targaryen is the rightful monarch after all.

When I realized that wasn't going to happen, I refused to ask out of spite. I didn't want to give you the satisfaction of thinking I cared enough to ask. And of course, you have also heard the phrase, “a Lannister always pays his debts.” If you deliver a message from me to Lady Arryn, I will be in your debt. I will owe you gold. If you deliver the message and I live, which I very much intend to do.

Name: tyrion lannister
Sentence: Where do I begin, my lords and ladies? I'm a vile man, I confess it. My crimes and sins are beyond counting. I have lied and cheated, gambled and whored. I'm not particularly good at violence, but I'm good at convincing others to do violence for me. You want specifics, I suppose. When I was seven, I saw a servant girl bathing in the river. I stole her robe. She was forced to return to the castle, naked and in tears. I close my eyes, I can still see her tits bouncing. When I was ten, I stuffed my uncle's boots with goatshit. When confronted with my crime, I blamed a squire. Poor boy was flogged and… I escaped justice. When I was twelve, I milked my eel into a pot of turtle stew. I flogged the one-eyed snake. I skinned my sausage. I made the bald man cry into the turtle stew, which I do believe my sister ate. At least I hope she did. I once brought a jackass and a honeycomb into a brothel -

Cersei knows you as a man of honor. lf you give her the peace she needs, and promise to carry her secret to your grave, l believe she will allow you to take the black and live out your days on the Wall with your brother and your bastard son.

Sentence: You think my life is some precious thing to me? That l would trade my honor for a few more years of... of what? You grew up with actors. You learned their craft and you learnt it well. But l grew up with soldiers. l learned how to die a long time ago.

Name: tyrion lannister
Sentence: So l was 16. My brother Jaime and l were riding, when we heard a scream. She ran out onto the road, clothes half torn off, with two men on her heels. Jaime scared away the men easily enough, while l wrapped her in my cloak. She was too scared to send off on her own, so while Jaime hunted down the rapers l took her to the nearest inn and fed her. Her name was Tysha. She was a wheelwright's orphan. And she was hungry. Together we finished off three chickens and a flagon of wine. lmpossible as it seems, there was a time when l was unaccustomed to wine. l forgot how afraid l was around girls. how l was always waiting for them to laugh at me or look away embarrassed, or ask me about my tall, handsome brother. l forgot about everything but Tysha. And somehow l found myself in her bed.

Name: bronn
Sentence: For three chickens, l should hope so.

Name: tyrion lannister
Sentence: lt didn't last long. l didn't know what the hell l was doing. But she was good to me. She kissed me afterwards and sang me a song. And by morning l was deep enough in love to ask for her hand. A few lies, a few gold coins, one drunken septon and there you have it - man and wife. For a fortnight anyway, until the septon sobered up and told my father.

Name: bronn
Sentence: Well, l imagine that was the end of all that.

Name: tyrion lannister
Sentence: Not quite. First, my father had Jaime tell me the truth. The girl was a whore, you see. Jaime had arranged the whole thing - the road, the rapers, all of it. He thought it was time l had a woman. After my brother confessed, my father brought in my wife and gave her to his guards. He paid her well - a silver for each man. How many whores command that kind of price? He brought me into the barracks and made me watch. By the end, she had so much silver that the coins were slipping through her fingers and rolling on to the floor.

Name: bronn
Sentence: l would have killed the man who did that to me.

Sentence: You should have known she was a whore.

Let the High Septon and Baelor the Blessed bear witness to what I say

But now – madness. Madness and stupidity. l always thought you were a stunted fool. Perhaps l was wrong.

Sentence: Monstrous, twisted. l pulled him out myself. He was scaled like a lizard, blind, with leather wings like the wings of a bat. When l touched him the skin fell from his bones. Inside he was full of graveworms. l warned you that only death can pay for life. You knew the price.

So tell me again exactly what it was that you saved?

Name: grand maester pycelle
Sentence: Kings? Oh, l can tell you all there is to know about kings. The thing you need to understand about kings is – For the past 67 years, l've known truly known more kings than any man alive. They're complicated men, but l know how to serve them. Yes, and keep on serving them. Aerys Targaryen. Of all the thousand thousand maladies the Gods visit on us, madness is the worst. He was a good man. Such a charmer. To watch him melt away before my eyes, consumed by dreams of fire and blood. Robert Baratheon was an entirely different animal – powerful man, great warrior, but alas - winning a kingdom and ruling a kingdom are rather different things. They say that if a man goes through life with his battle visor down, he can often be blind to the enemies at his side. Now l serve his son King Joffrey, may the Gods bless his reign.

Name: grand maester pycelle
Sentence: He is a capable young man. Strong military mind. Stern. But sternness in defense of the realm is no vice. lt's far too soon to know what manner of king he will be, but l sense true greatness on the horizon for our new King. Mmm. True greatness.

Name: ros
Sentence: So what's the thing?

Name: grand maester pycelle
Sentence: What thing?

Name: ros
Sentence: About kings. You said, "The thing you need to understand about kings".

Name: grand maester pycelle
Sentence: What? Things? What?

Name: ros
Sentence: When you started, you… Never mind.

Name: grand maester pycelle
Sentence: Let me see you out, my dear.

Name: ros
Sentence: lt's all right. No need.

Name: grand maester pycelle
Sentence: Yes, yes. Till the next time. Right.

Name: varys
Sentence: When you imagine yourself up there, how do you look? Does the crown fit? Do all the lords and ladies simper and bow, the ones who sneered at you for years?

Name: petyr baelish
Sentence: lt's hard for them to simper and bow without heads.

Name: varys
Sentence: A man with great ambition and no morals… l wouldn't bet against you.

Name: petyr baelish
Sentence: And what would you do, my friend, if you found yourself sitting up there?

Name: varys
Sentence: l must be one of the few men in this city who doesn't want to be King.

Name: petyr baelish
Sentence: You must be one of the few men in the city who isn't a man.

Name: varys
Sentence: Oh, you can do better than that.

Name: petyr baelish
Sentence: When they castrated you, did they take the pillar with the stones? l've always wondered.

Name: varys
Sentence: Have you? Do you spend a lot of time wondering what's between my legs?

Name: petyr baelish
Sentence: l picture a gash. Like a woman's. ls that about right?

Name: varys
Sentence: l am flattered, of course, to be pictured at all.

Name: petyr baelish
Sentence: Must be strange for you, even after all these years… a man from another land, despised by most, feared by all.

Name: varys
Sentence: Am l? That is good to know. Do you lie awake at night fearing my gash?

Name: petyr baelish
Sentence: But you carry on whispering in one king's ear and then the next. l admire you.

Name: varys
Sentence: And l admire you, Lord Baelish. A grasper from a minor House with a major talent for befriending powerful men – and women.

Name: petyr baelish
Sentence: A useful talent, l'm sure you'd agree.

Name: varys
Sentence: So here we stand in mutual admiration and respect.

Name: petyr baelish
Sentence: Playing our roles.

Name: varys
Sentence: Serving a new King.

Name: petyr baelish
Sentence: Long may he reign. My king.

Name: varys
Sentence: My king.

Name: joffrey lannister
Sentence: My lords. Shall we begin?

Name: yoren
Sentence: You're Arry now, hear me? Arry the orphan boy. No one asks an orphan too many questions, ‘cause nobody gives three shits. What's your name?

Name: arya stark
Sentence: Arry.

Name: yoren
Sentence: You've a long way to travel, and in bad company. l've 20 this time – men and boys all bound for the Wall. Your lord father gave me the pick of the dungeons, and l didn't find no little lordlings down there. This lot – half of them would turn you over to the King quick as spit for a pardon. And the other half would do the same, except they'd rape you first. So keep to yourself – and when you piss, do it in the woods alone. You stay with this lot, boy. And stay or l'll lock you in the back of the wagon with these three.

Name: hot pie
Sentence: Watch yourself, midget.

Name: lommy greenhands
Sentence: He's got a sword, this one.

Name: hot pie

Sentence: He ain't no squire. Look at him. He looks like a girl. l bet he stole that sword.

Name: lommy greenhands
Sentence: Let's have a look.

Name: hot pie

Name: lommy greenhands
Sentence: Take it off him.

Name: hot pie

Sentence: Look at him! You'd better give Hot Pie the sword. l've seen him kick a boy to death.

Name: hot pie
Sentence: l knocked him down and l kicked him in the balls and l kept kicking him until he was dead. l kicked him all to pieces. You better give me that sword!

Name: arya stark
Sentence: You want it? l'll give it to you. l already killed one fat boy. l bet you never killed anyone. l bet you're a liar. But l'm not. l'm good at killing fat boys. l like killing fat boys.

Name: gendry baratheon
Sentence: Your like picking on the little ones, do you? l've been hammering an anvil these past 10 years. When l hit that steel, it sings. Are you gonna sing when l hit you? This is castle-forged steel. Where'd you steal it?

Name: arya stark
Sentence: lt was a gift.

Name: gendry baratheon
Sentence: lt don't matter now. Where we're going, they don't care what you've done. They've got rapers, pickpockets, highwaymen, murderers.

Sentence: Which are you?

Name: gendry baratheon
Sentence: Armourer's apprentice. But my master got sick of me, so here l am.

Name: yoren
Sentence: Come on, you sorry sons of whores! lt's a thousand leagues from here to the Wall, and winter is coming!

Name: jeor mormont
Sentence: Ham. How many days in a row must a man be expected to start his day with ham? Bring me some beer at least. You look exhausted. Was your moonlight ride that tiring?

Name: jon snow
Sentence: My friends brought me back.

Name: jeor mormont
Sentence: l didn't say it was your honor.

Name: jon snow
Sentence: They killed my father.

Name: jeor mormont
Sentence: And you're gonna bring him back to life, are you? No? Good. We've had enough of that sort of thing. Beyond the Wall, the Rangers are reporting whole villages abandoned. At night they see fires blazing in the mountains from dusk until dawn. A captured wildling swears their tribes are uniting in some secret stronghold, to what ends the gods only know. Outside Eastwatch Cotter Pyke's men discovered four blue-eyed corpses. Unlike us, they were wise enough to burn them. Do you think your brother's war is more important than ours?

Name: jon snow
Sentence: No.

Name: jeor mormont
Sentence: When dead men and worse come hunting for us in the night, do you think it matters who sits on the lron Throne?

Name: jeor mormont
Sentence: Good. Because l want you and your wolf with us when we ride out beyond the Wall tomorrow.

Name: jon snow
Sentence: Beyond the Wall?

Name: jeor mormont
Sentence: l'll not sit meekly by and wait for the snows. l mean to find out what's happening. The Night's Watch will ride in force against the wildlings, the White Walkers and whatever else is out there. And we will find Benjen Stark, alive or dead. l will command them myself. So l'll only ask you once, Lord Snow, are you a brother of the Night's Watch or a bastard boy who wants to play at war?

Name: rakharo
Sentence: ls this your command, Khaleesi?

Sentence: Drogo will have no use for dragon eggs in the Night Lands. Sell them. You can return to the Free Cities and live as a wealthy woman for all your days.

Sentence: Khaleesi, my Queen, l vow to serve you, obey you, to die for you if need be, but let him go, Khaleesi. l know what you intend. Do not.

Sentence: Don't ask me to stand aside as you climb on that pyre. l won't watch you burn.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Sentence: ls that what you fear? You will be my khalasar. l see the faces of slaves. l free you. Take off your collars. Go if you wish, no one will stop you. But if you stay it will be as brothers and sisters, as husbands and wives.

Sentence: Ser Jorah, bind this woman to the pyre. You swore to obey me.

Sentence: I will. But it is not your screams I want. Only your life.

Sentence: The girl is right. What a man sows on his name day, he reaps all year.

Sentence: Take him away. I'll have him killed tomorrow, the fool.

Sentence: What a fine job you've done. . Look at you. . More beautiful than ever. . And you! You, you're going to be bigger than the Hound, but much better looking. . This one doesn't like me.

Name: tyrion lannister
Sentence: But still her father. Surely having so recently lost your own beloved father you can sympathize.

Sentence: My father was a traitor. My mother and brother are traitors, too. I am loyal to my beloved Joffrey.

Name: tyrion lannister
Sentence: Of course you are.

Name: tyrion lannister
Sentence: Well, , enjoy your name day, Your Grace. Wish I could stay and celebrate, but there is work to be done.

Name: joffrey lannister
Sentence: What work? . Why are you here?

Name: pycelle
Sentence: The raven arrived from the Citadel this morning, Your Grace. The conclave has met, , considered reports from Maesters all over the Seven Kingdoms, and declared this great summer done, at last. The longest summer in living memory.

Name: varys
Sentence: The peasants say, a long summer means an even longer winter.

Name: pycelle
Sentence: A common superstition.

Sentence: We have enough wheat for a five-year winter. If it lasts any longer, , we'll have fewer peasants.

Sentence: The city's drowning in refugees, Your Grace, fleeing the war. We have nowhere to house them, and with winter coming, it'll only get worse.

Name: janos

Name: tyrion lannister

Sentence: It's been a remarkable journey. I, , pissed off the edge of the Wall, I slept in a sky cell. . I fought with the hill tribes. So many adventures, so much to be thankful for.

Sentence: If I were capable of tricking father, I'd be emperor of the world by now. You brought this on yourself. .

Sentence: I've done nothing.

Sentence: I tried to stop it.

Name: cersei lannister
Sentence: Robb Stark is a child.

Sentence: Who's won every battle he's fought. Do you understand we're losing the war?

Name: cersei lannister

Name: tyrion lannister
Sentence: Nothing. But I know people. And I know that our enemies hate each other almost as much as they hate us.

Name: cersei lannister
Sentence: Joffrey is King.

Name: tyrion lannister
Sentence: Joffrey is King.

Name: cersei lannister
Sentence: You are here to advise him.

Name: tyrion lannister
Sentence: I'm only here to advise him. And if the King listens to what I say, the King might just get his Uncle Jaime back.

Name: cersei lannister
Sentence: How?

Name: tyrion lannister
Sentence: You love your children. It's your one redeeming quality. That and your cheekbones. The Starks love their children as well. And we have two of them.

Name: cersei lannister
Sentence: One.

Name: tyrion lannister
Sentence: One?

Name: cersei lannister
Sentence: Arya, little animal, she disappeared.

Name: tyrion lannister
Sentence: Disappeared? What, in a puff of smoke? We had three Starks to trade. You chopped one's head off and let another escape. Father will be furious. It must be odd for you to be the disappointing child.

Name: lord
Sentence: My Lord, may the Old Gods watch over your brother and all our northern sons.

Name: lord
Sentence: The walls of my Holdfast will not stand the winter. The stones were last mortared in the time of King Aerys, and I'm afraid the masons today are not fit to carry their fathers' hammers. When I was a boy, I remember seeing them put up a new tower at Torrhen's Square in a summer. Men worked back then. Today, my Holdfast looks like it was built by drunk children. At night you can hear the wind howling through the gaps. And the Gods forbid it rains. Why, I might as well sleep beneath a waterfall.

Name: luwin
Sentence: Maintenance of a Holdfast generally falls to the lord of that Holdfast.

Name: lord
Sentence: Generally, yes, but I've sent all the young men off to fight Robb Stark's war.

Name: osha
Sentence: Did they? . I heard some other fools say it's Lannister Red. Means the Lannisters will rule all Seven Kingdoms before long. I heard a stable boy say it's the color of blood, to mark the death of your father.

Sentence: The stars don't fall for men. The red comet means one thing, boy. Dragons.

Sentence: The dragons are all dead. They've been dead for centuries.

Sentence: She was Drogo's first gift to me.

Sentence: I remember.

Sentence: I promised to protect them. Promised them their enemies would die screaming. How do I make starvation scream?

Name: jorah mormont
Sentence: A trick I never learned, I'm afraid.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Sentence: Does it ever end?

Sentence: This is further east than I've ever been. But, yes, Khaleesi, everything ends, even the red waste.

Sentence: And you're sure there's no other way?

Sentence: If we go south to the land of the Lazarheen, the Lamb Men will kill us and take your dragons. If we go west to the Dothraki Sea, the first Khalasar we meet will kill us and take your dragons.

Sentence: No one will take my dragons.

Sentence: Cities, living or dead. Caravans and people. Rivers or lakes or the great salt sea. Find how far the Red Waste extends before us, and what lies on the other side.

Sentence: Are those girls?

Sentence: I'd keep on not seeing them if I were you.

Sentence: He said he planned to stop here on his way to the Frostfangs.

Name: craster
Sentence: People make all sorts of plans. I haven't seen Benjen Stark in three years. Haven't missed him. Always treated me like scum. . Haven't had any good wine for a long time. You Southerners make good wine, I'll give you that.

Name: jon snow
Sentence: We're not Southerners.

Name: craster
Sentence: Who's this little girl? You're prettier than half my daughters. You got a nice wet twat between your legs? What's your name?

Sentence: Snow, eh? Listen to me, bastard. All you lot from south of the Wall, you're Southerners. But now you're in the North, the real North.

Sentence: The lad meant no harm.

Name: craster
Sentence: I catch that pretty little bastard talking to my daughters -

Sentence: No one will talk to your daughters, you have my word. Now, sit down and shut your mouth.

Sentence: I could tell you, but I'm thirsty.

Sentence: There's a barrel of Dornish wine on the sledge. Bring it in here.

Sentence: You want to know where they've all gone? North! To join up with Mance Rayder Your old friend.

Sentence: Oh, aye. But once he was just a poor black crow. And now he's King-Beyond-the-Wall.

Sentence: He's been calling himself that for years. What's he king of? A frozen lake somewhere?

Name: craster
Sentence: That's a good-looking axe. Fresh forged?

Sentence: Give it here.

Sentence: You'll have another one made at Castle Black. . Here.

Sentence: Oh, that's some lovely steel. . You want to know what Mance Rayder is doing? Gathering an army. What I hear, he's already got more men than any of your southern kings.

Sentence: And where does he plan marching this army?

Name: craster
Sentence: When you're all the way north, there's only one direction to go.

Name: lord mormont
Sentence: These are bad times to be living alone in the wild. The cold winds are rising.

Name: craster
Sentence: Let them come. My roots are sunk deep. Wife, tell the Lord Crow how content we are.

Name: gilly
Sentence: This is our place. Our husband keeps us safe. Better to live free than die a slave.

Name: craster
Sentence: Don't it make you jealous, old man, to see me with all these young wives and you with no one to warm your bed?

Name: lord mormont
Sentence: We chose different paths.

Name: craster
Sentence: Oh, aye, and you chose the path with no one but boys on it. . You'll be wanting to sleep beneath my roof, I suppose, and eat me out of pigs.

Name: lord mormont
Sentence: A roof would be welcome. It's been hard riding. We've brought our own food and good steel for you.

Name: craster
Sentence: Any man lays a hand on one of my wives, he loses the hand. And I see this one, , staring too long, I might just gouge his eyes out.

Sentence: Your roof, your rules.

Sentence: Who am I? Who am I?

Sentence: Lord commander.

Sentence: And who are you?

Sentence: Who are you?

Sentence: Your steward.

Name: lord mormont
Sentence: You want to lead one day? . Then learn how to follow.

Sentence: Lord of Light, come to us in our darkness. We offer you these false Gods.

Sentence: Take them and cast your light upon us. For the night is dark and full of terrors.

Sentence: For the night is dark and full of terrors.

Sentence: After the long summer, darkness will fall heavy on the world. Stars will bleed.

Name: matthos
Sentence: He's my God too, and yours. But you were too blind to see. . Let me teach you how to read.

Name: davos
Sentence: Oh you and your mother.

Name: matthos
Sentence: It won't take long. You already know the letters. The holy books are much more persuasive than I can be.

Name: davos
Sentence: I wish I had a God, truly! I'm not mocking you, but I've seen men pray to every God there is. Pray for wind, pray for rain, pray for home. None of it works!

Name: matthos
Sentence: But you always came home.

Name: davos
Sentence: I wasn't praying.

Name: matthos
Sentence: But I was. Every night that you were at sea, I lit a candle and I prayed, for you.

Name: davos
Sentence: You want me to have a god, fine. King Stannis is my god. He raised me up and blessed me with his trust. He gave you a future I could never have imagined. You know how to read, you'll be a knight someday. You think your fire god commanded all that? It was Stannis. Only Stannis.

Name: matthos
Sentence: Stannis is my king, but he's only a man.

Name: davos
Sentence: Don't tell him that.

Name: cersei lannister
Sentence: Lord Janos Slynt was Commander of the City Watch. You had no right to exile him.

Name: tyrion lannister
Sentence: I have every right. I am the King's Hand.

Name: cersei lannister
Sentence: You're serving as the King's Hand until father gets here. I am Queen Regent.

Name: tyrion lannister
Sentence: Listen to me, Queen Regent, you're losing the people. Do you hear me?

Name: cersei lannister
Sentence: Ha, the people. You think I care?

Name: tyrion lannister
Sentence: You might find it difficult to rule over millions who want you dead. Half the city will starve when winter comes. The other half will plot to overthrow you. And your gold-plated thugs just gave them the rallying cry, “The Queen slaughters babies.” . You don't even have the decency to deny it.

Name: tyrion lannister
Sentence: It wasn't you who gave the order, was it? Joffrey didn't even tell you. Or did he tell you? I imagine that would be even worse.

Name: cersei lannister
Sentence: He did what needed to be done. . You want to be the Hand of the King? You want to rule? This is what ruling is! Lying on a bed of weeds, ripping them out by the root one by one before they strangle you in your sleep.

Name: tyrion lannister
Sentence: I'm no king, but I think there's more to ruling that that.

Name: cersei lannister
Sentence: I don't care what you think! You've never taken it seriously. You haven't, Jaime hasn't. . It's all fallen on me.

Name: tyrion lannister
Sentence: As has Jaime repeatedly, according to Stannis Baratheon.

Name: cersei lannister
Sentence: You're funny. . You've always been funny. But none of your jokes will ever match the first one, will they? You remember... back when you ripped my mother open on your way out of her and she bled to death.

Name: tyrion lannister
Sentence: She was my mother too.

Name: cersei lannister
Sentence: Now they're gone, for the sake of you. There's no bigger joke in the world than that. .

Name: davos
Sentence: Your Grace.

Name: matthos
Sentence: Your Grace.

Sentence: In my experience, pirates prefer fighting unarmed men.

Name: stannis baratheon
Sentence: It won't be a choice this time. Do you trust him?

Name: davos
Sentence: Salladhor Saan is an old friend, I've known him 30 years. I've never trusted him.

Name: stannis baratheon
Sentence: Well if he does his job, he'll have his share. Leave us.

Sentence: The Lord of Light shines through you, young warrior.

Sentence: Come.

Name: stannis baratheon
Sentence: Yeah.

Name: melisandre
Sentence: These armies are but toys for the Lord of Light.

Name: stannis baratheon
Sentence: Tell your lord to burn them then.

Name: melisandre
Sentence: I tell him nothing! I pray for his commands and I obey.

Name: stannis baratheon
Sentence: My little brother has a hundred thousand men according to the scouts. Men whose allegiance rightly belongs to me.

Name: melisandre
Sentence: You must have faith.

Name: stannis baratheon
Sentence: Faith? In a real war, the side with the greater number wins nine times out of ten.

Name: melisandre
Sentence: Then we must be the ten.

Name: stannis baratheon
Sentence: I cannot defeat my brother in the field, and I can't take King's Landing without the men he stole.

Name: melisandre
Sentence: I have seen the path to victory in the flames. At first, you must give yourself to the Lord of Light.

Name: melisandre
Sentence: You must give... all of yourself.

Name: stannis baratheon
Sentence: I have a wife. I took a vow.

Name: melisandre
Sentence: She's sick. Weak. Shut away in the tower. And she disgusts you. And she's given you nothing. No sons. Only stillborns. Only death. . I will give you a son, my King.

Name: stannis baratheon
Sentence: A son?

And all who study these mysteries try their hand at spells. I was no different. I was young. And what boy doesn't secretly wish for hidden powers to lift him out of his dull life into a special one? But in the end, for all my efforts, I got no more out of it than a thousand boys before me. Come on.

I can't picture my brother's face anymore. But Willem, oh, he was a nice-looking boy. He had good white teeth, blue eyes, one of those dimpled chins all the girls like. I would think about him when I was working, when I was drinking, when I was having a shit. It got to the point where I would say his name every night before I went to bed. Willem. Willem. Willem. Sentence: We have been working tirelessly, day and night, ever since your royal sister commanded us to do so. Our present count stands at 7,811. Enough to burn Stannis Baratheon's fleet and armies both.
