Sentence: This is a shit idea.

Name: tyrion lannister
Sentence: I'm afraid I have to concur with my advisor, Wisdom Haylene. The contents of this room could lay King's Landing low. You won't be making wildfire for my sister any longer. You'll be making it for me.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Sentence: Dracarys. Dracarys.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Sentence: He'll be able to feed himself from now on.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Sentence: Let him sleep, Doreah.

Name: doreah
Sentence: Yes, Khaleesi.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Sentence: He loves you.

Name: irri
Sentence: I rewove this part of the top. And I fixed the heel on this one.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Sentence: Thank you, my friend.

Name: doreah
Sentence: Did you see the dress Xaro had made for you? They say he's the wealthiest man in Qarth.

Name: irri
Sentence: It is known.

Name: doreah
Sentence: And if Qarth is the wealthiest city in Essos-

Name: daenerys targaryen
Sentence: The last time a rich man gave me a dress, he was selling me to Khal Drogo.

Name: irri
Sentence: May he ride forever through the night lands.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Sentence: Xaro is our host, but we know nothing about him. Men like to talk about other men when they're happy.

Name: doreah
Sentence: You would look like a real princess in Xaro's-

Name: irri
Sentence: She's not a princess. She's a Khaleesi. You should wear it, Khaleesi.

Name: irri
Sentence: You are their guest. It would be rude not to.

Name: woman
Sentence: And you must visit the night market. The Qartheen night market is like no night market you've ever seen.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Sentence: It sounds wonderful.

Name: woman
Sentence: The Meereenis think they have a night market. I will take you there myself.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Sentence: Please excuse me for a moment.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Sentence: What are they doing?

Name: jorah mormont
Sentence: Malakko says the statue is too heavy to carry. Kovarro says that Malakko is an idiot. They can pry out the gems, the rest is pure gold. Very soft. He can chop off as much as we can carry.

Name: kovarro
Sentence: Or melt it. Very simple.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Sentence: We are his guests! You can't pry it or chop it or melt it.

Name: kovarro
Sentence: Of course not, Khaleesi! We will wait until we leave.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Sentence: Not even when we leave.

Name: kovarro
Sentence: Why not?

Name: daenerys targaryen
Sentence: Our host saved us from the Red Waste and you want to steal from him? I will hear no more.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Sentence: My brother used to say the only thing the Dothraki knew how to do was steal things better men have built.

Name: jorah mormont
Sentence: It's not the only thing. They're quite good at killing the better men.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Sentence: That's not the kind of queen I'm going to be.

Name: pyatt pree
Sentence: Mother of Dragons. On behalf of the warlocks of Qarth, I welcome you. A demonstration?

Name: pyatt pree
Sentence: Take this gem. Look at it. Into its depths. So many facets. Look closely enough and you can see yourself in them. Often more than once.

Name: pyatt pree
Sentence: Should you grow tired of Xaro's baubles and trinkets, it would be an honor to host you at the House of the Undying. You are always welcome, Mother of Dragons.

Name: xaro
Sentence: My apologies. Pyatt Pree is one of the Thirteen. It was customary for me to extend him an invitation. Customs die slow deaths in Qarth.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Sentence: What is the House of the Undying?

Name: xaro
Sentence: It is where the warlocks go to squint at dusty books and drink shade of the evening. It turns their lips blue and their minds soft. So soft, they actually believe their parlor tricks are magic.

Name: quaithe
Sentence: You watch over her.

Name: jorah mormont
Sentence: Do I know you?

Name: quaithe
Sentence: I know you. Jorah Mormont of Bear Island.

Name: jorah mormont
Sentence: Who are you?

Name: quaithe
Sentence: I'm no one. But she is the Mother of Dragons. She needs true protectors, now more than ever. They shall come day and night to see the wonder born into the world again. And when they see, they shall lust, for dragons are fire made flesh. And fire is power.

Name: brienne
Sentence: It looked like Stannis.

Name: catelyn stark
Sentence: To me it just looked like... A shadow in the shape of a man.

Name: brienne
Sentence: In the shape of Stannis.

Name: catelyn stark
Sentence: We should reach my son's camp tomorrow.

Name: brienne
Sentence: Will you stay there long, my lady?

Name: catelyn stark
Sentence: Only long enough to tell Robb what I have seen. After that, I will leave for Winterfell. My two youngest need me. I've been away from them for far too long.

Name: brienne
Sentence: I never knew my mother.

Name: catelyn stark
Sentence: I'm sorry.

Name: catelyn stark
Sentence: My own mother died on the birthing bed when I was very young.

Name: brienne
Sentence: It's a bloody business.

Name: catelyn stark
Sentence: What comes after is even harder.

Name: brienne
Sentence: Once you're safely back amongst your own people, will you give me leave to go, my lady?

Name: catelyn stark
Sentence: You mean to kill Stannis.

Name: brienne
Sentence: I swore a vow.

Name: catelyn stark
Sentence: But Stannis has a great army around him. His own guards are sworn to keep him safe.

Name: catelyn stark
Sentence: I'm as good as any of them. I should never have fled.

Name: catelyn stark
Sentence: Renly's death was no fault of yours. You served him bravely.

Name: brienne
Sentence: I only held him that once as he was dying.

Name: catelyn stark
Sentence: He's gone, Brienne. You serve nothing and no one by following him into the earth. Renly's enemies are Robb's enemies as well.

Name: brienne
Sentence: I do not know your son, my lady. But I could serve you, if you would have me. You have courage. Not battle courage, perhaps, but, I don't know, a woman's kind of courage. And I think that when the time comes, you will not hold me back. Promise me that you will not hold me back from Stannis.

Name: catelyn stark
Sentence: When the time comes, I will not hold you back.

Name: brienne
Sentence: Then I am yours, my lady. I will shield your back and give my life for yours, if it comes to that. I swear it by the Old Gods and the new.

Name: catelyn stark
Sentence: I vow that you shall always have a place in my home and at my table and that I shall ask no service of you that might bring you dishonor. I swear it by the Old Gods and the new.

Name: winterfell shepherd
Sentence: And it's not just thieves, my lord. There's wolves in them hills now, more than I ever seen. They come down in the night and they kill my sheep. My three sons is away fighting for your brother, my lord. They'll fight, keep fighting till they're told to go home. I have no one to man my flock now. Only me. I can't keep watch all day and all night.

Name: bran stark
Sentence: We can send two orphan boys from Winterstown home with you to help watch over your flock if you can give them room and board.

Name: winterfell shepherd
Sentence: My wife always prayed for more children. We'll look after them. Thank you, my lord. And may the gods bless you and yours.

Name: bran stark
Sentence: Stop it. If that's everyone, I'm going to go for a ride before dark.

Name: luwin
Sentence: Good.

Name: bran stark
Sentence: Hodor.

Name: hodor
Sentence: Hodor.

Name: rodrik
Sentence: Bran! Lord Stark. Torrhen's Square is under siege.

Name: luwin
Sentence: Torrhen's Square is barely forty leagues from here. How can the Lannisters strike so far north?

Name: rodrik
Sentence: Might be a raiding party led by the Mountain. Might be sellswords paid by Tywin Lannister.

Name: bran stark
Sentence: We have to help them.

Name: rodrik
Sentence: Most of the fighting men are away with Robb, but I can gather two hundred decent men.

Name: luwin
Sentence: Do you need so many?

Name: bran stark
Sentence: If we can't protect our own bannermen, why should they protect us? Go, Ser Rodrik. Take the men you need.

Name: rodrik
Sentence: Won't take long, my lord. Southerners don't do well up here.

Name: bran stark
Sentence: So, what does it mean?

Name: osha
Sentence: Ask your Maester Luwin. He's the one studying books all the time.

Name: bran stark
Sentence: I did ask him. He'd never heard of a three-eyed raven.

Name: osha
Sentence: Must not mean anything, then.

Name: bran stark
Sentence: You're lying.

Name: osha
Sentence: You might be a little lord, but don't you call me a liar.

Name: bran stark
Sentence: You know what it means.

Name: osha
Sentence: I never said I didn't.

Name: bran stark
Sentence: You didn't give me an honest answer.

Name: osha
Sentence: That's not the same as being a liar.

Name: bran stark
Sentence: Well, it's not far off.

Name: osha
Sentence: So, you've been dreaming of a three-eyed raven again? In the godswood, you told me you didn't dream. Now who's a liar? What did you see in your dream?

Name: osha
Sentence: Something bad? Tell me, boy.

Name: bran stark
Sentence: I dreamt that the sea came to Winterfell. I saw waves crashing against the gates and the water came flowing over the walls. It flooded the castle. Drowned men were floating here, in the yard. Ser Rodrik was one of them.

Name: osha
Sentence: The sea is hundreds of miles away.

Name: bran stark
Sentence: I know. It's just a stupid dream.

Name: osha
Sentence: I've got to get these potatoes to the kitchen. Otherwise they'll put me in chains again.

Name: bran stark
Sentence: Osha. The three-eyed raven, what do they say about it north of the Wall?

Name: osha
Sentence: They say all sorts of crazy things north of the Wall.

Name: qhorin
Sentence: There.

Name: jeor
Sentence: Where?

Name: qhorin
Sentence: On that mountain.

Name: sam
Sentence: I don't see very well.

Name: jon snow
Sentence: A fire.

Name: qhorin
Sentence: There's a fire. The people sitting around it have better eyes than yours or mine. When they see us coming, that fire becomes a signal. Gives Mance Rayder plenty of time to throw a party in our honor.

Name: jeor
Sentence: How many wildlings have joined him?

Name: qhorin
Sentence: From what we can tell, all of them. Mance has gathered them all like deer against the wolves. They're almost ready to make their move.

Name: jon snow
Sentence: Where?

Name: qhorin
Sentence: Somewhere safe. Somewhere south. Can't just march into their midst. And we can't wait for them here with nothing but a pile of stones to protect us.

Name: jeor
Sentence: You saying we should fall back to the Wall?

Name: qhorin
Sentence: Mance was one of us once. Now he's one of them. He's going to teach them our way of doing things. They'll hit us in force and they won't run away when we hit back. They're gonna be more organized than before, more disciplined, more like us. So we need to be more like them, do things their way. Sneak in, kill Mance, and scatter them to the winds before they can march on the Wall. And to do that

Name: jeor
Sentence: We need to get rid of those lookouts.

Name: qhorin
Sentence: It's not a job for 400 men. I need to move fast and silent. Harker, Stonesnake, Borba.

Name: jon snow
Sentence: Lord Commander, I'd like to join Lord Qhorin.

Name: qhorin
Sentence: I've been called lots of things, but that might be my first Lord Qhorin. You're a steward, Snow, not a ranger.

Name: jon snow
Sentence: I've fought and killed a wight. How many rangers can say that?

Name: qhorin
Sentence: He's the one?

Name: jeor
Sentence: Aye. You killed a wight. You also let an old man beat you bloody and take your sword.

Name: qhorin
Sentence: Craster? In the boy's defense, that's a tough old goat.

Name: sam
Sentence: I could take up Jon's duties while he's gone, my lord. It would be no trouble.

Name: jeor
Sentence: Well, I hope you make a better ranger than you do a steward. Go on.

Name: xaro
Sentence: So, tell me, how long has your manservant been in love with you?

Name: daenerys targaryen
Sentence: He's not my manservant and he's not in love with me. He's my advisor and he's my friend.

Name: xaro
Sentence: Unlikely. I can almost always tell what a man wants.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Sentence: And what about what a woman wants?

Name: xaro
Sentence: Much more complicated. You, for example, what do you want?

Name: daenerys targaryen
Sentence: To cross the Narrow Sea and take back the Iron Throne.

Name: xaro
Sentence: Why?

Name: daenerys targaryen
Sentence: Because I promised my khalasar I'd protect them and find them a safe home.

Name: xaro
Sentence: You want to conquer the Seven Kingdoms for the Dothraki?

Name: daenerys targaryen
Sentence: I want them because they're mine by right. The Iron Throne is mine and I will take it.

Name: xaro
Sentence: Ah, a conqueror.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Sentence: And how did you get all of this? Did someone give it to you?

Name: xaro
Sentence: No. I come from nothing. I hit the docks like a piece of cargo, except someone normally cares what happens to cargo.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Sentence: So you wanted more than you had and you took it. You're a conqueror, too. You're just less ambitious.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Sentence: What do you want, Xaro Xhoan Daxos? At the gates of the city, you bled for me. Why?

Name: xaro
Sentence: I will show you why.

Name: xaro
Sentence: The door and the vault is made of Valyrian stone. The hardest steel does not make a mark. I offered the greatest locksmiths in Qarth their weight in gold if they could break into it. I made the same offer to the greatest thieves. They all went home empty-handed. The only thing that can open this door is this key.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Sentence: And behind the door?

Name: daenerys targaryen
Sentence: And it can all be mine?

Name: xaro
Sentence: All? Let us say half. More than enough to buy horses, ships, armies. Enough to go home.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Sentence: All I have to do?

Name: xaro
Sentence: Is marry me.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Sentence: That was a romantic proposal.

Name: xaro
Sentence: I've already married once for love, but the gods stole her from me. I come from nothing. My mother and father never owned a pair of shoes. But marry me, and I will give you the Seven Kingdoms and our children will be princes and princesses.

Name: xaro
Sentence: See? I have more ambition than you thought. The time is right, Daenerys Targaryen, First of Your Name. Robert Baratheon is dead.

Name: jorah mormont
Sentence: If you cross the sea with an army you bought and a foreign husband who paid for it...

Name: daenerys targaryen
Sentence: The Seven Kingdoms are at war with one another. Four false kings destroying the country.

Name: jorah mormont
Sentence: To win Westeros, you need support from Westeros.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Sentence: The usurper is dead.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Sentence: The Starks fight the Lannisters, and Baratheons fight each other.

Name: jorah mormont
Sentence: According to your new friend who earned your trust by cutting his hand?

Name: daenerys targaryen
Sentence: The time to strike is now. We need to find ships and an army or we'll spend the rest of our lives rotting away at the edge of the world.

Name: jorah mormont
Sentence: Rich men do not become rich by giving more than they get. They'll give you ships and soldiers and they'll own you forever. Moving carefully is the hard way, but it's the right way.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Sentence: And if I'd listened to that advice outside the gates of Qarth, we'd all be dead by now.

Name: jorah mormont
Sentence: I know the opportunity before you seems like the last you'll ever have, but you musT-

Name: daenerys targaryen
Sentence: Do not speak to me like I'm a child.

Name: jorah mormont
Sentence: I only want-

Name: daenerys targaryen
Sentence: What do you want? Tell me.

Name: jorah mormont
Sentence: To see you on the Iron Throne.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Sentence: Why?

Name: jorah mormont
Sentence: You have a good claim. A title. A birthright. But you have something more than that. You may cover it up and deny it, but you have a gentle heart. You would not only be respected and feared, you would be loved. Someone who can rule and should rule. Centuries come and go without a person like that coming into the world. There are times when I look at you and I still can't believe you're real.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Sentence: So what would you have me do, as my advisor?

Name: jorah mormont
Sentence: Make your own way. Find your own ship. You only need one. The allies we need are in Westeros, not Qarth.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Sentence: And how do I get the ship?

Name: jorah mormont
Sentence: I'll find it for you. A sound ship with a good captain.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Sentence: I look forward to meeting him.

Name: jorah mormont
Sentence: Khaleesi.

Name: arya stark
Sentence: You should stand sideface.

Name: gendry baratheon
Sentence: Sideface?

Name: arya stark
Sentence: Sideways.

Name: arya stark
Sentence: Smaller target.

Sentence: Am I fighting someone?

Sentence: You're practicing for a fight. You should practice right.

Sentence: Go up the battlement.

Sentence: That is strange.

Sentence: Move away. Stand back. He's dead.

Sentence: To take the castle.

Sentence: You went with Robb.

Sentence: And he sent me back to Pyke. I'm a Greyjoy. I can't fight for Robb and my father both. Where's Hodor?

Name: bran stark
Sentence: I don't know.

Episode Title: The Old Gods and the New
Name: theon greyjoy
Sentence: Find the halfwit.

Sentence: My men are bringing your people together in the courtyard.

Episode Title: The Old Gods and the New
Name: theon greyjoy
Sentence: So you and I can go down and tell them - how you've yielded Winterfell to me.

Episode Title: The Old Gods and the New
Name: bran stark
Sentence: I won't.

Episode Title: The Old Gods and the New
Name: theon greyjoy
Sentence: Yes, you will.

Episode Title: The Old Gods and the New
Name: bran stark
Sentence: I won't. I'll never yield. We'll fight you and throw you out.

Episode Title: The Old Gods and the New
Name: theon greyjoy
Sentence: The castle is mine. But these people are still yours. You'll yield to keep them safe, to keep them alive. That's what a good lord would do. Think carefully about what you want to say.

Episode Title: The Old Gods and the New
Name: bran stark
Sentence: Theon. Did you hate us the whole time?

Episode Title: The Old Gods and the New
Name: bran stark
Sentence: I've yielded Winterfell to Theon.

Name: theon greyjoy
Sentence: Louder. Say Prince Theon.

Name: bran stark
Sentence: I've yielded Winterfell to Prince Theon. You all know me.

Name: farlen
Sentence: Aye, we know you for a steaming sack of shit.

Episode Title: The Old Gods and the New
Name: bran stark
Sentence: Farlen, you be silent.

Episode Title: The Old Gods and the New
Name: theon greyjoy
Sentence: Listen to your little lord, Farlen. He has more sense than you do.

Episode Title: The Old Gods and the New
Name: bran stark
Sentence: All of you should do as he commands.

Episode Title: The Old Gods and the New
Name: theon greyjoy
Sentence: My father has donned the ancient crown of Salt and Rock and declared himself King of the Iron Islands. He claims the North as well by right of conquest. You are all his subjects.

Episode Title: The Old Gods and the New
Name: farlen
Sentence: Bugger that. I serve the Starks. If you think you can hold the North with it-

Episode Title: The Old Gods and the New
Name: ironborn
Sentence: Shut up!

Episode Title: The Old Gods and the New
Name: theon greyjoy
Sentence: If you serve me as loyally as you served Ned Stark, I will be as good to you as he ever was. Betray me, and you will wish you hadn't. Maester Luwin, send a raven to Pyke informing my father of my victory here. And one to Deepwood Motte to my sister. Inform her that she's to bring You are a maester of the Citadel, sworn to serve the Lord of Winterfell, are you not?

Episode Title: The Old Gods and the New
Name: luwin
Sentence: I am.

Episode Title: The Old Gods and the New
Name: theon greyjoy
Sentence: I am the Lord of Winterfell as Bran just informed you. Send the ravens.

Episode Title: The Old Gods and the New
Name: luwin
Sentence: My lord.

Episode Title: The Old Gods and the New
Name: osha
Sentence: My Lord Greyjoy.

Episode Title: The Old Gods and the New
Name: theon greyjoy
Sentence: I see you've finally learned how to address your betters. What do you want? I was brought here a captive.

Episode Title: The Old Gods and the New
Name: osha
Sentence: You were here the day I was taken.

Episode Title: The Old Gods and the New
Name: theon greyjoy
Sentence: I'm the one who took you. What of it?

Episode Title: The Old Gods and the New
Name: osha
Sentence: Let me serve you.

Episode Title: The Old Gods and the New
Name: theon greyjoy
Sentence: Serve me how? I need fighters, not kitchen sluts.

Episode Title: The Old Gods and the New
Name: osha
Sentence: It was Robb Stark who put me in the kitchens. Put a spear in my hand again.

Episode Title: The Old Gods and the New
Name: theon greyjoy
Sentence: So you can bury it in my neck? Do you take me for a fool? Get up.

Episode Title: The Old Gods and the New
Name: osha
Sentence: Step aside.

Episode Title: The Old Gods and the New
Name: osha
Sentence: It's your dream, little lord. The ocean has come to swallow this place. I ain't letting it drown me.

Episode Title: The Old Gods and the New
Name: theon greyjoy
Sentence: You'll all go about your tasks as usual. And in a few days' time-

Episode Title: The Old Gods and the New
Name: black lorren
Sentence: Greyjoy!

Episode Title: The Old Gods and the New
Name: black lorren
Sentence: We caught this one on his way back from Torrhen's Square. Took out two of ours before I got his sword.

Episode Title: The Old Gods and the New
Name: theon greyjoy
Sentence: Ser Rodrik, it grieves me that we meet as foes.

Episode Title: The Old Gods and the New
Name: rodrik
Sentence: It grieves me you've less honor than a back alley whore. You were raised here under this roof. These people are your people.

Episode Title: The Old Gods and the New
Name: theon greyjoy
Sentence: They are not my people.

Episode Title: The Old Gods and the New
Name: rodrik
Sentence: King Robb thought of you as a brother.

Episode Title: The Old Gods and the New
Name: theon greyjoy
Sentence: My brothers are dead. They died fighting Stark men, men like you.

Episode Title: The Old Gods and the New
Name: rodrik
Sentence: Aye, they died fighting a war your father started. Lord Stark raised you among his own sons.

Episode Title: The Old Gods and the New
Name: theon greyjoy
Sentence: Among them, but not one of them. I was his hostage, taken from my home.

Episode Title: The Old Gods and the New
Name: rodrik
Sentence: If he were alive to see this

Episode Title: The Old Gods and the New
Name: theon greyjoy
Sentence: He's not. He's dead. The Seven Kingdoms are at war. And Winterfell is mine.

Episode Title: The Old Gods and the New
Name: rodrik
Sentence: I should have put a sword in your belly instead of in your hand.

Episode Title: The Old Gods and the New
Name: theon greyjoy
Sentence: You've served this house faithfully, old man. But keep talking and I'll-

Episode Title: The Old Gods and the New
Name: theon greyjoy
Sentence: Take him to the cells. Lock him up

Episode Title: The Old Gods and the New
Name: dagmer
Sentence: My prince. You cannot let that stand. He must pay.

Episode Title: The Old Gods and the New
Name: theon greyjoy
Sentence: I'll lock him in a cell until he rots.

Episode Title: The Old Gods and the New
Name: dagmer
Sentence: No, he has to pay the iron price. They'll never respect you while he lives.

Episode Title: The Old Gods and the New
Name: theon greyjoy
Sentence: Ser Rodrik, I sentence you to death!

Episode Title: The Old Gods and the New
Name: bran stark
Sentence: No! You said no harm would come to them if I yielded.

Episode Title: The Old Gods and the New
Name: theon greyjoy
Sentence: The old man couldn't keep his mouth shut.

Episode Title: The Old Gods and the New
Name: luwin
Sentence: I urge you not to make a hasty decision.

Episode Title: The Old Gods and the New
Name: theon greyjoy
Sentence: He disrespected me in front of my men. That was his decision, not mine.

Episode Title: The Old Gods and the New
Name: luwin
Sentence: He is worth more to you alive than dead. The Starks will pay. Please, Theon, think what you do.

Episode Title: The Old Gods and the New

Name: talisa
Sentence: When I was twelve, my mother and father went to a wedding. Weddings in Volantis last for days, you know. And they left me with my little brother. The second afternoon they were gone was the hottest day in the three-year summer. We couldn't bear to be inside, so we ran down to the Rhoyne. Every child in Volantis was in the Rhoyne that day. The rich, the poor, we were all there. Naked, screaming, racing to the little islands. Drummers were playing for coppers on the east bank. I was treading water, talking to a friend, when I realized I hadn't seen my brother. I called his name. Then I started screaming his name. And then I saw him floating face down. My heart just stopped. I was I dragged him from the water. My friend helped me, I think. I don't even remember. He was so little. Then we pulled him onto the riverbank. And I screamed at him and I shook him. And he was dead. Just dead. A man ran over. He had a fish tattoo on his face. In Volantis, the slaves have tattoos. So you know what they are without having to talk to them. And this man worked on a fishing boat. And he pushed me out of the way. You have to understand, for a slave to push a highborn girl, that's death for the man, a terrible death. But he pushed me out of the way, and he started pressing on my brother's chest again and again and again, until my brother spat out half of the Rhoyne and cried out. And the man cradled his head and told him to be calm. I decided two things that day. I would not waste my years planning dances and masquerades with the other noble ladies. And when I came of age, I would never live in a slave city again. I'm sorry, Your Grace. You told me of your problems and I've blathered on.

Sentence: I, Joffrey of the House Baratheon, first of my name, the rightful King of the Andals and the First Men, Lord of the Seven Kingdoms and Protector of the Realm, do hereby proclaim my grandfather, Tywin Lannister, the savior of the city and the Hand of the King.

Sentence: Occasionally I drank with the harlots.

Name: tywin lannister
Sentence: What do you want, Tyrion?

Name: tyrion lannister
Sentence: Why does everyone assume I want something? Can't I simply visit with my beloved father? My beloved father who somehow forgot to visit his wounded son after he fell on the battlefield.

Name: tywin lannister
Sentence: Maester Pycelle assured me your wounds were not fatal.

Name: tyrion lannister
Sentence: I organized the defense of this city while you held court in the ruins of Harrenhal. I led the foray when the enemies were at the gate while your grandson, the king, quivered in fear behind the walls. I bled in the mud for our family. And as my reward, I was trundled off to some dark little cell. But what do I want? A little bloody gratitude would be a start.

Name: tywin lannister
Sentence: Jugglers and singers require applause. You are a Lannister. Do you think I demanded a garland of roses every time I suffered a wound on a battlefield? Hmm? Now, I have seven kingdoms to look after and three of them are in open rebellion. So tell me what you want.

Name: tyrion lannister
Sentence: I want what is mine by right. Jaime is your eldest son, heir to your lands and titles. But he is a Kingsguard, forbidden from marriage or inheritance. The day Jaime put on the white cloak, he gave up his claim to Casterly Rock. I am your son and lawful heir.

Name: tywin lannister
Sentence: You want Casterly Rock?

Name: tyrion lannister
Sentence: It is mine by right.

Name: tywin lannister
Sentence: We'll find you accommodations more suited to your name and as a reward for your accomplishments during the battle of Blackwater Bay. And when the time is right, you will be given a position fit for your talents so that you can serve your family and protect our legacy. And if you serve faithfully, you will be rewarded with a suitable wife. And I would let myself be consumed by maggots before mocking the family name and making you heir to Casterly Rock.

Name: tyrion lannister
Sentence: Why?

Name: tywin lannister
Sentence: Why? You ask that? You, who killed your mother to come into the world? You are an ill-made, spiteful little creature full of envy, lust, and low cunning. Men's laws give you the right to bear my name and display my colors since I cannot prove that you are not mine. And to teach me humility, the gods have condemned me to watch you waddle about wearing that proud lion that was my father's sigil and his father's before him. But neither gods nor men will ever compel me to let you turn Casterly Rock into your whorehouse. Go, now. Speak no more of your rights to Casterly Rock. Go.

Name: tywin lannister
Sentence: Oh, one more thing. The next whore I catch in your bed, I'll hang.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Sentence: Not fast enough. I can't wait that long. I need an army

Sentence: We'll be in Astapor by nightfall. Some say the Unsullied are the greatest soldiers in the world.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Sentence: The greatest slave-soldiers in the world. The distinction means a good deal to some people.

Name: jorah mormont
Sentence: Do those people have any better ideas about how to put you on the Iron Throne?

Name: daenerys targaryen
Sentence: It's too beautiful a day to argue.

Name: jorah mormont
Sentence: You're right. Another lovely day on the high seas.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Sentence: Don't mock them. They're the first Dothraki who have ever been on a ship. They followed me across the poison water. If they'll do it, others will. And with a true khalasar ...

Name: jorah mormont
Sentence: The Dothraki follow strength above all, khaleesi. You'll have a true khalasar when you prove yourself strong. And not before.

Name: davos
Sentence: Your Grace.

Name: stannis baratheon
Sentence: I heard you were dead.

Name: davos
Sentence: Not yet.

Name: stannis baratheon
Sentence: I had hoped to speak to you alone, Your Grace.

Name: stannis baratheon
Sentence: We are alone.

Name: davos
Sentence: Your Grace, you are the rightful king. Not only by blood. You're an honorable man, a just man. And there is still a war to fight.

Name: stannis baratheon
Sentence: I am fighting.

Name: davos
Sentence: By burning prisoners alive?

Name: melisandre
Sentence: How would you punish the infidels, Ser Davos?

Name: davos
Sentence: I do not judge people for the gods they worship. If I did, I'd have thrown you in the sea before you ever set foot on Dragonstone.

Name: melisandre
Sentence: I'm not your enemy.

Name: davos
Sentence: You are my enemy.

Name: melisandre
Sentence: Was it me you fought on Blackwater Bay? Did I set your ships ablaze? I wasn't there when the wildfire killed our men by the thousands. I could have saved those men. You would have taken the city, Stannis would now sit upon his rightful throne, and you would stand beside him. But I wasn't there because you convinced your king to leave me behind. Do you hear them screaming? All those burning men in the water crying for their mothers, for their gods for help? Until the moment the Blackwater swallowed them.

Name: melisandre
Sentence: Don't despair, Ser Davos. What I told your son is true.

Name: melisandre
Sentence: Death by fire is the purest death.

Name: davos
Sentence: This woman is evil! She's the mother of demons.

Name: stannis baratheon
Sentence: Take him to the dungeon and lock him in a cell.

Name: davos
Sentence: Your Grace!

Name: guard
Sentence: Come on.

Name: melisandre
Sentence: You've chosen the darkness, Ser Davos.

Name: davos
Sentence: She will destroy us all!

Name: melisandre
Sentence: I will pray for you.

Name: guard
Sentence: Guard

Name: guard
Sentence: Guard #2

Name: joffrey lannister
Sentence: Why have we stopped?

Name: guard
Sentence: It's Lady Margaery, Your Grace.

Name: joffrey lannister
Sentence: What is she doing? Who gave her permission?

Name: maid
Sentence: My lady. We should have guards, my lady.

Name: margaery tyrell
Sentence: Why?

Name: margaery tyrell
Sentence: Pardon me.

Name: maid
Sentence: Stop, my lady. You'll ruin your dress.

Name: margaery tyrell
Sentence: I have others.

Name: guard
Sentence: Would you like to speak with her, Your Grace?

Name: joffrey lannister
Sentence: No.

Name: child
Sentence: He was a soldier. He went to fight on the walls when the ships came into Blackwater Bay. He never came back.

Name: margaery tyrell
Sentence: And your mother?

Name: child
Sentence: She died when she had me.

Name: margaery tyrell
Sentence: Bad men wanted to come into this city and do terrible things, but your father stopped them.

Name: margaery tyrell
Sentence: Whenever you look at this knight, I want you to remember your father.

Name: child
Sentence: He wasn't a knight. He was just a soldier.

Name: margaery tyrell
Sentence: And what do knights swear to do? Protect the weak and uphold the good. Your father did that. Be proud of him.

Name: margaery tyrell
Sentence: Was your father a soldier, too?

Name: margaery tyrell
Sentence: You should be proud, too. Under King Joffrey's leadership, your fathers saved the city. They saved us all. From now on, we're going to take care of you. All of you.

Name: margaery tyrell
Sentence: Come to me for whatever you need to feed them, clothe them, or house them. Directly to me.

Name: margaery tyrell
Sentence: Your Grace.

Name: loras
Sentence: Your Grace.

Name: joffrey lannister
Sentence: Please, sit. Sit. I do apologize, my lady. Small council meetings. At what point does it become treason to waste the king's time?

Name: joffrey lannister
Sentence: That's a lovely gown, my lady.

Name: cersei lannister
Sentence: Yes, it suits you perfectly. I imagine you might be rather cold.

Name: margaery tyrell
Sentence: The climate is a bit more forgiving back in Highgarden, Your Grace.

Name: joffrey lannister
Sentence: Shall I have them bring you a shawl, my lady?

Name: margaery tyrell
Sentence: I am touched by your concern, Your Grace. Luckily for us Tyrells, our blood runs quite warm. Doesn't it, Loras?

Name: loras
Sentence: Yes.

Name: margaery tyrell
Sentence: Loras, isn't the queen's gown magnificent? The fabric, the embroidery, the metalwork. I've never seen anything like it.

Name: cersei lannister
Sentence: You might find a bit of armor quite useful once you become queen. Perhaps before. Joffrey tells me you stopped your carriage at Flea Bottom on your way back from the sept this morning.

Name: margaery tyrell
Sentence: Yes. I paid a visit to an orphanage the High Septon told me about.

Name: loras
Sentence: Margaery does a great deal of work with the poor back in Highgarden.

Name: margaery tyrell
Sentence: The lowest among us are no different from the highest if you give them a chance and approach them with an open heart.

Name: cersei lannister
Sentence: An open heart is what you'll get in Flea Bottom if you're not careful, my dear. Not long ago, we were attacked by a mob there. We had a full complement of guards that didn't stop them. The king barely escaped with his life.

Name: joffrey lannister
Sentence: My mother's always had a penchant for drama. Facts become less and less important to her as she grows older. Our lives were never truly in danger.

Name: cersei lannister
Sentence: You're right, of course. But you are your father's son. We can't all have a king's bravery.

Name: margaery tyrell
Sentence: Hunger turns men into beasts. I'm glad House Tyrell has been able to help in this regard. They tell me 100 wagons arrive daily now from the Reach. Wheat, barley, apples. We've had a blessed harvest. And, of course, it's our duty to assist the capital in time of need.

Name: joffrey lannister
Sentence: Well, as Ser Loras said, Lady Margaery has done this sort of... charitable work before. I'm sure she knows what she's doing.

Name: cersei lannister
Sentence: I'm sure she does.

Name: missandei
Sentence: The Unsullied have stood here for a day and a night with no food or water.

Name: missandei
Sentence: They will stand until they drop.

Name: missandei
Sentence: Such is their obedience.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Sentence: They may suit my needs. Tell me of their training.

Name: missandei
Sentence: The Westrosi woman is pleased with them, but speaks no praise to keep the price down. She wished to know how they are trained.

Name: kraznys mo nakloz
Sentence: Tell her what she would know and be quick about it.

Name: missandei
Sentence: They begin their training at five. Every day they drill from dawn to dusk until they have mastered the shortsword, the shield, and the three spears. Only one boy in four survives this rigorous training.

Name: missandei
Sentence: Their discipline and loyalty are absolute. They fear nothing.

Name: jorah mormont
Sentence: Even the bravest men fear death.

Name: missandei
Sentence: The knight says even brave men fear death.

Name: kraznys mo nakloz
Sentence: Tell the old man he smells of piss.

Name: missandei
Sentence: Truly, master?

Name: kraznys mo nakloz
Sentence: No, not truly. Are you a girl or a goat to ask such a thing?

Name: missandei
Sentence: My master says the Unsullied are not men. Death means nothing to them.

Name: kraznys mo nakloz
Sentence: Tell this ignorant whore of a Westerner to open her eyes and watch.

Name: missandei
Sentence: He begs you attend to this carefully, Your Grace.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Sentence: Tell the good master there is no need.

Name: kraznys mo nakloz
Sentence: She's worried about their nipples? Doers the dumb bitch know we've cut off their balls?

Name: missandei
Sentence: My master points out that men don't need nipples.

Name: kraznys mo nakloz
Sentence: Here, I'm done with you.

Name: unsullied
Sentence: This one is pleased to have served you.

Name: missandei
Sentence: To win his shield, an Unsullied must go to the slave marts with a silver mark, find a newborn, and kill it before its mother's eyes. This way, my master says, we make certain there is no weakness left in them.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Sentence: You take a babe from its mother's arms, kill it as she watches, and pay for her pain with a silver coin?

Name: missandei
Sentence: She is offended. She asks if you pay a sliver coin to the mother for her dead baby.

Name: kraznys mo nakloz
Sentence: What a soft mewling fool this one is.

Name: missandei
Sentence: My master would like you to know that the silver is paid to the baby's owner, not the mother.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Sentence: How many do you have to sell?

Name: missandei
Sentence: Eight thousand.

Name: kraznys mo nakloz
Sentence: Tell the Westerosi whore she has until tomorrow.

Name: missandei
Sentence: Master Kraznys asks that you please hurry. Many other buyers are interested.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Sentence: Eight thousand dead babies.

Name: jorah mormont
Sentence: The Unsullied are a means to an end.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Sentence: Once I own them, these men...

Name: jorah mormont
Sentence: They're not men. Not anymore.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Sentence: Once I own an army of slaves, what will I be?

Name: jorah mormont
Sentence: Do you think these slaves will have better lives serving Kraznys and men like him or serving you?

Name: jorah mormont
Sentence: You'll be fair to them. You won't mutilate them to make a point.

Name: jorah mormont
Sentence: You won't order them to murder babies. You'll see they're properly fed and sheltered. A great injustice has been done to them. Closing your eyes will not undo it.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Sentence: The warlocks.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Sentence: I owe you my life, Ser.

Name: barristan
Sentence: The honor is mine, my queen.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Sentence: You know this man?

Name: jorah mormont
Sentence: I know him as one of the greatest fighters the Seven Kingdoms has ever seen and as the Lord Commander of Robert Baratheon's Kingsguard.

Name: barristan
Sentence: King Robert is dead. I have been searching for you, Daenerys Stormborn, to ask your forgiveness. I was sworn to protect your family. I failed them.

Name: jon snow
Sentence: Don't think too much, Bran.

Name: jon snow
Sentence: Relax your bow arm.

Sentence: And which one of you was a marksman at ten?

Name: bran stark
Sentence: Father?

Sentence: Because the raven is you.

Name: hodor
Sentence: Hodor.

Sentence: It's all right, Hodor.

Name: osha
Sentence: Were you inside the wolf again, little lord?

Name: bran stark
Sentence: No, it was the three-eyed raven.

Name: osha
Sentence: He's back.

Name: bran stark
Sentence: I tried to kill it, but I couldn't. There was a boy.

Name: osha
Sentence: I don't want to hear about it.

Name: bran stark
Sentence: But you asked.

Name: osha
Sentence: We've got plenty of worries. We don't need to pour black magic on top of them.

Name: bran stark
Sentence: I didn't ask for black magic dreams.

Name: osha
Sentence: I know you didn't, little lord.

Name: osha
Sentence: We need to move.

Name: bran stark
Sentence: We don't know who might be after us. No one even knows we're alive.

Name: osha
Sentence: And who told you that? The three-eyed raven tell you?

Name: bran stark
Sentence: No.

Name: osha
Sentence: Some good he is, then.

Name: osha
Sentence: I don't know what other people know and what they don't. I only know the Wall is a long way off.

Name: talisa
Sentence: My mother always told me you Westerosi were a grim lot. Grim, bearded, stinking barbarians that would row across the Narrow Sea and steal us from our beds.

Name: robb stark
Sentence: Did you ever think you'd marry one?

Name: talisa
Sentence: I never thought I'd marry anyone at all.

Name: robb stark
Sentence: Never?

Name: talisa
Sentence: Not until I met the king of the grim, bearded, stinking barbarians.

Sentence: Pardon me, Your Grace. My queen.

Name: talisa
Sentence: Lord Bolton.

Name: robb stark
Sentence: Let me guess which one is the good news.

Name: roose bolton
Sentence: Word from Riverrun and Winterfell.

Name: catelyn stark
Sentence: I hadn't seen him in years. I don't even know how many.

Sentence: We'll travel to the funeral together. Lord Bolton will garrison here until we return.

Sentence: Will I be wearing manacles when I lay my father to rest?

Name: catelyn stark

Sentence: By the time Bolton's bastard Ramsay got to Winterfell, the Ironborn were gone. They massacred everyone and put the castle to the torch. And Bran and Rickon have not been found. They may have escaped. Or Theon may have taken them back to the Iron Islands as hostages.

Name: robb stark
Sentence: No.

Sentence: Where am I? Who are you? What do you want?

Sentence: Do you know how long it's going to take us to get to King's Landing walking through fields and forests?

Sentence: Yes.

Name: brienne
Sentence: By putting one foot in front of the other.

Name: jaime lannister
Sentence: It's going to be a very dull walk.

Name: brienne
Sentence: I'm here to take you to King's Landing and bring back Lady Stark's daughters in exchange. Dull is fine.

Name: jaime lannister
Sentence: You know, it doesn't matter how loyal a servant you are, no one enjoys the company of a humorless mute. Trust me on this. People have been serving me since I was born. You think Lady Stark is going to want a giant towheaded plank following her around for the rest of her life? A week's journey with you and she'll order you to fall on your sword.

Name: brienne
Sentence: If Lady Stark is unhappy with any aspect of my service, I'm sure she'll let me know. She's an honest woman.

Name: jaime lannister
Sentence: All the good it's done her.

Name: jaime lannister
Sentence: How did you come into Lady Stark's service? There's something we can talk about.

Name: brienne
Sentence: Not your concern, Kingslayer.

Name: jaime lannister
Sentence: It had to be recently. You weren't with her at Winterfell.

Name: brienne
Sentence: How would you know?

Name: jaime lannister
Sentence: Because I visited Winterfell. I would have noticed your dour head smacking into the archways.

Name: brienne
Sentence: Move.

Name: jaime lannister
Sentence: Were you pledged to Stannis?

Name: brienne
Sentence: Gods, no.

Name: jaime lannister
Sentence: Ah, Renly. Really? He wasn't fit to rule over anything more important than a 12-course meal.

Name: brienne
Sentence: Shut your mouth.

Name: jaime lannister
Sentence: Why? I lived with him at court since he was a boy, don't forget. Could hardly escape the little tulip. Skipping down the corridors in his embroidered silks. I knew him far better than you.

Name: brienne
Sentence: I knew him as well as anyone. As a member of his Kingsguard, he trusted me with everything. He would have been a wonderful king.

Name: jaime lannister
Sentence: Sounds like you quite fancied him.

Name: brienne
Sentence: I did not fancy him.

Name: jaime lannister
Sentence: Oh, gods, you did.

Name: jaime lannister
Sentence: Did you ever tell him? No, of course not. You weren't Renly's type, I'm afraid.

Name: jaime lannister
Sentence: He preferred curly-haired little girls like Loras Tyrell. You're far too much man for him.

Name: brienne
Sentence: I'm not interested in foul rumors.

Name: jaime lannister
Sentence: Unless they're about me. It's all true about Renly. His proclivities were the worst kept secret at court. It's a shame the throne isn't made out of cocks. They'd have never got him off it.

Name: brienne
Sentence: Shut your mouth!

Name: jaime lannister
Sentence: I don't blame him. And I don't blame you, either. We don't get to choose who we love.

Name: man
Sentence: Where are you headed, then?

Name: brienne
Sentence: South. You?

Name: man
Sentence: Riverrun. Staying off the kingsroad, are you? They get you no matter where you go. You can't win.

Name: jaime lannister
Sentence: No, you really can't.

Name: man
Sentence: Looks like you're safe enough, though. Meaning no offense, my lady, but I wouldn't tangle with you. Seven blessings to you.

Name: brienne
Sentence: And you.

Name: jaime lannister
Sentence: He knows who I am.

Name: brienne
Sentence: He doesn't.

Name: jaime lannister
Sentence: Maybe you're right. But what if you're not? What if he tells someone?

Name: brienne
Sentence: We're not doing it. He's an innocent man.

Name: jaime lannister
Sentence: More innocent than Lady Stark's daughters?

Name: joffrey lannister
Sentence: Make it tighter here.

Name: cersei lannister
Sentence: That's better. It makes you look very strong.

Name: joffrey lannister
Sentence: No flowers. I said no flowers. All these are wrong. Bring others.

Sentence: Yes, Your Grace.

Name: joffrey lannister

Sentence: Tell me what you think of her.

Name: joffrey lannister
Sentence: Who?

Sentence: Margaery.

Name: joffrey lannister
Sentence: She's an ideal match. With the Tyrells beside us, we'll crush the Northerners. Hang their lords, burn their strongholds, sow their fields with salt, and no one will think of rebelling for another century.

Name: cersei lannister
Sentence: It is a good match, but what do you think of her? She's beautiful and intelligent.

Name: joffrey lannister
Sentence: Yes, she is.

Name: cersei lannister
Sentence: Her concern with the well-being of the common people is interesting.

Name: joffrey lannister
Sentence: Not to me.

Name: cersei lannister
Sentence: I only meant that to go out of your way to endanger yourself.

Name: joffrey lannister
Sentence: This is becoming one of the most boring conversations I've ever had.

Name: cersei lannister
Sentence: Margaery Tyrell dotes on filthy urchins for a reason. She dresses like a harlot for a reason. She married a traitor and known degenerate like Renly Baratheon for a reason.

Name: joffrey lannister
Sentence: She married Renly Baratheon because she was told to. That's what intelligent women do-what they're told.

Name: cersei lannister
Sentence: You need to ask yourself

Name: joffrey lannister
Sentence: I don't need to do anything.

Name: joffrey lannister
Sentence: Better. Much better.

Name: shae
Sentence: I still don't believe it.

Name: sansa stark
Sentence: He didn't. He didn't want anything. He just takes an interest because he loved my mother.

Name: shae
Sentence: Men only want one thing from a pretty girl.

Name: sansa stark
Sentence: Littlefinger's not in love with me.

Name: shae
Sentence: Love is not the thing he wants.

Name: sansa stark
Sentence: He's too old.

Name: shae
Sentence: They never see it that way. He didn't ask you to do something for him? Spy on someone or...?

Name: sansa stark
Sentence: No.

Name: shae
Sentence: If he does ask you for anything or try anything or touch you, I want you to tell me.

Name: sansa stark
Sentence: Why? What will you do? I will make him stop.

Name: guard
Sentence: Ser Loras Tyrell, my lady.

Name: sansa stark
Sentence: Send him in.

Name: loras
Sentence: Lady Sansa.

Name: sansa stark
Sentence: Ser Loras.

Name: loras
Sentence: My sister Margaery invites you to take the air with her and our grandmother, the Lady Olenna, in the gardens. May I escort you to them?

Name: loras
Sentence: I believe you grow more beautiful every day, Lady Sansa.

Name: sansa stark
Sentence: You are too kind, Ser Loras. You probably don't remember the first time we met. At the Hando s tourney, you gave me your favor. A rose, a red rose.

Name: loras
Sentence: Of course I did.

Name: margaery tyrell
Sentence: It's more your color. You take it.

Name: maid
Sentence: Thank you.

Name: margaery tyrell
Sentence: You're such a dear.

Name: loras
Sentence: I'll take my leave. Lady Sansa.

Name: sansa stark
Sentence: Thank you, Ser Loras.

Name: margaery tyrell
Sentence: Come. Lady Sansa, it is my honor to present my grandmother the Lady Olenna of House Tyrell.

Name: olenna tyrell
Sentence: Kiss me, child.

Name: olenna tyrell
Sentence: It's so good of you to visit me and my foolish flock of hens. We're very sorry for your losses.

Name: sansa stark
Sentence: And I was sorry when I heard of Lord Renly's death, Lady Margaery. He was very gallant.

Name: olenna tyrell
Sentence: Gallant, yes. And charming and very clean. He knew how to dress and smile and somehow this gave him the notion he was fit to be king.

Name: margaery tyrell
Sentence: Renly was brave and gentle, Grandmother. Father liked him and so did Loras.

Name: olenna tyrell
Sentence: Loras is young and very good at knocking men off horses with a stick. That does not make him wise. As to your fathead father-

Name: margaery tyrell
Sentence: Grandmother! What will Sansa think of us?

Name: olenna tyrell
Sentence: She might think we have some wits about us. One of us, at any rate. It was treason. I warned them. Robert has two sons and Renly has an older brother. How could he possibly have any claim to that ugly iron chair? We should have stayed well out of all this if you ask me. But once the cow's been milked, there's no squirting the cream back up her udders. So here we are to see things through. What do you say to that, Sansa? Shall we have some lemon cakes?

Name: sansa stark
Sentence: Lemon cake's my favorite.

Name: olenna tyrell
Sentence: So we've been told. Are you going to bring the food or do you mean to starve us to death? Here, Sansa, come sit with me. I'm much less boring than these others.

Name: olenna tyrell
Sentence: Do you know my son? The Lord of Highgarden?

Name: sansa stark
Sentence: I haven't had the pleasure.

Name: olenna tyrell
Sentence: No great pleasure, believe me. A ponderous oaf. His father was an oaf as well. My husband, the late Lord Luthor. He managed to ride off a cliff whilst hawking. They say he was looking up at the sky and paying no mind to where his horse was taking him. And now my son is doing the same, only this time he's riding a lion instead of a horse. Now I want you to tell me the truth about this royal boy, this Joffrey.

Name: sansa stark
Sentence: I-, I-

Name: olenna tyrell
Sentence: You, you. Who else would know better? We've heard some troubling tales. Is there any truth to them? Has this boy mistreated you?

Name: olenna tyrell
Sentence: Has he ripped out your tongue?

Name: sansa stark
Sentence: Joff-King Joffrey, he-His Grace is very fair and handsome and as brave as a lion

Name: olenna tyrell
Sentence: Yes, all Lannisters are lions. And when a Tyrell farts, it smells like a rose. But how kind is he? How clever? Has he a good heart, a gentle hand?

Name: margaery tyrell
Sentence: I'm to be his wife. I only want to know what that means.

Name: olenna tyrell
Sentence: Bring me some cheese.

Name: servant
Sentence: The cheese will be served after the cakes, my lady.

Name: olenna tyrell
Sentence: The cheese will be served when I want it served. And I want it served now.

Name: olenna tyrell
Sentence: Are you frightened, child? No need for that. We're only women here. Tell us the truth. No harm will come to you.

Name: sansa stark
Sentence: My father always told the truth.

Name: olenna tyrell
Sentence: Yes, he had that reputation. And they named him traitor and took his head.

Name: sansa stark
Sentence: Joffrey. Joffrey did that. He promised he would be merciful and he cut my father's head off. And he said that was mercy. Then he took me up on the walls and made me look at it.

Name: olenna tyrell
Sentence: Go on.

Name: sansa stark
Sentence: I-I can't. I never meant-my father was a traitor. My brother as well. I have traitor's blood. Please don't make me say anymore.

Name: margaery tyrell
Sentence: She's terrified, Grandmother. Just look at her.

Name: olenna tyrell
Sentence: Speak freely, child. We would never betray your confidence, I swear it.

Name: sansa stark
Sentence: He's a monster.

Name: olenna tyrell
Sentence: Ah. That's a pity.

Name: sansa stark
Sentence: Please, don't stop the wedding.

Name: olenna tyrell

So I prayed to the gods, take him away. Make him die. He got the pox. And I knew I was the worst woman who ever lived. A murderer. I'd condemned this poor, innocent child to a horrible death all because I was jealous of his mother. A woman he didn't even know. So I prayed to all seven gods, let the boy live. Let him live and I'll love him. I'll be a mother to him. I'll beg my husband to give him a true name, to call him Stark and be done with it, to make him one of us.

Episode Title: And Now His Watch Is Ended
Name: varys
Sentence: As a boy, I traveled with a troupe of actors through the Free Cities. One day in Myr, a certain man made my master an offer too tempting to refuse. I feared the man meant to use me as I'd heard some men used small boys. But what he wanted was far worse. He gave me a potion that made me powerless to move or speak, yet did nothing to dull my senses. With a hooked blade he sliced me, root and stem, chanting all the while. He burned my parts in a brazier. The flames turned blue and I heard a voice answer his call. I still dream of that night. Not of the sorcerer, not of his blade. I dream of the voice from the flames. Was it a god? A demon? A conjurer's trick? I don't know. But the sorcerer called and a voice answered. And ever since that day, I have hated magic and all those who practice it. But you can see why I was eager to aid in your fight against Stannis and his Red Priestess. A symbolic revenge of sorts.

Episode Title: And Now His Watch Is Ended
Name: tyrion lannister
Sentence: Yes, ahem. I feel the need for actual revenge against the actual person who tried to have me killed. Which will require a degree of influence, which-

Episode Title: And Now His Watch Is Ended
Name: varys
Sentence: You do not possess at the moment.

Episode Title: And Now His Watch Is Ended
Name: varys
Sentence: But influence is largely a matter of patience, I have found. Once I had served the sorcerer's purpose, he threw me out of his house to die. I resolved to live to spite him. I begged. I sold what parts of my body remained to me. I became an excellent thief and soon learned that the contents of a man's letters are more valuable than the contents of his purse. Step by step, one distasteful task after another, I made my way from the slums of Myr to the small council chamber. Influence grows like a weed. I tended mine patiently until its tendrils reached from the Red Keep all the way across to the far side of the world where I managed to wrap them around something very special.

Name: jaime lannister
Sentence: You swore a solemn vow, remember? You're supposed to get me to King's Landing in one piece. Not going so well, is it? No wonder Renly died with you guarding him.

Name: jaime lannister
Sentence: That was unworthy. Forgive me. You protected me better than most-

Name: brienne
Sentence: Don't you mock me.

Name: jaime lannister
Sentence: I'm apologizing. I'm sick of fighting. Let's call a truce.

Name: brienne
Sentence: You need trust to have a truce.

Name: jaime lannister
Sentence: I trust you.

Name: jaime lannister
Sentence: There it is. There's the look. I've seen it for seventeen years on face after face. You all despise me. Kingslayer. Oathbreaker. A man without honor. You've heard of wildfire?

Name: brienne
Sentence: Of course.

Name: jaime lannister
Sentence: The Mad King was obsessed with it. He loved to watch people burn, the way their skin blackened and blistered and melted off their bones. He burned lords he didn't like. He burned Hands who disobeyed him. He burned anyone who was against him. Before long, half the country was against him. Aerys saw traitors everywhere. So he had his pyromancer place caches of wildfire all over the city- beneath the Sept of Baelor and the slums of Flea Bottom. Under houses, stables, taverns. Even beneath the Red Keep itself. Finally, the day of reckoning came. Robert Baratheon marched on the capital after his victory at the Trident. But my father arrived first with the whole Lannister army at his back, promising to defend the city against the rebels. I knew my father better than that. He's never been one to pick the losing side. I told the Mad King as much. I urged him to surrender peacefully. But the king didn't listen to me. He didn't listen to Varys who tried to warn him. But he did listen to Grand Maester Pycelle, that grey, sunken cunt. 'You can trust the Lannisters,' he said. 'The Lannisters have always been true friends of the crown.' So we opened the gates and my father sacked the city. Once again, I came to the king, begging him to surrender. He told me to bring him my father's head. Then he turned to his pyromancer. 'Burn them all,' he said. 'Burn them in their homes. Burn them in their beds.' Tell me, if your precious Renly commanded you to kill your own father and stand by while thousands of men, women, and children burned alive, would you have done it? Would you have kept your oath then?

Name: jaime lannister
Sentence: First, I killed the pyromancer. And then when the king turned to flee, I drove my sword into his back. 'Burn them all,' he kept saying. 'Burn them all.' I don't think he expected to die. He- he meant to burn with the rest of us and rise again, reborn as a dragon to turn his enemies to ash. I slit his throat to make sure that didn't happen. That's where Ned Stark found me.

Name: brienne
Sentence: If this is true why didn't you tell anyone? Why didn't you tell Lord Stark?

Name: jaime lannister
Sentence: Stark? You think the honorable Ned Stark wanted to hear my side? He judged me guilty the moment he set eyes on me. By what right does the wolf judge the lion? By what right?

Sentence: Help! Help! The Kingslayer!

Name: jorah mormont
Sentence: Proudest moment of my life. One knee in the dust, the king's sword on my shoulder, listening to the words. 'In the name of the Warrior, I charge you to be brave.' All I could think of was how badly I had to piss.

Name: jorah mormont
Sentence: In full plate metal for sixteen hours. Never occurred to me till the fighting was over. I was very nearly the first man knighted to piss on the king's boots.

Name: barristan
Sentence: Robert would have laughed. He was a good man, a great warrior. And a terrible king. I burned away my years fighting for terrible kings.

Name: jorah mormont
Sentence: You swore an oath.

Name: barristan
Sentence: Yes. And a man of honor keeps his vows, even if he's serving a drunk or a lunatic. Just once in my life before it's over, I want to know what it's like to serve with pride, to fight for someone I believe in. Do you believe in her?

Sentence: From this day forward you will choose your own names. You will tell your fellow soldiers to do the same. Throw away your slave name. Choose the name your parents gave you, or any other. A name that gives you pride.

Sentence: Grey Worm" gives me pride. It is a very lucky name. The name this one was born with was cursed. That was the name he had when he was taken as a slave. But Grey Worm is the name this one had the day Daenerys Stormborn set him free.

Sentence: The Karstarks have marched home. The young wolf has lost half his army. His days are numbered. Theon Greyjoy murdered both his brothers. That makes Sansa Stark the heir to Winterfell. And I am not about to hand her over to the Tyrells.

Sentence: The Tyrell army is helping us to win this war. Do you really think it's wise to refuse them?

Sentence: Is the Wall as big as they say?

Name: sam
Sentence: I'm not. It's seven hundred feet high, all made of ice. On a warm day you can see it weeping. Castle Black is nice enough. They keep a fire burning in the long hall day and night. And Hobb makes venison stew with onions. Very tasty. Sometimes, one of the brothers will sing. Dareon sings best.

Name: thoros
Sentence: I've always been a terrible priest. Drank too much rum. Fucked all the whores in King's Landing. It's a terrible thing to say, but by the time I came to Westeros, I didn't believe in our Lord. I decided that He, that all the gods, were stories we told the children to make them behave. So I wore the robes and every now and then I'd recite the prayers, but it was just for show. A spectacle for the locals. Until the Mountain drove a lance through this one's heart. I knelt beside his cold body and said the old words. Not because I believed in them, but he was my friend and he was dead. And they were the only words I knew. And for the first time in my life, the Lord replied. Beric's eyes opened and I knew the truth. Our god is the one true god. And all men must serve Him.

Name: melisandre

Sentence: A thousand blades taken from the hands of Aegon's fallen enemies, forged in the fiery breath of Balerion the Dread.

Sentence: There aren't. There aren't even two hundred. I've counted.

Name: varys
Sentence: Ha, I'm sure you have. Ugly old thing. Yet it has a certain appeal. The Lysa Arryn of chairs. Shame you had to settle for your second choice.

Sentence: Early days, my friend. It is flattering, really, you feeling such dread at the prospect of me getting what I want.

Name: varys
Sentence: Thwarting you has never been my primary ambition, I promise you. Although who doesn't like to see their friends fail now and then?

Name: petyr baelish
Sentence: You're so right. For instance, when I thwarted your plan to give Sansa Stark to the Tyrells. If I'm going to be honest, I did feel an unmistakable sense of enjoyment there. But your confidant, the one who fed you information about my plans, the one you swore to protect, you didn't bring her any enjoyment. And she didn't bring me any enjoyment. She was a bad investment on my part. Luckily, I have a friend who wanted to try something new. Something daring. And he was so grateful to me for providing this fresh experience.

Name: varys
Sentence: I did what I did for the good of the realm.

Name: petyr baelish
Sentence: The realm? Do you know what the realm is? It's the thousand blades of Aegon's enemies. A story we agree to tell each other over and over till we forget that it's a lie.

Name: varys
Sentence: But what do we have left once we abandon the lie? Chaos. A gaping pit waiting to swallow us all.

Name: petyr baelish
Sentence: Chaos isn't a pit. Chaos is a ladder.

Name: petyr baelish
Sentence: Many who try to climb it fail and never get to try again. The fall breaks them.

Name: petyr baelish
Sentence: And some are given a chance to climb, but they refuse. They cling to the realm or the gods or love. Illusions. Only the ladder is real. The climb is all there is.

Swaddled them, rocked them, fed them at her own breast. Elia wouldn't let the wet nurse touch them. And beautiful, noble Rhaegar Targaryen left her for another woman. That started a war and the war ended right here when your father's army took the city...

Name: tyrion lannister
Sentence: I wasn't actually present.

Name: oberyn martell
Sentence: And butchered those children. My nephew and niece. Carved them up and wrapped them in Lannister cloaks. And my sister, you know what they did to her?

Name: oberyn martell
Sentence: I'm asking you a question.

Name: tyrion lannister
Sentence: I've heard rumors.

Name: oberyn martell
Sentence: So have I. The one I keep hearing is that Gregor Clegane the Mountain raped Elia and split her in half with his great sword.

Name: tyrion lannister
Sentence: I wasn't there. I don't know what happened.

Name: oberyn martell
Sentence: If the Mountain killed my sister, your father gave the order. Tell your father I'm here. And tell him the Lannisters aren't the only ones who pay their debts.

Sentence: They're dragons, Khaleesi. They can never be tamed. Not even by their mother.

Sentence: I lie awake all night staring at the canopy thinking about how they died.

Sentence: I could get you essence of nightshade to help you sleep.

Name: sansa stark
Sentence: Do you know what they did to my brother? How they sewed his direwolf's head onto his body? And my mother. They say they cut her throat to the bone and threw her body in the river.

Name: tyrion lannister
Sentence: What happened to your family was a terrible crime. I didn't know your brother. He seemed like a good man, but I didn't know him. Your mother, on the other hand, I admired her. She wanted to have me executed, but I admired her. She was a strong woman. And she was fierce when it came to protecting her children. Sansa. Your mother would want you to carry on. You know it's true.

Name: sansa stark
Sentence: Will you pardon me, my lord? I'd like to visit the godswood.

Sentence: Of course. Of course. Prayer can be helpful, I hear.

Sentence: I don't pray anymore. It's the only place I can go where people don't talk to me.

Sentence: My lion.

Sentence: I'm not sure I've ever smelled a dead cat.

Sentence: Well, they smell like Pycelle.

Sentence: It must have been traumatic for you.

Name: cersei lannister
Sentence: My only daughter was shipped off to Dorne. We suffered through a siege.

Name: jaime lannister
Sentence: A rather short siege.

Name: cersei lannister
Sentence: A rather short siege that I didn't expect to survive. And now I'm marrying my eldest son to a wicked little bitch from Highgarden while I'm supposed to marry her brother, a renowned pillow biter. So...

Name: jaime lannister
Sentence: Father disowned me today.

Name: cersei lannister
Sentence: He can't disown you. You're all he's got.

Name: jaime lannister
Sentence: You're forgetting Tyrion.

Sentence: Staying in the Kingsguard means I live right here in the Red Keep with you.

Name: cersei lannister
Sentence: Not now.

Name: jaime lannister
Sentence: I want... Not now? When? I've been back for weeks.

Name: jaime lannister
Sentence: Something's changed.

Sentence: What do you want me to apologize for?

Name: cersei lannister
Sentence: For leaving me.

Name: jaime lannister
Sentence: You think I wanted to be taken prisoner?

Name: cersei lannister
Sentence: Don't know what you wanted. You weren't here. You left me alone.

Sentence: Every day I was a prisoner, I plotted my escape. Every day. I murdered people so I could be here with you.

Name: cersei lannister
Sentence: You took too long.

Sentence: I've seen you slip a shaft through a rabbit's eye at 200 yards. If that boy's still walking, it's 'cause you let him go.

Name: jon snow
Sentence: Last time I saw him, he was in the courtyard at Winterfell. "He said, " Next time I see you, you'll be all in black." I was jealous of Robb my whole life. The way my father looked at him, I wanted that. He was better than me at everything... fighting and hunting and riding and girls. Gods, the girls loved him. I wanted to hate him, but I never could.

Sentence: Well, you're better than me at everything. Except reading.

Sentence: There's a band of wildlings south of the Wall already led by Tormund Giantsbane. I killed their warg and three others. They shot me full of arrows. Their orders are to attack Castle Black from the south when Mance hits it from the north. The signal for the attack will be a bonfire. Mance said it would be the greatest fire the North has ever seen. That's the truth. All the truth.

Sentence: None of us are free. We are men of the Night's Watch. But we won't be taking your head today, Jon Snow. Go on.

Sentence: The Margaery Tyrell who walks into the sept a fortnight from now will inspire 1,000 songs. Now, how sad it will be if she's wearing rubbish like that.

Sentence: Perhaps I should just let Joffrey choose it for me. End up with a string of dead sparrow heads around my neck.

Sentence: My lady. My lady. Please pardon me for interrupting. My name is Brienne of Tarth.

Sentence: We know who you are. We've heard all about you. But hearing is one thing. Aren't you just marvelous? Absolutely singular.

Sentence: A shadow with the face of Stannis Baratheon. I swear to you by all the gods it was Stannis. He plunged his sword through Renly's heart and disappeared. One day, my lady, I will avenge our king.

Name: brienne
Sentence: I meant no offense.

Sentence: Margaery Tyrell, I've heard.

Defeated the Smiling Knight in single combat. Ser Duncan the Tall. Four pages for Ser Duncan. He must have been quite a man.

Sentence: Someone forgot to write down all your great deeds.

Sentence: Your Grace.

Name: daario
Sentence: A dusk rose.

Sentence: Would you like to walk at the back of the train instead of riding?

Name: daario
Sentence: And this one's called lady's lace.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Sentence: Would you like to walk without shoes?

Name: daario
Sentence: You have to know a land to rule it. It's plants, it's rivers, it's roads, it's people. Dusk rose tea eases fever. Everyone in Meereen knows that. Especially the slaves who have to make the tea. If you want them to follow you, you have to become a part of their world. Strategy.

Name: daario
Sentence: Harpy's Gold. No tea from this one. Beautiful but poisonous.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Sentence: You are a gambler, aren't you?

Name: daario
Sentence: Your Grace.

Sentence: There's one on every mile marker between here and Meereen.

Sentence: How many miles are there between here and Meereen?

Sentence: There she is.

Sentence: Yes, there she is.

Sentence: To return the Stark girls to their mother who is now dead.

Name: brienne
Sentence: To keep them safe.

Name: jaime lannister
Sentence: Well, Arya Stark hasn't been seen since her father was killed. Where do you think she is? My money's on dead. There's a certain safety in death, wouldn't you say? And Sansa Stark is now Sansa Lannister. Bit of a complication.

Name: brienne
Sentence: A complication does not release you from a vow.

Name: jaime lannister
Sentence: What do you want me to do? Kidnap my sister-in-law? And take her where? Where would she be safer than here?

Sentence: Look me in the eye and tell me that you think she'll be safe in King's Landing.

Name: jaime lannister
Sentence: Are you sure we're not related? Ever since I've returned, every Lannister I've seen has been a miserable pain in my ass. Maybe you're a Lannister, too. You've got the hair for it if not the looks.

Sentence: It's all right. It's all right. It's all right.

Name: sansa stark
Sentence: You're drunk.

Sentence: Yes. I have good reason to be. Once I was a knight. Now I'm only a fool. Don't you know me?

Sentence: Ser Dontos. The king's nameday celebration. I'm sorry. I should have remembered.

Sentence: I can't accept your apology. I may be a fool, but I'm a living fool, thanks to you.

Name: sansa stark
Sentence: Anyone would have done the same.

Name: ser dontos
Sentence: But only you did. I can never repay you. You gave me my life. But this, this is worth more than my life.

Name: ser dontos
Sentence: It belonged to my mother and her mother before her. House Hollard was strong once. House on the rise. That's all that's left of those days, thanks to a few sad, fat drunks like me.

Name: sansa stark
Sentence: I can't take it. It's very, very kind of you, but I can't.

Sentence: I don't have anything else left. That's all. Take it. Wear it. Let my name have one more moment in the sun before it disappears from the world.

Sentence: Yeah.

Sentence: When am I going to get a horse of my own?

Sentence: You're not very smart, are you?

Sentence: I'm not a thief.

Sentence: You think I'm gonna escape? Where would I go? I'd be dead by nightfall without you. My family's gone. I've got no one.

Sentence: I know him. The small one. His name is Polliver. He captured us and took us to Harrenhal.

Sentence: He killed Lommy.

Sentence: Hmm. Baelor the Blessed was holy. And pious. He built this sept. He also named a six-year-old boy high septon because he thought the boy could work miracles. He ended up fasting himself into an early grave because food was of this world and this world was sinful.

Name: tywin lannister
Sentence: Yeah. A good king must be just. Orys I was just. Everyone applauded his reforms. Nobles and commoners alike. But he wasn't just for long. He was murdered in his sleep after less than a year by his own brother. Was that truly just of him? To abandon his subjects to an evil that he was too gullible to recognize?

Name: tommen lannister

Name: tywin lannister
Sentence: No.

Sentence: Yes. Strength. King Robert was strong. He won the rebellion and crushed the Targaryen dynasty. And he attended three small council meetings in 17 years. He spent his time whoring and hunting and drinking until the last two killed him. So, we have a man who starves himself to death, a man who lets his own brother murder him, and a man who thinks that winning and ruling are the same thing. What do they all lack?

Sentence: Wisdom.

Name: tywin lannister
Sentence: Yes!

Sentence: Yes. But what is wisdom? Hmm? A house with great wealth and fertile lands asks you for your protection against another house with a strong Navy that could one day oppose you. How do you know which choice is wise and which isn't? You've any experience of treasuries and granaries or shipyards and soldiers?

Name: tywin lannister
Sentence: No. Of course not. A wise king knows what he knows and what he doesn't. You're young. A wise young king listens to his counselors and heeds their advice until he comes of age. And the wisest kings continue to listen to them long afterwards... Your brother was not a wise king. Your brother was not a good king. If he had been, perhaps he'd still be alive. Now, as the king, you will have to marry. Do you understand why?

Sentence: We ask the Father to judge us with mercy accepting our human frailty. We ask the Mother to bless our crops so we may feed ourselves and all who come to our door. Sentence: Guest right don't mean much anymore.

Name: farmer hamlet
Sentence: It means something to me. The gods will have their vengeance. Frey will burn in the seventh hell for what he did. Things were different when Hoster Tully ruled the Riverlands. We had good years and bad years, same as anyone. But we were safe. Now with the Freys, raiders come plundering, steal our food, steal our silver. I was gonna send Sally north to stay with my brother, but the north's no better. The whole country's gone sour.

Sentence: You look like you could really swing that sword. A real warrior with proper training. Those raiders wouldn't stand a chance against you. How would it be if you stayed on till the new moon? I could use a man to help with the farmwork. Sally does what she can, but she can't lift a bale of hay. Sentence: The lookout sees a pirate ship sailing their way. The captain shouts to his first mate, "Bring me my red shirt." The first mate brings the red shirt and the captain puts it on. And when the pirates try to board, the brave captain leads his men to victory. A few days later, the lookout screams, "Two pirate ships!" The crew is shivering like scared mice. But the courageous captain hollers, "Bring me my red shirt!"

Episode Title: The Laws of Gods and Men

Sentence: After the battle, the first mate asks, "Captain, why do you call for your red shirt before battle?" The captain replies, "So that if I am stabbed, you will not see me bleed." The next morning the lookout screams, "10 pirate ships! We are surrounded!" The crew goes silent.

Sentence: You have, Your Grace. You crucified him. I pray you'll never live to see a member of your family treated so cruelly.

Sentence: Your father crucified innocent children.

Episode Title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: hizdahr
Sentence: My father spoke out against crucifying those children. He decried it as a criminal act, but was overruled. Is it justice to answer one crime with another?

Episode Title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: daenerys targaryen
Sentence: I am sorry you no longer have a father, but my treatment of the masters was no crime. You'd be wise to remember that.

Episode Title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: hizdahr
Sentence: What's done is done. You are the queen and I am a servant of Meereen. A servant who does not wish to see its traditions eradicated.

Episode Title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: daenerys targaryen
Sentence: And what traditions do you speak of?

Episode Title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: hizdahr
Sentence: The tradition of funeral rite. Proper burial in the Temple of the Graces. My father and 162 noble Meereenese are still nailed to those posts, carrion for vultures, rotting in the sun.

Episode Title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: hizdahr
Sentence: Your Grace, I ask that you order these men taken down so that they might receive proper burials.

Episode Title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: daenerys targaryen
Sentence: And what of the slave children these noble Meereenese crucified? They were rotting in the sun as well. Would you have begged me for their right to a proper burial?

Episode Title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: hizdahr
Sentence: Your Grace, I cannot defend the actions of the masters. I can only speak to you as a son who loved his father. Let me take his body down. Let me have him brought to the temple and buried with dignity so that he might find peace in the next world.

Episode Title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: daenerys targaryen
Sentence: Bury your father, Hizdahr zo Loraq.
