Sentence: Thank you, my queen.

Episode Title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: daenerys targaryen
Sentence: How many more?

Episode Title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: missandei
Sentence: There are 212 supplicants waiting, Your Grace.

Episode Title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: daenerys targaryen

Episode Title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: oberyn martell
Sentence: These meetings aren't always going to be this early, are they? I was up late last night. So, does this mean I am a master of something now? Coins, ships?

Episode Title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: mace
Sentence: Lord Tywin and I already determined that I shall be the Master of Ships long before you--

Episode Title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: mace
Sentence: Lord Tywin, it's a great honor to have been granted a seat on this council. I--

Episode Title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: tywin lannister
Sentence: The trial begins this afternoon. We only have the morning for affairs of state. Shall we begin?

Episode Title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: varys
Sentence: Sandor Clegane has been spotted in the Riverlands, my lord.

Episode Title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: cersei lannister
Sentence: A coward and a traitor.

Episode Title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: varys
Sentence: My birds tell me the Hound slaughtered five of our soldiers. I believe the phrase "fuck the king" was uttered.

Episode Title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: pycelle
Sentence: Disgraceful.

Episode Title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: tywin lannister
Sentence: What would it take to make the common soldier stupid enough to try his luck with the Hound?

Episode Title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: varys
Sentence: 10 silver stags seems a generous bounty.

Episode Title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: tywin lannister
Sentence: Make it 100. What else?

Episode Title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: varys
Sentence: More whispers from the east, my lord.

Episode Title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: tywin lannister
Sentence: The Targaryen girl?

Episode Title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: varys
Sentence: Daenerys has taken up residence in Meereen. She has conquered the city and rules as its queen.

Episode Title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: cersei lannister
Sentence: Conquered with what?

Episode Title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: varys
Sentence: She commands an army of Unsullied, my queen. Some 8,000 strong. She has a company of sellswords-- the Second Sons. She has two knights advising her-- Jorah Mormont and Barristan Selmy. And she has three dragons.

Episode Title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: cersei lannister
Sentence: Baby dragons. Larger every year, Your Grace.

Episode Title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: pycelle
Sentence: Mormont is spying on her for us.

Episode Title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: varys
Sentence: No longer. He appears to be fully devoted to her. As for Ser Barristan, it would seem he took his dismissal from the Kingsguard a bit harder than anticipated.

Episode Title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: cersei lannister
Sentence: He's an old man. He wasn't fit to protect my son.

Episode Title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: tywin lannister
Sentence: Joffrey didn't die on his watch. Dismissing him was as insulting as it was stupid.

Episode Title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: cersei lannister
Sentence: Don't tell me you're worried about a child halfway across the world.

Episode Title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: varys
Sentence: A child with two seasoned warriors counseling her and a powerful army at her back, Your Grace.

Episode Title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: oberyn martell
Sentence: Lord Varys is right. I have been to Essos and seen the Unsullied firsthand. They are very impressive on the battlefield. Less so in the bedroom.

Episode Title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: tywin lannister
Sentence: Dragons haven't won a war in 300 years. Armies win them all the time. She must be dealt with.

Episode Title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: pycelle
Sentence: How, my lord? By force?

Episode Title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: tywin lannister
Sentence: Eventually, if it comes to that. Can your little birds find their way into Meereen?

Episode Title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: varys
Sentence: Most certainly, my Lord Hand.

Episode Title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: tywin lannister
Sentence: Mmm. Lord Tyrell, be a good man. Fetch my quill and paper.

Episode Title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: varys
Sentence: Prince Oberyn.

Episode Title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: oberyn martell
Sentence: Lord Varys...

Episode Title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: varys
Sentence: Only Varys. I'm not actually a nobleman. No one is under obligation to call me lord.

Episode Title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: oberyn martell
Sentence: And yet everyone does.

Episode Title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: varys
Sentence: You seem quite knowledgeable about the Unsullied. Did you spend much time in Essos?

Episode Title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: oberyn martell
Sentence: Five years.

Episode Title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: varys
Sentence: May I ask why?

Episode Title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: oberyn martell
Sentence: Tis a big and beautiful world. Most of us live and die in the same corner where we were born and never get to see any of it. I don't want to be most of us.

Episode Title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: varys
Sentence: Most of us aren't princes.

Episode Title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: oberyn martell
Sentence: You are from Essos. Where? Lys?

Episode Title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: varys
Sentence: I have an ear for accents. I've lost my accent entirely.

Episode Title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: oberyn martell
Sentence: I have an ear for that as well. How did you get here?

Episode Title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: varys
Sentence: It's a long story.

Episode Title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: oberyn martell
Sentence: One you don't like telling people.

Episode Title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: varys
Sentence: People I trust.

Episode Title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: oberyn martell
Sentence: My paramour Ellaria, she would find you very interesting. You should come to the brothel and meet her. We brought our own wine, not the swill they serve here. We have some lovely boys on retainer, but...

Episode Title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: oberyn martell
Sentence: You did like boys before?

Episode Title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: oberyn martell
Sentence: Really? Girls? Hmm. I hope you won't be offended when I say I never would have guessed.

Episode Title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: varys
Sentence: Not at all. But I was never interested in girls, either.

Episode Title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: oberyn martell
Sentence: What then?

Episode Title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: varys
Sentence: Nothing.

Episode Title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: oberyn martell
Sentence: Everybody is interested in something.

Episode Title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: varys
Sentence: Not me. When I see what desire does to people, what it's done to this country, I am very glad to have no part in it. Besides, the absence of desire leaves one free to pursue other things.

Episode Title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: oberyn martell
Sentence: Such as?

Episode Title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: tyrion lannister
Sentence: Let me guess, I've been pardoned.

Episode Title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: tyrion lannister
Sentence: Really?

Episode Title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: jaime lannister
Sentence: Father's orders.

Episode Title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: tyrion lannister
Sentence: Well, we mustn't disappoint Father.

Episode Title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: man
Sentence: Kingslayer!

Episode Title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: tommen lannister
Sentence: I, Tommen of the House Baratheon, First of my Name, King of the Andals and the First Men, and Lord of the Seven Kingdoms, do hereby recuse myself from this trial. Tywin of the House Lannister, Hand of the King, Protector of the Realm, will sit as judge in my stead. And with him Prince Oberyn of the House Martell and Lord Mace of the House Tyrell. And if found guilty... may the gods punish the accused.

Episode Title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: tywin lannister
Sentence: Tyrion of the House Lannister, you stand accused by the Queen Regent of regicide. Did you kill King Joffrey?

Episode Title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: tyrion lannister
Sentence: No.

Episode Title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: tywin lannister
Sentence: Did your wife, the Lady Sansa?

Episode Title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: tyrion lannister
Sentence: Not that I know of.

Episode Title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: tywin lannister
Sentence: How would you say he died, then?

Episode Title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: tyrion lannister
Sentence: Choked on his pigeon pie.

Episode Title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: tywin lannister
Sentence: So you would blame the bakers?

Episode Title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: tyrion lannister
Sentence: Or the pigeons. Just leave me out of it.

Episode Title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: tywin lannister
Sentence: The crown may call its first witness.

Episode Title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: meryn trant
Sentence: Once we'd got King Joffrey safely away from the mob, the Imp rounded on him. He slapped the king across the face and called him a vicious idiot and a fool. It wasn't the first time the Imp threatened Joffrey. Right here in this throne room, he marched up those steps and called our king a halfwit. Compared His Grace to the Mad King and suggested he'd meet the same fate. And when I spoke in the king's defense, he threatened to have me killed.

Episode Title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: tyrion lannister
Sentence: Oh, why don't you tell them what Joffrey was doing?

Episode Title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: tywin lannister
Sentence: Silence.

Episode Title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: tyrion lannister
Sentence: Pointing a loaded crossbow at Sansa Stark while you tore at her clothes and beat her.

Episode Title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: tywin lannister
Sentence: Silence! You will not speak unless called upon. You're dismissed, Ser Meryn.

Episode Title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: pycelle
Sentence: Basilisk venom, widow's blood, wolfsbane, essence of nightshade, sweetsleep, tears of Lys, demon's dance... blind eye--

Episode Title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: oberyn martell
Sentence: I think you have made your point, Grand Maester. You have a lot of poison in your store.

Episode Title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: pycelle
Sentence: Had, Prince Oberyn. My stores were plundered.

Episode Title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: tywin lannister
Sentence: By whom?

Episode Title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: pycelle
Sentence: By the accused, Tyrion Lannister, after he had me wrongfully imprisoned.

Episode Title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: tywin lannister
Sentence: Grand Maester, you examined King Joffrey's corpse. Was it without question poison that killed him?

Episode Title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: pycelle
Sentence: Without question.

Episode Title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: pycelle
Sentence: This was found on the body of Dontos Hollard, the king's fool. He was last seen spiriting Sansa Stark, the wife of the accused, away from the feast. She wore this necklace the day of the wedding. Residue of a most rare and terrible poison was found inside.

Episode Title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: tywin lannister
Sentence: Was this one of the poisons stolen from your store?

Episode Title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: pyelle
Sentence: It was. The Strangler. A poison few in the Seven Kingdoms possess. And used to strike down the most noble child the gods ever put on this good earth.

Episode Title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: cersei lannister
Sentence: I will hurt you for this. A day will come when you think you are safe and happy and your joy will turn to ashes in your mouth and you will know the debt is paid.

Episode Title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: mace
Sentence: Your own brother said this to you?

Episode Title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: cersei lannister
Sentence: Shortly before the Battle of Blackwater Bay. I confronted him about his plans to put Joffrey on the front lines. As it turned out, when the attack came, Joff insisted on remaining at the battlements. He believed his presence would inspire the troops.

Episode Title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: oberyn martell
Sentence: Tyrion said, "And you will know the debt is paid." What debt?

Episode Title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: cersei lannister
Sentence: I discovered he'd been keeping whores in the Tower of the Hand. I asked him to confine his salacious acts to the brothel where such behavior belongs. He wasn't pleased.

Episode Title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: tywin lannister
Sentence: Thank you, Your Grace, for the courage of your testimony.

Episode Title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: mace
Sentence: Do you remember the precise nature of this threat?

Episode Title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: varys
Sentence: I'm afraid I do, my lord. He said, "Perhaps you should speak more softly to me, then. Monsters are dangerous and just now kings are dying like flies."

Episode Title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: mace
Sentence: And he said this to you at a meeting of the small council?

Episode Title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: varys
Sentence: Yes. After we received word of Robb Stark's death. He didn't seem gladdened by the news. Perhaps his marriage to Sansa Stark had made him more sympathetic to the northern cause.

Episode Title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: tywin lannister
Sentence: You're excused, Lord Varys.

Episode Title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: tyrion lannister
Sentence: Father, may I ask the witness one question?

Episode Title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: tywin lannister
Sentence: One.

Episode Title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: tyrion lannister
Sentence: You once said that without me, this city would have faced certain defeat. You said the histories would never mention me, but you would not forget. Have you forgotten, Lord Varys?

Episode Title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: varys
Sentence: Sadly, my lord, I never forget a thing.

Episode Title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: tywin lannister
Sentence: We will adjourn for now.

Episode Title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: tywin lannister
Sentence: Toll the bells in an hour's time.

Episode Title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: guard
Sentence: Clear the court!

Episode Title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: jaime lannister
Sentence: You'd condemn your own son to death?

Episode Title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: tywin lannister
Sentence: I've condemned no one. The trial is not over.

Episode Title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: jaime lannister
Sentence: This isn't a trial. It's a farce. Cersei has manipulated everything and you know it.

Episode Title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: tywin lannister
Sentence: I know nothing of the sort.

Episode Title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: jaime lannister
Sentence: You've always hated Tyrion.

Episode Title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: tywin lannister
Sentence: He killed his king.

Episode Title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: jaime lannister
Sentence: As did I. Do you know the last order the Mad King gave me? To bring him your head. I saved your life so you could murder my brother?

Episode Title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: tywin lannister
Sentence: It won't be murder. It'll be justice.

Episode Title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: jaime lannister
Sentence: Justice?

Episode Title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: tywin lannister
Sentence: I'm performing my sworn duty as Hand of the King. If Tyrion is found guilty, he will be punished accordingly.

Episode Title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: jaime lannister
Sentence: He'll be executed.

Episode Title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: tywin lannister
Sentence: No, he'll be punished accordingly.

Episode Title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: jaime lannister
Sentence: Once you said family is what lives on. All that lives on. You told me about a dynasty that would last 1,000 years. What happens to your dynasty when Tyrion dies? I'm a Kingsguard, forbidden by oath to carry on the family line.

Episode Title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: tywin lannister
Sentence: I'm well aware of your oath.

Episode Title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: jaime lannister
Sentence: What happens to your name? Who carries the lion banner into future battles? Your nephews? Lancel Lannister? Others whose names I don't even remember?

Episode Title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: tywin lannister
Sentence: What happens to my dynasty if I spare the life of my grandson's killer?

Episode Title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: jaime lannister
Sentence: It survives through me. I'll leave the Kingsguard. I'll take my place as your son and heir if you let Tyrion live.

Episode Title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: tywin lannister
Sentence: Done.

Episode Title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: tywin lannister
Sentence: When the testimony's concluded and a guilty verdict rendered, Tyrion will be given the chance to speak. He'll plead for mercy. I'll allow him to join the Night's Watch. In three days' time, he'll depart for Castle Black and live out his days at the Wall. You'll remove your white cloak immediately. You will leave King's Landing to assume your rightful place at Casterly Rock. You will marry a suitable woman and father children named Lannister. And you'll never turn your back on your family again.

Episode Title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: jaime lannister
Sentence: You have my word.

Episode Title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: tywin lannister
Sentence: And you have mine.

Episode Title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: tyrion lannister
Sentence: Not going well, is it?

Episode Title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: jaime lannister
Sentence: You're going to be found guilty.

Episode Title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: tyrion lannister
Sentence: Oh, you think so?

Episode Title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: jaime lannister
Sentence: When you are, you need to enter a formal plea for mercy and ask to be sent to the Wall. Father's agreed to it. He'll spare your life and allow you to join the Night's Watch.

Episode Title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: tyrion lannister
Sentence: Ned Stark was promised the same thing and we both know how that turned out.

Episode Title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: jaime lannister
Sentence: Father is not Joffrey. He'll keep his word.

Episode Title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: tyrion lannister
Sentence: How do you know?

Episode Title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: jaime lannister
Sentence: Do you trust me?

Episode Title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: jaime lannister
Sentence: Keep your mouth shut. No more outbursts. This will all be over soon.

Episode Title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: tywin lannister
Sentence: The crown may call its next witness.

Episode Title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: tywin lannister
Sentence: State your name.

Episode Title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: shae
Sentence: Shae.

Episode Title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: tywin lannister
Sentence: Do you swear by all the gods that your testimony will be true and honest?

Episode Title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: shae
Sentence: I swear it.

Episode Title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: tywin lannister
Sentence: Do you know this man?

Episode Title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: shae
Sentence: Yes. Tyrion Lannister.

Episode Title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: tywin lannister
Sentence: How do you know him?

Episode Title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: shae
Sentence: I was handmaiden to his wife Lady Sansa.

Episode Title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: tywin lannister
Sentence: This man stands accused of murdering King Joffrey. What do you know of this?

Episode Title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: shae
Sentence: I know that he's guilty.

Episode Title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: shae
Sentence: He and Sansa planned it together.

Episode Title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: tywin lannister
Sentence: Silence! Continue.

Episode Title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: shae
Sentence: She wanted revenge for her father, her mother, her brother. She blamed their deaths on the king. Tyrion was happy to help. He hated Joffrey. He hated the queen. He hated you, my lord.

Episode Title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: shae
Sentence: He stole poison from the Grand Maester's chamber to put in Joffrey's wine.

Episode Title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: oberyn martell
Sentence: How could you possibly know all this? Why would he reveal such plans to his wife's maid?

Episode Title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: shae
Sentence: I wasn't just her maid. I was his whore.

Episode Title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: mace
Sentence: I beg your pardon? You said you were his...

Episode Title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: shae
Sentence: His whore.

Episode Title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: tywin lannister
Sentence: How did you come to be in his service?

Episode Title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: shae
Sentence: He stole me. I was with another man, a knight in your lordship's army. But when Tyrion arrived at the camp, he sent one of his cutthroats into our tent. He broke the knight's arm and brought me to Lord Tyrion. "You belong to me now," he said. "I want you to fuck me like it's my last night in this world."

Episode Title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: tywin lannister
Sentence: Silence. Silence!

Episode Title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: oberyn martell
Sentence: And did you?

Episode Title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: shae
Sentence: Did I what?

Episode Title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: oberyn martell
Sentence: Fuck him like it was his last night in this world.

Episode Title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: shae
Sentence: I did everything he wanted. Whatever he told me to do to him. Whatever he felt like doing to me. I kissed him where he wanted. I licked him where he wanted. I let him put himself where he wanted. I was his property. I would wait in his chambers for hours so he could use me when he was bored. He ordered me to call him "my lion," so I did. I took his face in my hands and said, "I am yours and you are mine."

Episode Title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: tyrion lannister
Sentence: Shae. Please don't.

Episode Title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: shae
Sentence: I am a whore. Remember? That was before he married Sansa. After that, all he wanted was her. But she wouldn't let him into her bed. So he promised to kill King Joffrey for her.

Episode Title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: tyrion lannister
Sentence: Father, I wish to confess. I wish... to confess.

Episode Title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: tywin lannister
Sentence: You wish to confess?

Episode Title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: tyrion lannister
Sentence: I saved you. I saved this city and all your worthless lives. I should have let Stannis kill you all.

Episode Title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: tywin lannister
Sentence: Tyrion. Do you wish to confess?

Episode Title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: tyrion lannister
Sentence: Yes, Father. I'm guilty. Guilty. Is that what you want to hear?

Episode Title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: tywin lannister
Sentence: You admit you poisoned the king?

Episode Title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: tyrion lannister
Sentence: No, of that I'm innocent. I'm guilty of a far more monstrous crime. I am guilty of being a dwarf.

Episode Title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: tywin lannister
Sentence: You are not on trial for being a dwarf.

Episode Title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: tyrion lannister
Sentence: Oh, yes, I am. I've been on trial for that my entire life.

Episode Title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: tywin lannister
Sentence: Have you nothing to say in your defense?

Episode Title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: tyrion lannister
Sentence: Nothing but this-- I did not do it. I did not kill Joffrey, but I wish that I had.

Episode Title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: tyrion lannister
Sentence: Watching your vicious bastard die gave me more relief than 1,000 lying whores.

Episode Title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: tyrion lannister
Sentence: I wish I was the monster you think I am. I wish I had enough poison for the whole pack of you. I would gladly give my life to watch you all swallow it.

Episode Title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: tywin lannister
Sentence: Ser Meryn. Ser Meryn. Escort the prisoner back to his cell.

Episode Title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: tyrion lannister
Sentence: I will not give my life for Joffrey's murder. And I know I'll get no justice here. So I will let the gods decide my fate. I demand a trial by combat.

Name: jaime lannister
Sentence: I made a deal for you to keep your ungrateful head on your ungrateful neck a little while longer.

Name: tyrion lannister
Sentence: I'm sorry, what am I grateful for? The opportunity to live and die at the Wall as punishment for a crime I did not commit?

Name: jaime lannister
Sentence: You threw your life away. You threw it away. It's not a joke. You understand that, don't you?

Name: tyrion lannister
Sentence: Of course it's a joke, just not a very funny one. I couldn't- I couldn't listen to her standing there telling her lies. I couldn't do it.

Name: jaime lannister
Sentence: You fell in love with a whore.

Name: tyrion lannister
Sentence: Yes, I fell in love with a whore. And I was stupid enough to think that she had fallen in love with me. That deal you made, it was everything Father wanted. You do see that? He gets you back as his heir. The future Lord of the Rock. And he ships me off to Castle Black, out of sight at last. All so perfect. It felt good to take that from him. He knows I'm innocent and he's willing to sacrifice me anyway. He's willing to sacrifice any of us. Not you. You're the golden son. You could kill a king, lose a hand, fuck your own sister, you'll always be the golden son.

Name: jaime lannister
Sentence: Careful. I'm the last friend you've got.

Name: tyrion lannister
Sentence: At least I got to tell them what they really are.

Name: jaime lannister
Sentence: Yes, brilliant speech. They'll be talking about it for days to come. I thought you were a realist. Didn't realize you'd die for pride.

Name: tyrion lannister
Sentence: Don't give up on me just yet. I survived one trial by combat, even though you weren't there to save me.

Name: jaime lannister
Sentence: I can't save you this time either. My training has proved that I can't beat a stable boy with my left hand.

Name: tyrion lannister

Sentence: The whole way from Dorne all anyone talked about was the monster that had been born to Tywin Lannister. A head twice the size of his body, a tail between his legs, claws, one red eye, the privates of both a girl and a boy.

Sentence: When we met your sister, she promised she would show you to us. Every day we would ask. Every day she would say, "Soon." Lord Bolton implores you to protect your men and abandon this fortress you can no longer hold. Do this and he will be just and fair with you as he is being with me. The Boltons will give you safe passage to the stony shore.

Sentence: He wants us to surrender?

Name: petyr
Sentence: A great-grandfather from Braavos, yes. I suppose all of our ancestors came from somewhere else originally.

Sentence: Our forebearers settled the Vale thousands of years ago. We've fought off invaders ever since.

Name: petyr
Sentence: The beauty of the Vale is matched only by the nobility of its great families. Lady Arryn often told me that you were her rock, Lord Royce.

Sentence: She told me nothing about you, Baelish. But I didn't need to hear from her. Moneylender. Whoremonger. You've been licking Tywin Lannister's boots so long, it's a wonder your tongue's not black.

Name: petyr
Sentence: My lord...

Sentence: And when Jon Arryn named you Master of Coin, no one cared. Always been a grubby job. Why not let a grubby man do it? But when I heard you were lurking here, fawning over the Lady Arryn...

Name: petyr
Sentence: Lady Arryn invited me. She and I have been close since childhood.

Name: lady anya
Sentence: Yes, we all know how close you were. Lady Arryn's predilections were her own affair. Her death is our affair.

Name: petyr

Sentence: She was an odd fish. Everyone knew that. But suicide? She adored that boy of hers. I don't see her abandoning him. Not by choice.

Sentence: Strange that within days of your arrival, you've married Lady Arryn and she's fallen through the Moon Door.

Name: petyr
Sentence: She was always prone to melancholy. My lady wasn't meant for a world as brutal as ours.

Sentence: We were told there was a witness. A girl.

Sentence: A niece of yours, I believe.

Sentence: A girl with no learning and scattered wits. I assure you, she would be of no help.

Sentence: My lady...

Name: lady anya
Sentence: I wasn't asking you.

Name: sansa stark
Sentence: He can stay.

Name: lord royce
Sentence: Speak up, girl, you're not a damn kitchen mouse. Tell us what you saw.

Name: sansa stark
Sentence: to Petyr* I'm sorry, Lord Baelish. I have to tell the truth. *to the council* I'll tell you everything.

Name: lady anya
Sentence: Please, Alayne, leave nothing out.

Name: sansa stark
Sentence: My name is not Alayne. It's Sansa Stark, eldest daughter of Lord Eddard Stark. Lord Royce, we met when you came to Winterfell. You were escorting your son Ser Waymar to the Wall.

Sentence: Sansa Stark? You tell lies right to my face, you little worm?

Name: sansa stark
Sentence: Lord Baelish has told many lies. All to protect me. Since my father was executed, I have been a hostage in King's Landing. A plaything for Joffrey to torture or Queen Cersei to torment. They beat me, they humiliated me, they married me to the Imp. I had no friends in King's Landing...except one. He saved me. Smuggled me away when he had the chance. He knew I'd be safe here in the Eyrie with my own blood, my Aunt Lysa. The Lannisters have friends everywhere. Even the Vale. He made me swear not to tell anyone my true name.

Name: ser vance
Sentence: Your secret is safe with us, my lady.

Name: lord royce
Sentence: Your father grew up right here in these halls. We hunted together many times. He was a fine man.

Name: lady anya
Sentence: Tell us what happened to your aunt, Sansa.

Name: sansa stark
Sentence: You knew her well, my lords, my lady. You knew she was a troubled woman. She always loved Lord Baelish. She told me herself. From the moment he arrived at the gates of Riverrun, a boy of eight carrying everything he owned in a little sack. She confessed to me she never loved Lord Arryn. She did as her father commanded, as so many of us have. When the gods finally allowed her to be with Lord Baelish, she was so happy. For a time. My aunt was a jealous lady. She was terrified that Lord Baelish didn't love her anymore. That he would abandon her for a younger woman. And then...one day she saw him kiss me.

Name: lord royce
Sentence: Lady Sansa.

Name: sansa stark
Sentence: It was a peck on the cheek, Lord Royce, nothing more. Lord Baelish is my uncle now, in truth, by marriage. He's always been so kind to me. I was so happy to be here, to be free. All because of him. But my aunt turned on me. She cursed me. Called me a whore. Promised to throw me through the Moon Door. When Lord Baelish tried to calm her, she struck him. She said she didn't want to live anymore. She stood on the edge of that Moon Door. He tried to reason with her. Promised her she was the only one he had ever loved, but she stepped through those doors and she was...*begins sobbing*

Name: lady anya
Sentence: Shh. Shh, it's not your fault, sweet girl. It's not your fault.

Name: lord royce
Sentence: You could see it in the way she raised that boy. Feeding him from her own teats when he was 10 years old.

Sentence: For Lysa, no. But for her son? Only 20 years ago, the knights of the Vale rode behind Jon Arryn, Ned Stark, Robert Baratheon. They fought together to overcome the Mad King. And since then, Arryn and Royce, Corbray, Waynwood, all the great houses of the Vale watched from the corner. A timid boy at a tavern brawl.

Sentence: Are you questioning our courage?

Name: petyr
Sentence: I want to know which side you're on. Do you support the Lannisters, the house that executed your friend Ned Stark?

Name: lord royce
Sentence: Of course we don't support the damn Lannisters.

Name: petyr
Sentence: No? Catelyn Stark begged her sister for support and Lysa refused. By staying out of the fray, you've allowed Tywin Lannister to destroy his rivals on every compass point. Who stands against him now?

Sentence: I'd have you back Robin Arryn, Lord of the Vale.

Sentence: Robin Arryn is a sickly little boy.

Sentence: More often they die young.

Name: petyr
Sentence: I adored Lysa with all my heart. But she loved her son so much, she became overprotective. He needs to learn how to swing a sword. How to ride a horse.

Name: lord royce
Sentence: Aye, it's time.

Name: petyr

Sentence: Khaleesi.

Sentence: That wine merchant tried to poison me because of your information.

Name: ser jorah
Sentence: I stopped you from drinking his wine.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Sentence: Because you knew it was poisoned.

Name: ser jorah
Sentence: I suspected.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Sentence: You betrayed me from the first.

Name: ser jorah
Sentence: Forgive me. I never meant...please, Khaleesi, forgive me.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Sentence: You sold my secrets to the man who killed my father and stole my brother's throne...

Name: ser jorah
Sentence: I have protected you. Fought for you. Killed for you.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Sentence: and you want me to forgive you?

Name: ser jorah
Sentence: I have loved you.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Sentence: Love? Love? How can you say that to me? Any other man, and I would have you executed. But you, I do not want you in my city dead or alive. Go back to your masters in King's Landing. Collect your pardon if you can.

Name: ser jorah
Sentence: Daenerys, please.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Sentence: Don't ever presume to touch me again or speak my name. You have until dusk to collect your things and leave this city. If you're found in Meereen past break of day, I'll have your head thrown into Slaver's Bay. Go. Now.

Sentence: Moat Cailin is yours, Father.

Name: ramsay bolton
Sentence: Unimportant. A cripple, a young boy. None of the northern lords have seen them. Dead most likely. Most of the Ironborn have fled the North. Now more will follow, thanks to you. Tell me what you see.

Sentence: Moors, fields, hills.

Name: ramsay bolton
Sentence: Tell me what you see.

Sentence: Not nothing. The North. Ride 700 miles that way, you're still in the North. 400 miles that way. 300 miles that way. The North is larger than the other six kingdoms combined. And I am the Warden of the North. The North is mine. Now tell me, what is your name?

Name: ramsay bolton
Sentence: Ramsay Snow.

Name: roose
Sentence: No, not Ramsay Snow. *hands Ramsay a scroll* Open it. From this day until your last day, you are Ramsay Bolton, son of Roose Bolton, Warden of the North.

Name: ramsay bolton
Sentence: You honor me. I swear I will uphold your name and your tradition. I will be worthy of you, Father, I promise.

Name: ramsay bolton
Sentence: Come, Reek, I'll be needing a bath.

Name: sansa stark
Sentence: Yes?

Name: petyr
Sentence: First time I saw you, you were just a child. A girl from the North come to the capital for the first time. Not a child any longer. Why did you help me?

Name: sansa stark
Sentence: They would have thrown you through the Moon Door if they found you guilty.

Name: petyr
Sentence: That's not an answer.

Name: sansa stark

Name: petyr
Sentence: I don't know.

Name: sansa stark
Sentence: Neither do I.

Name: petyr

Name: sansa stark
Sentence: I know what you want.

Name: sandor clegane
Sentence: I thought it'd make me happy, but it doesn't. Not really. Nothing makes you happy.

Name: sandor clegane
Sentence: Aye, nothing in the world beats that look.

Name: arya stark

Name: arya stark
Sentence: That's your stupid pride talking. It's why you'll never be a great killer. I'd have killed Joffrey with a chicken bone if I had to.

Sentence: It wasn't safe for her inside. People die at their dinner tables. They die in their beds. They die squatting over their chamber pots. Everybody dies sooner or later. Don't worry about your death. Worry about your life. Take charge of your life for as long as it lasts. That is what it means to be Lord of the Vale.

Sentence: Shall we go?

Name: tyrion lannister
Sentence: Wine always helps. I thank you for it. Trial by combat. Deciding a man's guilt or innocence in the eyes of the gods by having two other men hack each other to pieces. Tells you something about the gods. How much longer?

Name: jaime lannister
Sentence: Soon.

Name: tyrion lannister
Sentence: Do you think Oberyn has a chance? The Red Viper of Dorne. You don't get a name like that unless you're deadly, right?

Sentence: I've never seen him fight.

Name: tyrion lannister
Sentence: Oh, he's going to die. I'm going to die.

Sentence: Oberyn believes in himself.

Name: tyrion lannister
Sentence: That's putting it mildly. What's the punishment for regicide? Drawing and quartering? Hanging? Breaking at the wheel?

Name: jaime lannister
Sentence: Beheading.

Name: tyrion lannister
Sentence: Seems rather ordinary. And he was my nephew as well, so what is that? Fratricide is brothers. Filicide is sons. Nepoticide. That's the one. Matricide, patricide, infanticide, suicide. There's no kind of killing that doesn't have its own word.

Name: jaime lannister
Sentence: Cousins.

Name: tyrion lannister
Sentence: Cousins, you're right. There is no word for cousin killing. Well done. Do you remember cousin Orson? Orson Lannister?

Name: jaime lannister
Sentence: Of course. Wet-nurse dropped him on his head. Left him simple.

Name: tyrion lannister
Sentence: Simple? Used to sit all day in the garden. Crushing beetles with a rock.

Name: together
Sentence: Khuu! Khuu! Khuu!

Name: tyrion lannister
Sentence: Nothing made him happier.

Name: jaime lannister
Sentence: Nothing made you happier. You'd think being tormented from birth would have given you some affinity for the afflicted.

Name: tyrion lannister
Sentence: On the contrary. Laughing at another person's misery was the only thing that made me feel like everyone else.

Name: jaime lannister
Sentence: The joke wore thin, though.

Name: tyrion lannister
Sentence: For you. You drifted away.

Name: jaime lannister
Sentence: I had other interests.

Name: tyrion lannister
Sentence: Yes, other interests. But I stayed with Orson.

Name: jaime lannister
Sentence: Why?

Name: tyrion lannister
Sentence: I was curious. Why was he smashing all those beetles? What did he get out of it? First thing I did was ask him. "Orson, why are you smashing all those beetles?" He gave me an answer. "Smash the beetles. Smash 'em. Khuu! Khuu! Khuu!" I wasn't deterred. I was the smartest person I knew. Certainly I had the wherewithal to unravel the mysteries that lay at the heart of a moron. So I went to Maester Volarik's library.

Name: jaime lannister
Sentence: Volarik. Tried to touch me once.

Name: tyrion lannister
Sentence: Turns out, far too much has been written about great men and not nearly enough about morons. Doesn't seem right. In any case, I found nothing that illuminated the nature of Orson's affliction or the reason behind his relentless beetle slaughter. So I went back to the source. I may not have been able to speak with Orson, but I could observe him, watch him the way men watch animals to come to a deeper understanding of their behavior. *picks up a beetle* And as I watched, I became more and more sure of it. There was something happening there. His face was like the page of a book written in a language I didn't understand. But he wasn't mindless. He had his reasons. And I became possessed with knowing what they were. I began to spend inordinate amounts of time watching him. I would eat my lunch in the garden, chewing my mutton to the music of "khuu, khuu, khuu". And when I wasn't watching him, I was thinking about him. Father droned on about the family legacy and I thought about Orson's beetles. I read the histories of Targaryen conquests. Did I hear dragon wings? No. I heard "khuu, khuu, khuu" and I still couldn't figure out why he was doing it. And I had to know, because it was horrible that all these beetles should be dying for no reason.

Name: jaime lannister
Sentence: Every day around the world, men, women, and children are murdered by the score. Who gives a dusty fuck about a bunch of beetles?

Name: tyrion lannister
Sentence: I know, I know. But still, it filled me with dread. Piles and piles of them, years and years of them. How many countless living crawling things smashed and dried out and returned to the dirt? In my dreams I found myself standing on a beach made of beetle husks stretching as far as the eye could see. I woke up crying, weeping for their shattered little bodies. I tried to stop Orson once.

Name: jaime lannister
Sentence: He was twice your size.

Name: tyrion lannister
Sentence: He just pushed me aside with a "khuu" and kept on smashing. Every day until that mule kicked him in the chest and killed him. *puts the beetle back on the ground* So what do you think? Why did he do it? What was it all about?

Name: jaime lannister
Sentence: I don't know.

Sentence: Protect the gate!
