Sentence: Hold the fucking gate! Hold it!

Name: sam
Sentence: to Grenn* We need more men down here.

Name: grenn
Sentence: We have to hold the gate.

Name: sam
Sentence: But we need men here.

Name: grenn
Sentence: Tell Jon! He's in command. *to the men behind him* Let's go!

Name: sam
Sentence: to Olly* Get me to the top! You hear me?!

Name: sam
Sentence: Your name's Olly, right? Listen to me Olly, get me to the top and when we give a signal, bring us back down. Do you hear me?

Name: sam
Sentence: And find a weapon, Olly. Fight them!

Name: jon snow
Sentence: What are you doing up here?

Name: sam
Sentence: The Wildlings are over the walls. Ser Alliser has fallen. The castle walls can't stand much longer.

Name: jon snow
Sentence: Ed. You have The Wall. If they try the mammoths again, drop fire on them. If the climbers get too high, drop the scythe on them.

Name: jon snow
Sentence: Two brothers now fight with me.

Name: ed
Sentence: Might as well enjoy our last night, right boys? Light the fuckers up. Knock! Draw! Loose!

Name: donnel
Sentence: How are we gonna stop that?

Name: cooper
Sentence: We shot twenty-eight arrows in him already.

Name: grenn
Sentence: You heard Jon, we hold the gate.

Name: donnel
Sentence: Jon Snow's not Lord Commander.

Name: grenn
Sentence: We hold the gate!

Name: donnel
Sentence: Mother save me. Father save me.

Name: grenn
Sentence: The gods aren't down here. It's the six of us, you hear me?

Name: donnel
Sentence: No, please.

Name: grenn
Sentence: Night gathers, and now my watch begins. It shall not end until my death. I shall take no wife, hold no lands, father no children. I shall wear no crowns

Name: all together
Sentence: And win no glory. I shall live and die at my post. I am the sword in the darkness. I am the watcher on the walls. I am the shield that guards the realms of men. I pledge my life and honor to the Night's Watch, for this night and all the nights to come!

Name: jon snow
Sentence: to Sam* I don't want you out there.

Name: sam
Sentence: You can't protect me forever. There won't be anywhere to hide if the castle falls.

Name: jon snow
Sentence: I need him more than I need you.

Name: sam
Sentence: We need you boy.

Name: ygritte
Sentence: Jon Snow.

Name: jon snow
Sentence: No, shh, don't talk.

Name: ygritte
Sentence: Do you remember that cave?

Name: ygritte
Sentence: We shouldo ve stayed in that cave.

Name: jon snow
Sentence: We'll go back there.

Name: ygritte
Sentence: You know nothing, Jon Snow.

Name: ed
Sentence: Drop the scythe, boys!

Name: ed
Sentence: Hoister up!

Name: ed
Sentence: They've had enough for one night.

Name: ed
Sentence: Don't cheer too loud. They still outnumber us a thousand to one.

Name: jon snow
Sentence: Tormund. It's over, let it end.

Name: tormund
Sentence: This is how a man ends.

Name: jon snow
Sentence: Put him in chains. We'll question him later.

Name: tormund
Sentence: I shouldo ve thrown you from the top of your wall boy!

Name: jon snow
Sentence: Aye, you shouldo ve.

Name: sam
Sentence: Woah! It's me. It's me. I promised you, didn't I?

Name: sam
Sentence: We held them off.

Name: jon snow
Sentence: For one night.

Name: sam
Sentence: This is a great victory.

Name: jon snow
Sentence: Great victory? Mance was testing our defenses. He almost made it through. And he has more giants, he has more mammoths. He has a thousand times as many men. They'll hit us again tonight. Maybe we can hold them off for a day or two, but we can never beat them.

Name: sam
Sentence: Where are you going?

Name: jon snow
Sentence: I'm going to find Mance.

Name: sam
Sentence: To...you can't do that. No one gave you any orders.

Name: jon snow
Sentence: Who's left to give orders? The Wildling army is only an army because of Mance. He united a hundred warring tribes. Without Mance they lose their leader. They lose their purpose, they go back to fighting each other, scatter back to their home.

Name: sam
Sentence: Without Mance? You're going to kill him?

Name: jon snow
Sentence: I'm going to try.

Name: sam
Sentence: They'll never let you within a hundred yards of him. And if you did, even if you managed to kill him.

Name: jon snow
Sentence: He'll kill me. If I don't go he'll kill me anyway. They'll kill the rest of us too.

Name: sam
Sentence: He won't just kill ya. They'll boil you. They'll filet you. They'll make it last days!

Name: jon snow
Sentence: You're right. It's a bad plan. What's your plan?

Name: jon snow
Sentence: They held the gate. Get some brothers down here to help you. You need to burn the bodies. Raise the outer gate, then lower it again as soon as I'm out.

Name: sam
Sentence: What are you doing?

Name: jon snow
Sentence: I promised Jeor I'd never lose it again. *he hands the sword to Sam* In case I don't come back.

Name: sam
Sentence: Jon. Come back.

Name: mance
Sentence: You're wearing a black cloak again.

Name: jon snow
Sentence: I've been sent to negotiate with you.

Name: mance
Sentence: It appears my trusting nature got the better of me. It's happened before. I was hoping your loyalty was real when you pledged yourself to us, Jon Snow, truly I was.

Name: jon snow
Sentence: The Halfhand ordered me to join your army and bring back whatever information I could to Castle Black. He made me kill him so you'd trust me. I was loyal, to him and to my Night's Watch vows.

Name: mance
Sentence: All of your vows? She wasn't enough to turn ya, eh? Were you enough to turn her?

Name: jon snow
Sentence: She put three arrows in me when I escaped.

Name: mance
Sentence: Did you see her again at Castle Black?

Name: jon snow
Sentence: Yes.

Name: mance
Sentence: And?

Name: jon snow
Sentence: She's dead.

Name: mance
Sentence: Your doing?

Name: jon snow
Sentence: No.

Name: mance
Sentence: We'll drink to her.

Name: mance
Sentence: Of all the ways I'd kill you, poison would be the last.

Name: mance
Sentence: Ygritte.

Name: jon snow
Sentence: Ygritte.

Name: jon snow
Sentence: That's not wine.

Name: mance
Sentence: No, it's a proper Northern drink, Jon Snow. You did well. Fought hard. Killed some of our strongest men. One of our giants went into your tunnel and never came out again. Mag the Mighty.

Name: jon snow
Sentence: He's dead. He killed my friend Grenn.

Name: mance
Sentence: He was their king. Last of a bloodline that stretches back before the First Men.

Name: jon snow
Sentence: Grenn came from a farm.

Name: mance
Sentence: Mag and Grenn.

Name: jon snow
Sentence: Grenn and Mag.

Name: mance
Sentence: Kullback, could I trouble you for something to eat? I don't imagine our guest has eaten anything in quite some time. So. You're here to strike a bargain?

Name: jon snow
Sentence: Turn your army around and go home.

Name: mance
Sentence: You know I know you're low on arrows. You're low on oil. You're low on men. How many are left? 50?

Name: jon snow
Sentence: I told Tormund and Orell. We have more than a thousand men.

Name: mance
Sentence: I showed you everything I had. The whole army, a hundred thousand strong, and what did you do? You fired on us with everything you had. It wasn't much. Soon as I saw that I sent four hundred men to climb the wall. An unmanned stretch five miles west of here. A lot of them will die climbing, but most of them will be over by the end of the day. This is me being honest with you, Jon Snow, which is more than you've ever done for me. My people have bled enough. We're not here to conquer, we're here to hide behind your wall just like you. We need your tunnel. Now we both know that winter is coming and if my people aren't south of the wall when it comes in earnest, we'll all end up worse than dead. Wanna strike a bargain with me? Here's a bargain. You go back, you open the gates to us and I swear to you that no one else will die. Refuse and we'll kill every last man in Castle Black.

Name: mance
Sentence: Ah! Oh, that's why you're here. I reckon you could do it before any of them could stop ya. They'd kill you of course, they'd kill ya slow, but ya knew that when you came in here. Are you capable of that, Jon Snow? Killing a man in his own tent when he's just offered ya peace? Is that what the Night's Watch is? Is that what you are?

Name: mance
Sentence: You attacking us?

Name: jon snow
Sentence: No, it's like you said, we don't have the men.

Name: mance
Sentence: Hold! To me. To me.

Name: mance
Sentence: Stand down! I said my people have bled enough and I meant it.

Name: stannis baratheon
Sentence: You're the king beyond the wall?

Name: stannis baratheon
Sentence: You know who I am?

Name: mance
Sentence: Never had the pleasure.

Name: davos
Sentence: This is Stannis Baratheon, the one true king of the seven kingdoms.

Name: mance
Sentence: We're not in the seven kingdoms and you're not dressed for this weather.

Name: stannis baratheon
Sentence: It is customary to kneel when surrendering to a king.

Name: mance
Sentence: We do not kneel.

Name: stannis baratheon
Sentence: I'll have thousands of your men in chains by nightfall, I'll have nowhere to put them and nothing to feed them. I'm not here to slaughter beat dogs. Their fate depends on their king.

Name: mance
Sentence: All the same, we do not kneel.

Name: stannis baratheon
Sentence: Take these men away.

Name: davos
Sentence: What are men of the Night's Watch doing in a Wildling camp?

Name: jon snow
Sentence: I was sent to discuss terms with the king beyond the wall.

Name: davos
Sentence: You're speaking to the one true king boy. You'll address him as your grace.

Name: jon snow
Sentence: I know he's the king. My father died for him. My name is Jon Snow, your grace. I'm Ned Stark's son.

Name: stannis baratheon
Sentence: Your father was an honorable man.

Name: jon snow
Sentence: He was, your grace.

Name: stannis baratheon
Sentence: What do you think he'd have done with him?

Name: jon snow
Sentence: I was this man's prisoner once. He couldo ve tortured me, he couldo ve killed me, but he spared my life. I think my father wouldo ve taken him prisoner, listened to what he had to say.

Name: stannis baratheon
Sentence: Very well. *to Davos* Take him.

Name: jon snow
Sentence: Your grace. If my father'd seen the things that I've seen, he'd also tell you to burn the dead before nightfall. All of them.

Name: pycelle
Sentence: I would suggest milk of the poppy to ease his pain but he is completely insensate.

Name: cersei lannister
Sentence: Bloody Martells.

Name: pycelle
Sentence: The cause appears to be manticore venom.

Name: qyburn
Sentence: It is, yes, manticore.

Name: pycelle
Sentence: I've read a good deal about it. It's a horrible poison, usually Mantari in origin. Oh! Yes, yes. There's nothing to be done.

Name: qyburn
Sentence: Yes there is.

Name: pycelle
Sentence: May I ask what you think you're doing?

Name: qyburn
Sentence: Saving him.

Name: pycelle
Sentence: Your grace. I wish it were otherwise, but Ser Gregor is beyond saving. Well, well beyond. This man is not even a Maester, let alone Grand Maester.

Name: qyburn
Sentence: That's for the best. No Maester knows how to save him.

Name: pycelle
Sentence: That is exactly the sort of arrogance that had him expelled from the citadel, your grace. His curiosity was deemed dangerous and unnatural. Rightly so in my opinion.

Name: cersei lannister
Sentence: You're dismissed, Grand Maester.

Name: pycelle
Sentence: Your grace. This is my laboratory!

Name: cersei lannister
Sentence: Not anymore.

Name: cersei lannister
Sentence: You can save him?

Name: qyburn
Sentence: Difficult to say, your grace, but if my past work is any guide. We stand a chance.

Name: cersei lannister
Sentence: Do everything you can. Come to me with anything you need.

Name: qyburn
Sentence: Thank you, your grace. You should know, the process may change him, somewhat.

Name: cersei lannister
Sentence: Will it weaken him?

Name: qyburn
Sentence: Oh no.

Name: cersei lannister
Sentence: Very well then.

Name: tywin lannister
Sentence: Not another word. We've been over this, the matter's closed.

Name: cersei lannister
Sentence: I'm opening it again.

Name: tywin lannister
Sentence: You are betrothed to Loras Tyrell. Still betrothed to Loras Tyrell and you will marry Loras Tyrell as soon as Tommen marries Margaery.

Name: cersei lannister
Sentence: I will not.

Name: tywin lannister
Sentence: Jaime cannot marry or inherit lands. Tyrion's sentence will be carried out tomorrow. You have, on several occasions, made great claims about your commitment to this family's future. Your role in that future is more vital now than it ever was.

Name: cersei lannister
Sentence: I don't care. I will stay in King's Landing where I belong with my son, the king.

Name: tywin lannister
Sentence: When you were nine years old, I was called to the capital. I decided to take your brother with me and not you. You insisted that you would not be left at Casterly Rock under any circumstances and if you recall-

Name: cersei lannister
Sentence: I'm not interested in hearing another one of your smug stories about the time you won. This isn't going to be one of those times.

Name: tywin lannister
Sentence: Do you think you'll be the first person dragged into a sept to be married against her will?

Name: cersei lannister
Sentence: When you marched into the throne room to tell me we'd won the Battle at Blackwater, do you remember?! I was sitting on the iron throne with Tommen. I was about to give him essence of nightshade, that's how far I was willing to go when I thought someone awful had come to take my son away. Someone awful is coming to take him away.

Name: tywin lannister
Sentence: No.

Name: cersei lannister
Sentence: Joffrey is dead. Myrcella's been sold like livestock. And now you want to ship me off to Highgarden and steal my boy, my last boy. Margaery will dig her claws in and you will dig your claws in and you will fight over him like beasts until you rip him apart. I will burn our house to the ground before I let that happen.

Name: tywin lannister
Sentence: And how will you do that?

Name: cersei lannister
Sentence: I'll tell everyone the truth.

Name: tywin lannister
Sentence: And what truth would that be?

Name: cersei lannister
Sentence: You don't know, do you? You never believed it. How is that possible? What am I saying, of course it's possible. How can someone so consumed by the idea of his family have any conception what his actual family was doing? We were right there in front of you and you didn't see us. One look in the past twenty years, one real look and you wouldo ve known.

Name: tywin lannister
Sentence: Known what?

Name: cersei lannister
Sentence: Everything they say is true. About Jaime and me.

Name: tywin lannister
Sentence: No, no, no, no, no.

Name: cersei lannister
Sentence: Your legacy is a lie.

Name: tywin lannister
Sentence: I don't believe you.

Name: cersei lannister
Sentence: Yes you do.

Name: cersei lannister
Sentence: Jaime.

Name: jaime lannister
Sentence: You won. One fewer brother. Must be proud of yourself. There's really nothing you wouldn't do, is there?

Name: cersei lannister
Sentence: For my family, no. I would do things for my family you couldn't imagine.

Name: jaime lannister
Sentence: Tyrion is your family.

Name: cersei lannister
Sentence: He's not.

Name: jaime lannister
Sentence: You don't get to choose.

Name: cersei lannister
Sentence: I do, so do you. You can choose the creature that killed our mother to come into this world-

Name: jaime lannister
Sentence: Are you really mad enough to blame him for that? He didn't decide to kill her. He was an infant.

Name: cersei lannister
Sentence: A disease doesn't decide to kill you, all the same you cut it out before it does. What do you decide? What do you choose?

Name: jaime lannister
Sentence: The things I did to get back to you, to endure all that, only to find you-

Name: cersei lannister
Sentence: I choose you.

Name: jaime lannister
Sentence: Those are words.

Name: cersei lannister
Sentence: Yes. Like the ones I just said to father. I told him.

Name: jaime lannister
Sentence: Told him what?

Name: cersei lannister
Sentence: I told him about us.

Name: jaime lannister
Sentence: You told him?

Name: cersei lannister
Sentence: I told him I wouldn't marry Loras Tyrell. I told him I'm staying right here with Tommen, with you.

Name: jaime lannister
Sentence: You think he'll just accept that?

Name: cersei lannister
Sentence: Go and ask him.

Name: jaime lannister
Sentence: What did you say?

Name: cersei lannister
Sentence: I don't want to talk about Tywin Lannister. I don't choose Tywin Lannister, I don't love Tywin Lannister. I love my brother. I love my lover. People will whisper, they'll make their jokes. Let them. They're all so small I can't even see them. I only see what matters.

Name: jaime lannister
Sentence: Someone will walk in.

Name: cersei lannister
Sentence: I don't care.

Name: missandei
Sentence: in Valyrian* You stand before Daenerys Stormborn, the Unburnt, Queen of Mereen, Queen of the Andals and the Rhoynar and the First Men. Khaleesi of the Great Grass Sea, Breaker of Chains and Mother of Dragons.

Name: fennesz
Sentence: in Valyrian* Thank you for seeing me, your grace. My name is Fennesz. I can speak the common tongue if you wish.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Sentence: You speak it very well.

Name: fennesz
Sentence: Before you freed me, I belonged to Master Mighdal. I was tutor to his children. I taught them languages and history. They know a great deal about your family because of me. Little Calla is only seven, but she admires you very much.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Sentence: I hope I can prove worthy of her admiration. What can I do for you?

Name: fennesz
Sentence: When you took the city, the children begged me not to leave the house. But Master Mighdal and I agreed that I must. So I lost my home. Now I live on the streets.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Sentence: I have outfitted mess halls to feed all former slaves and barracks to shelter them.

Name: fennesz
Sentence: I do not mean to offend, your grace. I went to one of these places. The young prey on the old. Take what they want and beat us if we resist.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Sentence: My Unsullied will make them safe again in short order my friend, this I promise you.

Name: fennesz
Sentence: Even if they are safe, who would I be there? What purpose would I serve? With my master, I was a teacher. I had the respect and love of these children.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Sentence: What is it that you want from me?

Name: fennesz
Sentence: Your grace, I ask you to let me sell myself back to Master Mighdal.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Sentence: You want to return to a man who owned you, like a goat or a chair?

Name: fennesz
Sentence: Please, your grace, the young may rejoice in the new world you've built for them. But for those of us too old to change there is only fear and squalor. I am not alone. There are many outside waiting to beg the same-

Name: daenerys targaryen
Sentence: I did not take this city to preside over the injustice I fought to destroy. I took it to bring people freedom. But freedom means making your own choices. I will allow you to sign a contract with your former master. It may not cover a period lasting longer than a year.

Name: fennesz
Sentence: Thank you, your grace. Thank you.

Name: barristan
Sentence: The masters will take advantage of this situation. The men serving them will be slaves in all but name.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Sentence: Approach my friend.

Name: man
Sentence: in Low Valyrian* I do not understand, my queen. I do not understand, my queen.

Name: missandei
Sentence: in Low Valyrian* The Queen says you may approach.

Name: man
Sentence: crying, speaking Low Valyrian*

Name: missandei
Sentence: translating* I have brought you. He came from the sky. The black one. The winged shadow. He came from the sky and...

Name: missandei
Sentence: translating* My girl. My little girl.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Sentence: What was her name?

Name: missandei
Sentence: Zala, your grace.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Sentence: How old was she?

Name: missandei
Sentence: Three.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Sentence: Three. *in Valyrian* And still no word on Drogon?

Name: grey worm
Sentence: in Valyrian* Sailors saw him flying over the Black Cliffs three days ago, my queen. Nothing since then.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Sentence: in Valyrian* Meet me in the catacombs.

Name: aemon
Sentence: They came to us from White Harbor and Barrowton, from Fairmarket and King's Landing, from north and south, from east and west. They died protecting men, women, and children who will never know their names. It is for us to remember them. Our brothers, we shall never see their like again.

Name: all together
Sentence: And now their watch is ended.

Name: aemon
Sentence: And now their watch is ended.

Name: tormund
Sentence: Your old blind man patched me up. Why?

Name: jon snow
Sentence: He's sworn to treat all wounded men, friend or foe.

Name: tormund
Sentence: You want me alive so you can torture me?

Name: jon snow
Sentence: No one's going to torture you.

Name: tormund
Sentence: So how do we die? Hanging? Beheading? Drop us from the top of the wall?

Name: jon snow
Sentence: I don't know what happens to the prisoners.

Name: tormund
Sentence: Who decides?

Name: jon snow
Sentence: I suppose Stannis does.

Name: tormund
Sentence: He your king now?

Name: jon snow
Sentence: I don't have a king.

Name: tormund
Sentence: You spent too much time with us, Jon Snow. You can never be a kneeler again.

Name: jon snow
Sentence: We're gonna burn the bodies of your dead. Do you want to say any words over them?

Name: tormund
Sentence: Words? What kind of words?

Name: jon snow
Sentence: Funeral words. I don't know how the Free Folk do it.

Name: tormund
Sentence: Do what?

Name: jon snow
Sentence: Say farewell.

Name: tormund
Sentence: The dead can't hear us, boy.

Name: tormund
Sentence: Snow. Did you love her? She loved you.

Name: jon snow
Sentence: She told you?

Name: tormund
Sentence: No. All she ever talked about was killing you. That's how I know. She belongs in the North. The real North. You understand me?

Name: meera
Sentence: We can stop, we can rest.

Name: jojen
Sentence: We'll rest with the three-eyed raven.

Name: meera
Sentence: We're not going to make it.

Name: jojen
Sentence: We're already here.

Name: bran stark
Sentence: Jojen. Jojen! Look, Jojen, look.

Name: meera
Sentence: JOJEN! Hold on!

Name: bran stark
Sentence: Help them! Now!

Name: meera
Sentence: Hold on to me!

Name: hodor
Sentence: Hodor...

Name: bran stark
Sentence: Help them!

Name: jojen
Sentence: Bran! Save yourself, now!

Name: girl
Sentence: Come with me, Brandon Stark!

Name: girl
Sentence: He is lost. Come with me, or die with him.

Name: jojen
Sentence: Go with them.

Name: girl
Sentence: They cannot follow us. The power that moves them is powerless here.

Name: bran stark
Sentence: Who are you?

Name: girl
Sentence: The First Men called us The Children, but we were born long before them. Come, he waits for you.

Name: bran stark
Sentence: You're the three-eyed raven.

Name: old man
Sentence: I have been many things. Now, I am what you see.

Name: meera
Sentence: My brother, he led us to you, and now he…

Name: old man
Sentence: He knew what would happen. From the moment he left, he knew, and he went anyway.

Name: meera
Sentence: How do you know?

Name: old man
Sentence: I've been watching you. All of you, all of your lives, with a thousand eyes and one. Now you've come to me at last, Brandon Stark, though the hour is late.

Name: bran stark
Sentence: I didn't want anyone to die for me.

Name: old man
Sentence: He died so that you could find what you have lost.

Name: bran stark
Sentence: You're going to help me walk again?

Name: old man
Sentence: You'll never walk again. But you will fly.

Name: brienne
Sentence: Podrick. Podrick! Where are the horses?

Name: podrick
Sentence: I hobbled them last night.

Name: brienne
Sentence: What sort of hobble?

Name: podrick
Sentence: A figure-eight, like you taught me.

Name: brienne
Sentence: If you did it like I taught you then the horses would be here.

Name: podrick
Sentence: Thieves, maybe?

Name: brienne
Sentence: It's at least thirty miles to the Eyrie from here. You're carrying the saddle bags.

Name: arya stark
Sentence: People coming. You can shit later, there's people coming!

Name: brienne
Sentence: Morning!

Name: arya stark
Sentence: Morning.

Name: brienne
Sentence: I like your sword. Are we getting close to the bloody gate?

Name: arya stark
Sentence: About ten more miles.

Name: brienne
Sentence: Did you hear that Podrick? Only about ten more miles to the Bloody Gate.

Name: arya stark
Sentence: Are you a knight?

Name: brienne
Sentence: No.

Name: arya stark
Sentence: But you know how to use that sword.

Name: brienne
Sentence: I do.

Name: arya stark
Sentence: Does it have a name?

Name: brienne
Sentence: Oathkeeper.”

Name: arya stark
Sentence: Mine's “Needle.”

Name: brienne
Sentence: Good name.

Name: arya stark
Sentence: Who taught you how to fight?

Name: brienne
Sentence: My father.

Name: arya stark
Sentence: Mine never wanted to. Said fighting was for boys.

Name: brienne
Sentence: Mine said the same. But I kept fighting the boys anyway. Kept losing. Finally my father said, “If you're going to do it, you might as well do it right.”

Name: brienne
Sentence: Seven blessings. I'm Brienne of Tarth, this is Podrick Payne.

Name: sandor clegane
Sentence: You want something?

Name: podrick
Sentence: That's Sandor Clegane- the Hound.

Name: brienne
Sentence: You're Arya Stark.

Name: sandor clegane
Sentence: I asked if you wanted something.

Name: brienne
Sentence: I swore to your mother I would bring you home to her.

Name: arya stark
Sentence: My mother's dead.

Name: brienne
Sentence: I know. I wish I couldo ve been there to protect her.

Name: arya stark
Sentence: You're not a northerner.

Name: brienne
Sentence: I know, but I swore a sacred vow to protect her.

Name: arya stark
Sentence: Why didn't you?

Name: brienne
Sentence: She commanded me to bring Jaime Lannister back to King's Landing.

Name: sandor clegane
Sentence: You're paid by the Lannisters. You're here for the bounty on me.

Name: brienne
Sentence: I'm not paid by the Lannisters.

Name: sandor clegane
Sentence: No? Fancy sword you've got there. Where'd you get it? I've been looking at Lannister gold all my life. Go on, Brienne of fucking Tarth, tell me that's not Lannister gold.

Name: brienne
Sentence: Jaime Lannister gave me this sword.

Name: arya stark
Sentence: The Bloody Gate's ten miles.

Name: brienne
Sentence: I swore to your mother by the Old Gods and the New -

Name: arya stark
Sentence: I don't care what you swore!

Name: brienne
Sentence: Arya!

Name: sandor clegane
Sentence: You heard the girl! She's not coming with you.

Name: brienne
Sentence: She is.

Name: sandor clegane
Sentence: You're not a good listener. Valyrian steel-- I've always wanted some Valyrian steel.

Name: brienne
Sentence: Come with me Arya. I'll take you to safety.

Name: sandor clegane
Sentence: Safety?! Where the fuck's that? Her aunt in the Eyrie's dead. Her mother's dead, her father's dead, her brother's dead. Winterfell's a pile of rubble. There's no safety, you dumb bitch. If you don't know that by now, you're the wrong one to watch over her.

Name: brienne
Sentence: And that's what you're doing? Watching over her?

Name: sandor clegane
Sentence: Aye, that's what I'm doing.

Name: brienne
Sentence: I have no wish to kill you Ser.

Name: sandor clegane
Sentence: I'm not a knight.

Name: brienne
Sentence: Arya! Arya! ARYA! Where is she?

Name: podrick
Sentence: She was just here...

Name: brienne
Sentence: Why weren't you watching her?

Name: podrick
Sentence: I was watching you I thought you migth need some help…

Name: brienne
Sentence: Which way Pod? Which way did she go?

Name: podrick
Sentence: Ah, I think that way.

Name: sandor clegane
Sentence: You're still here? [Coughs] Big bitch saved you.

Name: arya stark
Sentence: I don't need saving.

Name: sandor clegane
Sentence: No, not you. You're a real killer. With your water dancing, and your needle.

Name: arya stark
Sentence: You're gonna die?

Name: sandor clegane
Sentence: Unless there's a Maester hiding behind that rock, aye, I'm done. I'd skin you alive for wine. [Arya offers water.] Fuck water! Killed by a woman. I bet you liked that. Go on, go after her. She'll help you. Going out alone, you won't last a day out there.

Name: arya stark
Sentence: I'll last longer than you.

Name: sandor clegane
Sentence: You remember where the heart is? Fuck it. I'm ready. Go on, girl. Another name off your list. You kept promising me. I cut down your butcher's boy, the ginger. He was begging for mercy. Please sir, please don't kill me, please, please. Bled all over my horse. Saddle stunk of butcher's boy for weeks. And your sister, your pretty sister. I shouldo ve taken her. That night the Blackwater burned, I shouldo ve fucked her bloody. At least I'd have one happy memory! Do I have to beg you? Do it. Do it.

Name: sandor clegane
Sentence: Kill me. Kill me! Kill me! Kill me!

Name: tyrion lannister
Sentence: Oh, get on with it you son of a whore.

Name: jaime lannister
Sentence: Is that any way to speak about our mother?

Name: tyrion lannister
Sentence: What're you doing?

Name: jaime lannister
Sentence: What do you think I'm doing? The galley's waiting in the bay bound for the Free Cities.

Name: tyrion lannister
Sentence: Who's helping you?

Name: jaime lannister
Sentence: Varys.

Name: tyrion lannister
Sentence: Varys?

Name: jaime lannister
Sentence: You have more friends than you thought.

Name: jaime lannister
Sentence: There's a locked door at the top of the stairs. Knock on it twice, and then twice again. Varys will open.

Name: tyrion lannister
Sentence: I suppose this is goodbye, then.

Name: jaime lannister
Sentence: Farewell, little brother.

Name: tyrion lannister
Sentence: Jaime, thank you. For my life.

Name: jaime lannister
Sentence: Quickly now.

Name: woman
Sentence: Tywin… my lion...

Name: tyrion lannister
Sentence: I'm sorry. I'm sorry.

Name: tywin lannister
Sentence: Tyrion! Put down the crossbow. Who released you? Ah, your brother ,I expect. He always had a soft spot for you. Come, we'll go and talk in my chambers. Is this how you want to speak to me? Shaming your father has always given you pleasure…

Name: tyrion lannister
Sentence: All my life, you've wanted me dead.

Name: tywin lannister
Sentence: Yes. But you refused to die. I respect that, even admire it. You fight for what's yours. I'd never let them execute you; is that what you fear? I'd never let Illyn Payne take your head. You're a Lannister. You're my son.

Name: tyrion lannister
Sentence: I loved her.

Name: tywin lannister
Sentence: Who?

Name: tyrion lannister
Sentence: Shae.

Name: tywin lannister
Sentence: Bah, Tyrion. Put down that crossbow.

Name: tyrion lannister
Sentence: I murdered her. With my own hands.

Name: tywin lannister
Sentence: It doesn't matter.

Name: tyrion lannister
Sentence: It doesn't matter?

Name: tywin lannister
Sentence: She was a whore!

Name: tyrion lannister
Sentence: Say that word again.

Name: tywin lannister
Sentence: And what? You'll kill your own father in the privy? No. You're my son. Enough of this nonsense…

Name: tyrion lannister
Sentence: I am your son, and you sentenced me to die. You knew I didn't poison Joffrey, but you sentenced me all the same. Why?

Name: tywin lannister
Sentence: Enough. We'll go back to my chambers and speak with some dignity.

Name: tyrion lannister
Sentence: I can't go back there. She's in there.

Name: tywin lannister
Sentence: What, are you afraid of a dead whore?

Name: tywin lannister
Sentence: You shot me. You're no son of mine.

Name: tyrion lannister
Sentence: I am your son. I have always been your son.

Name: varys
Sentence: What have you done? Quickly. Trust me, my friend, I've brought you this far.

Name: arya stark
Sentence: I want to see the captain.

Name: captain
Sentence: You're seeing him.

Name: arya stark
Sentence: I want to go north, to the wall.

Name: captain
Sentence: No you don't.

Name: arya stark
Sentence: I can pay.

Name: captain
Sentence: There is nothing in the north but ice and war and pirates.

Name: arya stark
Sentence: I wouldn't need a cabin. Please, I could work, scrubbing the floors, or…

Name: captain
Sentence: I'm not going north, child, we're going home.

Name: arya stark
Sentence: Where's home?

Name: captain
Sentence: The Free City of Braavos.

Name: arya stark
Sentence: Wait, I have something else.

Name: captain
Sentence: More silver won't make a difference.

Name: arya stark
Sentence: It's not silver, it's iron.

Name: arya stark
Sentence: Valar morghulis.

Name: captain
Sentence: How did you… valar dohaeris. Of course, you shall have a cabin.

Name: melara
Sentence: We shouldn't be out here alone.

Name: cersei lannister
Sentence: Why not?

Name: melara
Sentence: If your father hears…

Name: cersei lannister
Sentence: He'll never know we've been gone.

Name: melara
Sentence: But if he finds out…

Name: cersei lannister
Sentence: You don't need to be afraid of my father.

Name: melara
Sentence: Are you sure?

Name: cersei lannister
Sentence: Yes.

Name: melara
Sentence: We shouldn't go in.

Name: cersei lannister
Sentence: Of course we should.

Name: maggy
Sentence: Get out. Get out!

Name: melara
Sentence: Let's go…

Name: cersei lannister
Sentence: No.

Name: maggy
Sentence: Listen to your friend.

Name: cersei lannister
Sentence: They said that you were terrifying. With cat's teeth and three eyes. You're not terrifying. You're boring.

Name: maggy
Sentence: You don't know what I am.

Name: cersei lannister
Sentence: I know you're a witch and you can see the future. Tell me mine.

Name: maggy
Sentence: Everybody wants to know their future. Until they know their future.

Name: cersei lannister
Sentence: This is my father's land. My land. Tell me my future or I'll have your two boring eyes gouged out of your head.

Name: maggy
Sentence: Your blood. Give me a taste.

Name: maggy
Sentence: Three questions you get. You won't like the answers.

Name: cersei lannister
Sentence: I've been promised to the prince. When will we marry?

Name: maggy
Sentence: You'll never wed the prince. You'll wed the king.

Name: cersei lannister
Sentence: But I will be queen?

Name: maggy
Sentence: Oh yes, you'll be queen. For a time. In comes another. Younger, more beautiful, to cast you down and take all you hold dear.

Name: cersei lannister
Sentence: Will the king and I have children?

Name: maggy
Sentence: No. The king will have 20 children, and you will have 3.

Name: cersei lannister
Sentence: That doesn't make sense.

Name: maggy
Sentence: Gold will be their crowns. Gold their shrouds.

Name: melara
Sentence: Come on, we have to go. We have to go! Cersei!

Name: priest
Sentence: Your grace, we are honored by your presence. The mourners are waiting.

Name: cersei lannister
Sentence: They will keep waiting. I want a moment alone with him.

Name: priest
Sentence: But your grace, many of these lords and ladies have travelled day and night to be here…

Name: priest
Sentence: From all seven kingdoms…

Name: cersei lannister
Sentence: They will wait.

Name: cersei lannister
Sentence: He never wanted you to be a King's Guard, but here you are, protecting his dead body.

Name: jaime lannister
Sentence: What he built. The towers. He built it for us. He meant it for us. They're going to try to take it away, all of it.

Name: cersei lannister
Sentence: They?

Name: jaime lannister
Sentence: All of them out there are enemies. They're waiting a night to make sure he's really dead and as soon as they see the stones on his eyes they'll set to work on tearing us apart.

Name: cersei lannister
Sentence: They had nothing to do with it. The man who murdered our father, he tore us apart, he's the enemy. I've been telling you for years, you've been defending him for years…

Name: jaime lannister
Sentence: This is exactly what they want.

Name: cersei lannister
Sentence: and now our father is dead. And that little monster is out there somewhere drawing breath. Did you set him free?

Name: cersei lannister
Sentence: Tyrion may be a monster but at least he killed our father on purpose. You killed him by mistake. With stupidity. You're a man of action, aren't you? When it occurs to you to do something you do it, nevermind the consequences. Take a look. Look at the consequences. Here they are. He loved you more than anyone in this world.

Name: varys
Sentence: Apologies.

Name: tyrion lannister
Sentence: I still don't see why I had to stay in this fucking crate once we set sail.

Name: varys
Sentence: I saved your life. If they catch you, they catch me. I cannot say I feel overly guilty about leaving you in that “fucking crate”.

Name: tyrion lannister
Sentence: Do you know what it's like to stuff your shit through one of those air holes?

Name: varys
Sentence: No. I only know what it's like to pick up your shit and throw it overboard.

Name: tyrion lannister
Sentence: Pentos?

Name: varys
Sentence: The home of my colleague. Ilyrio Mopatis. A merchant. He and I met many years ago, through mutual friends. A group of people who saw Robert Baratheon for the disaster he was. We tried to do what was best for the realm by supporting the Targaryen restoration. And thus began the chain of mistakes that has led us both here. Things have gotten worse, not better. Westeros needs to be saved from itself.

Name: tyrion lannister
Sentence: Much better.

Name: varys
Sentence: My lord?

Name: tyrion lannister
Sentence: I don't think I am anymore. A lord. Are you a lord if you kill your father? I don't suppose they revoke your nobility for killing a whore. That has to be happen all the time.

Name: varys
Sentence: You already drank yourself across the Narrow Sea.

Name: tyrion lannister
Sentence: In a box. Why stop now?

Name: varys
Sentence: Because we are talking about the future of our country.

Name: tyrion lannister
Sentence: The future is shit. Just like the past.

Name: prostitute
Sentence: You want the same? Same as always?

Name: white rat
Sentence: You… you don't have to.

Name: prostitute
Sentence: Habit.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Sentence: Sons of the Harpy?

Name: barristan
Sentence: Yes, your grace. They left it on the body.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Sentence: They've never killed before.

Name: barristan
Sentence: It was only a matter of time, your grace. Conquerors are always met with resistance.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Sentence: I didn't conquer them. Their own people did.

Name: mossador
Sentence: They do not see us as people, Your Grace.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Sentence: Then they will have to learn to see things differently, Mossador. He did not risk his life fighting for freedom so cowards in masks could take it away. And I did not take up residence in this pyramid so I could watch the city below decline into chaos. What was the name of the man you lost?

Name: grey worm
Sentence: White Rat, your grace.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Sentence: I want him buried with honor. Publicly. In the Temple of the Graces.

Name: barristan
Sentence: The Sons of the Harpy will hear that message.

Name: mossador
Sentence: Make them very angry.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Sentence: Angry snakes lash out. Makes chopping off their heads that much easier. Find the men who did this and bring them to me.

Name: missandei
Sentence: Torgo Nudho.

Name: grey worm
Sentence: Missandei hin Naath.

Name: missandei
Sentence: I wanted to speak with you.

Name: grey worm
Sentence: Why do you come?

Name: missandei
Sentence: White Rat, the Unsullied who… I have heard they found his body in a brothel. I have heard that more than one Unsullied has been known to visit Meereen's brothels. May I ask you why? Why would an Unsullied go to a brothel?

Name: grey worm
Sentence: I do not know. I must go.

Name: jon snow
Sentence: Get your shield up.

Name: olly
Sentence: It's too heavy.

Name: jon snow
Sentence: If it wasn't heavy it wouldn't stop a sword, now get it up.

Name: jon snow
Sentence: Come. Try it again. Drive at me. Keep your shield up. Or I'll ring your head like a bell.

Name: gilly
Sentence: Shouldn't you be training, too?

Name: sam
Sentence: Well, I'm hardly a new recruit. How many brothers can say they've killed a white walker and a Thenn? I might be the first in history!

Name: alliser
Sentence: These men need a firm hand. Always have. They're poachers and thieves.

Name: alliser
Sentence: Not soldiers.

Name: gilly
Sentence: That one hates me.

Name: sam
Sentence: If Ser Alliser is chosen as the new Lord Commander… he hates the wildlings.

Name: sam
Sentence: All the wildlings.

Name: gilly
Sentence: Don't let them send us away.

Name: sam
Sentence: It's not a sure thing. Ser Denys Mallister has commanded the Shadow Tower for 20 years, and people say he's a good man. He's running against Ser Alliser--

Name: gilly
Sentence: Sam! Don't let them send us away.

Name: sam
Sentence: I told you. Wherever you go, I go, too.

Name: gilly
Sentence: You can't leave, they'll execute you.

Name: jon snow
Sentence: Good, good, pivot! Don't forget to pivot! Shield up!

Name: melisandre
Sentence: The king wants a word.

Name: jon snow
Sentence: You're not cold, my lady?

Name: melisandre
Sentence: Never. The Lordo s fire lives within me, Jon Snow.

Name: melisandre
Sentence: Feel.

Name: melisandre
Sentence: Are you a virgin?

Name: jon snow
Sentence: No.

Name: melisandre
Sentence: Good.

Name: melisandre
Sentence: Your grace. The bastard of Winterfell.

Name: stannis baratheon
Sentence: You know who rules at Winterfell now?

Name: jon snow
Sentence: Roose Bolton.

Name: stannis baratheon
Sentence: The traitor who plunged a dagger into Robb Stark's heart. Don't you want to avenge him?

Name: jon snow
Sentence: I want a great many things, your grace. But I'm a sworn brother of the Night's Watch now.

Name: davos
Sentence: I've been talking to your sworn brothers. Many of them love you.

Name: jon snow
Sentence: They're good men.

Name: davos
Sentence: Many don't. You were seen taking the body of a wildling girl north of the Wall. Why?

Name: jon snow
Sentence: It's where she belonged.

Name: davos
Sentence: Some of the Night's Watch feel you have too much affection for the wildlings.

Name: jon snow
Sentence: They were born on the wrong side of the wall. That doesn't make them monsters.

Name: stannis baratheon
Sentence: No matter. I shall take back the North from the thieves who stole it. Tywin Lannister is dead. He can't protect them now. I shall mount Roose Bolton's head on a spike. But if I'm to take Winterfell I'll need more men.

Name: jon snow
Sentence: The men of the Night's Watch are sworn to play no part--

Name: stannis baratheon
Sentence: I'm not talking about the damn Night's Watch. I'm talking about the wildlings.

Name: jon snow
Sentence: Your grace, you want the wildlings to march in your army?

Name: stannis baratheon
Sentence: If they swear to follow me, I'll pardon them. We'll take Winterfell. Once the North is won, I'll declare them citizens of the realm. I'll give them land to live on.

Name: davos
Sentence: It's a fair offer. More than fair.

Name: stannis baratheon
Sentence: I'll offer them their lives and their freedom if Mance kneels before me and swears his loyalty.

Name: jon snow
Sentence: I don't think that's likely.

Name: stannis baratheon
Sentence: You admire him, don't you?

Name: jon snow
Sentence: I respect him.

Name: stannis baratheon
Sentence: He likes you. Convince him to bend the knee...

Name: jon snow
Sentence: Your grace…

Name: stannis baratheon
Sentence: or he burns.

Name: jon snow
Sentence: How much time do I have?

Name: stannis baratheon
Sentence: Nightfall. The sun drops fast this time of year. Hurry, Jon Snow.

Name: master of arms
Sentence: Sword up! Attack, my lord! Attack! Don't cross your feet!

Name: yohn royce
Sentence: My sons have had swords in their hands from the time they could walk. This one…

Name: petyr baelish
Sentence: Lord Arryn will never be a great warrior.

Name: royce
Sentence: Great warrior? He sings a sword like a girl with palsy.

Name: squire
Sentence: My lord.

Name: master of arms
Sentence: Sword up, my lord!

Name: petyr baelish
Sentence: Some boys develop more slowly. He's still young.

Name: royce
Sentence: He's 13. Boys go to war at 13.

Name: petyr baelish
Sentence: He has other gifts.

Name: royce
Sentence: Does he?

Name: petyr baelish
Sentence: The gift of a great name. Sometimes that's all one needs.

Name: sansa stark
Sentence: Goodbye Lord Royce, and thank you for all you've done for me.

Name: royce
Sentence: I have done nothing more than my duty, my lady.

Name: petyr baelish
Sentence: I have no doubt that upon my return, Robin's skills will have improved immeasurably.

Name: royce
Sentence: He'll be safe here. As for his skills, I make no promises.

Name: podrick
Sentence: Will we head north at some point? He said Sansa had a brother at Castle Black. We're a few days ride from the Kingsroad, but that will take us--

Name: brienne
Sentence: Us? The only reason you're here is that Jaime Lannister told me you weren't safe in the capital. You're hundreds of miles from King's Landing. No one knows what you look like. No one cares. You're safe.

Name: podrick
Sentence: But I'm you're squire.

Name: brienne
Sentence: Do you even know what a squire is?

Name: podrick
Sentence: An attendant to a knight?

Name: brienne
Sentence: I'm not a knight. That means you're not a squire.

Name: podrick
Sentence: Well, where would I go?

Name: brienne
Sentence: I don't care, I'm not your mother.

Name: podrick
Sentence: You swore to find the Stark girls.

Name: brienne
Sentence: I found Arya. She didn't want my protection.

Name: podrick
Sentence: Sansa still might.

Name: brienne
Sentence: Will you shut your mouth? I didn't ask for advice. I don't want anyone following me. I'm not a leader. All I ever wanted is to fight for a Lord I believed in. The good lords are dead and the rest are monsters.

Name: sansa stark
Sentence: You told Lord Royce we were going to the Fingers.

Name: petyr baelish
Sentence: I did.

Name: sansa stark
Sentence: But we're heading west.

Name: petyr baelish
Sentence: We are.

Name: sansa stark
Sentence: If he wanted to betray us, he already would have.

Name: petyr baelish
Sentence: Lord Royce may be as honorable as he thinks he is, but he's not alone in that castle. Do you trust all those knights and ladies, stable boys and serving girls?

Name: sansa stark
Sentence: No. Do you trust the carriage driver or the knights escorting us?

Name: petyr baelish
Sentence: No. But I pay them well, and they've seen what happens to men who disappoint me.

Name: sansa stark
Sentence: So where are we going? To a land where you trust everyone?

Name: petyr baelish
Sentence: So a land so far from here, even Cersei Lannister can't get her hands on you.

Name: loras
Sentence: It was such a deep, deep shock to us all. Your father was a force to be reckoned with. He truly was. I wouldn't presume to claim to have known him as such…

Name: loras
Sentence: But just being in his presence was enough to make it so clear just how formidable a person you were dealing with. What a… what a force to be reckoned with.

Name: cersei lannister
Sentence: Thank you so much for your kind words.

Name: grand maester pyrcelle
Sentence: Deepest condolences, your grace. This tragedy… I never trusted Varys. I often warned…

Name: lancel lannister
Sentence: Your grace.

Name: cersei lannister
Sentence: Cousin Lancel. I hardly recognized you.

Name: lancel
Sentence: My deepest sympathies.

Name: kevan lannister
Sentence: I apologize for my son's appearance.

Name: cersei lannister
Sentence: Uncle, it's quite alright.

Name: kevan
Sentence: They call themselves sparrows. Bloody fanatics. Religion has its place, of course, but at a certain point… They never would have come to the capital when Tywin was alive.

Name: cersei lannister
Sentence: I'm sure he'll grow out of it. Whatever it is. Excuse me.

Name: kevan
Sentence: Of course.

Name: cersei lannister
Sentence: Your wounds from the Blackwater seem to have healed.

Name: lancel
Sentence: It wasn't my wounds that needed healing.

Name: cersei lannister
Sentence: What can I do for you?

Name: lancel
Sentence: You can forgive me.

Name: cersei lannister
Sentence: What could you possibly have done to warrant my forgiveness?

Name: lancel
Sentence: I led you into the darkness.

Name: cersei lannister
Sentence: I doubt you've ever led anyone anywhere.

Name: lancel
Sentence: I tempted you into our unnatural relations. And, of course, there was the king. His boar hunt. His wine.

Name: cersei lannister
Sentence: I don't know what you're talking about.

Name: lancel
Sentence: I'm a different person now. I found peace in the light of the Seven. You can too. They watch over all of us, ready to dole out mercy… or justice. Their world is at hand. I will pray for your father's soul.

Name: cersei lannister
Sentence: The day Tywin Lannister's soul needs your help…

Name: olyvar
Sentence: It looks like Dorne.

Name: loras
Sentence: No it doesn't.

Name: olyvar
Sentence: It does. That's the Sunspear bit right there. And that's where the mountains are. And over here is… Sunsnake? Stonespear?

Name: loras
Sentence: Sandstone.

Name: olyvar
Sentence: Yes. Yes, Sandstone. Just there.

Name: loras
Sentence: Fine.

Name: loras
Sentence: It's Dorne.

Name: olyvar
Sentence: We should go there. I think we would have a lovely time.

Name: loras
Sentence: Judging by my experience, that would be wonderful. Dorne, Highgarden. Anywhere but here.

Name: margaery tyrell
Sentence: We're late for dinner as it is.

Name: loras
Sentence: You're very respectful.

Name: margaery tyrell
Sentence: I'm very hungry.

Name: margaery tyrell
Sentence: What's your name?

Name: olyvar
Sentence: Olyvar, my lady.

Name: margaery tyrell
Sentence: I'm afraid my brother is keeping the king waiting, Olyvar.

Name: margaery tyrell
Sentence: Perhaps you might consider being a bit more discreet?

Name: loras
Sentence: Why? They all know about me anyway. Everybody knows everything about everyone. What's the point in trying to keep a secret in a place like this?

Name: margaery tyrell
Sentence: In any event… you shouldn't keep your intended waiting.

Name: loras
Sentence: My intended? Please. Tywin's dead. That means no one can force Cersei to marry me.

Name: margaery tyrell
Sentence: Lucky you.

Name: loras
Sentence: Unlucky you.

Name: margaery tyrell
Sentence: You think I want that woman married to my brother?

Name: loras
Sentence: If she doesn't marry me, she doesn't go to Highgarden. Which means she stays in King's Landing. Which means you're trapped here with Cersei Lannister as your mother-by-law.

Name: margaery tyrell
Sentence: Perhaps.

Name: loras
Sentence: Perhaps?

Name: margaery tyrell
Sentence: Perhaps?

Name: tyrion lannister
Sentence: Eunuch, the spider, the master of whisperers.

Name: varys
Sentence: Imp, half-man.

Name: varys
Sentence: There are faster ways to kill yourself.

Name: tyrion lannister
Sentence: Not for a coward.

Name: varys
Sentence: You are many things, my friend, but not a coward.

Name: tyrion lannister
Sentence: You never told me why you set me free.

Name: varys
Sentence: Your brother asked me to.

Name: tyrion lannister
Sentence: You could have said no.

Name: varys
Sentence: Refuse the Kingslayer? A dangerous proposition.

Name: tyrion lannister
Sentence: Not as dangerous as releasing me. You risked your life, your position, everything. Why? You're not family, you owe me nothing.

Name: varys
Sentence: I didn't do it for you. I did it for the Seven Kingdoms.

Name: tyrion lannister
Sentence: A drunken dwarf will never be the savior of the Seven Kingdoms.

Name: varys
Sentence: I don't believe in saviors. I believe men of talent have a role to play in the war to come.

Name: tyrion lannister
Sentence: You're going to have to find another soldier. I'm done with Westeros and Westeros is done with me.

Name: varys
Sentence: You have many admirable qualities, self-pity is not one of them. Any fool with a bit of luck can find himself born into power. But earning it for yourself, that takes work.

Name: tyrion lannister
Sentence: I'm not well-suited for work.

Name: varys
Sentence: I think you are. You have your father's instinct for politics, and you have compassion.

Name: tyrion lannister
Sentence: Compassion? Yes. I killed my lover with my bare hands. I shot my own father with a crossbow.

Name: varys
Sentence: I never said you were perfect.

Name: tyrion lannister
Sentence: What is it you want exactly?

Name: varys
Sentence: Peace. Prosperity. A land where the powerful do not prey on the powerless.

Name: tyrion lannister
Sentence: Where the castles are made of gingerbread and the moats are filled with blackberry wine. The powerful have always preyed on the powerless, that's how they became powerful in the first place.

Name: varys
Sentence: Perhaps. And perhaps we've grown so used to horror we assume there's no other way. If you sat on the Iron Throne, would you spread misery throughout the land?

Name: tyrion lannister
Sentence: I will never sit on the Iron Throne.

Name: varys
Sentence: No, you won't. But you could help another climb those steps and take that seat. The Seven Kingdoms need someone stronger than Tommen, but gentler than Stannis. A monarch who can intimidate the high lord and inspire the people. A ruler loved by millions with a powerful army and the right family name.

Name: tyrion lannister
Sentence: Good luck finding him.

Name: varys
Sentence: Who said anything about him? You have a choice my friend. You can stay here at Ilyrio's palace and drink yourself to death, or you can ride with me to Mereen, meet Daenerys Targaryen, and decide if the world is worth fighting for.

Name: tyrion lannister
Sentence: Can I drink myself to death on the road to Meereen?

Name: daario naharis
Sentence: When did the Unsullied start patrolling the streets of Meereen? Looks like your friends haven't been behaving themselves.

Name: hizdahr zo loraq
Sentence: The mission to Yunkai was a resounding success. The Wise Masters of Yunkai have agreed to cede power to a council of elders, made up of both the freedmen and the former slaveholders. All matters of consequence will be brought to you for review.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Sentence: Good.

Name: hizdahr
Sentence: They did ask for some concessions.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Sentence: Concessions?

Name: hizdahr
Sentence: Politics is the art of compromise, your grace.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Sentence: I'm not a politician. I'm a queen.

Name: hizdahr
Sentence: Forgive me. You're right, of course. Still, it's easier to rule happy subjects than angry ones.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Sentence: I don't expect the Wise Masters to be happy. Slavery made them rich, I ended slavery.

Name: hizdahr
Sentence: They do not ask for the return of slavery. They ask for the re-opening of the fighting pits.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Sentence: The fighting pits? Where slaves fought slaves to the death?

Name: hizdahr
Sentence: In the new world that you've brought to us, free men would fight free men.

Name: hizdahr
Sentence: The pitfighters that you liberated plead for this opportunity. Bring some here and ask them yourself.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Sentence: No fighting pits.

Name: hizdahr
Sentence: Opening them would show the people of Yunkai and Meereen that you respect their traditions.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Sentence: I do not respect the tradition of human cockfighting.

Name: hizdahr
Sentence: If you--

Name: daenerys targaryen
Sentence: How many times must I say no before you understand?

Name: daenerys targaryen
Sentence: Whatever he wants from me he's not going to get it. If he really believes I'm going to reopen the fighting pits…

Name: daario
Sentence: You should reopen the fighting pits.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Sentence: What?

Name: daario
Sentence: My mother was a whore, I told you that. She liked to drink pear brandy. The older she got, the less she made selling her body, the more she wanted to drink. So one day when I was 12, she sold me to a slaver she fucked the night before.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Sentence: Why?

Name: daario
Sentence: I was a bad child. I wasn't big, but I was quick. And I loved to fight. So they sold me to a man in Tolos who trained fighters for the pits. I had my first match when I was 16.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Sentence: You were sold into slavery, forced to fight to the death for the amusement of the masters, and you're defending the fighting pits?

Name: daario
Sentence: I'm only here because of those pits. I learned to fight like a Dothraki screamer, a Norvoshi priest, a Westerosi knight. Soon I was famous. 10,000 men and women screamed my name when I stepped into the pit. I made so much money for my master he set me free when I died. I joined the Second Sons, and then I met you.

Name: daario
Sentence: You're the queen. Everyone's too afraid of you to speak truth. Everyone but me. You've made thousands of enemies all across the world. As soon as they see weakness, they'll attack. Show your strength here, now.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Sentence: That's why I have the Unsullied patrolling the streets.

Name: daario
Sentence: Anyone with a chest full of gold can buy an army of Unsullied. You're not the Mother of Unsullied. You're the Mother of Dragons.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Sentence: I don't want another childo s bones dropped at my feet. No one's seen Drogon in weeks. For all I know he's flown halfway across the world. I can't control them anymore.

Name: daario
Sentence: A dragon queen with no dragons is not a queen.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Sentence: Viserion? Rhaegal?

Name: daenerys targaryen
Sentence: Easy. Easy. Easy.

Name: mance
Sentence: So here we are.

Name: jon snow
Sentence: Here we are.

Name: mance
Sentence: When we first met you were my prisoner. And now, for our last meeting…

Name: jon snow
Sentence: This doesn't have to be our last meeting.

Name: mance
Sentence: No, but it will be.

Name: jon snow
Sentence: You know what Stannis wants?

Name: mance
Sentence: He wants me to bend the knee. And he wants the free folk to fight for him. I'll give him this much

Name: jon snow
Sentence: Shouldn't a king be bold?

Name: mance
Sentence: Oh, aye. I respect him. If he gets what he wants, I expect he'll be a better ruler than the fools sitting on the Iron Throne the last hundred years. But I'll never serve him.

Name: jon snow
Sentence: You told me you weren't here to conquer. You told me your people have bled enough.

Name: mance
Sentence: That's right. But I don't want them bleeding for Stannis Baratheon either.

Name: jon snow
Sentence: You spent your life convincing 90 clans to come together for the first time in history. Thenns and Hornfoots, the ice-river clans, even the giants. A life's work uniting them. You didn't do it for power. You didn't do it for glory. You brought them together to save them because none of them will survive the winter, not if they're north of the wall. Isn't their survival more important than your pride?

Name: mance
Sentence: Pride? Fuck my pride. This isn't about that.

Name: jon snow
Sentence: Then bend the knee and save your people.

Name: mance
Sentence: They followed me because they respected me. Because they believed in me. The moment I kneel for a Southern king that's all gone.

Name: jon snow
Sentence: And how many tens of thousands are out there right now? How many women? How many children? And you won't go out and rescue them because why? You're afraid of looking afraid.

Name: mance
Sentence: Oh, I am afraid. No shame in that. How will they do it? Beheading? Hanging?

Name: jon snow
Sentence: They'll burn you alive.

Name: mance
Sentence: Bad way to go. I'll be honest with you, I don't want to die. And burnt to death, I don't want people to remember me like that. Scorched and screaming. But it's better than betraying everything I believe.

Name: jon snow
Sentence: And what happens to your people? You preserve your dignity and die standing, and they'll sing songs about you. “You'd rather burn than kneel. The great hero.” Until winter comes, and the white walkers come for us all, and there's no one left to sing.

Name: mance
Sentence: You're a good lad. Truly, you are. But if you can't understand why I won't enlist my people in a foreigner's war, there's no point explaining.

Name: jon snow
Sentence: I think you're making a terrible mistake.

Name: mance
Sentence: The freedom to make my own mistakes was all I ever wanted.

Name: stannis baratheon
Sentence: Mance Rayder, you've been called the King Beyond the Wall. Westeros only has one king. Bend the knee, I promise you mercy.

Name: stannis baratheon
Sentence: Kneel and live.

Name: mance
Sentence: This was my home for many years. I wish you good fortune in the wars to come.

Name: melisandre
Sentence: Man or woman, young or old, lord or peasant, our choices are the same. We choose light, or we choose darkness. We choose good, or we choose evil. We choose the true god or the false.

Name: melisandre
Sentence: Free folk, there is only one true king, and his name is Stannis. Here stands the king of lies. Behold the fate of those who choose the darkness.

Sentence: We've met. With Renly Baratheon. What did he say about you? He said, "You're a loyalty comes free of charge." Someone appears to have paid quite a bit for it since then.

Sentence: Because I am her uncle. I married her Aunt Lysa shortly before my belovedo s untimely death. We're family now, and you're an outsider. Forgive me, Lady Brienne, but experiences made me wary of outsiders.

Name: bronn
Sentence: I've been all over the world. And if there's one thing I've learned, it's that meanness comes around. People like your sister, they always get what's coming to them eventually. One way or another.
