Episode Title: The House of Black and White
Name: jaime lannister
Sentence: Beautiful bride you've chosen. When were you planning on getting married?

Episode Title: The House of Black and White
Name: bronn
Sentence: Just get on with it.

Episode Title: The House of Black and White
Name: jaime lannister
Sentence: On with what?

Episode Title: The House of Black and White
Name: bronn
Sentence: What you're here for. There's no way this little visit could possibly mean anything good for me.

Episode Title: The House of Black and White
Name: jaime lannister
Sentence: It's very good for you.

Episode Title: The House of Black and White
Name: bronn
Sentence: Lollys will be marrying Ser Wyllis Bracken.

Episode Title: The House of Black and White
Name: jaime lannister
Sentence: Mmm.

Episode Title: The House of Black and White
Name: bronn
Sentence: We made a deal, your sister and I.

Episode Title: The House of Black and White
Name: jaime lannister
Sentence: I would have advised against that.

Episode Title: The House of Black and White
Name: bronn
Sentence: How is this good for me?

Episode Title: The House of Black and White
Name: jaime lannister
Sentence: Cause you're going to come with me and help me with something important. And when we return, I'm going to give you a much better girl, and a much better castle.

Episode Title: The House of Black and White
Name: bronn
Sentence: Return from where?

Episode Title: The House of Black and White
Name: jaime lannister
Sentence: As far south as south goes.

Episode Title: The House of Black and White
Name: trystane
Sentence: My future queen.

Episode Title: The House of Black and White
Name: areo
Sentence: The prince does not wish to be disturbed.

Episode Title: The House of Black and White
Name: ellaria
Sentence: Remove myself from my path, or I'll take that long axe and shove it--

Episode Title: The House of Black and White
Name: doran
Sentence: Captain. Let her pass.

Episode Title: The House of Black and White
Name: ellaria
Sentence: Your brother was murdered, and you sit here at the Water Gardens, staring at the sky and doing nothing.

Episode Title: The House of Black and White
Name: doran
Sentence: Oberyn was slain during a trial by combat. By law, that is not murder.

Episode Title: The House of Black and White
Name: ellaria
Sentence: Your brother--

Episode Title: The House of Black and White
Name: doran
Sentence: You don't have to remind me. He was my brother long before he was anything to you.

Episode Title: The House of Black and White
Name: ellaria
Sentence: What will you do about his death.

Episode Title: The House of Black and White
Name: doran
Sentence: I will bury him. I will mourn for him.

Episode Title: The House of Black and White
Name: ellaria
Sentence: You would have me go to war?

Episode Title: The House of Black and White
Name: doran
Sentence: You would have me go to war?

Episode Title: The House of Black and White
Name: ellaria
Sentence: The whole country would have you go to war.

Episode Title: The House of Black and White
Name: doran
Sentence: Then we are lucky the whole country does not decide.

Episode Title: The House of Black and White
Name: ellaria
Sentence: The Sand Snakes are with me. They have the love of their people. They will avenge your father while you sit here in your chair doing nothing.

Episode Title: The House of Black and White
Name: ellaria
Sentence: Oberyn is dead. And this Lannister girl skips about the Water Gardens eating our food, breathing our air. How many of your brothers and sisters do they have to kill?

Episode Title: The House of Black and White
Name: doran
Sentence: I loved my brother. And you made him very happy. For that you will always have a place in my heart. But we do not mutilate little girls for vengeance. Not here. Not while I rule.

Episode Title: The House of Black and White
Name: ellaria
Sentence: And how long will that be?

Episode Title: The House of Black and White
Name: daario
Sentence: The Unsullied are too conspicuous.

Episode Title: The House of Black and White
Name: daario
Sentence: Anyone can see you coming from a mile off. Of course you haven't found any Sons of the Harpy. You haven't, have you?

Episode Title: The House of Black and White
Name: daario
Sentence: My Second Sons, on the other hand, they drink, they whore, fight in the streets--they blend in. They overhear things in taverns, follow people from the taverns to nice, quiet alleys, break a few fingers, overhear a few more things. Before you know it...

Episode Title: The House of Black and White
Name: grey worm
Sentence: No one here. We go.

Episode Title: The House of Black and White
Name: daario
Sentence: In a hurry? You're afraid?

Episode Title: The House of Black and White
Name: grey worm
Sentence: Unsullied fear nothing.

Episode Title: The House of Black and White
Name: daario
Sentence: Right. That's your problem. You understood fear once, long ago, but you've forgotten what it means. Someone who's forgotten fear has forgotten how to hide.

Episode Title: The House of Black and White
Name: daario
Sentence: Fear is useful that way.

Episode Title: The House of Black and White
Name: mossador
Sentence: Sons of the Harpy, they want to put a collar back on my neck. On all of our necks. Please, Your Grace, you must kill him.

Episode Title: The House of Black and White
Name: daenerys targaryen
Sentence: It would send a message.

Episode Title: The House of Black and White
Name: barristan
Sentence: I think you should exercise restraint, Your Grace.

Episode Title: The House of Black and White
Name: daenerys targaryen
Sentence: Why?

Episode Title: The House of Black and White
Name: barristan
Sentence: For one thing, he may have valuable information.

Episode Title: The House of Black and White
Name: daario
Sentence: The Son of the Harpy has no more valuable information.

Episode Title: The House of Black and White
Name: barristan
Sentence: How do you know that?

Episode Title: The House of Black and White
Name: daario
Sentence: Because I questioned him.

Episode Title: The House of Black and White
Name: hizdahr
Sentence: And the information you did get, he is young and poor.

Episode Title: The House of Black and White
Name: mossador
Sentence: He is born free.

Episode Title: The House of Black and White
Name: hizdahr
Sentence: Why should he want to bring back slavery? What did it do for him?

Episode Title: The House of Black and White
Name: daenerys targaryen
Sentence: Perhaps the only thing that gave him pride was knowing that there was someone lower than he was.

Episode Title: The House of Black and White
Name: mossador
Sentence: They pay him. Great families afraid to do a thing. They pay poor man to do it for them.

Episode Title: The House of Black and White
Name: hizdahr
Sentence: And how do you know this?

Episode Title: The House of Black and White
Name: mossador
Sentence: Everyone knows this.

Episode Title: The House of Black and White
Name: hizdahr
Sentence: I don't know it, and I'm the head of a great family.

Episode Title: The House of Black and White
Name: barristan
Sentence: We do not know what this man did or didn't do. Give him a trial, at least. A fair trial. Show all of the citizens of Meereen that you are better than those who would depose. Teach them a better way.

Episode Title: The House of Black and White
Name: mossador
Sentence: I do not know the place from where Old Ser comes. Things maybe are different there, I hope. But here, in Meereen, before Daenerys Stormborn, they own us. So we learn much about them or we do not live long. They teach me what they are. Mercy, fair trial

Episode Title: The House of Black and White
Name: daenerys targaryen
Sentence: Thank you all for your counsel.

Episode Title: The House of Black and White
Name: barristan
Sentence: Your Grace, a word, please, I beg you.

Episode Title: The House of Black and White
Name: daenerys targaryen
Sentence: About what?

Episode Title: The House of Black and White
Name: barristan
Sentence: About your father. About the Mad King.

Episode Title: The House of Black and White
Name: daenerys targaryen
Sentence: The Mad King? You're here to remind me of my enemies' lies? Consider me reminded.

Episode Title: The House of Black and White
Name: barristan
Sentence: Your Grace, I served in his Kingsguard. I was at his side from the first. Your enemies did not lie.

Episode Title: The House of Black and White
Name: daenerys targaryen
Sentence: Go on.

Episode Title: The House of Black and White
Name: barristan
Sentence: When the people rose in revolt against him, your father set their towns and castles aflame. He murdered sons in front of their fathers. He burned men alive with Wildfire, and laughed as they screamed. And his efforts to stamp out dissent led to rebellion that killed every Targaryen except two.

Episode Title: The House of Black and White
Name: daenerys targaryen
Sentence: I'm not my father.

Episode Title: The House of Black and White
Name: barristan
Sentence: No, Your Grace. Thank the gods. But the Mad King gave his enemies the justice he thought they deserved. And each time it made him feel powerful and right. Until the very end.

Episode Title: The House of Black and White
Name: daenerys targaryen
Sentence: I will not have the Son of the Harpy executed without a fair trial.

Episode Title: The House of Black and White
Name: barristan
Sentence: Your Grace.

Episode Title: The House of Black and White
Name: tyrion lannister
Sentence: There's a bug.

Episode Title: The House of Black and White
Name: varys
Sentence: Yes, best be careful. You might accidentally consume some solid food.

Episode Title: The House of Black and White
Name: tyrion lannister
Sentence: When I agreed to come with you, did I misrepresent my intentions? Besides, what is there for me to do inside this fucking box?

Episode Title: The House of Black and White
Name: varys
Sentence: You don't like it?

Episode Title: The House of Black and White
Name: tyrion lannister
Sentence: I want to take a walk.

Episode Title: The House of Black and White
Name: varys
Sentence: You can't. Cersei has offered a lordship to the man who brings her your head.

Episode Title: The House of Black and White
Name: tyrion lannister
Sentence: She ought to offer her cunt. Best part of her for the best part of me. Well, I suppose a box is as good a place for me as anywhere.

Episode Title: The House of Black and White
Name: varys
Sentence: Are we really going to spend the entire road to Volantis talking about the futility of everything?

Episode Title: The House of Black and White
Name: tyrion lannister
Sentence: You're right. No point. The road to Volantis? You said we were going to Meereen. What's in Volantis?

Episode Title: The House of Black and White
Name: varys
Sentence: The road to Meereen.

Episode Title: The House of Black and White
Name: tyrion lannister
Sentence: And what do you hope to find at the end of the road to Meereen?

Episode Title: The House of Black and White
Name: varys
Sentence: I told you. A ruler.

Episode Title: The House of Black and White
Name: tyrion lannister
Sentence: We've already got a ruler. Everywhere has already got a ruler. Every pile of shit on the side of every road has someone's banner hanging from it.

Episode Title: The House of Black and White
Name: varys
Sentence: You were quite good, you know. At ruling. During your brief tenure as Hand.

Episode Title: The House of Black and White
Name: tyrion lannister
Sentence: I didn't rule. I was a servant.

Episode Title: The House of Black and White
Name: varys
Sentence: Still, a man of talent.

Episode Title: The House of Black and White
Name: tyrion lannister
Sentence: Managed to kill a lot of people.

Episode Title: The House of Black and White
Name: varys
Sentence: Yes, but showed great promise in other areas as well.

Episode Title: The House of Black and White
Name: tyrion lannister
Sentence: She wanted me to leave King's Landing. She begged me. I wouldn't go.

Episode Title: The House of Black and White
Name: varys
Sentence: Why?

Episode Title: The House of Black and White
Name: tyrion lannister
Sentence: Cause I liked it. Power. Even as a servant.

Episode Title: The House of Black and White
Name: varys
Sentence: People follow leaders. And they will never follow us. They find us repulsive.

Episode Title: The House of Black and White
Name: tyrion lannister
Sentence: I find us repulsive.

Episode Title: The House of Black and White
Name: varys
Sentence: And we find them repulsive, which is why we surround ourselves with large, comfortable boxes to keep them away. And yet, no matter what we do, people like you and me are never really satisfied inside the box. Not for long.

Episode Title: The House of Black and White
Name: tyrion lannister
Sentence: You're right. Let's go for a walk.

Episode Title: The House of Black and White
Name: varys
Sentence: No.

Episode Title: The House of Black and White
Name: tyrion lannister
Sentence: How many dwarves are there in the world? Is Cersei going to kill them all?

Episode Title: The House of Black and White
Name: cersei lannister
Sentence: Not him.

Episode Title: The House of Black and White
Name: meryn
Sentence: Are you trying to deceive your Queen? Shall I throw them in a cell, Your Grace?

Episode Title: The House of Black and White
Name: cersei lannister
Sentence: That won't be necessary, Ser Meryn. I don't want to dissuade the other hunters. Mistakes will be made.

Episode Title: The House of Black and White
Name: hunters
Sentence: Thank you, Your Grace. Thank you.

Episode Title: The House of Black and White
Name: cersei lannister
Sentence: Take the head.

Episode Title: The House of Black and White
Name: qyburn
Sentence: Pardon me, Your Grace. I would take it, if you don't mind. It could prove useful for my work.

Episode Title: The House of Black and White
Name: cersei lannister
Sentence: Very good.

Episode Title: The House of Black and White
Name: qyburn
Sentence: Over there will be fine.

Episode Title: The House of Black and White
Name: meryn
Sentence: You heard the man. Over there.

Episode Title: The House of Black and White
Name: kevan
Sentence: You're the Hand of the King?

Episode Title: The House of Black and White
Name: cersei lannister
Sentence: No, Uncle. Clearly it would not be appropriate for a woman to assume that role. I'm merely advising my son until he comes of age and chooses a Hand for himself.

Episode Title: The House of Black and White
Name: mace tyrell
Sentence: Your Grace, I would be willing to serve provisionally as the King's Hand until he becomes old enough--

Episode Title: The House of Black and White
Name: cersei lannister
Sentence: You're a good man, Lord Tyrell, but I don't imagine you'll have the time. In addition to being Master of Ships, the king has appointed you Master of Coin.

Episode Title: The House of Black and White
Name: mace
Sentence: Oh, Your Grace.

Episode Title: The House of Black and White
Name: cersei lannister
Sentence: He called your experience and wisdom in financial matters unparalleled. He said he would be honored to have you represent the crown's interests in the same.

Episode Title: The House of Black and White
Name: mace
Sentence: The honor is all mine, Your Grace.

Episode Title: The House of Black and White
Name: pycelle
Sentence: Your Grace, in the past on several occasions, a Grand Maester has served as the King's Hand.

Episode Title: The House of Black and White
Name: cersei lannister
Sentence: The King has named Qyburn the new Master of Whisperers.

Episode Title: The House of Black and White
Name: pycelle
Sentence: Your Grace, him? This man? This embarrassment to the Citadel? Your Grace, what qualifications can he possibly have for this post?

Episode Title: The House of Black and White
Name: cersei lannister
Sentence: The qualification of loyalty, Grand Maester. That's far more than the eunuch ever had. Far more than many ever have.

Episode Title: The House of Black and White
Name: pycelle
Sentence: I must say I cannot see--

Episode Title: The House of Black and White
Name: cersei lannister
Sentence: Uncle Kevan, in light of your position as commander of the Lannister armies, it would please the king if you would serve as his Master of War. No man living better deserves the title.

Episode Title: The House of Black and White
Name: kevan
Sentence: That is kind of you to say. I would like to hear it from the king himself.

Episode Title: The House of Black and White
Name: cersei lannister
Sentence: The king is very busy at this moment.

Episode Title: The House of Black and White
Name: kevan
Sentence: He should be here, learning what it means to rule.

Episode Title: The House of Black and White
Name: cersei lannister
Sentence: He is learning. On this occasion, in his capacity as ruler, he's asked me to speak on his behalf.

Episode Title: The House of Black and White
Name: kevan
Sentence: I returned to the capital to pay my respects to my brother. And to you. And to serve the king. I did not return to the capital to serve as your puppet. To watch you stack the small council with sycophants. Sending your own brother away so he wouldn't be--

Episode Title: The House of Black and White
Name: cersei lannister
Sentence: My brother has left the capital to lead a sensitive diplomatic mission.

Episode Title: The House of Black and White
Name: kevan
Sentence: What mission?

Episode Title: The House of Black and White
Name: cersei lannister
Sentence: That is not your concern as Master of War.

Episode Title: The House of Black and White
Name: kevan
Sentence: I do not recognize your authority to dictate what is and is not my concern. You are the Queen Mother. Nothing more.

Episode Title: The House of Black and White
Name: cersei lannister
Sentence: You would abandon your king in his time of need?

Episode Title: The House of Black and White
Name: kevan
Sentence: If he wants to send for me, I will be waiting for him. At Casterly Rock.

Episode Title: The House of Black and White
Name: shireen
Sentence: Come on. You know this one. It looks like an animal.

Episode Title: The House of Black and White
Name: gilly
Sentence: Snake. Snake... S! It's an S!

Episode Title: The House of Black and White
Name: shireen
Sentence: Right, very good!

Episode Title: The House of Black and White
Name: sam
Sentence: Hmm! Did you know that the youngest Lord Commander in history, Osric Stark, was elected at the age of 10?

Episode Title: The House of Black and White
Name: gilly
Sentence: I know "S".

Episode Title: The House of Black and White
Name: shireen
Sentence: You'll learn, I promise. I taught Ser Davos, and old people are terrible at learning new things.

Episode Title: The House of Black and White
Name: gilly
Sentence: Well, you're a wonderful teacher. Very patient!

Episode Title: The House of Black and White
Name: sam
Sentence: I only said that the more time you spend practicing, the faster you'll be able to read.

Episode Title: The House of Black and White
Name: gilly
Sentence: That's alright. We're doing just fine. I'm sure you and Ostrich Stark have a lot to talk about.

Episode Title: The House of Black and White
Name: gilly
Sentence: How old were you when you learned to read?

Episode Title: The House of Black and White
Name: shireen
Sentence: Three.

Episode Title: The House of Black and White
Name: sam
Sentence: Three?! Who taught you, your mother?

Episode Title: The House of Black and White
Name: shireen
Sentence: No. Old Maester Cressen did. I had a lot of time to practice. My mother kept me inside because...

Episode Title: The House of Black and White
Name: gilly
Sentence: What do you call it in the South, what happened to your face?

Episode Title: The House of Black and White
Name: shireen
Sentence: Greyscale. What do you call it north of the Wall?

Episode Title: The House of Black and White
Name: gilly
Sentence: I don't know. But two of my sisters had it. They both died. How did they cure you?

Episode Title: The House of Black and White
Name: shireen
Sentence: I don't remember. I was a baby. Lots of people came and tried, I think. Whatever they did, it went away. What happened to your sisters?

Episode Title: The House of Black and White
Name: gilly
Sentence: My father made them move out of the keep into the huts outside. None of us were allowed to go near them. But we heard them. Especially at night. They started to sound... not like themselves.

Episode Title: The House of Black and White
Name: sam
Sentence: Did you ever see them?

Episode Title: The House of Black and White
Name: gilly
Sentence: Only once at the end. They were covered with it. Their faces, their arms. They acted like animals. My father had to drag them out to the woods on a rope.

Episode Title: The House of Black and White
Name: shireen
Sentence: What did he do to them in the woods?

Episode Title: The House of Black and White
Name: shireen
Sentence: Mother.

Episode Title: The House of Black and White
Name: selyse
Sentence: Leave us.

Episode Title: The House of Black and White
Name: sam
Sentence: Your Grace.

Episode Title: The House of Black and White
Name: selyse
Sentence: You need to stay away from that girl.

Episode Title: The House of Black and White
Name: shireen
Sentence: Why?

Episode Title: The House of Black and White
Name: selyse
Sentence: She's a wildling.

Episode Title: The House of Black and White
Name: shireen
Sentence: Her name's Gilly. She's nice. I'm teaching her to read.

Episode Title: The House of Black and White
Name: selyse
Sentence: She's a wildling. Your father defeated their people. He executed her king for treason. They could strike at him by striking at you.

Episode Title: The House of Black and White
Name: shireen
Sentence: Gilly wouldn't do that.

Episode Title: The House of Black and White
Name: selyse
Sentence: You have no idea what people will do. All your books and you still don't know.

Episode Title: The House of Black and White
Name: stannis baratheon
Sentence: I ordered Mance Rayder burnt at the stake. You prevented that order from being carried out. You showed mercy to Mance Rayder. A king's word is law. Perhaps you should ask Ser Davos how much mercy I show to lawbreakers. Show too much kindness, people won't fear you. If people don't fear you, they don't follow you.

Episode Title: The House of Black and White
Name: jon snow
Sentence: With respect, Your Grace, the free folk will never follow you, no matter what you do. You're the man who burned their king alive.

Episode Title: The House of Black and White
Name: stannis baratheon
Sentence: Who then? You?

Episode Title: The House of Black and White
Name: jon snow
Sentence: No. Only one of their own.

Episode Title: The House of Black and White
Name: stannis baratheon
Sentence: Do you know this wretched girl Lyanna Mormont?

Episode Title: The House of Black and White
Name: jon snow
Sentence: The Lord Commander's niece.

Episode Title: The House of Black and White
Name: stannis baratheon
Sentence: Lady of Bear Island, and a child of 10. I asked her to commit her house to my cause, that's her response.

Episode Title: The House of Black and White
Name: jon snow
Sentence: Bear Island knows no king but the King in the North, whose name is Stark.

Episode Title: The House of Black and White
Name: stannis baratheon
Sentence: That amuses you?

Episode Title: The House of Black and White
Name: jon snow
Sentence: I apologize, Your Grace. Northerners can be a bit like the free folk. Loyal to their own.

Episode Title: The House of Black and White
Name: stannis baratheon
Sentence: I know. My brother Robert went on often and loudly about how difficult it was to control them - even with your father's help.

Episode Title: The House of Black and White
Name: davos
Sentence: Tonight, the Night's Watch elect a new Lord Commander. Ser Alliser Thorne is going to win.

Episode Title: The House of Black and White
Name: jon snow
Sentence: Most likely.

Episode Title: The House of Black and White
Name: davos
Sentence: Unpleasant man. He thinks you're a traitor. What's your life going to be like on the Wall with Thorne in command?

Episode Title: The House of Black and White
Name: jon snow
Sentence: Unpleasant, I expect.

Episode Title: The House of Black and White
Name: stannis baratheon
Sentence: Your bravery made him look weak. He'll punish you for it. I don't punish men for bravery. I reward them.

Episode Title: The House of Black and White
Name: jon snow
Sentence: I don't doubt it, Your Grace. But I'm a brother of the Night's Watch. I've pledged them my life, my honor, my sword. I don't know what I have left to give you.

Episode Title: The House of Black and White
Name: stannis baratheon
Sentence: You can give me the North.

Episode Title: The House of Black and White
Name: jon snow
Sentence: I can't. Even if I wanted to, I'm a bastard. A Snow.

Episode Title: The House of Black and White
Name: stannis baratheon
Sentence: Kneel before me. Lay your sword at my feet. Pledge me your service and you'll rise again as Jon Stark, Lord of Winterfell.

Episode Title: The House of Black and White
Name: sam
Sentence: He'll make you a Stark with the stroke of a pen?

Episode Title: The House of Black and White
Name: jon snow
Sentence: It's the first thing I ever remember wanting. I'd daydream that my father would ask the king, and just like that I would never be the bastard of Winterfell again.

Episode Title: The House of Black and White
Name: sam
Sentence: You deserve this. You do. I couldn't be happier for you.

Episode Title: The House of Black and White
Name: jon snow
Sentence: I'm going to refuse him.

Episode Title: The House of Black and White
Name: sam
Sentence: But you'd be Lord of Winterfell.

Episode Title: The House of Black and White
Name: jon snow
Sentence: I swore a vow to the Night's Watch. If I don't take my own word seriously, what sort of Lord of Winterfell would I be?

Episode Title: The House of Black and White
Name: alliser
Sentence: Crowded. You'd think we were serving venison stew.

Episode Title: The House of Black and White
Name: aemon
Sentence: Does anyone wish to speak for candidates before we cast our tokens for the 998th Lord Commander of the Night's Watch?

Episode Title: The House of Black and White
Name: janos
Sentence: Ser Alliser Thorne is not just a knight, he's a man of true nobility. He was acting commander when the Wall came under attack, and led us to victory against the wildlings.

Episode Title: The House of Black and White
Name: men
Sentence: Hear, hear.

Episode Title: The House of Black and White
Name: janos
Sentence: He's a veteran of 100 battles and has been a defender of the Watch and the Wall almost all of his life. He's the only true choice.

Episode Title: The House of Black and White
Name: aemon
Sentence: Is there anyone else?

Episode Title: The House of Black and White
Name: shadow tower brother
Sentence: Ser Denys Mallister joined the Watch as a boy and has served loyally longer than any other ranger. Through 10 winters he served. As commander of the Shadow Tower, he kept the wildlings away. We could do no better.

Episode Title: The House of Black and White
Name: aemon
Sentence: If there's no one else, we will begin the voting. The triangular tokens count for Ser Alliser Thorne. The square tokens for Ser Denys Mallister. Each brother will--

Episode Title: The House of Black and White
Name: sam
Sentence: Maester Aemon.

Episode Title: The House of Black and White
Name: aemon
Sentence: Samwell Tarly. Go on.

Episode Title: The House of Black and White
Name: janos
Sentence: Sam the Slayer.

Episode Title: The House of Black and White
Name: janos

Episode Title: The House of Black and White
Name: sam
Sentence: Ser Alliser fought bravely, it is true. And when he was wounded, it is Jon who saved us. He took charge of the wall's defense. He killed the Magnar of the Thenns. He went North to deal with Mance Rayder, knowing it almost certainly meant his own death. Before that, he led the mission to avenge Lord Commander Mormont. Mormont himself chose Jon to be his steward. He saw something in Jon, and now we've all seen it, too. He may be young, but he's the commander we turned to when the night was darkest.

Episode Title: The House of Black and White
Name: alliser
Sentence: I can't argue with any of that. But who does Jon Snow want to command? Night's Watch or the wildlings? Everyone knows he loved a wildling girl and spoke with Mance Rayder many times. What would have happened in that tent between those two old friends if Stannis's army hadn't come along? We all saw him put the King-beyond-the-Wall out of his misery. Do you want to choose a man who has fought the wildlings all his life, or a man who makes love to them?

Name: mossador
Sentence: Then who lives in the Pyramids? Who wears gold masks and murders your children? When Grey Worm came to us, I was the first to take up the knife for you. I remember the look on my father's face as I struck down his Master, who had traded his infant son for a dog. My father died in the fighting. If we allow the Sons of the Harpy to return us to chains, he never lived.

Name: man

Name: arya stark
Sentence: You said that I could be your apprentice. You said you'd teach me how to a Faceless Man.

Name: jaqen hghar
Sentence: A man teaches a girl. . Valar dohaeris. All men must serve. Faceless men, most of all. .

Name: arya stark
Sentence: I want to serve. .

Name: jaqen hghar
Sentence: A girl wants to serve herself. Here we serve the Many-Faced God, to serve well. A girl must become no-one.

Name: arya stark
Sentence: Which one is the Many-Faced God? I see the Stranger. I see the Drowned God. I see the Weirwood Face.

Name: jaqen hghar
Sentence: There is only one god. A girl knows his name. And all men know his gift.

Name: arya stark
Sentence: Where are they taking him?

Name: bystanders
Sentence: Queen Margaery! Queen Margaery! Queen Margaery!

Name: margaery tyrell
Sentence: I am his/hers, and she/he is mine. From this day, until the end of my days.

Name: tommen lannister
Sentence: Did I hurt you?

Name: margaery tyrell
Sentence: No. You were lovely.

Name: tommen lannister
Sentence: It all happened so fast.

Name: margaery tyrell
Sentence: Yes. .

Name: tommen lannister
Sentence: I was scared maybe I hurt you, it sounded

Name: margaery tyrell
Sentence: No, no, no. You're very sweet. The sweetest king who ever lived.

Name: tommen lannister
Sentence: This is what I want to do all day, every day for the rest of my life.

Name: margaery tyrell
Sentence: Wouldn't that be glorious? . Shouldn't we rest a little while? Just to catch our breath, there's no rush, is there?

Name: tommen lannister
Sentence: Of course not. Are you hungry? Shall I have them bring you some cake or pomegranate juice?

Name: margaery tyrell
Sentence: No, I'm fine. I just want you all to myself. I want to know everything there is to know about King Tommen First of His Name.

Name: tommen lannister
Sentence: King Tommen. It still sounds strange to me. Does Queen Margaery sound strange to you?

Name: margaery tyrell
Sentence: So strange… Husband.

Name: tommen lannister
Sentence: Wife. . Sometimes it feels odd. I'm the king, I've married the most beautiful woman in the world, , and it's all because my brother died.

Name: margaery tyrell
Sentence: I understand. But it's not your fault, you know that, don't you? You mustn't feel guilty.

Name: tommen lannister
Sentence: I don't feel guilty. That's what's odd.

Name: tommen lannister
Sentence: Do you like to sail?

Name: margaery tyrell
Sentence: I love to sail.

Name: tommen lannister
Sentence: I do, too.

Name: margaery tyrell
Sentence: I think we're going to be very happy, you and I.

Name: margaery tyrell
Sentence: Living in a tower so high, it touches the clouds. Of course my grandmother couldn't wait to go home. The capital is not for everyone, I suppose. Does your mother like it here?

Name: tommen lannister
Sentence: I don't think so. She told me never to trust anyone in King's Landing.

Name: margaery tyrell
Sentence: It's so wonderful to have her watching over you. A lioness guiding her cub. .

Name: tommen lannister
Sentence: Well, but I'm a man now.

Name: margaery tyrell
Sentence: You are. And the king. . But you'll always be her baby-boy.

Name: tommen lannister
Sentence: I suppose.

Name: margaery tyrell
Sentence: I adore how she has always been so generous with me, so kind. And the horror she's had to injure. . Losing her husband, her eldest child and her father. It's no wonder she's so protective of you. She'll never let you out of her sight.

Name: cersei lannister
Sentence: You look very much in love. The first days of marriage are often so blissful. She's certainly very pretty, isn't she? Like a doll, she smiles quite a lot. Do you think she's intelligent? I can't quite tell. Not that it matters.

Name: tommen lannister
Sentence: Do you ever miss Casterly Rock?

Name: cersei lannister
Sentence: There's nothing for me in Casterly Rock.

Name: tommen lannister
Sentence: That's where you grew up. . You always told me that you liked the people there better. You said that King's Landing smelled of horse dung and sour milk.

Name: cersei lannister
Sentence: Why are we speaking of Casterly Rock?

Name: tommen lannister
Sentence: The way that you talked about it, I always thought that you missed it. That you... That it was your real home.

Name: cersei lannister
Sentence: This is my real home now. Where my family lives.

Name: tommen lannister
Sentence: I want you to be happy, mother.

Name: cersei lannister
Sentence: I know that. I know you do, my sweet boy.

Name: tommen lannister
Sentence: But wouldn't you be happier in Casterly Rock?

Name: margaery tyrell
Sentence: I said, "Darling, surely 4 times is enough, are you trying to set a new record?" . And he said, "Well, what is the record? I'm sure we can break it."

Name: margaery tyrell
Sentence: Mother! . Welcome.

Name: cersei lannister
Sentence: Don't you look lovely. Marriage agrees with you.

Name: margaery tyrell
Sentence: Can we bring you anything to eat or drink? I wish we had some wine for you. It's a bit early in the day for us.

Name: cersei lannister
Sentence: No, no. I, I can't stay. I just wanted to let you know if, there is ever anything I can do for you.

Name: margaery tyrell
Sentence: You are very sweet.

Name: cersei lannister
Sentence: Tommen seems quite taken with his new queen.

Name: margaery tyrell
Sentence: I absolutely adore him. You raised a gallant young man. I'm forever grateful.

Name: cersei lannister
Sentence: Good. Good. I'm glad to hear you're happy.

Name: margaery tyrell
Sentence: Ecstatic. I really am. Exhausted, to be honest, but what can I expect, he is half lion, half stag. .

Name: cersei lannister
Sentence: I'll leave you to it then. .

Name: margaery tyrell
Sentence: Oh, forgive me, I haven't been at Court for long, I get so confused. What's the proper way to address you now? Queen Mother or Dowager Queen?

Name: cersei lannister
Sentence: There's no need for such formalities.

Name: margaery tyrell
Sentence: In any event, judging from the King's enthusiasm, the Queen Mother will be a Queen Grandmother soon.

Name: cersei lannister
Sentence: Won't that be a lovely day.

Name: margaery tyrell
Sentence: Can you imagine the celebrations? They'll ring the bells all day and night.

Name: cersei lannister
Sentence: Remember. Anything you need.

Name: roose
Sentence: We can't hold the North with terror alone.

Name: ramsay bolton
Sentence: You can't hold the North if you let these lesser lords insult us.

Name: roose
Sentence: I sent you there to collect taxes, not bodies.

Name: ramsay bolton
Sentence: Lord Cerwyn refused to pay. Said the Warden of the North would always be a Stark, and he'd be damned if he kissed a traitor's boot.

Name: roose
Sentence: He left you no choice.

Name: ramsay bolton
Sentence: I flayed him living, along with his wife and brother. Made his son watch.

Name: roose
Sentence: And?

Name: ramsay bolton
Sentence: The new Lord Cerwyn paid his taxes.

Name: roose
Sentence: I have something important to tell you. Stop eating and listen.

Name: roose
Sentence: We don't have enough men to hold the North if the other Houses rise up against us. Do you understand that?

Name: ramsay bolton
Sentence: Our pact with the Lannisters protects -

Name: roose
Sentence: I had a pact with Tywin Lannister, and Tywin Lannister is dead. The remaining Lannisters are a thousand miles away dealing with that fact. They've never once in the history of the Seven Kingdoms sent their army this far north. If you think they will for us, you're a fool. We become a great house by entering in alliances with other houses, and parleying those alliances into greater power. The best way to forge a lasting alliance isn't by peeling a man's skin off. The best way is marriage. . Now that you're a Bolton by royal decree, it's time you married a suitable bride. And as it happens, I found the perfect girl to solidify our hold in the North.

Name: sansa stark
Sentence: That's Moat Cailin.

Name: petyr baelish
Sentence: Yes. A bit shabby, isn't it? You've been here before.

Name: sansa stark
Sentence: On our way down to King's Landing, with my father and Arya and… where are you taking me?

Name: petyr baelish
Sentence: Home.

Name: sansa stark
Sentence: The Boltons have Winterfell. . The marriage proposal, it wasn't for you?

Name: petyr baelish
Sentence: No.

Name: sansa stark
Sentence: Roose Bolton murdered my brother. He betrayed my family!

Name: petyr baelish
Sentence: He did.

Name: sansa stark
Sentence: He serves the Lannisters.

Name: petyr baelish
Sentence: For now.

Name: sansa stark
Sentence: I won't go.

Name: petyr baelish
Sentence: Winterfell is your home.

Name: sansa stark
Sentence: Not anymore.

Name: petyr baelish
Sentence: Always. You're a Stark. Dyeing your hair doesn't change that. You're Sansa Stark. The eldest surviving child of Ned and Catelyn Stark. Your place is in the North.

Name: sansa stark
Sentence: I can't marry him. You can't make me. He's a traitor. A murderer.

Name: petyr baelish
Sentence: You're not marrying Roose Bolton. No, you'll be marrying his son and heir, Ramsay. One day he'll be Warden of the North and you will -

Name: sansa stark
Sentence: No!

Name: petyr baelish
Sentence: Sansa -

Name: sansa stark
Sentence: No, you can't make me. I will starve myself. I will die before I have to go there.

Name: petyr baelish
Sentence: I won't force you to do anything. Don't you know by now how much I care for you? Say the word and we turn the horses round, but listen to me. Listen. . You've been running all your life. Terrible things happened to your family and you weep. You sit alone in a darkened room, mourning their fates. You've been a bystander to tragedy from the day they executed your father. Stop being a bystander, do you hear me? Stop running. There's no justice in the world. Not unless we make it. You loved your family. Avenge them.

Name: podrick
Sentence: How do we get through there?

Name: brienne
Sentence: We don't. We go around. .

Name: podrick
Sentence: It sets miles out of the way. We'll lose sight of them.

Name: brienne
Sentence: Doesn't matter. I know where they're going.

Name: brienne
Sentence: Aren't you getting a bit old to be a squire? How did you end up squiring for the Imp?

Name: podrick
Sentence: He hates that nickname.

Name: brienne
Sentence: Well, he's not here to complain about it, is he?

Name: podrick
Sentence: I squired for a knight name Ser Lorimer during the War of the Five Kings. One night, he had a bit too much to drink. And he was famished, so he borrowed a ham.

Name: brienne
Sentence: He borrowed it?

Name: podrick
Sentence: He wasn't a thief. He was drunk and hungry and he wasn't thinking. I was drunk too. He gave me half the ham. Next morning, one of the guards saw him passed out, under a wagon, with the ham bone still in his hand. They hanged the man afternoon. They tied the noose for me too, but, Lord Tywin heard my family name was Payne. So he pardoned me, and sent me to King's Landing to squire for his son.

Name: brienne
Sentence: As punishment. For both of you.

Name: podrick
Sentence: It didn't seem that way. Lord Tyrion was always very good to me.

Name: brienne
Sentence: Yes, all of your lords were very kind to you. All except me. Sorry you have to squire such a nasty person.

Name: podrick
Sentence: I'm not sorry. You're the best fighter I've ever seen. You beat The Hound. I'm proud to be your squire.

Name: brienne
Sentence: I'm sorry I'm always snapping at you.

Name: podrick
Sentence: If you wouldn't snap at me I wouldn't learn anything.

Name: brienne
Sentence: You want to be a knight, Pod?

Name: podrick
Sentence: Yes.

Name: brienne
Sentence: Starting tomorrow, we'll train with the sword twice a day, before we ride in the morning and after we camp for the evening. . And I'm going to show you how to ride properly.

Name: podrick
Sentence: Thank you.

Name: brienne
Sentence: I can't knight you, but I can teach you how to fight.

Name: podrick
Sentence: I suppose that's more important.

Name: podrick
Sentence: You weren't a knight, but you were a Kingsguard to Renly Baratheon, weren't you?

Name: brienne
Sentence: I was.

Name: podrick
Sentence: Lord Tyrion said he was a good man.

Name: brienne
Sentence: He was.

Name: podrick
Sentence: But how did you end up serving Renly?

Name: brienne
Sentence: When I was a girl, my father held a ball. I'm his only living child, so he wants to make a good match for me. He invited dozens of young lords to Tarth. I didn't want to go, but he dragged me to the ballroom. . And it was wonderful. None of the boys noticed how mulish and tall I was. The shoved each other, and threatened to duel if they thought it was their turn to dance. And whispered in my ear how they wanted to marry me and take me back to their castles. . My father smiled at me and I smiled at him. I'd never been so happy. . Till I saw a few of the boys sniggering. And then they all started to laugh, they couldn't keep the game going any longer. They were toying with me. ‘Brienne the Beauty', they called me. Great joke. And I realized I was the ugliest girl alive. A great lumbering beast. I tried to run away, but Renly Baratheon took me in his arms. “Don't let them see your tears,” he told me. “They're nasty little shits. The nasty little shits aren't worth crying over.” He danced with me and none of the other boys could say a word. And he was the king's brother after all.

Name: podrick
Sentence: But wasn't he... Lord Tyrion said he was...

Name: brienne
Sentence: Yes, Pod, he liked men, I'm not an idiot. He didn't love me, he didn't want me, he danced with me because he was kind and he wouldn't see me hurt. He saved me from being a joke. From that day until his last day. And I couldn't save him in return. Nothing's more hateful than failing to protect the one you love. One day, I will avenge King Renly.

Name: podrick
Sentence: But you said a shadow murdered him. How do you fight a shadow?

Name: brienne
Sentence: A shadow with the face of Stannis Baratheon. I know it was Stannis. I know it in my heart. Stannis is a man, not a shadow. And a man can be killed.

Name: stannis baratheon
Sentence: Lord Commander.

Name: jon snow
Sentence: Your Grace.

Name: stannis baratheon
Sentence: I'd like to speak alone.

Name: jon snow
Sentence: Olly is my steward now, as I was Lord Commander Mormont's. I want him to attend my meetings, to learn from men with experience. One day, he might command.

Name: stannis baratheon
Sentence: Very well. . Have you considered my offer?

Name: jon snow
Sentence: I have. And I thank you for it. You do me great honor. All my life I wanted to be Jon Stark.

Name: stannis baratheon
Sentence: Say the word and you will be.

Name: jon snow
Sentence: But I have to refuse you. I'm Lord Commander of the Night's Watch. My place is here.

Name: stannis baratheon
Sentence: I'm giving you a chance to avenge your family. To take back the castle where you grew up. To rule the North.

Name: jon snow
Sentence: I wish I could fight beside you. Believe me, I do. But I swore a sacred vow at the Godswood. I pledged my life to the Night's Watch.

Name: stannis baratheon
Sentence: You're as stubborn as your father. And as honorable.

Name: jon snow
Sentence: I can imagine no higher praise.

Name: stannis baratheon
Sentence: I didn't mean it as praise. Honor got your father killed. . But if your mindo s made up, I won't try to persuade you.

Name: jon snow
Sentence: May I ask, Your Grace, how long you plan to stay at Castle Black?

Name: stannis baratheon
Sentence: Are you bored of us already?

Name: jon snow
Sentence: You saved us from Mance Rayder's army. We will never forget that. But it's a question of survival. The Night's Watch can't continue to feed your men and the wildling prisoners indefinitely. Winter is coming.

Name: stannis baratheon
Sentence: I know it. We march on Winterfell within the fortnight. Before the snows trap us here.

Name: jon snow
Sentence: And the wildlings?

Name: stannis baratheon
Sentence: They'd rather burn than fight for me, so be it. I leave their fate to you. You could execute them, that's the safest course. . Or you could see if this Tormund fellow is more willing to compromise than Mance ever was. I assume the brothers of the Night's Watch would rather see the wildlings dead.

Name: jon snow
Sentence: Most of the brothers, yes. There's little love for the free folk here. .

Name: stannis baratheon
Sentence: You're the Lord Commander. Your decision.

Name: stannis baratheon
Sentence: You have many enemies in Castle Black. Have you considered sending Alliser Thorne elsewhere? Give him command of Eastwatch-by-the-Sea.

Name: jon snow
Sentence: I heard it was best to keep your enemies close.

Name: stannis baratheon
Sentence: Whoever said that didn't have many enemies.

Name: davos
Sentence: He sees something in you. . Might not be apparent from his tone, but it's the truth. He believes in you.

Name: jon snow
Sentence: I'm sorry I disappointed him.

Name: davos
Sentence: The king is a complicated man. But he wants what's right for the Seven Kingdoms.

Name: jon snow
Sentence: As long as he's ruling them.

Name: davos
Sentence: He's the one true king. He has the blood right to that throne.

Name: jon snow
Sentence: I've sworn to stay clear of the politics of the Seven Kingdoms.

Name: davos
Sentence: Have you now? . How does the Night's Watch vow go again? I bet you've got it memorized since you got here.

Name: olly
Sentence: Night gathers and now my watch begins -

Name: davos
Sentence: Not that bit, the bit at the end.

Name: olly
Sentence: I'm the sword in the darkness, the watcher on the walls, the shield that guards the realm of men. I pledge my life -

Name: davos
Sentence: Wait, that's enough. “The shield that guards the realm of men.” That's what you swore to be. Now I'm not a learned man, but the best way of helping the most people might not be sitting in a frozen castle at the edge of the world. It just might mean wading in the muck, getting your boots dirty, and doing what needs to be doing.

Name: jon snow
Sentence: And what needs to be done?

Name: davos
Sentence: As long as the Boltons rule the North, , the North will suffer. Just one man's opinion.

Name: stannis baratheon
Sentence: We must. To beat the snows.

Name: melisandre
Sentence: Once before you put your faith in Ser Davos and left me behind. I hope you won't make that mistake again.

Name: stannis baratheon
Sentence: I won't. I need you.

Name: melisandre
Sentence: You only need faith, my King.

Name: stannis baratheon
Sentence: And you, my Lady, what do you need?

Name: melisandre
Sentence: To serve my Lord.

Name: sam
Sentence: Lord Ashford. . Lady Caulfield. . Lord Smallwood.

Name: jon snow
Sentence: Never even heard of these people.

Name: sam
Sentence: They haven't heard of you either. . But we need men and they have some.

Name: jon snow
Sentence: And how many men does this Lord Mazin have to send us?

Name: sam
Sentence: More than Lord Wibberley.

Name: jon snow
Sentence: Not him.

Name: sam
Sentence: I know, I'm sorry, but we need men and supplies. And Roose Bolton is the Warden of The North.

Name: jon snow
Sentence: He murdered my brother.

Name: sam
Sentence: We swore to be the Watchers on the Wall. We can't watch the Wall with 50 men. And we can't get more men without help from the Warden of the North.

Name: sam
Sentence: Apologies, my Lady.

Name: melisandre
Sentence: Lord Commander.

Name: jon snow
Sentence: How can I help you?

Name: melisandre
Sentence: Come with us when we ride south. . None of us know the castle as well as you do. Its hidden tunnels, its weaknesses, its people. Winterfell was your home once. Don't you want to chase the rats out of it? .

Name: jon snow
Sentence: Castle Black is my home now. Night's Watch takes no part in the wars of the Seven Kingdoms.

Name: melisandre
Sentence: There's only one war. Life against death. Come. Let me show what you're fighting for. .

Name: jon snow
Sentence: You're gonna show me some vision in the fire. Forgive me, my Lady. But I don't trust in visions.

Name: melisandre
Sentence: No visions. No magic. Just life.

Name: melisandre
Sentence: Do you feel my heart beating? This power in you, you resist it, and that's your mistake. Embrace it.

Name: melisandre
Sentence: The Lord of Light made us male and female. Two parts of a greater whole. We are joining this power. Power to make life, power to make light, and power to cast shadows.

Name: jon snow
Sentence: I don't think Stannis would like that very much.

Name: melisandre
Sentence: Then we shouldn't tell him. .

Name: jon snow
Sentence: I can't.

Name: melisandre
Sentence: Why?

Name: jon snow
Sentence: I swore a vow. . I loved another.

Name: melisandre
Sentence: The dead don't need lovers. Only the living.

Name: jon snow
Sentence: I know. But I still love her.

Name: melisandre
Sentence: You know nothing, Jon Snow.

Name: stannis baratheon
Sentence: Are you lonely?

Name: shireen
Sentence: Just bored.

Name: stannis baratheon
Sentence: My father used to tell me that boredom indicates a lack of inner resources.

Name: shireen
Sentence: Were you bored a lot, too?

Name: stannis baratheon
Sentence: I know Castle Black is no place for a child, but I -

Name: shireen
Sentence: I like it. . I thought I'd be left at home. I know mother didn't want to bring me. .

Name: stannis baratheon
Sentence: Why do you say that?

Name: shireen
Sentence: She told me, "I don't want to bring you."

Name: stannis baratheon
Sentence: She shouldn't have said that.

Name: shireen
Sentence: Are you ashamed of me, father?

Name: stannis baratheon
Sentence: When you were an infant, , the Dornish trailer landed on Dragonstone. His goods were junk except for one wooden doll. He'd even sewn a dress on it in the colors of our House. No doubt he'd heard of your birth, and assumed new fathers were easy targets. I still remember how you smiled when I put that doll in your cradle, , and you pressed it to your cheek. . By the time we burnt the doll, it was too late. . I was told you would die. Or worse, the grayscale would go slow. . Let you grow just enough to know the world before taking it away from you. Everyone advised me to send you to the ruins of Valyria to live out your short life with the Stone men, before the sickness spread to the castle. I told them all to go to hell. . I called in every maester on this side of the world. Every healer, every apothecary. They stopped the disease and saved your life. Because you did not belong across the world with the bloody Stone men. . You are the Princess Shireen of House Baratheon. And you are my daughter.

Name: petyr baelish
Sentence: I thought I might find you here. . Your Aunt Lyanna.

Name: sansa stark
Sentence: Father never talked about her. Sometimes I'd find him down here, lighting the candles. They say she was beautiful.

Name: petyr baelish
Sentence: I saw her once. I was a boy, living with your mother's family. Lord Whent had a great tourney at Harrenhal. Everyone was there. The Mad King, your father, Robert Baratheon. And Lyanna, she was already promised to Robert. You can imagine what it was like for me, a boy from nowhere, with nothing to his name, watching these legendary men, tilting at the lists. The last two riders were Barristan Selmy and Rhaegar Targaryen. When Rhaegar won, everyone cheered for the prince. I remember the girls laughing when he took off his helmet and they saw that silver hair. How handsome he was. Until he rode right past his wife, Elia Martell, and all the smiles died. I've never seen so many people so quiet. He rode past his wife, and he lay a crown of winter roses in Lyanna's lap. Blue as frost. How many tens of thousands had to die because Rhaegar chose your aunt?

Name: sansa stark
Sentence: Yes, he chose her… and then he kidnapped her and raped her.

Name: petyr baelish
Sentence: Come. . Let's speak somewhere the dead can't hear us. .

Name: sansa stark
Sentence: Dressed for riding?

Name: petyr baelish
Sentence: I am.

Name: sansa stark
Sentence: Where are you going?

Name: petyr baelish
Sentence: King's Landing.

Name: sansa stark
Sentence: King's Landing?

Name: petyr baelish
Sentence: Cersei sent for me. . We must not let her sniff out any trouble.

Name: sansa stark
Sentence: You can't leave me here!

Name: petyr baelish
Sentence: I know how hard it is to live with people you despise, believe me. But it won't be for long.

Name: sansa stark
Sentence: How do you know?

Name: petyr baelish
Sentence: Stannis Baratheon garrisons at Castle Black. He'll march south to King's Landing before the winter snows block his way. But first, he has to take Winterfell.

Name: sansa stark
Sentence: You don't know that.

Name: petyr baelish
Sentence: I do. Once he liberates these lands from the Boltons he'll rally your father's bannermen to his cause. With the North behind him, Stannis can finally take the Iron Throne.

Name: sansa stark
Sentence: You think he'll defeat the Boltons?

Name: petyr baelish
Sentence: He has a larger army. He's the finest military commander in Westeros. A betting man would put his money on Stannis. . As it happens, I am a betting man.

Name: sansa stark
Sentence: And if you're right?

Name: petyr baelish
Sentence: Stannis takes Winterfell, he rescues you from the most despised family in the North. Grateful for your late father's courageous support for his claim, he names you Wardeness of the North.

Name: sansa stark
Sentence: But I, I wouldn't… Wardeness of the North

Name: petyr baelish
Sentence: You are the last surviving Stark. He needs you.

Name: sansa stark
Sentence: What if you're wrong? What if Stannis never attacks Winterfell, or he does and the Boltons defeat him?

Name: petyr baelish
Sentence: Then you will take this Bolton boy, Ramsay, and make him yours.

Name: sansa stark
Sentence: I don't know how to do that.

Name: petyr baelish
Sentence: Of course you do. He's already fallen for you.

Name: sansa stark
Sentence: His father frightens me.

Name: petyr baelish
Sentence: He should, he's a dangerous man. But even the most dangerous men can be outmaneuvered. And you've learnt to maneuver from the very best. . I return before too long. . You'll be strong without me. . The North will be yours. Do you believe me?

Name: sansa stark
Sentence: I expect I'll be a married woman by the time you return.

Name: bronn
Sentence: Breakfast.

Name: bronn
Sentence: That would have been a shit way to die.

Name: jaime lannister
Sentence: As far as I've seen, they're all shit ways to die.

Sentence: I don't care what's sung about me when I'm dead.

Sentence: No? Two knights, off to rescue a princess. Sounds like a good song to me.

Name: jaime lannister
Sentence: Sounds like all the rest.

Sentence: What about you? What shit way would you choose?

Name: bronn
Sentence: In my own keep, drinking my own wine, watching my sons grovel for my fortune.

Name: jaime lannister
Sentence: How disappointing. I thought you'd have something more exciting planned.

Name: bronn
Sentence: I've had an exciting life. I want my death to be boring. How do you want to go?

Name: jaime lannister
Sentence: In the arms of the woman I love.

Name: bronn
Sentence: She want the same thing?

Name: jaime lannister
Sentence: Let's go.

Name: jaime lannister
Sentence: Pentoshi.

Name: bronn
Sentence: And he's headed to Oldtown?

Name: jaime lannister
Sentence: As I said. Why?

Name: bronn
Sentence: What's to stop him from docking down the coast and telling the locals that Jaime Lannister's in Dorne?

Name: jaime lannister
Sentence: A bag of gold.

Name: bronn
Sentence: I'm not sure you understand how much people hate your family in this part of the world.

Name: jaime lannister
Sentence: It was a heavy bag.

Name: bronn
Sentence: And I bet he swore all kinds of oaths to get it. But you won't be around if he breaks them.

Name: bronn
Sentence: How many you count?

Name: jaime lannister
Sentence: Four.

Name: bronn
Sentence: How many you think you can take?

Name: jaime lannister
Sentence: One, if he's slow.

Name: rider
Sentence: Halt!

Name: bronn
Sentence: Fucked in the arse. . Hiya! . Morning, lads. Glad we found you.

Name: rider
Sentence: Who are you?

Name: bronn
Sentence: Cooper. . This is Darnell.

Name: rider
Sentence: You're from King's Landing.

Name: bronn
Sentence: Accent gave me away? Flea Bottom. Whelped and whipped.

Name: rider
Sentence: Why are you here?

Name: bronn
Sentence: Our ship capsized in the night. We managed to swim ashore. It was a near thing, really.

Sentence: I thought the sharks would get us. .

Name: rider
Sentence: There are no sharks in Dorne.

Name: jaime lannister
Sentence: I could have sworn those were shark fins.

Name: bronn
Sentence: Dolphins maybe.

Name: rider
Sentence: Throw your swords in the sand.

Name: bronn
Sentence: Boys, there's no need for this. Just, point us in the right direction. We'll find our way home.

Name: rider
Sentence: Swords in the sand! Now!

Name: bronn
Sentence: That one should be slow enough.

Name: bronn
Sentence: Nice move! .

Name: jaime lannister
Sentence: Luck.

Name: bronn
Sentence: You had a wonderful teacher.

Sentence: Always wanted a Dornish stallion. Beasts can run a day and night without tiring. We'll ride to the Water Gardens with a nice breeze in our face.

Sentence: First we need to bury these bodies.

Name: bronn
Sentence: Birds have to eat too.

Sentence: Corpses raise questions, questions raise armies. We're not here to start a war.

Name: bronn
Sentence: Do you know how long it will take us to dig all those holes?

Sentence: I can't dig very well with one hand. Not at all, really.

Name: tyene
Sentence: Nama!

Name: elaria
Sentence: Nym, Obara.

Sentence: Will it be war?

Sentence: Prince Doran will weep for your father, but nothing else. We must avenge Oberyn ourselves.

Name: elaria
Sentence: We don't need an army to start a war. . Queen Cersei loves her children, and we have one of them.

Name: nymeria
Sentence: We may have a problem.

Name: obara
Sentence: A ship's captain, who found me in Planky Town, claiming he had information to sell. He told me he smuggled Jaime Lannister into Dorne.

Name: elaria
Sentence: He's come for Myrcella. If he gets to her before we do, we lose our only chance for revenge. You must choose. Doran's way and peace, or my way and war.

Name: tyene
Sentence: I'm with you. Always. .

Name: elaria
Sentence: Nym? . Obara?

Name: obara
Sentence: When I was a child, , Oberyn came to take me to court. I'd never seen this man, and yet he called himself my father. My mother wept, said I was too young, and a girl.

Name: obara
Sentence: I made my choice long ago.

Name: tyrion lannister
Sentence: Thank you. . Who are you?

Name: jorah mormont
Sentence: Your captor.

Name: tyrion lannister
Sentence: Do you have wine?

Name: jorah mormont
Sentence: No.

Name: tyrion lannister
Sentence: I can't sleep without wine.

Name: jorah mormont
Sentence: Then stay awake.

Name: tyrion lannister
Sentence: You're going the wrong way. My sister's in Westeros. Westeros is west! We're heading east.

Name: jorah mormont
Sentence: I'm not taking you to your sister.

Name: tyrion lannister
Sentence: You said you were taking me to the Queen.

Name: jorah mormont
Sentence: I am. Queen Daenerys Targaryen. She's the Queen I serve.

Name: tyrion lannister
Sentence: What a waste of a good kidnapping. So happens I was heading there myself!

Name: jorah mormont
Sentence: What business would you have with the Queen?

Name: tyrion lannister
Sentence: Gold and glory. Oh, and hate. If you've ever met my sister, you'd understand. So now that it's clear we're on the same side? . A high born knight from the North of Westeros, down on his luck in Essos. Dragon epaulettes? Bear sigil breast plate. You're Jorah Mormont. I have to ask how, exactly, were you serving your Queen in a whore house, half a world away? Is it possible, that you were running? Why would you be running? And why would she have sent you away? Oh, wait! You were spying on her, weren't you? It's all coming back to me! I was drunk through most of the Small Council meetings, but it's all coming back. You passed notes to Varys's little birds. She found out, didn't she? Found out, and exiled you. . And now you hope to win back her favor with a gift. A risky scheme. One might even say, desperate. Do you think Daenerys would execute me, and pardon you? I'd say the reverse is just as likely.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Sentence: Everyone looks happy enough from up here. . What?

Name: barristan
Sentence: I was thinking of all the times your brother made me go with him down from the Red Keep, into the streets of King's Landing.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Sentence: Why?

Name: barristan
Sentence: He liked to walk among the people, he liked to sing to them.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Sentence: He sang to them?

Name: barristan
Sentence: Yes. Rhaegar would take a spot on the Hook or the Street of Seeds and then he'd sing. Just like all the other minstrels.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Sentence: And what did you do?

Name: barristan
Sentence: I made sure no one killed him. And I collected the money. . Well he liked to see how much he could make.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Sentence: He was good?

Name: barristan
Sentence: He was very good. Viserys never told you?

Name: daenerys targaryen
Sentence: He told me Rhaegar was good at killing people. .

Name: barristan
Sentence: Rhaegar never liked killing. He loved singing.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Sentence: And what did you do with the money?

Name: barristan
Sentence: Well, one time, he gave it to the next minstrel down the street. One time, he gave it to an orphanage in Flea Bottom. One time... we got horribly drunk. .

Name: daario
Sentence: Your Grace. Hizdahr is here, waiting in your audience chamber.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Sentence: How many others are there?

Name: daario
Sentence: Fifty a hundred.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Sentence: Will you be joining us, Ser Barristan?

Name: daario
Sentence: I think I can protect you from Hizdahr Zo Loraq.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Sentence: I think I can protect me from Hizdahr Zo Loraq. Go, Ser Barristan. Sing a song for me.

Name: barristan
Sentence: Your Grace. .

Name: hizdahr
Sentence: All men must die. But not all can die in glory.

Name: missandei
Sentence: Glory?

Name: hizdahr
Sentence: Why else do men fight? Why did your ancestors cross the Narrow Sea and conquer the Seven Kingdoms? So their names would live on. Those who find victory in the fighting pits, will never become kings, but their names will live on. It's the best chance they'll ever have.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Sentence: Is that what you used to tell men before you set them to butchering each other for sport?

Name: hizdahr
Sentence: Your Grace, today is the traditional start of the fighting season.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Sentence: I do not recognize this tradition.

Name: hizdahr
Sentence: Traditions are the only thing that will hold this city, your city, together. . Without them, former slaves and former masters have nothing in common. Nothing but centuries of mistrust and resentment. I can't promise this is the answer to all our problems, but it's a start.

Name: woman
Sentence: Sons of the Harpy.

Name: end
Sentence: EPISODE

Name: hizdahr
Sentence: I am so sorry, my queen. He was a good man.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Sentence: Barristan the Bold" they called him. He crossed a continent to serve me. He was a loyal friend. And he died in an alley, butchered by cowards who hide behind masks.

Name: daario
Sentence: We could pull back to the pyramid district, secure it, and use it as a base from which to operate. Then we clean the city out, neighborhood by neighborhood, street by street, until the rats have nowhere left to hide.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Sentence: I prefer your earlier suggestion. Round up the leaders of each of Meereen's great families and bring them to me.

Name: hizdahr
Sentence: But... I'm the leader of my family.

Name: hizdahr
Sentence: No, Your Grace! I had nothing to do with this. Your Grace!

Name: daenerys targaryen
Sentence: Walk forward.

Name: man
Sentence: You cannot do this.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Sentence: Another step.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Sentence: They will eat you, if I tell them to. They may eat you even if I don't. Children. Some say I should give up on them. . But a good mother never gives up on her children. She disciplines them if she must.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Sentence: But she does not give up on them.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Sentence: Who is innocent? Maybe all of you are, , maybe none of you are. Maybe, , I should let the dragons decide.

Name: hizdahr
Sentence: All men must die.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Sentence: Don't want to overfeed them. Tomorrow perhaps.

Name: sam
Sentence: And though Daenerys maintains her grip on Slaver's Bay, forces rise against her from within and without. She refuses to leave until the freedom of the former slaves is secure." She sounds like quite a woman.

Name: aemon
Sentence: And she's alone, under siege, no family to guide her or protect her. Her last relation thousands of miles away, useless, dying.

Name: sam
Sentence: Don't say that, Maester Aemon.

Name: aemon
Sentence: A Targaryen, alone in the world, is a terrible thing.

Name: jon snow
Sentence: Maester Aemon.

Name: aemon
Sentence: Lord Commander.

Name: jon snow
Sentence: Sam, I'd like to speak to the maester alone.

Name: jon snow
Sentence: How are you feeling?

Name: aemon
Sentence: Oh, like a hundred-year-old man slowly freezing to death.

Name: jon snow
Sentence: I need your advice. There's something I want to do, something I have to do. But it'll divide the Night's Watch. Bitterly. Half the men will hate me the moment I give the order.

Name: aemon
Sentence: Half the men hate you already, Lord Commander. Do it.

Name: jon snow
Sentence: But you don't know what it is.

Name: aemon
Sentence: That doesn't matter. You do. You will find little joy in your command. But with luck, you will find the strength to do what needs to be done. Kill the boy, Jon Snow. Winter is almost upon us. Kill the boy, and let the man be born.

Name: jon snow
Sentence: Where are the rest of the free folk now? . Where have they gone? . Who leads them?

Name: tormund
Sentence: They followed Mance. They won't follow anyone else.

Name: jon snow
Sentence: What about you?

Name: tormund
Sentence: Hard to lead when you're in chains.

Name: jon snow
Sentence: What if I unchained you?

Name: tormund
Sentence: Why would you do that?

Name: jon snow
Sentence: Because you are not my enemy. And I'm not yours.

Name: tormund
Sentence: You sure seemed like my enemy when you were killing my friends.

Name: jon snow
Sentence: For 8,000 years the Night's Watch have sworn an oath to be the shield that guards the realms of men. And for 8,000 years we've fallen short of that oath. You belong to the realms of men. All of you.

Name: tormund
Sentence: And now everything is going to change?

Name: jon snow
Sentence: It is.

Name: tormund
Sentence: Why now?

Name: jon snow
Sentence: Because now, , I am Lord Commander of the Night's Watch.

Name: tormund
Sentence: What would you have me do, , Lord Commander?

Name: jon snow
Sentence: I'd have you go north of the Wall. Gather the remaining free folk wherever they are and bring them back here. I'll open the gates for them and let them through. I'll find them lands to settle south of the Wall.

Name: tormund
Sentence: They won't kneel for you and neither will I.

Name: jon snow
Sentence: I don't want them to kneel for me. I want them to fight with me when the time comes.

Name: tormund
Sentence: The day I ask my people to fight with the crows is the day my people cut my guts from my belly and make me eat them.

Name: jon snow
Sentence: And how many of your people can't fight? The women, the children, the old, the sick, what happens to them? You're condemning them to death. Worse than death because you're too proud to make peace. Or maybe you're not proud. Maybe you're just a coward.

Name: tormund
Sentence: Easy thing to say to a man in chains.

Name: jon snow
Sentence: Your people need a leader. And they need to get south of the Wall before it's too late. We don't have much time and they have less. The walkers are coming and they'll hit your people first. I'm not asking you to make peace to save your skin. Make peace to save your people.

Name: tormund
Sentence: Most of them are at Hardhome. You know where that is?

Name: jon snow
Sentence: Up on Storroldo s Point. I can give you 10 horses and nine other men. You can get there in a week.

Name: tormund
Sentence: We'll need ships.

Name: jon snow
Sentence: I'll talk to King Stannis about lending you his fleet.

Name: tormund
Sentence: All right, then. You're coming with me. You're the Lord Commander of the Night's Watch. They need to hear it from you. They need to know the ships they are boarding won't be torched in the middle of the sea. You come with me, or I don't go.

Name: man
Sentence: You'd bring wildlings here, through our gates?

Name: jon snow
Sentence: Men, women, and children will die by the thousands if we do nothing.

Name: man
Sentence: Let them die. We got our own to worry about. Less enemies for us.

Name: stannis baratheon
Sentence: Fewer.

Name: davos
Sentence: What?

Name: stannis baratheon
Sentence: Nothing.

Name: sam
Sentence: There is good farmland in the Gift. . Land that no one uses now. A dozen abandoned villages.

Name: man
Sentence: And why do you think the farmers abandoned those villages? Because the wildlings raided them for years. Cut them down! Just like they did this boy's people.

Name: allister
Sentence: We've been fighting them all for thousands of years. They've slaughtered villages. They've slaughtered our brothers.

Name: jon snow
Sentence: And we've slaughtered theirs.

Name: edd
Sentence: I will follow you anywhere, you know that. But they killed Grenn. And they killed Pyp. . They killed 50 of our brothers. I can't forget that. I can't forgive it.

Name: jon snow
Sentence: You were at the Fist of the First Men. If we abandon them, you know what they become. We can learn to live with the wildlings or we can add them to the army of the dead. Whatever they are now, they're better than that.

Name: jon snow
Sentence: Thank you. . Olly. . If you have something you want to say to me, say it. It's all right.

Name: olly
Sentence: You don't mean it, do you? Telling the wildlings you want to make peace. You're just doing it to trick them.

Name: jon snow
Sentence: It's not a trick.

Name: olly
Sentence: They burned my village. They put an arrow through my father's head right in front of me. They butchered my mother, everyone I ever knew.

Name: jon snow
Sentence: I know what it's like to lose the people you love. I know this is hard for you. But winter is coming. We know what's coming with it. We can't face it alone.

Name: olly
Sentence: Will there be anything else you need, Lord Commander?

Name: jon snow
Sentence: No.

Name: podrick
Sentence: She's far away from the Lannisters. This is her home. Maybe Lady Sansa is better off here.

Sentence: Better off with the Boltons who murdered her mother and brother? Sansa's in danger even if she doesn't realize it.

Sentence: Thank you. You've lived here a long time?

Sentence: Aye.

Sentence: I knew him and his father before him. The Starks are gone now.

Sentence: Not all of them. I know who's inside that castle.

Sentence: I'm not talking about the Boltons. I need to get a message to her. To Sansa Stark.

Name: malko
Sentence: A rare find for the fighting pits, my friends. Not your usual street tough old drunken pirate. This one's a Westerosi knight from an ancient house, trained in sword and lance. he fought beside the Stag King Robert on the far side of the Narrow Sea. He was first from the breach during the siege of Pyke, slaughtering 50 men with his flaming sword. He killed the great Khal Drogo in single combat. Betrayed by his woman, he sold himself into slavery to repay his debts. Bidding begins at 12 gold honors.

Name: olenna tyrell
Sentence: You there! Where would I find the High Septon, or High Sparrow, or whatever bloody fool name he's got.

Sentence: It's not as good a name as Queen of Thorns, I'll admit.

Name: olenna tyrell

Sentence: Huh.

Sentence: A man of the people, is that your game? It's an old game. dull and unconvincing. A man of the people who does Cersei's dirty work for her.

Name: sparrow
Sentence: The people always do the dirty work.

Sentence: Spare me the homilies, I can smell a fraud from a mile away.

Name: sparrow
Sentence: A useful talent.

Name: olenna tyrell
Sentence: I'm here for my grandson and granddaughter.

Name: sparrow
Sentence: Your grandson and granddaughter swore sacred vows and lied. The Father judges us all. Sons of high lords, sons of fishermen. If you break his laws you will be punished.

Name: olenna tyrell
Sentence: Don't you walk away from me.

Name: sparrow
Sentence: You don't give commands here, Lady Olenna.

Name: olenna tyrell
Sentence: What is it you want? Gold? I'll make you the richest septon who ever lived.

Name: olenna tyrell
Sentence: What then?

Name: sparrow
Sentence: I imagine this is strange for you. Everyone you meet has a hidden motive, and you pride yourself on slitting in and out. But I'm telling you a simple truth

Name: olenna tyrell
Sentence: How do they communicate their demands? By raven or horse?

Name: sparrow
Sentence: By the holy text. The seven pointed star. If you don't have one in your library I'll give you my own.

Name: olenna tyrell
Sentence: I've read the seven pointed star.

Name: sparrow
Sentence: Then you'll remember the passages concerning buggery and perjury. Your grandchildren will be punished in the same manner as anyone who breaks the sacred laws.

Name: olenna tyrell
Sentence: Half the men, women, and children in this foul city break the sacred laws. You live among murderers, thieves, and rapists. And yet you punish Loras for shagging and Margaery for defending her brother?

Name: sparrow
Sentence: Yes. The Gods' laws must be applied to all equally.

Name: olenna tyrell
Sentence: If it's equality you want then so be it. When House Tyrell stops sending our crops to the capital, everyone here will starve. And I'll make sure the hungry know who to blame,

Name: sparrow
Sentence: Have you ever served the field, Lady Olenna? Have you ever reaped the grain? Has anyone in House Tyrell? A lifetime of wealth and power has left you blind in one eye. You are the few. We are the many. And when the many stop fearing the few…

Name: squire
Sentence: Lady Olenna.

Sentence: Starving yourself won't make things any better for her, my love.

Sentence: She's in a prison cell and there's nothing I can do. I am the king! The queen is in prison and there's nothing I can do!

Sentence: No matter who you are, no matter how strong you are, sooner or later, you'll face circumstances beyond your control.

Sentence: This is my home, this has been my home for years. I didn't want to come here but she told me to. I did what she said, I did my duty and now she's forcing me to go back?

Sentence: Your nose is bleeding.

Sentence: My dagger was coated with a special ointment from Asshei. They call it the Long Farewell. It takes time to work, but if a single drop makes contact with the skin, death.

Name: tyene
Sentence: The only antidote. Who's the most beautiful woman in the world?

Sentence: Sorry? Who?

Sentence: Don't drop it.

Sentence: I think you're very handsome as well.

Sentence: I'm sorry about the locale.

Sentence: It felt like the safest place.

Sentence: It was an establishment like no other. The sheer range of appetites catered to, desires that didn't exist until we invented them.

Sentence: You've always been rather impressed with yourself, haven't you?

Sentence: The past is the past. The future is all that's worth discussing. The future of House Tyrell.

Sentence: Don't pretend to have any concern for my house, my grandchildren, or me. I should have known you'd return to the capital once things started going wrong.

Sentence: I promise you, Lord Baelish, that our fates are joined. Together we murdered a king. And if my house should fall, I would have nothing to hide. And if i should meet with some accident here at this broken little flesh market, they'll never even find what's left of you. So do you deny a part in all of this?

Sentence: Cersei summoned me to King's Landing. I dared not refuse her.

Name: olenna tyrell
Sentence: And what did she want?

Name: petyr baelish
Sentence: A piece of info that she know that I had. Neither silence nor lies were an option. But I have other information of which she is unaware. And as you say, our interests are aligned. I have a gift for you.

Sentence: What kind of gift?

Sentence: The same kind I gave Cersei. A handsome young man.

Name: slave owner
Sentence: Many worthy fighters have died trying to make it to the Great Games. When most of you worthless scum join them in death this afternoon it will represent a significant rise in your station. But if you happen to triumph here you will fight at the great pit of Daznak itself in front of the queen. So whatever happens, the gods have smiled upon you today. Today is the day your lives actually start to mean something.

Sentence: You and you, you, you two, you, you, and you.

Sentence: What are you doing?

Sentence: Get him out of my sight.

Sentence: Khaleesi, please, I just need a moment of your time. I brought you a gift.
