Sentence: It's true. He has.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Sentence: Who are you?

Name: tyrion lannister
Sentence: I am the gift. It's a pleasure to meet you, Your Grace. My name is Tyrion Lannister.

Name: cersei lannister
Sentence: This is horrible. Unacceptable. Are they feeding you enough at least? I brought you this. Venison. It's quite good. I had it myself for supper only last night. We did everything we could from the moment they took your brother. Tommen even went to the sept himself to confront the high sparrow, but I fear The Faith has left reason behind.

Name: margaery tyrell
Sentence: I know you did this.

Name: cersei lannister
Sentence: We are making every effort on your behalf. I swear to you by all the seven gods.

Name: margaery tyrell
Sentence: Lies come easily to you. Everyone knows that. But innocence, decency, concern? You're not very good at those, I'm afraid. Perhaps that's why your son was so eager to cast you aside for me.

Name: cersei lannister
Sentence: You're upset. You're not thinking clearly. I'll visit again when you've had a chance to calm down.

Name: margaery tyrell
Sentence: I don't want to see you again.

Name: cersei lannister
Sentence: I do hope you change your mind about that. I've been told men often go mad in the Black Cells below the Red Keep, but I suppose your isolation will end once your trial begins.

Name: margaery tyrell
Sentence: Leave.

Name: cersei lannister
Sentence: Yes, I'm afraid I must. My son needs me now more than ever.

Name: margaery tyrell
Sentence: Get out you hateful bitch!

Name: cersei lannister
Sentence: Sleep well, sister.

Name: sparrow
Sentence: Thank you. You saw her?

Name: cersei lannister
Sentence: Yes.

Name: sparrow
Sentence: And?

Sentence: Her accommodations seem sufficient. What happens to her now?

Name: sparrow
Sentence: Well she and her brother are both being held under fair suspicion. A trial will be held for each of them to determine if they are guilty of any acts that might constitute a violation of the tenants of the faith.

Name: cersei lannister
Sentence: Who will stand judge?

Name: sparrow
Sentence: Seven septons. As it was in all trials before the Targaryens.

Name: cersei lannister

Name: sparrow

Name: cersei lannister
Sentence: If one or both of them were to confess before the trial…

Sentence: Then they will be at The Mother's mercy.

Sentence: What does The Mother's mercy entail?

Name: sparrow
Sentence: It depends on the situation. The acts themselves, the degree of contrition.

Name: cersei lannister
Sentence: Thank you High Septon for bringing them whatever justice they deserve in the eyes of the Seven.

Name: sparrow
Sentence: Did you know this chapel is one of the oldest structures in King's Landing?

Name: cersei lannister
Sentence: I think I may have heard at one point.

Name: sparrow
Sentence: Baelor built his sept around it. But men worshipped here long before him.

Name: sparrow
Sentence: Who carved this altar do you know?

Name: cersei lannister
Sentence: I'm afraid i don't.

Name: sparrow
Sentence: No one does. There's no name on it. Or anywhere else in the chapel. The people who built this place didn't inflict their vanity on the people who came after them. The way Baelor did with that great gilded monstrosity out there. Their faith was clean.

Name: sparrow
Sentence: A young man came to us not long ago, broken in body and spirit. He had so much to strip away, so much weighing him down. But piece by piece he unburdened himself. Let go of vanity, pride, sin, now his soul is so light he will float through the Seven Heaves like a bird.

Name: sparrow
Sentence: And he has much to say about you.

Name: cersei lannister
Sentence: Move. Let me go immediately.

Name: cersei lannister
Sentence: You will order her to let me go! I am the queen! I am the queen! Have you lost your mind? Let me go! You filthy… I am the queen! Let me go!

Name: cersei lannister
Sentence: Look at me. Look at my face. It's the last thing you'll see before you die.

Sentence: You want revenge against the Lannisters? I killed my mother Joanna Lannister the day I was born. I killed my father Tywin Lannister with a bow to the heart. I am the greatest Lannister killer of our time.

Sentence: So I should welcome you into my service because you murdered members of your own family?

Name: tyrion lannister
Sentence: Into your service? Your Grace we have only just met. It's too soon to know if you deserve my service.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Sentence: If you'd rather return to the fighting pits just say the word.

Name: tyrion lannister
Sentence: When I was a young man I heard a story about a baby born during the worst storm in living memory. She had no wealth, no lands, no army, only a name and a handful of supporters, most of whom probably thought they could use that name to benefit themselves. They kept her alive, moving her from place to place, often hours ahead of the men who had been sent to kill her. She was eventually sold off to some warlord on the edge of the world and that appeared to be that. And then a few years later the most well informed person I knew told me that this girl without wealth, lands, or armies had somehow acquired all 3 in a very short span of time, along with three dragons. He thought she was our best, last chance to build a better world. I thought you were worth meeting at the very least.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Sentence: And why are you worth meeting? Why should I spend my time listening to you?

Name: tyrion lannister
Sentence: Because you can not build a better world on your own. You have no one at your side who understands that land you want to rule. The strengths and the weaknesses of the houses that will either support or oppose you.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Sentence: I have a very large army and very large dragons.

Name: tyrion lannister
Sentence: Killing and politics aren't always the same thing. When I served as Hand of the King I did quite well with the latter considering the king in question preferred torturing animals to leading his people. I could do an even better job advising a ruler worth the name.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Sentence: So you want to advise me. Very well. What would you have me do with him? I swore I would kill him if he ever returned.

Name: tyrion lannister
Sentence: I know.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Sentence: Why should the people trust a queen who can't keep her promises?

Name: tyrion lannister
Sentence: Whomever Ser Jorah was when he started informing on you, he is no longer that man. I can't remember seeing the same man as devoted to anything as he is to serving you. He claims he would kill for you and die for you, and nothing I have witnessed gives me reason to doubt him. And yet he did betray you.

Name: tyrion lannister
Sentence: Did he have an opportunity to confess his betrayals?

Name: daenerys targaryen
Sentence: Yes, many opportunities.

Name: tyrion lannister
Sentence: And did he?

Name: daenerys targaryen
Sentence: No. Not until forced to do so.

Name: tyrion lannister
Sentence: He worships you. He is in love with you, I think. But he did not trust you with the truth - an unpleasant truth, to be sure - but one of great significance to you. He did not trust that you would be wise enough to forgive him.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Sentence: So I should kill him?

Name: tyrion lannister
Sentence: A ruler who kills those that are devoted to her is not a ruler that inspires devotion. And you're going to need to inspire devotion, and lots of it, if you're ever going to rule across the Narrow Sea. But you cannot have him by your side when you do.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Sentence: Remove Ser Jorah from the city.

Name: septa
Sentence: Confess.

Name: cersei lannister
Sentence: My son. Let me speak to--

Name: septa
Sentence: Confess. I meant it.

Name: cersei lannister
Sentence: My face will be the last thing you see before--

Name: arya stark
Sentence: My name is Lana. I'm an orphan. When I was 8 I begged enough money to buy my first bucket of oysters, and I sold that bucket and made enough money to buy 2 more.

Name: arya stark
Sentence: Iit took a while but I finally saved enough to buy myself an oyster cart. Now every morning I make my way down to the canals. I pass the fish mongers and the bakers. I usually see Lhara, my first customer of the day on my way home. Then I turn left onto Moonsinger Lane--

Name: arya stark
Sentence: Left onto Ragman Lane, where I do most of my trade.

Name: jaqen hghar
Sentence: Lana is very impressive. Very industrious. She will make a fine servant for the Many Faced God.

Name: arya stark
Sentence: How will she serve him?

Name: jaqen hghar
Sentence: She will no longer turn left onto Ragman Lane. She will turn right and go to Ragman Harbor.

Name: arya stark
Sentence: What will she do there?

Name: jaqen hghar
Sentence: She will see.

Name: arya stark
Sentence: See what?

Name: jaqen hghar
Sentence: How can a man tell a girl this. If he knew what she would see, there would be no reason to send her.

Name: arya stark
Sentence: Oysters, clams and cockles!

Name: arya stark
Sentence: Oysters clams and cockles! Oysters clams and cockles!

Name: thin man
Sentence: Your oysters fresh?

Name: arya stark
Sentence: Best in the city.

Name: thin man
Sentence: You wouldn't lie to an old man would you?

Name: thin man
Sentence: Very nice. Give me 4. With vinegar.

Name: man
Sentence: It's my 18th voyage. I've returned from all of them without a scratch on me.

Name: thin man
Sentence: Can't do it.

Name: man
Sentence: Please I have 3 children. Without me-- here take it you have to, I have 3 children, what will they do? Please you have to! Please! You don't understand?

Name: jaqen hghar
Sentence: The man is a gambler. He wages that his sailor's ship will make it to its destination. It is a strange wager for the captain. He only wins if he loses his life.

Name: arya stark
Sentence: So why would a captain make the wager in the first place?

Name: jaqen hghar
Sentence: A girl tells a man that she has seen.

Name: arya stark
Sentence: If the captain dies, the thin man pays his family a lot of money.

Name: jaqen hghar
Sentence: But perhaps the gambler loses his bet and decides that he doesn't have to pay after all. A destitute woman and her small child, what can they do to such a man if he keeps their money for himself? To whom can they turn for recourse?

Name: arya stark
Sentence: The Many Faced God. You said you didn't know what I would see at the docks.

Name: jaqen hghar
Sentence: A man had no idea what she would see and what she would not. A girl named Lana will return to the docks. She will watch the gambler. She will come to know as much about him as she knows about herself.

Name: arya stark
Sentence: And then what?

Name: jaqen hghar
Sentence: A gift for the Thin Man.

Name: waif
Sentence: She is not ready.

Name: jaqen hghar
Sentence: Perhaps she is, perhaps she's not.

Name: waif
Sentence: And if she's not?

Name: jaqen hghar
Sentence: It is all the same to the Many Faced God.

Name: qyburn
Sentence: The trial will take place. The High Sparrow will be presenting a substantial case against you.

Name: cersei lannister
Sentence: The charges?

Name: qyburn
Sentence: Fornication, treason, incest, the murder of King Robert.

Name: cersei lannister
Sentence: All lies.

Name: qyburn
Sentence: Of course, Your Grace. My concern is that The Faith does not adhere to the same standards of proof as the crown. And I hope you'll excuse me for saying it, but belief is so often the death of reason.

Name: cersei lannister
Sentence: I wish you'd said it sooner. Any word from Jaime?

Name: qyburn
Sentence: I'm afraid not. Your Grace, Grand Maester Pycelle has summoned your Uncle Kevan back from Casterly Rock to serve as Hand of the King. He now presides over the small council.

Name: cersei lannister
Sentence: Tell him I need to speak to him.

Name: qyburn
Sentence: I implored him to visit you but he would not.

Name: cersei lannister
Sentence: What about my son, the king? If you can visit me then surely the king--

Name: qyburn
Sentence: Your arrest, and Queen Margaery's arrest, the king has not taken well. He remains in his chambers, his servants often find his food in the hall. Left untouched.

Name: cersei lannister
Sentence: You need to talk to him, you need to talk to my son to come and see me, come and see his mother.

Name: qyburn
Sentence: I tried my grace, he wouldn't see me. He wouldn't see anyone.

Name: cersei lannister
Sentence: I can't stay here.

Name: qyburn
Sentence: There is a way, Your Grace. A way out.

Name: cersei lannister
Sentence: Confess? To the High Sparrow? I won't. I made him. I rose him up from nothing, I will not kneel before some barefooted commoner and beg his forgiveness.

Name: qyburn
Sentence: Goodbye my queen. The work continues.

Name: sansa stark
Sentence: Why. Why Theon.

Name: theon greyjoy
Sentence: Not Theon. There is no Theon. Reek.

Name: sansa stark
Sentence: Reek. Why did you tell him, Reek?

Name: theon greyjoy
Sentence: I was helping you. You were trying to escape, there is no escape. Not ever. Theon Greyjoy tried to escape. The master knew. He knows everything. He hunted him, he caught him, he strapped him to a cross, and cut away piece after piece until there was no Theon left.

Name: sansa stark
Sentence: Good. If it weren't for you I'd still have a family. If I could do to you what Ramsay did to you right here, right now, I would.

Name: theon greyjoy
Sentence: I deserved everything. I deserve to be Reek. I did terrible things. Turned on Robb. Captured Winterfell. Killed those boys.

Name: theon greyjoy
Sentence: They weren't “those boys”, they were Bran and Rickon. They were your brothers, you'd know them since they were born.

Name: theon greyjoy
Sentence: They weren't. They were only--

Name: sansa stark
Sentence: Only what?

Name: theon greyjoy
Sentence: I can't..

Name: sansa stark
Sentence: Tell me!

Name: theon greyjoy
Sentence: I can't, not unless the master says...

Name: sansa stark
Sentence: Tell me, they weren't what?!

Name: theon greyjoy
Sentence: They weren't...

Name: sansa stark
Sentence: Tell me why Bran and Rickon should be dead while you still breathe the air. Tell me to my face Theon, tell me that they weren't your brothers!

Name: theon greyjoy
Sentence: They weren't Bran and Rickon! I couldn't find them. It was two farm boys. I killed them and burned them so no one would know.

Name: sansa stark
Sentence: You didn't…?

Name: sansa stark
Sentence: Do you know where they went, Bran and Rickon?

Name: theon greyjoy
Sentence: I can't talk to you anymore.

Name: sansa stark
Sentence: Theon, you have to tell me, do you have any idea where Bran and Rickon--

Name: theon greyjoy
Sentence: Not Theon, Reek!

Name: bolton bannerman
Sentence: Our scouts tells us he's got no more than 6000 men. More than half of them are mounted, however.

Name: roose
Sentence: And how high can Stannis' horses jump? Our walls have been full repaired our walls have been reinforced. We have enough food for six months. We are more prepared for a siege than they could have ever been. All we have to do is wait for them to freeze, starve, and mutiny.

Name: roose
Sentence: You disagree?

Name: ramsay bolton
Sentence: Stannis isn't from the North. You are, father. I think you're missing an opportunity to show the people of the North how House Bolton treats southern invaders.

Name: roose
Sentence: And what do you recommend?

Name: ramsay bolton
Sentence: That we not sit and wait to let Stannis to decide what type of fight this is going to be. That we hit first, and hit hard, and leave a feast for the crows.

Name: roose
Sentence: A smart commander does not surrender a defensive advantage. As long as we stay behind these walls they can't touch us. Not to mention that the snow is so deep that we couldn't get an army through if we wanted to.

Name: ramsay bolton
Sentence: I don't need an army. I need 20 good men.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Sentence: So have you decided yet? Whether I'm worthy of your service?

Name: tyrion lannister
Sentence: Have you decided yet whether you're going to have me killed?

Name: daenerys targaryen
Sentence: It's probably my safest option.

Name: tyrion lannister
Sentence: I can see why you would think so. It's what your father would have done.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Sentence: And what would your father do?

Name: tyrion lannister
Sentence: My father? Who publicly sentenced me to death? I'd say his thoughts on having me killed were abundantly clear.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Sentence: Is that why you killed him?

Name: tyrion lannister
Sentence: Some day if you decide not to execute me, I'll tell you all about why I killed my father. And on that day, should it ever come, we'll need more wine than this.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Sentence: I know what my father was. What he did. I know the Mad King earned his name.

Name: tyrion lannister
Sentence: So here we sit, two terrible children of two terrible fathers.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Sentence: I'm terrible?

Name: tyrion lannister
Sentence: I've heard stories.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Sentence: Why did you travel to the other side of the world to meet someone terrible?

Name: tyrion lannister
Sentence: To see if you were the right kind of terrible.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Sentence: Which kind is that?

Name: tyrion lannister
Sentence: The kind that prevents your people from being even more so.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Sentence: I did reopen the fighting pits. Under my rule murder will once again become entertainment.

Name: tyrion lannister
Sentence: Yes, that was wise. And you agreed to marry someone you loathed for the greater good. Very impressive. My own sister married someone she loathed as well, though not by choice and certainly not for the greater good, Gods forbid. She ended up having him killed.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Sentence: Perhaps it won't come to that.

Name: tyrion lannister
Sentence: It's not impossible that Varys was right about you after all.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Sentence: Varys? King Robert's spy master?

Name: tyrion lannister
Sentence: Yes. He was the one who convinced me to come find you. He was my travelling companion before Ser Jorah seized that role for himself.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Sentence: Jorah sent my secrets to Varys. For 20 years the spider oversaw the campaign to find and kill me.

Name: tyrion lannister
Sentence: He did what he had to do to survive. He did a lot of other things that he didn't have to do. I suspect he's the main reason you weren't slaughtered in your crib.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Sentence: But you trust him?

Name: tyrion lannister
Sentence: Yes, oddly. He might be the only person in the world that I trust. Besides my brother.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Sentence: The brother who killed my father.

Name: tyrion lannister
Sentence: That's the one.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Sentence: Perhaps I will have you killed after all.

Name: tyrion lannister
Sentence: Your queenly prerogative. I had given up on life until Varys convinced me you might be worth living for. You chop off my head? Well, my final days were interesting.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Sentence: I'm not going to kill you.

Name: tyrion lannister
Sentence: No? Banish me?

Name: daenerys targaryen
Sentence: No.

Name: tyrion lannister
Sentence: So if I'm not going to be murdered, and I'm not going to be banished...

Name: daenerys targaryen
Sentence: You're going to advise me. While you can still speak in complete sentences.

Name: tyrion lannister
Sentence: Advise you on what?

Name: daenerys targaryen
Sentence: How to get what I want.

Name: tyrion lannister
Sentence: The Iron Throne. Perhaps you should try wanting something else.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Sentence: If I want jokes I'll get myself a proper fool.

Name: tyrion lannister
Sentence: I'm not entirely joking. There's more to the world than Westeros after all. How many hundreds of thousands of lives have you changed for the better here? Perhaps this is where you belong. Where you can do the most good.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Sentence: I fought so that no child born into Slaver's Bay would ever know what it was like to be bought or sold. I will continue that fight here and beyond. But this is not my home.

Name: tyrion lannister
Sentence: And when you get back to your home, who supports you?

Name: daenerys targaryen
Sentence: The common people.

Name: tyrion lannister
Sentence: Let's be generous and assume that's going to happen. Here in Slaver's Bay you had the support of the common people and only the common people. What was that like, ruling without the rich? House Targaryen is gone, not a single person who shares your blood is alive to support you. The Starks are gone as well, our two terrible fathers saw to that. The remaining Lannisters won't back you, not ever. Stannis Baratheon won't back you either, his entire claim to the Throne depends on the illegitimacy of yours. That leaves the Tyrells. Not impossible, but not enough.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Sentence: Lannister, Targaryen, Baratheon, Stark, Tyrell. They're all just spokes on a wheel. This one's on top, then that ones on top and on and on it spins, crushing the people on the ground.

Name: tyrion lannister
Sentence: It's a beautiful dream. Stopping the wheel. You're not the first person to have dreamt it.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Sentence: I'm not going to stop the wheel. I'm going to break the wheel.

Name: jorah mormont
Sentence: You said whoever wins would fight at the Great Pit in front of the queen. I won.

Name: master
Sentence: You struck me.

Name: jorah mormont
Sentence: I've been flogged if it makes you happy. I'm the best you've got. If I win at the Great Pit how much can you sell me for?

Name: master
Sentence: You're a free man, you could have gone anywhere, why did you come back?

Name: jorah mormont
Sentence: Let me fight for her and I belong to you.

Name: septa
Sentence: Thirsty? Confess.

Name: cersei lannister
Sentence: I'll get out of here, you realize. Before long.

Name: cersei lannister
Sentence: I can make you a wealthy woman. A lady of the court.

Name: cersei lannister
Sentence: I can make sure you die in the most hideous way imaginable, and all I do is sit here imagining ways for you to die.

Name: gilly
Sentence: Does it hurt?

Name: sam
Sentence: No.

Name: gilly
Sentence: Good.

Name: sam
Sentence: How are you?

Name: gilly
Sentence: I'm not the one who got punched and kicked in the face.

Name: sam
Sentence: You know what I mean.

Name: gilly
Sentence: I'm good.

Name: sam
Sentence: Are you scared?

Name: gilly
Sentence: A little.

Name: sam
Sentence: Me too.

Name: sam
Sentence: Who's there?

Name: olly
Sentence: Olly.

Name: sam
Sentence: Come in.

Name: olly
Sentence: I heard what happened.

Name: sam
Sentence: Not to worry. Men brawl from time to time. It's only natural.

Name: olly
Sentence: Figured you were hungry.

Name: sam
Sentence: You're a good lad.

Name: olly
Sentence: Wanted to ask you something. If you've got the time.

Name: gilly
Sentence: I need to check on baby Sam.

Name: sam
Sentence: Now then. How can I help?

Name: olly
Sentence: It's about the Lord Commander.

Name: sam
Sentence: Yes?

Name: olly
Sentence: He's going up to Hardhome to save all them wildlings. Wildlings killed my mom and dad. They killed everyone in my village.

Name: sam
Sentence: We've been fighting them for years.

Name: olly
Sentence: This wasn't a fight. We were farmers and they slaughtered us. So why's he saving them?

Name: sam
Sentence: Wildlings are people, just like us. There are good ones and bad ones.

Name: olly
Sentence: The one he's travelling with, the one with the red beard, he led the raid on my village.

Name: sam
Sentence: Olly...

Name: olly
Sentence: How can he trust him?

Name: sam
Sentence: I've seen the army of the dead. I've seen the white walkers, and they're coming for us, for all the living. And when it's time we'll need every last man we can find.

Name: olly
Sentence: But what if we let the wildings through the gates and they cut our throats while we sleep?

Name: sam
Sentence: Jon's taking a risk, but he has to. We don't stand a chance otherwise. Sometimes a man has to make hard choices, choices that might look wrong to others but you know are right in the long run.

Name: olly
Sentence: You believe that?

Name: sam
Sentence: With all my heart.

Name: sam
Sentence: Try not to worry Olly. I've been worrying about Jon for years. He always comes back.

Name: tormund
Sentence: You trust me Jon Snow?

Name: jon snow
Sentence: Does that make me a fool?

Name: tormund
Sentence: We are fools together now.

Name: tormund
Sentence: Lord of Bones. Been a long time.

Name: lord of bones
Sentence: Last time I saw you the little crow was your prisoner. The other way around now. What happened?

Name: tormund
Sentence: War.

Name: lord of bones
Sentence: You call that a war? The greatest army the North has ever seen cut to pieces by a southern king.

Name: tormund
Sentence: We should gather the elders find somewhere quiet to talk.

Name: lord of bones
Sentence: You don't give the orders here.

Name: tormund
Sentence: I'm not giving an order.

Name: lord of bones
Sentence: Why aren't you in chains?

Name: jon snow
Sentence: He's not my prisoner.

Name: lord of bones
Sentence: What is he?

Name: jon snow
Sentence: We're allies.

Name: lord of bones
Sentence: You fucking traitor! You fight for the crows now.

Name: tormund
Sentence: I don't fight for the crows.

Name: jon snow
Sentence: We're not here to fight. We're here to talk.

Name: lord of bones
Sentence: Is that right? You and the pretty crow do a lot of talking, Tormund. And when you're done talking, do you get down on your knees and suck his cock--

Name: tormund
Sentence: Gather the elders and let's talk.

Name: jon snow
Sentence: My name's Jon Snow. I'm Lord Commander of the Night's Watch. We're not friends. We've never been friends. We won't become friends today. This isn't about friendship. This is about survival. This is about putting a 700 foot wall between you and what's out there.

Name: karsi
Sentence: You built that wall to keep us out.

Name: loboda
Sentence: Since when do the crows give 2 shits if we live?

Name: jon snow
Sentence: In normal times we wouldn't. But these aren't normal times. The white walkers don't care if a man's Free Folk or Crow. We're all the same to them. Meat to their army. But together we can beat them.

Name: karsi
Sentence: Beat the white walkers? Good luck with that. Run from them, maybe.

Name: jon snow
Sentence: It's not a trick. It's a gift for those who join us.

Name: jon snow
Sentence: Dragonglass. A man of the Night's Watch used one of these daggers to kill a walker.

Name: loboda
Sentence: You saw this?

Name: jon snow
Sentence: No. But I trust the man.

Name: karsi
Sentence: There are old stories about Dragonglass.

Name: loboda
Sentence: There are old stories about ice spiders big as hounds.

Name: karsi
Sentence: And with the things we've seen you don't believe them?

Name: jon snow
Sentence: Come with me and I'll share these weapons.

Name: karsi
Sentence: Come with you where?

Name: jon snow
Sentence: There are good lands south of the wall. The Night's Watch will allow you through the tunnel and allow your people to farm those lands.

Name: jon snow
Sentence: I knew Mance Rayder. He never wanted a war with the Night's Watch, he wanted a new life for his people. For you. We're prepared to give you that new life.

Name: karsi
Sentence: If…?

Name: jon snow
Sentence: If you swear you join us when the real war begins.

Name: loboda
Sentence: Where is Mance?

Name: jon snow
Sentence: He died.

Name: loboda
Sentence: How?

Name: jon snow
Sentence: I put an arrow through his heart.

Name: loboda
Sentence: I say we send the Lord Commander back to Castle Black with no eyes.

Name: tormund
Sentence: None of you saw Mance die! I did. The Southern King who broke our army, Stannis, wanted to burn him alive to send him a message. Jon Snow defied that cunt's orders. His arrow was mercy. What it did took courage, and that's what we need today

Name: karsi
Sentence: I lost my father, my uncle, and 2 brothers fighting the damn crows.

Name: jon snow
Sentence: I'm not asking you to forget your dead. I'll never forget mine. I lost 50 brothers the night that Mance attacked the wall. But I'm asking you to think about your children now. They'll never have children of their own if we don't band together. The Long Night is coming and the dead come with it. No clan can stop them. The free folk can't stop them. The Night's Watch can't stop them. And all the southern kings can't stop them. Only together, all of us, and even then it might not be enough, but at least then we'll give the fuckers a fight.

Name: karsi
Sentence: You vouch for this man, Tormund?

Name: tormund
Sentence: He's prettier than both my daughters, but he knows how to fight. He's young, but he knows how to lead. He didn't have to come to Hardhome. He came because he needs us. And we need him.

Name: loboda
Sentence: My ancestors would spit on me if I broke bread with a crow.

Name: karsi
Sentence: So would mine, but fuck 'em, they're dead.

Name: tormund
Sentence: This is the way.

Name: wildling elder
Sentence: I'm with Tormund. We stay here we're dead men. At least with King Crow there's a chance.

Name: giant
Sentence: Tormund.

Name: loboda
Sentence: Keep that new life you want to give us. Keep your glass, King Crow. Soon as you get on his ships they're gonna slit your throats and dump your bodies to the bottom of the Shivering Sea. That's our enemy. That has always been our enemy.

Name: karsi
Sentence: I fucking hate Thenns.

Name: jon snow
Sentence: How many are with us? 5000?

Name: tormund
Sentence: I'm not good at counting.

Name: jon snow
Sentence: We're leaving too many behind.

Name: tormund
Sentence: The free folk are stubborn. You know how long it took Mance to band them together. 20 fucking years.

Name: jon snow
Sentence: And he knew them better than I ever will.

Name: tormund
Sentence: They're running out of food and there's nothing to hunt. They'll come around.

Name: karsi
Sentence: Johnna is gonna look after you. She's in charge, you listen to her.

Name: daughter
Sentence: I wanna go with you.

Name: karsi
Sentence: I need to get the old folks on the boats. I'm right behind you, I promise. Go on.

Name: wun wun
Sentence: Lokh kif rukh?

Name: loboda
Sentence: Shut the gate.

Name: loboda
Sentence: Shut the gate!!

Name: shouting
Sentence: Wait! Open the gate! Let us in! Help us! Please open it!

Name: loboda
Sentence: Ready your arrows!

Name: jon snow
Sentence: Get in line! Get in line!

Name: jon snow
Sentence: Hold the line! Hold the line!

Name: nights watch brother
Sentence: Lord Commander!

Name: jon snow
Sentence: Get them to the ship and come back for me!

Name: brother
Sentence: But you'll never make it--

Sentence: Of course, but for you, that means seeking out money, finery, power Seeking out your family means seeking out sin I'm not maligning you I sought those things out, too. To the exclusion of all else My father was a cobbler He died with I was young and I took over his shop He was a simple man and he made simple shoes But I found that the more work I put into my shoes, the more people wanted them Fine leather, ornamentation, detailing, and time Time most of all Dozens of hours spent on a single pair

Name: margaery tyrell
Sentence: Quality takes time

Name: sparrow
Sentence: Yes I imagine you've worn a year of someone's life on your back The highborn liked to cover their feet with my time and they paid well for the privilege I used their money to buy a taste of their lives for myself Each time I indulged, I felt myself ascending to something better

Name: margaery tyrell
Sentence: And one day you walked through a graveyard and realized it was all for nothing and set out on the path to righteousness Book of the Stranger, verse 25

Name: sparrow
Sentence: You know

Name: margaery tyrell
Sentence: Septa Unella reads it to me At me

Name: sparrow
Sentence: Yes, yes, she does enjoy reading at people You're close But it wasn't a graveyard It was a feast I bought old fine wine and young pretty girls and invited my friends to come share it all We passed around the wine, passed around the women, and soon we fell into a stupor I woke before dawn I could barely stand Everyone else was asleep on the couches or on the floor, lying in heaps next to their fine clothes The truth of their bodies laid bare I could smell them beneath the incense and the perfume and the fine food that had already started to turn And I saw it with perfect clarity I saw what my sins were The gold I had, the wine I drank, the women I used, my ceaseless struggle to maintain my position It was all part of a story A story I was telling myself about who I was A collection of lies that would disappear in the light The people I was trying to climb away from, the beggars in the street, the poor, they were closer to the truth than I ever was

Name: margaery tyrell
Sentence: So what did you do?

Name: sparrow
Sentence: I left to go and find them I didn't even put on my shoes I walked out the door and never went back

Name: sparrow
Sentence: Come, let's go and see him

Name: margaery tyrell
Sentence: Who?

Name: sparrow
Sentence: Your brother

Name: margaery tyrell
Sentence: enters her brother's cell. The door closes and locks behind her. Loras is lying on the floor.

Name: margaery tyrell
Sentence: Loras. Loras.

Name: margaery tyrell
Sentence: helps LORAS to his knees. He cries.

Name: margaery tyrell
Sentence: Listen to me. You need to stay strong.

Name: loras
Sentence: I can't stay strong. I never was strong.

Name: margaery tyrell
Sentence: You are strong. You are the future of our house, the future of our family.

Name: loras
Sentence: I don't care about that.

Name: margaery tyrell
Sentence: Shh. Have you -- have you told them that? That you don't care?

Name: loras
Sentence: I just want it to stop. Help me.

Name: margaery tyrell
Sentence: They want me to help you. They want me told help tear you down. That's why he's letting me see you, I know it is. And if either of us give in to what they want, then they win.

Name: loras
Sentence: Let them win. Just make it stop. Please.

Name: loras
Sentence: begins sobbing. MARGAERY embraces him.

Name: margaery tyrell
Sentence: All right.

Name: cersei lannister
Sentence: is walking down the hall to TOMMEN's chamber. She hears MAESTER PYCELLE talking.

Name: maester pycelle
Sentence: And now, how to avert disaster with our current predicament. This High Sparrow. I have dealt with fanatics of every description, Your Grace. Not setting them off, that's the most important thing. You are beset with enemies both within and without.

Name: cersei lannister
Sentence: enters the room

Name: cersei lannister
Sentence: What are you doing here?

Name: maester pycelle
Sentence: I am advising the king on our current predicament.

Name: cersei lannister
Sentence: Leave.

Name: maester pycell
Sentence: I am a member of the Small Council. The king's small --

Name: cersei lannister
Sentence: Is this a Small Council meeting?

Name: maester pycell
Sentence: Obviously not. I'm here to lend my wisdom and my support.

Name: tommen lannister
Sentence: Thank you for your counsel, Grand Maester. That will be all for now.

Name: maester pycell
Sentence: Your Grace.

Name: maester
Sentence: PYCELLE hobbles towards the door. As he leaves, he flashes CERSEI a smile. CERSEI closes the door.

Name: cersei lannister
Sentence: Since I've missed the past several Small Coucil meetings, I wanted to speak to you about a few things.

Name: tommen lannister
Sentence: I've been thinking about the High Sparrow.

Name: cersei lannister
Sentence: As have we all, unfortunately.

Name: tommen lannister
Sentence: We need to be careful in dealing with such a man. To prevent things from escalating any further. We have to be careful not to antagonize him. He has Margaery. We can't put her at risk. He's dangerous.

Name: cersei lannister
Sentence: Look at me. What did they do to me? To the king's own mother?

Name: cersei lannister
Sentence: It's all right. It's done. It's in the past. And of course Margaery's safety is paramount.

Name: tommen lannister
Sentence: You don't like Margaery, do you?

Name: cersei lannister
Sentence: Whether I like her or not is completely unimportant. Margaery is the queen. Queens must command respect. Kings even more so. Not just for their own sake, but for everyone's. The High Sparrow has no respect for kings or queens. No respect for anything in this world. He has no use for the things of this world. He want to knock them down and replace them with what? With fantasies. With beggars in the street. With nothing.

Name: tommen lannister
Sentence: Mother...there's something I want to tell you. Something the High Sparrow told me.

Name: cersei lannister
Sentence: You've spoken with him?

Name: tommen lannister
Sentence: I promised him I wouldn't tell anyone. If he found out I told --

Name: cersei lannister
Sentence: It would be a breach of confidence which he would not take lightly, given his constant prattling about the truth. I am your mother. You can always trust me.

Name: kevan
Sentence: and LADY OLENNA are waiting in the Small Council chamber for the meeting to start. CERSEI and JAIME enter.

Name: cersei lannister
Sentence: The Small Council meeting has been postponed on the king's orders.

Name: kevin
Sentence: and LADY OLENNA stand up.

Name: lady olenna
Sentence: I would have thought we were perfectly clear the first time. You're not welcome.

Name: cersei lannister
Sentence: You once spoke of your respect for our father because he understood the necessity of working with one's rivals.

Name: lady olenna
Sentence: My dear, you have been stripped of your dignity and authority, publicly shamed, and confined to the Red Keep. What's left to work with?

Name: jaime lannister
Sentence: Cersei is the mother of the king. She has the king's ear and his trust. And the king has been speaking regularly with the High Sparrow about Queen Margaery and Ser Loras.

Name: cersei lannister
Sentence: The High Sparrow seized power knowing full well we'd bicker amongst ourselves instead of seizing it back. Here we are. Well done to us. Now the future of the Seven Kingdoms rest in his dirty, peasant hands. In a few days, he'll have a trial for me. But before that, Queen Margaery will make her walk of atonement. Yes, Margaery will repent her sins before the good people of the city.

Name: lady olenna
Sentence: Oh, no. That cannot happen. That will not happen.

Name: cersei lannister
Sentence: I agree.

Name: jaime lannister
Sentence: You've got the second largest army in Westeros. You'll bring them into the city, stop queen Margaery's humiliation before it starts, and take her back into Crown custody.

Name: kevan
Sentence: The king has ordered me to take no action against the High Sparrow or the Faith Militant out of fear for the queen's safety.

Name: jaime lannister
Sentence: You'll take no action at all. When the Tyrell armies come, you will stand down. Are you expressly forbidden from standing down?

Name: kevan
Sentence: No, but if the king should call on me --

Name: jaime lannister
Sentence: The whole thing will be over before anyone can call on you to do anything. When the High Sparrow is in custody or dead, preferably, and Margaery's back at Tommen's side, do you think the king will be angry at the outcome?

Name: cersei lannister
Sentence: You hate these fanatics as much as we do. You hate what they've done to your son. Do you want Lancel back or have you given him up for good?

Name: kevan
Sentence: Of course I want him back.

Name: cersei lannister
Sentence: Then stand aside and let the people that took him from you be destroyed.

Name: kevan
Sentence: If it doesn't go as planned, the Sparrows have many friends in the city. We'll have civil war. Many will die.

Name: lady olenna
Sentence: Many will die no matter what we do. Better them than us.

Name: theon greyjoy
Sentence: approaches Pyke Castle by boat.

Name: yara greyjoy
Sentence: They told me you were home and I didn't believe it. “Theon Greyjoy?” I said. “He's dead. He's been dead a long time." He let you go?

Name: theon greyjoy
Sentence: I escaped.

Name: yara greyjoy
Sentence: I can't hear you.

Name: yara greyjoy
Sentence: Look at me. Look at me! Men died trying to rescue you. Good men. My men.

Name: theon greyjoy
Sentence: I'm sorry.

Name: yara greyjoy
Sentence: You were my brother. You're a spoiled little cunt, but you were my brother and I risked everything for you and you betrayed me.

Name: theon greyjoy
Sentence: I know. I know and I'm sorry.

Name: yara greyjoy
Sentence: Stop saying that.

Name: theon greyjoy
Sentence: He broke me. He broke me into a thousand pieces.

Name: yara greyjoy
Sentence: I know.

Name: theon greyjoy
Sentence: You don't know.

Name: yara greyjoy
Sentence: He send us one of those pieces. That's why I came for you.

Name: yara greyjoy
Sentence: Why did you come here?

Name: theon greyjoy
Sentence: Where else could I go?

Name: yara greyjoy
Sentence: You heard father was dead and thought you'd claim the crown?

Name: theon greyjoy
Sentence: No, no. I only heard he died after we docked.

Name: yara greyjoy
Sentence: You happen to show up on Pyke right before the Kingsmoot?

Name: theon greyjoy
Sentence: I didn't know.

Name: yara greyjoy
Sentence: You think any Ironborn wants you to be king? After what you've done?

Name: theon greyjoy
Sentence: I don't want to be king.

Name: yara greyjoy
Sentence: What do you want?

Name: theon greyjoy
Sentence: I shouldo ve listened to you. You're the only one --

Name: yara greyjoy
Sentence: That doesn't matter anymore. Stop crying. Look at me. Tell me what you want.

Name: theon greyjoy
Sentence: You should rule the Iron Islands. Let me help you.

Name: ramsay bolton
Sentence: peels an apple with a knife. The door opens. A guard ushers OSHA into the room. RAMSAY nods. The guard leaves and closes the door.

Name: ramsay bolton
Sentence: They've cleaned you up nicely. You know who I am?

Name: osha
Sentence: A lord?

Name: ramsay bolton
Sentence: Yes. A lord. You've seen my banners?

Name: osha
Sentence: The flayed man.

Name: ramsay bolton
Sentence: Does that worry you at all?

Name: osha
Sentence: You eat them after?

Name: ramsay bolton
Sentence: No.

Name: osha
Sentence: Then I've seen worse.

Name: ramsay bolton
Sentence: peels the skin of the apple and puts it on the table with the knife. OSHA looks at the knife. RAMSAY waves for OSHA to come to him. She walks towards him.

Name: ramsay bolton
Sentence: You served the Starks?

Name: osha
Sentence: Aye. They put me in chains and put a sword at my throat, so I've served them.

Name: ramsay bolton
Sentence: The Starks have been gone for a long time, but you kept protecting Rickon.

Name: osha
Sentence: He'd fetch a good price to the right buyer. I served his family a long time. Didn't get no wages. Way I see it, I'm owed.

Name: ramsay bolton
Sentence: Be that as it may, Rickon's not yours to sell anymore. He's mine. So what use could I possibly have for you?

Name: osha
Sentence: I can give you what you want.

Name: ramsay bolton
Sentence: Are you sure you know what that is?

Name: osha
Sentence: comes closer and sits down on his lap. They kiss.

Name: osha
Sentence: Same thing men always want. And when they really want it, they give it a bath first.

Name: ramsay bolton
Sentence: You're a good talker.

Name: ramsay bolton
Sentence: I like that.

Name: ramsay bolton
Sentence: You're a much better talker than Theon Greyjoy.

Name: osha
Sentence: That so?

Name: ramsay bolton
Sentence: I had to work hard to get him talking. But he talked. They all do.

Name: ramsay bolton
Sentence: He told me everything. All about the Stark boys. Who helped them escape, and how she did it.

Name: osha
Sentence: gets up and tries to stab RAMSAY with the knife, but RAMSAY stabs her in the neck first. She falls on the ground, with blood running from her neck. She dies. RAMSAY cleans his knife and continues to peel the apple. He bites a piece.

Name: sansa stark
Sentence: JON SNOW, BRIENNE, TORMUND, and DOLOROUS EDD are eating at a table. SANSA looks at the meat on her fork. JON SNOW, DOLOROUS EDD, and TORMUND eat vigorously. BRIENNE looks around at the men eating. TORMUND stares intently at BRIENNE. BRIENNE looks away. TORMUND smiles. DOLOROUS EDD notices their interaction.

Name: dolorous edd
Sentence: Sorry about the food. It's not what we're known for.

Name: sansa stark
Sentence: That's all right. There are more important things.

Name: man
Sentence: A letter for you, Lord Commander.

Name: jon snow
Sentence: I'm not Lord Commander anymore.

Name: jon snow
Sentence: To the traitor and bastard Jon Snow. You allowed thousands of wildlings past the Wall. You have betrayed your own kind. You have betrayed the North. Winterfell is mine, bastard. Come and see. Your brother Rickon is in my dungeon.

Name: jon snow
Sentence: SNOW looks at SANSA.

Name: jon snow
Sentence: His direwolf's skin is on my floor. Come and see. I want my bride back. Send her to me, bastard, and I will not trouble you or your wildling lovers. Keep her from me and I will ride north and slaughter every wildling man, woman, and babe living under your protection. You will watch as I skin them living. You --

Name: sansa stark
Sentence: Go on.

Name: jon snow
Sentence: It's just more of the same.

Name: jon snow
Sentence: SNOW puts the letter away, but SANSA takes it and continues reading.

Name: sansa stark
Sentence: You will watch as my soldiers take turns raping your sister. You will watch as my dogs your wild little brother. Then I will spoon your eyes from their sockets and let my dogs do the rest. Come and see. Ramsay Bolton, Lord of Winterfell and Warden of the North.

Name: jon snow
Sentence: Lord of Winterfell and Warden of the North.

Name: sansa stark
Sentence: His father's dead. Ramsay killed him. And now he has Rickon.

Name: jon snow
Sentence: We don't know that.

Name: sansa stark
Sentence: Yes, we do.

Name: tormund
Sentence: How many men does he have in his army?

Name: sansa stark
Sentence: I heard him say 5,000 once when he was talking about Stannis's attack.

Name: jon snow
Sentence: How many do you have?

Name: tormund
Sentence: That can march and fight? 2,000. The rest are children and old people.

Name: sansa stark
Sentence: You're the son of the last true Warden of the North. Northern families are loyal. They'll fight for you if you ask.

Name: sansa stark
Sentence: A monster has taken our home and our brother. We have to go back to Winterfell and save them both.

Name: jon snow
Sentence: SNOW nods.

Name: khal moro
Sentence: It is forbidden to spill blood in the sacred city. It is forbidden to carry weapons in the sacred city.

Name: khal
Sentence: So we don't spill blood.

Sentence: Well… there's always a little blood.

Sentence: Someone crushed his head with a rock.

Sentence: Aggo belonged to my khalaser. He served me well. He got his head smashed in by a rock. Fuck Aggo.

Sentence: Bring in Drogo's widow.

Name: daenerys targaryen

Name: khal
Sentence: Who cares about her? She's a midget.

Sentence: I like her.

Name: khal
Sentence: She's paler than milk.

Sentence: I'd like to know what a khaleesi tastes like.

Name: khal
Sentence: Good. You can suck my dick.

Sentence: She belongs with the Dosh Khaleen.

Name: khal
Sentence: The Wise Masters of Yunkai want her. They're offering ten thousand horses In exchange. What's worth more, one pink little girl or ten thousand horses?

Name: khal moro
Sentence: Fuck the Wise Masters in their perfumed asses. I'll take their horses for myself.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Sentence: Don't you want to know what I think?

Name: khal moro
Sentence: You'd rather be sold to slavery? Or maybe you'd like to show Rhalko here what you taste like?

Name: daenerys targaryen
Sentence: No. I don't want either of those things.

Name: khal moro
Sentence: We don't care what you want. This is the Temple of the Dosh Khaleen. You have no voice here, unless you are Dosh Khaleen. Which you are not, until we decide you are.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Sentence: I know where I am. I have been here before. This is where the Dosh Khaleen pronounced my child the Stallion Who Mounts the World.

Name: khal moro
Sentence: And what happened? You trusted a sorceress, like a fool. Your baby is dead because of you. And so is Khal Drogo.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Sentence: This is where Drogo promised to take his khalasar west to where the world ends. To ride wooden horses across the Black Salt Sea as no khal has done before. He promised to kill the men in their iron suits and tear down their stone houses. He swore to me before the Mother of Mountains.

Name: khal moro
Sentence: And you were dumb enough to believe him?

Name: daenerys targaryen
Sentence: And here, now, what great matters do the Great Khals discuss? Which little villages you'll raid, how many girls you'll get to fuck, how many horses you'll demand in tribute. You are small men. None of you are fit to lead the Dothraki. But I am. So I will.

Name: khal moro
Sentence: All right. No Dosh Khaleen for you. Instead we'll take turns fucking you. And then we'll let our bloodriders fuck you.

Name: khal moro
Sentence: And If there's anything left of you, we'll give our horses a turn. You crazy cunt. Did you really think we would serve you?

Name: daenerys targaryen
Sentence: lays her hand on a fire pit.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Sentence: You're not going to serve. You're going to die.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Sentence: knocks down all the fire pits one by one. The khals cower away from the flame. The flame begins to cover the entire temple. The khals run to the door and try to escape, but the door has been barred. JORAH and DAARIO watch the temple burning from the outside. The Dothraki people gather around the burning temple. DAENERYS grabs the final fire pit and knocks it in KHAL MORO's direction. The fire engulfs the entire temple and kills all the khals. DAENERYS walks out of the fire, unharmed and naked. All the Dothraki bow to DAENERYS. JORAH and DAARIO walk up to the steps burning temple. JORAH bows to DAENERYS. DAARIO stares at her and then bows.

Name: sansa stark
Sentence: Yes?

Name: man
Sentence: For you, my lady.

Name: sansa stark
Sentence: How far is Mole's Town?

Name: petyr baelish
Sentence: Sansa. Lady Brienne. When I heard you had escaped WInterfell, I feared the worst. You have no idea how happy I am to see you unharmed.

Name: sansa stark
Sentence: Unharmed? What are you doing here?

Name: petyr baelish
Sentence: I rode north with the Knights of the Vale to come to your aid. They're encamped at Moat Cailin as we speak.

Name: sansa stark
Sentence: To come to my aid? Did you know about Ramsay? If you didn't know, you're an idiot. If you did know, you're my enemy.

Name: sansa stark
Sentence: Would you like to hear about our wedding night? He never hurt my face. He needed my face, the face of Ned Stark's daughter. But the rest of me, he did what he liked with the rest of me as long as I could still give him an heir. What do you think he did?

Name: petyr baelish
Sentence: I can't begin to contemplate --

Name: sansa stark
Sentence: What do you think he did to me?

Name: brienne
Sentence: Lady Sansa asked you a question.

Name: petyr baelish
Sentence: He beat you.

Name: sansa stark
Sentence: Yes, he enjoyed that. What else do you think he did?

Name: petyr baelish
Sentence: Sansa, I --

Name: sansa stark
Sentence: What else?

Name: petyr baelish
Sentence: Did he cut you?

Name: sansa stark
Sentence: Maybe you did know about Ramsay all along.

Name: petyr baelish
Sentence: I didn't know.

Name: sansa stark
Sentence: I thought you knew everyone's secrets.

Name: petyr baelish
Sentence: I made a mistake, a horrible mistake. I underestimated a stranger.

Name: sansa stark
Sentence: The other things he did, ladies aren't supposed to talk about those things, but I imagine brothel keepers talk about them all the time. I can still feel it. I don't mean in my tender heart it still pains me so. I can still feel what he did in my body standing here right now.

Name: petyr baelish
Sentence: I'm so sorry.

Name: sansa stark
Sentence: You said you would protect me.

Name: petyr baelish
Sentence: And I will. You must believe me when I tell you that I will.

Name: sansa stark
Sentence: I don't believe you anymore. I don't need you anymore. You can't protect me. You won't even be able to protect yourself if I tell Brienne to cut you down. And why shouldn't I?

Name: petyr baelish
Sentence: Do you want me to beg for my life? If that's what you want, I will. Whatever you ask that is in my power, I will do.

Name: sansa stark
Sentence: What if I want you to die here and now?

Name: petyr baelish
Sentence: Then I will die.

Name: sansa stark
Sentence: You freed me from the monsters who murdered my family and you gave me to other monsters who murdered my family. Go back to Moat Cailin. My brother and I will take back the North on our own. I never want to see you again.

Name: petyr baelish
Sentence: I would do anything to undo what's been done to you. I know that I can't. Will you allow me to say one more thing before I go? Your great-uncle Brynden the Blackfish has gathered what remains of the Tully forces and retaken Riverrun. You might consider seeking him out. The time may come when you need an army loyal to you.

Name: sansa stark
Sentence: I have an army.

Name: petyr baelish
Sentence: Your brother's army.

Name: petyr baelish
Sentence: Half-brother.

Name: waif
Sentence: You're not ready. You should go home before it's too late.

Name: waif
Sentence: You'll never be one of us, Lady Stark.

Name: jaqen hghar
Sentence: She has a point.

Name: jaqen hghar
Sentence: None of the first Faceless Men were born to lords and ladies. They began as slaves in the mines of Valyria.

Name: arya stark
Sentence: Who was the first?

Name: jaqen hghar
Sentence: He was no one. The Many-Faced God taught him how to shed his face and how to give the gift. The man taught others in exchange for their service. Many served, many more gifts were given. Soon all the masters and overseers were gone and the Faceless Men fled.

Name: arya stark
Sentence: Where did they go?

Name: jaqen hghar
Sentence: Here. They founded the Free City of Braavos and built this house. These were the faces they wore in life when they were not wearing others. The first Faceless Men. And now a girl is one of them, if a girl desires.

Name: arya stark
Sentence: A girl has no desires.

Name: arya stark
Sentence: Who?

Name: jaqen hghar
Sentence: An actress who calls herself Lady Crane. She performs at the theater in Sheelba Square. A girl has been given a second chance. There will not be a third. One way or another, a face will be added to the hall.

Sentence: Oh, come, Father, in bed you must lie. I love you, Father. Please don't die.

Sentence: I feel the winds of winter as they lick across the land. And our son alone on that cold, cold throne without a guiding hand. Who will teach him strength? Who will teach him grace? To whom will he turn when it's time to learn to look darkness in the face?

Name: izembaro
Sentence: Ned stark will do fine. Now bring me more wine.

Sentence: I dare yes.

Sentence: The proper progression.

Sentence: The lawful ascension.
