Name: tommen lannister
Sentence: No. No, you don't. You- - you could never. You're right, he's not. He's a lot more- -

Name: margaery tyrell
Sentence: He is. There's something about him. His way of looking at the world. It's not an easy thing admitting to yourself what you really are. It's taken me a while. He's helped me.

Name: tommen lannister
Sentence: What are you talking about? You're a good person. You've always been a good person. You're the best person I know.

Name: tommen lannister
Sentence: I was just telling him about your devotion to the poor.

Name: margaery tyrell
Sentence: Ah, yes, I visited their hovels and I fed them soup and I made sure I was seen doing it. I never gave them what they really needed, though. I've had lots of time to think about how good I was at seeming good. All those stories I told myself about who I was and why I did the things I did. There were so many lies in those stories.

Name: tommen lannister
Sentence: I don't understand.

Name: margaery tyrell
Sentence: It's all right. It really is. It's such a relief to let go of those lies.

Name: tommen lannister
Sentence: What about Loras?

Name: margaery tyrell
Sentence: I love my brother. I will always love my brother. His soul is pure and perfect. His sins don't erase that purity, they only obscure it. He just needs to atone for them. We all do. Sooner or later, one way or another. The gods have a plan for us all.

Name: gilly
Sentence: It's hard to walk in this.

Name: sam
Sentence: It's beautiful. You're beautiful.

Name: sam
Sentence: This venison, it's very tasty. Is it from today's hunt?

Name: dickon
Sentence: Well, no. We haven't been able to cure that one yet. This is last week's.

Name: sam
Sentence: Oh, of course. Sorry. Long journey.

Name: dickon
Sentence: Brought it down from 70 yards. One shot.

Name: sam
Sentence: Oh, that's a fair distance.

Name: dickon
Sentence: So do you do much hunting up at the wall?

Name: sam
Sentence: Oh, yes. Yes. A good amount. North of the Wall, you don't hunt, you don't eat.

Name: dickon
Sentence: Mm-hmmm. Mostly deer or is it elk as well?

Name: sam
Sentence: Rabbits. Sometimes squirrels. I say “we,” it's my friend Jon mostly. Sometimes Edd. Oh, and Gilly. She's- - she's quite a good hunter as well. Um, huntress.

Name: melessa
Sentence: I imagine it's common where you're from. We once met a man, Lord Umber from Last Hearth, wasn't it, Randyll, who said he taught all his daughters how to hunt.

Name: talla
Sentence: Your father taught you to hunt? Our father would never teach us. I think our father could learn a thing or two from your father.

Name: randyll
Sentence: That's enough of that.

Name: melessa
Sentence: Samwell, would you care for more bread?

Name: sam
Sentence: Oh, yes. Yes, please. Thank you, Mother.

Name: randyll
Sentence: Not fat enough already?

Name: sam
Sentence: I travelled south under orders from the Lord Commander. He wants me to- -

Name: randyll
Sentence: I read your letter. You're to be a maester.

Name: sam
Sentence: Yes. And once I have my chain, I'll return to Castle Black.

Name: randyll
Sentence: I thought the Night's Watch might make a man of you. Something resembling a man at least. You managed to stay soft and fat.

Name: randyll
Sentence: Your nose buried in books. Spending your life reading about the achievements of better men. I'll wager you still can't sit a horse or wield a sword.

Name: melessa
Sentence: Randyll, to be maester of the Night's Watch is a great honor.

Name: gilly
Sentence: He can wield a sword. He killed a Thenn. He killed a White Walker.

Name: dickon
Sentence: There's no such thing.

Name: gilly
Sentence: I saw it with my own eyes on our way down to Castle Black. He drove a dagger into the walker's heart. He risked his own life to save mine more than once. He's a greater warrior than either of you will ever be.

Name: randyll
Sentence: Your way down to Castle Black? Where did he kill a white walker? Where are you from? How'd you come to meet my son?

Name: gilly
Sentence: The Night's Watch came to our keep.

Name: randyll
Sentence: Where?

Name: sam
Sentence: Gilly.

Name: gilly
Sentence: North of the Wall.

Name: randyll
Sentence: North of the Wall? You're a Wildling. The Seven Kingdoms have waged war against these savages for centuries and here I sit hosting one in my hall thanks to my son. See that sword?

Name: randyll
Sentence: It's called Heartsbane. It's been in our family for 500 years. It's Valyrian steel. Only a handful of them left in the world. It's supposed to go to my firstborn son after I die. To him. He will never wield that sword. If he were to become Lord Tarly of Horn Hill, it would be the end of this house. I took you for a Mole's Town whore when I saw you and I made my peace with that. Who else would have him? But I overestimated him. No. It was a wildling whore that seduced my son. This you getting back at me, boy? Hmm? Bring that to my table and making me dine with it. And you got what you were after, didn't you? A bastard. A half-breed bastard. Your invitation into our home.

Name: melessa
Sentence: Come, my dear. Talla.

Name: melessa
Sentence: I've lost my appetite.

Name: randyll
Sentence: He dishonors us.

Name: melessa
Sentence: You dishonor yourself.

Name: randyll
Sentence: Your mother's a fine woman. You're not worthy of her. To please her, I'll take the wildling in. She can work in the kitchens. The bastard will be raised here. But this will be the last night you ever spend at Horn Hill.

Name: sam
Sentence: I'm sorry I let him treat you that way. I was afraid he'd turn you and Little Sam away.

Name: gilly
Sentence: I'm not angry at you. I'm angry that horrible people can treat good people that way and get away with it. When do you have to go?

Name: sam
Sentence: First light.

Name: sam
Sentence: Say good-bye to him for me.

Name: gilly
Sentence: You're not what he thinks you are, Sam. He doesn't know what you are.

Name: sam
Sentence: Good-bye, Gilly.

Name: gilly
Sentence: Sam?

Name: sam
Sentence: We're leaving.

Name: gilly
Sentence: What?

Name: sam
Sentence: Get your things.

Name: gilly
Sentence: I don't have any things.

Name: gilly
Sentence: What are you doing?

Name: sam
Sentence: We belong together. All of us.

Name: gilly
Sentence: What about your mother and sister?

Name: sam
Sentence: Oh, they'll understand.

Name: gilly
Sentence: Your sister's dress.

Name: sam
Sentence: She won't mind. Looks better on you anyway.

Name: gilly
Sentence: Sam. That's your father's sword.

Name: sam
Sentence: It's my family's sword.

Name: gilly
Sentence: Sam. Won't he come for it?

Name: sam
Sentence: He can bloody well try.

Name: clarenzo
Sentence: The lion and the rose are one. I thank the gods above.

Name: clarenzo
Sentence: And to you, my beauteous bridge, I pledge undying love.

Name: all
Sentence: Hail King Joffrey. Hail Queen Margaery.

Name: clarenzo
Sentence: I'll drink a toast to my new queen, for there is no one fairer. Dear Uncle, will you share my joy and be my royal cupbearer?

Name: bobono
Sentence: Drink long and deep, my noble king, from this cup of sweet wine.

Name: bobono
Sentence: The last drink he shall ever take. And vengeance shall be mine.

Name: clarenzo
Sentence: Poison! Murder! I gasp. I- - I die.

Name: clarenzo
Sentence: I limp. And it was he…

Name: clarenzo
Sentence: that poisoned me. My evil Uncle Imp.

Name: lady crane
Sentence: My firstborn son. My golden lion foully, falsely slain. I pray you found a lasting peace free from strife and pain.

Name: lady crane
Sentence: Hear my prayer, O cruel gods. Take my life instead. For I cannot face another day when my sweet boy is dead. Oh, woe. Oh grief.

Name: lady crane
Sentence: Oh, darkest day, my heart is full of sorrow. All hope is lost. All joy is gone. And there is no tomorrow.

Name: bobono
Sentence: What is that I hear and smell? Someone I'll soon send to hell.

Name: bobono
Sentence: It's time to see if truth they told who said Tywin Lannister shits gold.

Name: izembaro
Sentence: You beast. You beast. You killed my wife and now you've taken your father's life.

Name: izembaro
Sentence: No worse child ever stained this land.

Name: izembaro
Sentence: Curse the day I named you.

Name: bobono
Sentence: My greatest crime. Now I must flee.

Name: bobono
Sentence: Then sail across the Narrow Sea to do unto you more treachery.

Name: bobono
Sentence: Don't fear the winter.

Name: bobono
Sentence: Fear me!

Name: izembaro
Sentence: Thank you. Ladies and gentlemen, I give you Bianca, Clarenzo.

Name: izembaro
Sentence: I give you Bobono.

Name: izembaro
Sentence: I give you Camello.

Name: izembaro
Sentence: And last but not least, sweet Lady Crane.

Name: camello
Sentence: Give this a good beating. Shake those fleas out. That's a dear.

Name: izembaro
Sentence: That crowd was shit.

Name: lady crane
Sentence: Girl.

Name: lady crane
Sentence: What are you doing back here?

Name: arya stark
Sentence: Nothing.

Name: lady crane
Sentence: I saw you the other day in the audience. How many times have you seen this stupid play?

Name: arya stark
Sentence: Three times.

Name: lady crane
Sentence: Did you pay?

Name: arya stark
Sentence: No.

Name: lady crane
Sentence: I remember when the players came to my village. I didn't have any money, so I snuck in. Just like you. Saw the painted faces, the costumes, listened to the songs, cried when the young lovers died in each other's arms. I ran off and joined them the next day, never looked back.

Name: arya stark
Sentence: You're very good.

Name: lady crane
Sentence: My final speech is shit.

Name: lady crane
Sentence: But to be fair to myself, which I always like to be, the writing's no good.

Name: arya stark
Sentence: So change it. It would all just be farting, belching, and slapping without you.

Name: lady crane
Sentence: How would you change it?

Name: arya stark
Sentence: The queen loves her son more than anything. And he was taken from her before she could say good-bye. She wouldn't just cry. She would be angry. She would want to kill the person who did this to her.

Name: lady crane
Sentence: What's your name?

Name: arya stark
Sentence: Mercy.

Name: lady crane
Sentence: You have very expressive eyes, Mercy.

Name: lady crane
Sentence: Wonderful eyebrows. Do you like pretending to be other people?

Name: arya stark
Sentence: I have to go. My father's waiting for me.

Name: bianca
Sentence: Lady Crane, they loved you.

Name: lady crane
Sentence: They were sweet. Or drunk. Drunkenly sweet.

Name: izembaro
Sentence: No laugh for Nedo s death. These people are worse than animals.

Name: izembaro
Sentence: But they loved her. They all love her.

Name: camello
Sentence: Yes, you are adored by people and animals alike.

Name: lady crane
Sentence: I do what I can with what I'm given.

Name: izembaro
Sentence: With what you're given?

Name: lady crane
Sentence: Well, I was thinking- -

Name: izembaro
Sentence: Oh, we're all thinkers now, are we?

Name: izembaro
Sentence: Full to the tits with ideas.

Name: lady crane
Sentence: I didn't mean- -

Name: izembaro
Sentence: You have ideas, I have ideas, he has ideas. Why should my ideas have any more value than yours simply because I've been doing this my whole life? Who is anyone to judge my work? This is my profession. I know what I'm doing.

Name: izembaro
Sentence: You have no right to an opinion.

Name: arya stark
Sentence: Careful of that one. She wants you dead.

Name: jaqen hghar
Sentence: And?

Name: waif
Sentence: As I expected.

Name: jaqen hghar
Sentence: A shame. A girl had many gifts.

Name: waif
Sentence: You promised me.

Name: jaqen hghar
Sentence: Don't let her suffer.

Name: mace
Sentence: My lord.

Name: jaime lannister
Sentence: My lord.

Name: mace
Sentence: My friends, the hour has come. Madness has overtaken this city and grasped in its claws my children. But now we must drive it back under the rocks whence it came. Madness has had its day!

Name: captain
Sentence: Forward, march!

Name: sparrow
Sentence: Rich or poor, noble or common, if we win, we must atone. Margaery of House Tyrell came to us a sinner. She stood before the gods in the holy sept and lied. She turned a blind eye to her brother's sins. She disgraces her house, the king, and herself.

Name: captain
Sentence: Company, halt! Face front! Turn!

Name: sparrow
Sentence: Lord Tyrell.

Name: sparrow
Sentence: Ser Jaime.

Name: jaime lannister
Sentence: Sorry to interrupt. We're here for Queen Margaery and Ser Loras Tyrell. Give them to us and we'll be on our way.

Name: sparrow
Sentence: I don't have the authority to give them to you. And you don't have the authority to take them.

Name: captain
Sentence: Lock spears!

Name: jaime lannister
Sentence: I speak for King Tommen of House Baratheon, First of His Name.

Name: sparrow
Sentence: The gods don't recognize his authority in this matter.

Name: jaime lannister
Sentence: You already insulted one great house. It won't happen twice. Every last sparrow will die before Margaery walks down that street.

Name: sparrow
Sentence: To die in the service of the gods would please each and every one of us. We yearn for it. But there is no call for it today. There will be no walk of atonement.

Name: captain
Sentence: Order up!

Name: sparrow
Sentence: Queen Margaery has already atoned for her sins by bringing another into the true light of the Seven.

Name: sparrow
Sentence: Together we announce a new age of harmony. A holy alliance between the Crown and the Faith.

Name: woman
Sentence: Long live King Tommen and bless you, Queen Margaery!

Name: tommen lannister
Sentence: The crown and the faith are the twin pillars upon which the world rests. Together we will restore the Seven Kingdoms to glory.

Name: mace
Sentence: What's happening?

Name: olenna tyrell
Sentence: He's beaten us. That's what's happening.

Name: tommen lannister
Sentence: When you attack the Faith, you attack the Crown. Anyone who attacks the Crown is unfit to serve as Lord Commander of the Kingsguard.

Name: jaime lannister
Sentence: I've been a member of the Kingsguard since before you were born. You don't have to do this. You don't have to do anything.

Name: tommen lannister
Sentence: I have to answer to the gods.

Name: jaime lannister
Sentence: Not when you're sitting in that chair.

Name: tommen lannister
Sentence: The Crown's decision on this matter is final.

Name: jaime lannister
Sentence: Will I be walking naked in the streets? Or will I spend a few months in the sept dungeons first to teach me about the gods' mercy?

Name: tommen lannister
Sentence: You have served your house and your king faithfully for many years. And you will continue to do so. But not in this city.

Name: walder
Sentence: You've lost it?

Name: black walder
Sentence: Yes, father.

Name: walder
Sentence: It's a castle, not a bloody sheep. Presumably you still know where it is. You didn't lose Riverrun. You let the Blackfish take it from you.

Name: lothar
Sentence: He surprised us. He knows the castle better than anyone.

Name: walder
Sentence: You did lose the Blackfish after the Red Wedding. You had him right here in this hall and you let him leave. Then when I told you to hunt him down and kill him, you couldn't find him. That's what it means to lose something. Now he's come back and taken Riverrun.

Name: black walder
Sentence: I don't think it's fair to blame us- -

Name: walder
Sentence: For 300 years we kissed Tully boots, swore oaths to them and their stinking fish banners. Not again. Riverrun is ours. Take it back.

Name: black walder
Sentence: We don't have the men.

Name: walder
Sentence: We've got 10 times as many men as the damn Blackfish.

Name: black walder
Sentence: The Mallisters have risen against us. And the Blackwoods.

Name: lothar
Sentence: The Brotherhood Without Banners is rallying the commoners against us, raiding our supply trains and camps.

Name: black walder
Sentence: Riverrun can withstand a siege for a year.

Name: walder
Sentence: If I want excuses, I'll put her in charge. They're laughing at us. All across the Riverlands right down to King's Landing, they're laughing at us.

Name: walder
Sentence: I hear it in my sleep! I'm not dead yet, unfortunately for you. And I'll not leave this world until they all choke on that laughter. Take that castle back.

Name: lothar
Sentence: He'll never yield, Father.

Name: walder
Sentence: Oh, he'll yield.

Name: walder
Sentence: You'll show him the knife you used to kill Robb Stark's child in his whore mother's belly, and you'll show him the knife you used to open his niece's throat. And you'll remind him who it was that got married at the Red Wedding in the first place. His nephew.

Name: walder
Sentence: Cheer up, Lord Edmure. You're going home.

Name: jaime lannister
Sentence: I'm being sent to deal with the Blackfish. Apparently Walder Frey can't manage it on his own because he's 400 years old. Sent me with an army to the Riverlands and a siege that could last months.

Name: cersei lannister
Sentence: BEtter you're elsewhere at the head of an army than in the sept dungeons.

Name: jaime lannister
Sentence: I'm not going to the Riverlands.

Name: cersei lannister
Sentence: What, then?

Name: jaime lannister
Sentence: I'm going to give Bronn the largest bag of gold anyone's ever seen and have him gather the best killers he knows. I'll take them to the sept and I'll remove the High Sparrow's head and every other sparrow head I can find.

Name: cersei lannister
Sentence: You can't.

Name: jaime lannister
Sentence: He has our son! He stole our son! He's torn our family apart. How should we treat people who tear us apart?

Name: cersei lannister
Sentence: We should treat them without mercy and we will. But if you kill the High Sparrow, you won't leave the sept alive. And without you, this is all for nothing. Stand at the head of our army where you belong, where Father wanted you. Show our men where their loyalties belong. Show them what lannisters are, what we do to our enemies. And take that stupid little castle back because it's ours and because you can.

Name: jaime lannister
Sentence: You'll stand trial soon. I need to he here for you.

Name: cersei lannister
Sentence: It will be a trial by combat. I have the Mountain. They've made us both stronger, all of them.

Name: cersei lannister
Sentence: They have no idea how strong we are. No idea what we're going to do to them.

Name: cersei lannister
Sentence: We've always been together. We'll always be together. We're the only two people in the world.

Name: meera
Sentence: Why did you help us?

Name: rider
Sentence: The Three-Eyed Raven sent for me.

Name: meera
Sentence: The Three-Eyed Raven's dead.

Name: rider
Sentence: Now he lives again.

Name: rider
Sentence: When I last saw you, you were a boy. A fearless boy. Loved to climb the castle walls, frighten his mother.

Name: bran stark
Sentence: Who are you?

Name: bran stark
Sentence: Uncle Benjen. The last letter Jon wrote me said you had been lost beyond the Wall.

Name: benjen
Sentence: I led a ranging party deep into the North to find White Walkers. They found us. A white walker stabbed me in the gut with a sword of ice. Left me there to die. To turn. The Children found me. Stopped the walker's magic from taking hold.

Name: bran stark
Sentence: How?

Name: benjen
Sentence: The same way they made the Walkers in the first place. You saw it yourself.

Name: bran stark
Sentence: Dragonglass. A shard of dragonglass plunged into your heart.

Name: benjen
Sentence: You are the Three-Eyed Raven now.

Name: bran stark
Sentence: I didn't have time to learn. I can't control anything.

Name: benjen
Sentence: You must learn to control it before the Night King comes.

Name: benjen
Sentence: Drink.

Name: benjen
Sentence: One way or another, he will find his way to the world of men. When he does, you will be there waiting for him. And you will be ready.

Name: daario
Sentence: Everything all right?

Name: daenerys targaryen
Sentence: How many days' ride to Meereen?

Name: daario
Sentence: A week at best.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Sentence: How many ships will I need to bring my khalasar to Westeros?

Name: daario
Sentence: Dothraki and all their horses, the Unsullied, the Second Sons- - 1,000 ships easily. Probably more.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Sentence: And who has that many?

Name: daario
Sentence: Nobody.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Sentence: Nobody yet.

Name: daario
Sentence: So we ride for Meereen and after that we sail for Westeros. What then?

Name: daenerys targaryen
Sentence: I take what is mine.

Name: daario
Sentence: You weren't made to sit on a chair in a palance.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Sentence: What was I made for?

Name: daario
Sentence: You're a conqueror, Daenerys Stormborn.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Sentence: Wait here.

Name: daario
Sentence: I'm going after her. Wait for me here.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Sentence: Every khal who ever lived chose three blood riders to fight beside him and guard his way. But I am not a khal. I will not choose three blood riders. I choose you all.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Sentence: I will ask more of you than any khal has ever asked of his khalassar! Will you ride the wooden horses across the black salt sea?

Name: daenerys targaryen
Sentence: Will you kill my enemies in their iron suits and tear down their stone houses?

Name: daenerys targaryen
Sentence: Will you give me the Seven Kingdoms, the gift Khal Drogo promised me before the Mother of Mountains?

Name: daenerys targaryen
Sentence: Are you with me?

Name: daenerys targaryen
Sentence: Now and always?

Name: man
Sentence: That's it. Get it to the top.

Name: man
Sentence: Steady. Steady.

Name: ray
Sentence: Up she goes.

Name: ray
Sentence: Hey, come on. Put your back into it, huh?

Name: ray
Sentence: Here you are, son.

Name: ray
Sentence: Oh, gentlemen, please.

Name: ray
Sentence: And you lot, come on. Come on, get it moving. Come on, come on.

Name: ray
Sentence: In all my days I've never seen a man swing an ax like that. How many men did it take to cut you down?

Name: sandor
Sentence: Just one.

Name: ray
Sentence: Ooh. he must have been some kind of monster.

Name: sandor
Sentence: He was a woman.

Name: ray
Sentence: I think some of the men are a bit afraid of you.

Name: sandor
Sentence: I'm used to it.

Name: ray
Sentence: When I found you, I thought you'd been dead for days. The way you were stinking already and you had bugs all over you and bone was coming through right there.

Name: ray
Sentence: I was gonna give you a proper burial and then you coughed. Oh, nearly shit myself. I reckoned you were gonna die by the time I loaded you on the wagon, but you didn't. Now, I reckoned you'd die a dozen more times over the next few days, but you didn't. What kept you going?

Name: sandor
Sentence: Hate.

Name: ray
Sentence: No, there's a reason you're still here.

Name: sandor
Sentence: Aye, there's a reason. I'm a big fucker and I'm tough to kill.

Name: ray
Sentence: No, a reason. Gods aren't done with you yet.

Name: sandor
Sentence: I've heard that before. Man was talking about a different god, though.

Name: ray
Sentence: Well, maybe he was right. I don't know much about the gods.

Name: sandor
Sentence: You're in the wrong line of work.

Name: ray
Sentence: Oh, there's plenty of pious sons of bitches who think they know the word of god or gods. I don't. I don't even know their real names. Maybe it is the Seven. Or maybe it's the old gods. Or maybe it's the Lord of Light. Or maybe they're all the same fucking thing. I don't know. What matters, I believe, is that there's something greater than us. And whatever it is, it's got plans for Sandor Clegane.

Name: sandor
Sentence: You didn't know me back in my time. You don't know the things I've done.

Name: ray
Sentence: I've heard stories.

Name: sandor
Sentence: If the gods are real...why haven't they punished me?

Name: ray
Sentence: They have.

Name: sparrow
Sentence: Your Grace. What are we reading today?

Name: margaery tyrell
Sentence: The Book of the Mother, Your Holiness. Chapter three, verse 12.

Name: sparrow
Sentence: Ah, “As water rounds the stones, smoothing- -”

Name: margaery tyrell
Sentence: Smoothing what was jagged, so does a woman's love calm a man's brute nature. A wife salves her husbando s wounds, a mother sings her son to sleep.”

Name: sparrow
Sentence: You learn quickly. There are some who know every verse of the sacred text, but don't have a drop of the Mother's mercy in their blood and savages who can't read at all who understand the Father's wisdom.

Name: margaery tyrell
Sentence: For year I pretended to love the poor, the afflicted. I had pity for them, but I never loved them. They disgusted me.

Name: sparrow
Sentence: They are hard to love.

Name: sparrow
Sentence: The poor disgust us because they are us, shorn of our illusions. They show us what we'd look like without our fine clothes. How'd we smell without perfume.

Name: sparrow
Sentence: Can I ask you about a personal matter?

Name: margaery tyrell
Sentence: Of course.

Name: sparrow
Sentence: The king mentioned that since your reunion, you haven't joined him in the marriage bed.

Name: margaery tyrell
Sentence: No.

Name: sparrow
Sentence: You have a duty, Your Grace. To your husband, your king, your country, to the gods themselves.

Name: margaery tyrell
Sentence: It's just...the desires that once drove me no longer do.

Name: sparrow
Sentence: Congress does not require desire on the woman's part, only patience. The king must have an heir if we are to continue our good work.

Name: margaery tyrell
Sentence: Forgive me. Sometimes the truth path is hard to find.

Name: sparrow
Sentence: Hard to find and harder still to walk upon. But you've made great progress. I only pray your grandmother follows your lead.

Name: margaery tyrell
Sentence: My grandmother?

Name: sparrow
Sentence: Yes. The Queen of Thorns is a remarkable woman, a strong woman, and an unrepentant sinner. You must teach her the new way as she taught you the old. Or I fear for her safety, body and soul.

Name: olenna tyrell

Name: beric
Sentence: We gave you two of the three out of respect for your loss. That's generous.

Name: sandor
Sentence: Bunch of nancies.

Sentence: There was a time I would have killed all seven of you just to gut these three.

Sentence: You're getting old, Clegane.

Name: sandor
Sentence: He's not.

Name: sandor

Name: thoros
Sentence: Enjoying yourself?

Name: sandor
Sentence: I prefer chicken.

Name: beric
Sentence: You ought to join us. We could use you.

Name: sandor
Sentence: I tried joining. Didn't work out for me.

Name: thoros
Sentence: Clegane, we're here for a reason. The Lord of Light is keeping Beric alive for a reason. He gave a failed, drunk priest the power to bring him back for a reason. We are part of something larger than ourselves.

Name: sandor

Name: beric
Sentence: Cold winds are rising in the North.

Name: sandor
Sentence: And you're going to go stop them?

Name: beric
Sentence: We need good men to help us.

Name: sandor
Sentence: Last time you saw me, you wanted to execute me.

Name: beric
Sentence: True enough. But the Lord of Light gave you the power to defeat me. Why?

Name: sandor
Sentence: I beat you because I'm better than you, Beric. I was better than you before you started yammering on about the Lord and I'm better than you now.

Name: beric
Sentence: Aye, you're probably right. You're a fighter. You were born a fighter. You walked away from the fight. How did that go? Good and bad, young and old, the things we're fighting will destroy them all alike. You can still help a lot more than you've harmed Clegane, it's not too late for you.

Name: arya stark
Sentence: Lady Crane?

Name: waif
Sentence: If you'd have done your job, she would have died painlessly.

Name: waif
Sentence: Instead…

Name: waif
Sentence: The Many-Faced God was promised a name. He must always receive what is his. You can't change that. I can't change that. No one can. And now he's been promised another name.

Name: waif
Sentence: It will all be over soon. On your knees or on your feet?

Name: waif
Sentence: Haven't we been through this already? That won't help you.

Name: arya stark
Sentence: You told her to kill me.

Name: jaqen hghar
Sentence: Yes. But here you are. And there she is.

Name: jaqen hghar
Sentence: Finally a girl is no one.

Name: arya stark
Sentence: A girl is Arya Stark of Winterfell and I'm going home.

Name: tyrion lannister
Sentence: Despite appearances, I think you'll find the city's on the rise.

Name: tyrion lannister
Sentence: Perhaps we should take shelter.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Sentence: The city is on the rise?

Name: tyrion lannister
Sentence: Meereen is strong. Commerce has returned to the markets. The people are behind you.

Name: tyrion lannister
Sentence: Well, not all the people, of course. No ruler that ever lived had the support of all the people. But the rebirth of Meereen is the cause of this violence. The Masters cannot let Meereen succeed. Because if Meereen succeeds, a city without slavery, a city without Masters…

Name: tyrion lannister
Sentence: it proves that no one needs a Master.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Sentence: Good. Shall we begin?

Name: tyrion lannister
Sentence: Do we have a plan?

Name: daenerys targaryen
Sentence: I will crucify the Masters. I will set their fleets afire, kill every last one of their soldiers, and return their cities to the dirt. That is my plan.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Sentence: You don't approve?

Name: tyrion lannister
Sentence: You once told me you knew what your father was. Did you know his plans for King's Landing when the Lannister armies were at his gates?

Name: tyrion lannister
Sentence: Probably not. Well, he told my brother and Jaime told me. He had caches of wildfire hidden under the Red Keep, the Guildhalls, the Sept of Baelor, all the major thoroughfares. He would have burned every one of his citizens. The loyal ones and the trators. Every man, woman, and child. That's why Jaime killed him.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Sentence: This is entirely different.

Name: tyrion lannister
Sentence: You're talking about destroying cities. It's not entirely different. I'd like to suggest an alternate approach.

Name: razdal
Sentence: Once before, I offered you peace. If you had not been so arrogant, you could have returned to your homeland with a fleet of ships. Instead, you will flee Slaver's Bay on foot like the beggar queen you are.

Name: tyrion lannister
Sentence: We are here to discuss terms of surrender, not to trade insults.

Name: yezzan
Sentence: The terms are simple. You and your foreign friends will abandon the Great Pyramid and the city of Meereen. The Unsullied you stole from Kraznys mo Nakloz will remain to be sold again to the highest bidder. The translator you stole from Kraznys mo Nakloz will remain to be sold again to the highest bidder. The dragons beneath the Great Pyramid will be slaughtered.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Sentence: We obviously didn't communicate clearly. We're here to discuss your surrender, not mine.

Name: razdal
Sentence: I imagine it's difficult adjust to the new reality. Your reign is over.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Sentence: My reign has just begun.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Sentence: Dracarys.

Name: grey worm
Sentence: You men have a choice

Name: grey worm
Sentence: fight and die for the masters who would never fight and die for you, or go home to your families.

Name: tyrion lannister
Sentence: Thank you for the armada. Our queen does love ships. Now, last time we spoke, we made a pact. You violated that pact. You declared war upon us. Though our queen does have a forgiving nature, this cannot be forgiven.

Name: missandei
Sentence: Our queen insists that one of you must die as punishment for your crimes.

Name: tyrion lannister
Sentence: It always seems a bit abstract, doesn't it, other people dying?

Name: razdal
Sentence: Him. He should die.

Name: belicho
Sentence: Yes, him.

Name: razdal
Sentence: He's not one of us. He's an outsider, a lowborn. He does not speak for us.

Sentence: Please.

Name: tyrion lannister
Sentence: Tell your people what happened here. Tell them you live by the grace of Her Majesty. When they come forward with notions of retribution or ideas about returning the slave cities to their former glory, remind the what happened when Daenerys Stormborn and her dragons came to Meereen.

Sentence: You don't have to be here.

Name: sansa stark
Sentence: Yes, I do.

Name: ramsay bolton

Sentence: Thank you for returning Lady Bolton safely. Now, dismount and kneel before me, surrender your army and proclaim me the true Lord of Winterfell and Warden of the North. I will pardon you for deserting the Night's Watch. I will pardon these treasonous lords for betraying my house. Come, bastard, you don't have the men, you don't have the horses, and you don't have Winterfell. Why lead those pour souls into slaughter? There's no need for a battle. Get off your hose and kneel. I'm a man of mercy.

Name: jon snow
Sentence: You're right. There's no need for a battle. Thousands of men don't need to die. Only one of us. Let's end this the old way. You against me.

Name: ramsay bolton
Sentence: I keep hearing stories about you, bastard. The way people in the North talk about you, you're the greatest swordsman who ever walked. Maybe you are that good. Maybe not. I don't know if I'd beat you. But I know that my army will beat yours. I have 6,000 men. You have, what, half that? Not even?

Sentence: Aye, you have the numbers. Will your men want to fight for you when they hear you wouldn't fight for them?

Name: ramsay bolton

Name: sansa stark
Sentence: You're going to die tomorrow, Lord Bolton. Sleep well.

Sentence: She's a fine woman, your sister. I look forward to having her back in my bed. And you're all fine-looking men. My dogs are desperate to meet you. I haven't fed them for seven days. They're ravenous. I wonder which parts they'll try first. Your eyes? Your balls? We'll find out soon enough. In the morning, then, bastard.

Sentence: If he was smart, he'd stay inside the walls of Winterfell and wait us out.

Sentence: That's not his way. He knows the North is watching. If the other houses sense weakness on his part, they'll stop fearing him. He can't have that. Fear is his power.

Sentence: It's not his men that worry me. It's his horses. I know what mounted knights can do to us.

Name: tormund
Sentence: You and Stannis cut through us like piss through snow.

Sentence: We're digging trenches all along our flanks. They won't be able to hit us the way that Stannis hit you, in a double envelopment.

Name: tormund
Sentence: stares blankly at JON SNOW.

Name: jon snow
Sentence: A pincer move.

Name: jon snow
Sentence: They won't be able to hit us from the sides.

Name: tormund
Sentence: Good.

Sentence: It's crucial that we let them charge at us. They've got the numbers, we need the patience. If we let him buckle our center, he'll pursue. Then we'll have him surrounded on three sides.

Name: tormund
Sentence: Did you really think that cunt would fight you man to man?

Sentence: No. But I wanted to make him angry. I want him coming at us full tilt.

Sentence: We should all get some sleep.

Name: tormund
Sentence: Rest, Jon Snow. We need you sharp tomorrow.

Sentence: So you've met the enemy, drawn up your battle plans.

Sentence: Aye, for what they're worth.

Name: sansa stark
Sentence: You've known him for the space of a single conversation, you and your trusted advisors, and you sit around and make your plans on how to defeat a man you don't know. I lived with him. I know the way his mind works. I know how he likes to hurt people. Did it ever once occur to you that I might have some insight?

Name: jon snow
Sentence: You're right.

Name: sansa stark
Sentence: You think he's going to fall into your trap. He won't He's the one who lays traps.

Name: jon snow

Name: sansa stark
Sentence: You don't know him.

Name: jon snow
Sentence: All right, tell me. What should we do? How do we get Rickon back?

Name: sansa stark
Sentence: We'll never get him back. Rickon is Ned Starks trueborn son, which makes him a greater threat to Ramsay than you, a bastard, or me, a girl. As long as he lives, Ramsay's claim to Winterfell will be contested, which means he won't live long.

Sentence: We can't give up on our brother.

Sentence: Listen to me, please. He wants you to make a mistake.

Name: sansa stark

Name: jon snow
Sentence: Now, it's not enough! It's what we have! Battles have been won against greater odds.

Name: jon snow
Sentence: SNOW I won't ever let him touch you again. I'll protect you, I promise.

Name: davos
Sentence: You think there's hope?

Sentence: I've never seen these Bolton fuckers fight. And they've never seen the free folk fight, so, yes, there's hope. You want to avenge your king, don't you?

Sentence: It wasn't the Boltons defeated Stannis. It was Stannis himself. I loved the man. He lifted me up and made me something. But he had demons in his skull whispering foul things.

Sentence: You saw these demons?

Name: davos
Sentence: What?

Name: davos
Sentence: No, it's a manner of speaking. Not actual demons.

Name: tormund
Sentence: Oh. Well, you loved that cunt Stannis and I loved the man he burned. Mance didn't have demons in his skull. He didn't torch people or listen to some red witch. I believed in him. I thought he was the man to lead us through the Long Night. But I was wrong just like you.

Sentence: Maybe that was our mistake, believing in kings.

Name: tormund
Sentence: Jon Snow's not a king.

Name: davos
Sentence: No, he's not.

Sentence: I serve the Lord of Light. I do what he commands.

Sentence: I interpret his signs as well as I can. If the Lord didn't want me to bring you back, how did I bring you back? I have no power. Only what he gives me and he gave me you.

Name: jon snow

Name: melisandre
Sentence: I don't know. Maybe you're only needed for this small part of his plan and nothing else. Maybe he brought you here to die again.

Name: melisandre
Sentence: The one we've got.

Name: tyrion lannister
Sentence: Last time we saw each other was at Winterfell, yes? You were making jokes about my height, I seem to recall. Everyone who makes a joke about a dwarf's height thinks he's the only person ever to make a joke about a dwarf's height. “The height of nobility,” “a man of your stature,” “someone to look up to.” You're all making the same five or six jokes.

Name: theon greyjoy
Sentence: It was a long time ago.

Name: tyrion lannister
Sentence: It was. And how have things been going for you since then? Not so well, I gather. Can't imagine you would have murdered the Stark boys if things had been going well.

Name: yara greyjoy
Sentence: And he paid for them.

Name: tyrion lannister
Sentence: Doesn't seem like it. He's still alive. It was complicated for you, I'm sure, growing up at Winterfell. Never quite knowing who you were. But then, we all live complicated lives, don't we?

Sentence: You've brought us 100 ships from the Iron Fleet with men to sail them. In return, I expect you want me to support your claim to the throne of the Iron Islands?

Sentence: Not my claim. Hers.

Sentence: And what's wrong with you?

Sentence: I'm not fit to rule.

Sentence: We can agree upon that at least.

Sentence: Has the Iron Islands ever had a queen before?

Sentence: No more than Westeros.

Sentence: Our Uncle Euron returned home after a long absence. He murdered our father and took the Salt Throne from yara. He would have murdered us if we had stayed.

Sentence: Lord Tyrion tells me your father was a terrible king.

Name: yara greyjoy
Sentence: You and I have that in common.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Sentence: We do. And both murdered by a usurper as well.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Sentence: Will their ships be enough?

Name: tyrion lannister
Sentence: With the former Masters' fleet, possibly. Barely. There are more than 100 ships in the Iron Fleet.

Name: theon greyjoy
Sentence: There are and Euron is building more. He's going to offer them to you.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Sentence: So why shouldn't I wait for him?

Sentence: The Iron Fleet isn't all he's bringing. He also wants to give you --

Name: yara greyjoy
Sentence: His big cock, I think he said. Euron's offer is also an offer of marriage, you see. You won't get one without the other.

Sentence: And I imagine your offer is free of any marriage demands?

Name: yara greyjoy
Sentence: I never demand, but I'm up for anything, really.

Name: theon greyjoy
Sentence: He murdered our father and would have murdered us. He'll murder you as soon as you have what he wants.

Name: tyrion lannister
Sentence: The Seven Kingdoms.

Name: theon greyjoy
Sentence: All of them.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Sentence: And you don't want the Seven Kingdoms?

Sentence: Your ancestors defeated ours and took the Iron Islands. We ask you to give them back.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Sentence: And that's all?

Name: yara greyjoy
Sentence: We'd like you to help us murder an uncle or two who don't think a woman's fit to rule.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Sentence: Reasonable.

Name: tyrion lannister
Sentence: What if everyone starts demanding their independence?

Name: daenerys targaryen
Sentence: She's not demanding, she's asking. The others are free to ask as well. Our father were evil men, all of us here. They left the world worse than they found it. We're not going to do that. We're going to leave the world better than we found it.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Sentence: You will support my claim as queen of the Seven Kingdoms and respect the integrity of the Seven Kingdoms. No more reaving, roving, raiding, or raping.

Name: yara greyjoy
Sentence: That's our way of life.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Sentence: No more.

Name: yara greyjoy
Sentence: No more.

Sentence: I've reconsidered. I think that sounds like a wonderful idea.

Sentence: Where is he?

Sentence: Ah. Sansa. Hello, Sansa. Is this where I'll be staying now? No. Our time together is about to come to an end. That's all right. You can't kill me. I'm part of you now.

Sentence: Your words will disappear. Your house will disappear. Your name will disappear. All memory of you will disappear.

Sentence: My hounds will never harm me.

Sentence: They're loyal beasts.

Sentence: Sit. Down! Down! Down! Down! Down!

Sentence: You got my money?

Sentence: Later. Go away.

Name: girl
Sentence: Grand Maester.

Name: sparrow
Sentence: Ser Loras Tyrell. Are you prepared to stand trial and profess your guilt or innocence before the Seven?

Name: loras
Sentence: There'll be no need for a trial. I confess before the Seven and freely admit to my crimes.

Name: sparrow
Sentence: To which crimes will you be confessing?

Name: loras
Sentence: All of them. I lay with other men including the traitor Renly Baratheon.

Name: loras
Sentence: I perjured myself before the gods. I am guilty of depravity… dishonesty, profligacy, and arrogance. I see that now. I humble myself before the Seven and accept whatever punishment the gods deem just.

Name: sparrow
Sentence: The gods' judgment is fierce, but also fair. The Warrior punishes those who believe themselves beyond the reach of justice. But the Mother shows her mercy to those who kneel before her.

Name: loras
Sentence: I take full responsibility for my many sins and unburden myself of my desires. My only remaining wish is to devote my life to the Seven. May I be a living example of their grace for others to witness.

Name: sparrow
Sentence: You understand fully what this means?

Name: loras
Sentence: I do. I will abandon the Tyrell name and all that goes with it. I will renounce my lordship and my claims on Highgarden. I will never marry and I will never father children.

Sentence: I will.

Sentence: What's the meaning of this? I was told that-- I have more important things to do with my time than waste them in the presence--

Sentence: Please, Grand Maester. I bear you no ill will. Please forgive me if you can.

Name: qyburn
Sentence: This pains me, my lord. Whatever your faults, you do not deserve to die alone in such a cold, dark place. But sometimes before we can usher in the new, the old must be put to rest.

Sentence: The longer you wait, the worse it'll be for you.

Name: lancel
Sentence: What are you doing?

Sentence: There's something wrong.

Sentence: Cersei is not here. Tommen is not here. Why do you think they are not here?

Name: sparrow
Sentence: If the accused is not here, she will be tried regardless. We cannot escape the justice of the gods--

Name: margaery tyrell
Sentence: Forget about the bloody gods and listen to what I'm telling you. Cersei understands the consequences of her absence and she is absent anyway, which means she does not intend to suffer those consequences. The trial can wait. We all need to leave.

Sentence: We all need to leave now!

Name: margaery tyrell
Sentence: Loras. Stay with me.

Sentence: Let me through. Let me through. Get out of my way.

Sentence: Let us through!

Sentence: Confess. Confess.

Sentence: No.

Name: cersei lannister
