Name: cersei lannister
Sentence: Confess. It felt good. Beating me, starving me, frightening me, humiliating me. You didn't do it because you cared about my atonement. You did it because it felt good. I understand. I do things because they feel good. I drink because it feels good. I killed my husband because it felt good to be rid of him. I fuck my brother because it feels good to feel him inside me. I lie about fucking my brother… because it feels good to keep our son safe from hateful hypocrites. I killed your High Sparrow… and all his little sparrows… all his septons, all his septas, all his filthy soldiers, because it felt good to watch them burn. It felt good to imagine their shock and their pain. No thought has ever given me greater joy. Even confessing feels good under the right circumstances.

Name: cersei lannister
Sentence: You've always been quiet.

Name: cersei lannister
Sentence: I said my face would be the last thing you saw before you died. Do you remember?

Name: septa unella
Sentence: Good. I'm glad to see your face. I'm ready to meet the gods.

Name: cersei lannister
Sentence: What? Now? Today? You're not going to die today. You're not going to die for quite a while. Ser Gregor.

Name: cersei lannister
Sentence: This is Ser Gregor Clegane. He's quiet, too.

Name: cersei lannister
Sentence: Your gods have forsaken you. This is your god now.

Name: cersei lannister
Sentence: Shame.

Name: attendant
Sentence: I'm very sorry, Your Grace. Very sorry.

Name: walder
Sentence: For House Lannister!

Name: men
Sentence: Hear me roar!

Name: walder
Sentence: For House Frey!

Name: men
Sentence: We stand together!

Name: walder
Sentence: May we stand together through the centuries, good friends to the last.

Name: walder
Sentence: And when we drive our swords through our enemies' hearts, may we speak the words of our alliance, “The Freys and the Lannisters send their regards.”

Name: bronn
Sentence: You don't even have to do anything, do you?

Name: bronn
Sentence: You just sit there, a rich slab of beef, and all the birds come pecking.

Name: jaime lannister
Sentence: You're welcome to her.

Name: bronn
Sentence: She doesn't want me. She wants your golden fingers up her twat.

Name: jaime lannister
Sentence: Those two have their eyes on you.

Name: bronn
Sentence: They have their eyes on you, cunt.

Name: jaime lannister
Sentence: Not my type.

Name: bronn
Sentence: Not blonde enough?

Name: jaime lannister
Sentence: Ladies, have you met Ser Bronn of the Blackwater, hero of the Battle of Blackwater Bay.

Name: jaime lannister
Sentence: There you go.

Name: bronn
Sentence: Maybe I'm not in the mood.

Name: bronn
Sentence: Fuck it.

Name: bronn
Sentence: No need to call me ser just because I'm an anointed knight.

Name: walder
Sentence: This came together rather well. Your father would be pleased.

Name: jaime lannister
Sentence: I'm sure he would be.

Name: walder
Sentence: Edmure is back in a cell. Can't go killing my son by law. It wouldn't be right. Give the family a bad name.

Name: walder
Sentence: So the famous Blackfish killed by footsoldiers, eh? Legendary warrior, everyone said.

Name: jaime lannister
Sentence: Have you done much fighting yourself, Lord Frey?

Name: walder
Sentence: I'm a bit old for all that.

Name: jaime lannister
Sentence: No, but back in your day.

Name: walder
Sentence: The purpose of fighting is defeating your enemies, isn't it?

Name: walder
Sentence: I've defeated mine. Riverrun belonged to House Tully for a thousand years. Now it's mine. What do you call that? Victory.

Name: jaime lannister
Sentence: Yes, you're a great conqueror.

Name: walder
Sentence: Go on, mock me, boy. You think I mind? The Tullys mocked me for years. The Starks mocked me. Where are they now? You talk about war as if you're an expert but the one battle I remember you fighting, you were captured by Robb Stark, the Young Wolf. But it doesn't matter. Here we are now, two kingslayers. We know what it's like to have them grovel to our faces and snigger behind our backs. We don't mind, do we? Fear is a marvelous thing.

Name: jaime lannister
Sentence: They don't fear the Freys, though. They fear the Lannisters. We gave you the Riverlands to hold the Riverlands. If we have to ride north and take them back for you every time you lose them, why do we need you?

Name: cersei lannister
Sentence: Show me.

Name: qyburn
Sentence: Your Grace, there's no need--

Name: qyburn
Sentence: What are your thoughts concerning the king's funeral? As the Sept of Baelor is no longer an option, perhaps a ceremony in the throne room?

Name: cersei lannister
Sentence: He should be with his grandfather, his brother, his sister. Burn him and bury his ashes where the sept once stood.

Name: sam
Sentence: Hello.

Name: sam
Sentence: From Lord Commander Snow at Castle Black.

Name: sam
Sentence: I'm-- I'm to be the new maester.

Name: maester
Sentence: Oh.

Name: maester
Sentence: According to our records, Jeor Mormont is Lord Commander.

Name: sam
Sentence: He died.

Name: maester
Sentence: We received no report from the maester at Castle Black.

Name: sam
Sentence: Maester Aemon became quite ill shortly after the election. He's since passed away. Which is why I'm here.

Name: maester
Sentence: This is irregular.

Name: sam
Sentence: Yes, well, I suppose that life is irregular.

Name: maester
Sentence: The archmaester will discuss these irregularities with you. In the meantime, you are permitted to use the library. Follow me.

Name: maester
Sentence: No women or children!

Name: jon snow
Sentence: When we had feasts, our family would sit up here… and I'd sit down there.

Name: melisandre
Sentence: Could have been worse, Jon Snow. You had a family. You had feasts.

Name: jon snow
Sentence: Aye, you're right. I was luckier than most.

Name: jon snow
Sentence: What is that?

Name: davos
Sentence: Tell him. Tell him who it belonged to.

Name: melisandre
Sentence: The Princess Shireen.

Name: davos
Sentence: Tell him what you did to her. Tell him!

Name: melisandre
Sentence: We burned her at the stake.

Name: davos
Sentence: Why?

Name: melisandre
Sentence: The army was trapped. The horses were dying. It was the only way.

Name: davos
Sentence: You burned a little girl alive!

Name: melisandre
Sentence: I only do what my Lord commands!

Name: davos
Sentence: If he commands you to burn children, your Lord is evil!

Name: melisandre
Sentence: We are standing here because of him. Jon Snow is alive because the Lord willed it.

Name: davos
Sentence: I loved that girl like she was my own. She was good. She was kind. And you killed her!

Name: melisandre
Sentence: So did her father. So did her mother. Her own blood knew it was the only way.

Name: davos
Sentence: The only way for what? They all died anyway! You told everyone Stannis was the one. You had him believing it, all of them fooled. And you lied.

Name: melisandre
Sentence: I didn't lie. I was wrong.

Name: davos
Sentence: Aye, you were wrong. How many died because you were wrong?

Name: davos
Sentence: I ask your leave to execute this woman for murder. She admits to the crime.

Name: jon snow
Sentence: Do you have anything to say for yourself?

Name: melisandre
Sentence: I've been ready to die for many years. If the Lord was done with me, so be it, but he's not. You've seen the Night King, Jon Snow. You know the great war is still to come. You know the army of the dead will be upon us soon. And you know I can help you win that war.

Name: jon snow
Sentence: Ride south today. If you return to the North, I'll have you hanged as a murderer.

Name: davos
Sentence: If you ever come back this way, I will execute you myself.

Name: jon snow
Sentence: I'm having the lordo s chamber prepared for you.

Name: sansa stark
Sentence: Mother and Father's room? You should take it.

Name: jon snow
Sentence: I'm not a Stark.

Name: sansa stark
Sentence: You are to me.

Name: jon snow
Sentence: You're the Lady of Winterfell. You deserve it. We're standing here because of you. The battle was lost until the Knights of the Vale rode in. They came because of you. You told me Lord Baelish sold you to the Boltons.

Name: sansa stark
Sentence: He did.

Name: jon snow
Sentence: And you trust him?

Name: sansa stark
Sentence: Only a fool would trust Littlefinger. I should have told you about him, about the Knights of the Vale. I'm sorry.

Name: jon snow
Sentence: We need to trust each other. We can't fight a war amongst ourselves. We have so many enemies now.

Name: sansa stark
Sentence: Jon.

Name: sansa stark
Sentence: A raven came from the Citadel. A white raven. Winter is here.

Name: jon snow
Sentence: Well, Father always promised, didn't he?

Name: olenna tyrell
Sentence: The last time a Tyrell came to Dorne, he was assassinated. 100 red scorpions, was it?

Name: ellaria
Sentence: You have nothing to fear from us, Lady Olenna.

Name: olenna tyrell
Sentence: You murder your own prince, but you expect me to trust you?

Name: obara
Sentence: We invited you to Dorne because we needed your help. You came to Dorne because you needed our help?

Name: olenna tyrell
Sentence: What is your name again? Barbaro?

Name: obara
Sentence: Obara.

Name: olenna tyrell
Sentence: Obara. You look like an angry little boy. Don't presume to tell me what I need.

Name: nymeria
Sentence: Forgive my sister. What she lacks in diplomacy, she makes--

Name: olenna tyrell
Sentence: Do shut up, dear.

Name: olenna tyrell
Sentence: Anything from you?

Name: olenna tyrell
Sentence: No? Good. Let the grown women speak.

Name: ellaria
Sentence: The Lannisters have declared war on House Tyrell. They have declared war on Dorne. We must be allies now if we wish to survive.

Name: olenna tyrell
Sentence: Cersei stole the future from me. She killed my son. She killed my grandson. She killed my granddaughter. Survival is not what I'm after now.

Name: ellaria
Sentence: You're absolutely right. I chose the wrong words. It is not survival I offer. It is your heart's desire.

Name: olenna tyrell
Sentence: And what is my heart's desire?

Name: ellaria
Sentence: Vengeance. Justice.

Name: varys
Sentence: Fire and blood.

Name: daario
Sentence: Your ships are nearly ready. I saw them painting the sails.

Name: daario
Sentence: I'm curious to see how the Dothraki do on the poison water.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Sentence: You're not coming with us.

Name: daario
Sentence: New strategy? You want the Second Sons to attack from the west coast? If we take Casterly Rock, the Lannisters will have nowhere to run when you hit King's Landing.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Sentence: You're not going to Westeros. You're staying here with the Second Sons. There's finally peace in Meereen. You will keep the peace while the people choose their own leaders.

Name: daario
Sentence: Fuck Meereen. Fuck the people. I'm here for you, not them.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Sentence: You promised me. “My sword is yours. My life is yours.” This is what I command. If I'm going to rule in Westeros, I'll need to make alliances. The best way to make alliances is with marriage.

Name: daario
Sentence: Who are you marrying this time?

Name: daenerys targaryen
Sentence: I don't know. Maybe no one.

Name: daario
Sentence: But you need to lure all the noble houses to the table? Are you a queen or fish bait?

Name: daenerys targaryen
Sentence: I can't bring a lover to Westeros.

Name: daario
Sentence: A king wouldn't think twice about it.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Sentence: So that's what you want? To be my mistress?

Name: daario
Sentence: I'm not proud. I don't care what perfumed aristocrat sits beside you in the throne room. I don't want a crown. I want you.

Name: daario
Sentence: I love you. And I make you happy. You know I do. Bring me with you. Let me fight for you.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Sentence: I can't.

Name: daario
Sentence: The dwarf told you to do this.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Sentence: No one tells me to do anything.

Name: daario
Sentence: Clever fellow. Can't argue with his logic. I'm no use to you over there.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Sentence: Don't get angry.

Name: daario
Sentence: I'm not angry. I'm full of self-pity. Who comes after you? Who can ever follow Daenerys Stormborn, the Mother of Dragons?

Name: daenerys targaryen
Sentence: A great number of women, I imagine. Specific orders will be left for you regarding the welfare of Meereen and the Bay of Dragons.

Name: daario
Sentence: Bay of Dragons?

Name: daenerys targaryen
Sentence: We can't call it Slaver's Bay anymore, can we?

Name: daario
Sentence: You'll get that throne you want so badly, I'm sure of it. I hope it brings you happiness.

Name: daario
Sentence: I pity the lord of Westeros. They have no idea what's coming for them.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Sentence: Farewell, Daario Naharis.

Name: tyrion lannister
Sentence: How did he take it?

Name: daenerys targaryen
Sentence: No tears.

Name: tyrion lannister
Sentence: I know it was hard for you. You turned away a man who truly loves you because he would have been a liability in the Seven Kingdoms. That's the kind of self-sacrifice that makes for a good ruler, if it's any consolation.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Sentence: It's not.

Name: tyrion lannister
Sentence: No, I suppose not. I'm terrible at consoling.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Sentence: Yes, you really are.

Name: tyrion lannister
Sentence: All right, how about the fact that this is actually happening? You have your armies, you have your ships, you have your dragons. Everything you've ever wanted since you were old enough to want anything. It's all yours for the taking. Are you afraid?

Name: tyrion lannister
Sentence: Good. You're in the great game now. And the great game's terrifying. The only people who aren't afraid of failure are madmen like your father.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Sentence: Do you know what frightens me? I said farewell to a man who loves me. A man I thought I cared for. And I felt nothing. Just impatient to get on with it.

Name: tyrion lannister
Sentence: He wasn't the first to love you and he won't be the last.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Sentence: Well, you have completely failed to console me.

Name: tyrion lannister
Sentence: For what it's worth, I've been a cynic for as long as I can remember. Everyone's always asking me to believe in things-- family, gods, kings, myself. It was often tempting until I saw where belief got people. So I said no, thank you to belief. And yet here I am.

Name: tyrion lannister
Sentence: I believe in you. It's embarrassing, really. I'd swear you my sword, but I don't actually own a sword.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Sentence: It's your counsel I need.

Name: tyrion lannister
Sentence: It's yours. Now and always.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Sentence: Good. I, um… I had something made for you. I'm not sure if it's right.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Sentence: Tyrion Lannister, I name you Hand of the Queen.

Name: walder
Sentence: You're not one of mine, are you?

Name: handmaiden
Sentence: No, my lord.

Name: walder
Sentence: Didn't think so. Too pretty.

Name: walder
Sentence: Where are my damn moron sons? Black Walder and Lothar promised to be here by midday.

Name: handmaiden
Sentence: They're here, my lord.

Name: walder
Sentence: Well, what are they doing, trimming their cunt hairs? Tell them to come here now.

Name: handmaiden
Sentence: But they're already here, my lord.

Name: handmaiden
Sentence: Here, my lord.

Name: handmaiden
Sentence: They weren't easy to carve. Especially Black Walder.

Name: walder
Sentence: What…

Name: arya stark
Sentence: My name is Arya Stark. I want you to know that. The last thing you're ever going to see is a Stark smiling down at you as you die.

Name: petyr
Sentence: Forgive me, my lady… if you're at prayer.

Name: sansa stark
Sentence: I'm done with all that. I came here every day when I was a girl. I prayed to be somewhere else. Back then I only ever thought about what I wanted, never about what I had.

Name: sansa stark
Sentence: I was a stupid girl.

Name: petyr
Sentence: You were a child.

Name: sansa stark
Sentence: What do you want?

Name: petyr
Sentence: I thought you knew what I wanted.

Name: sansa stark
Sentence: I was wrong.

Name: petyr
Sentence: No, you weren't. Every time I'm faced with a decision, I close my eyes and see the same picture. Whenever I consider an action, I ask myself will this action help to make this picture a reality? Pull it out of my mind and into the world? And I only act if the answer is yes. A picture of me on the Iron Throne… and you by my side.

Name: sansa stark
Sentence: It's a pretty picture.

Name: petyr
Sentence: News of this battle will spread quickly through the Seven Kingdoms. I've declared for House Stark for all to hear.

Name: sansa stark
Sentence: You've declared for other houses before, Lord Baelish. It's never stopped you from serving yourself.

Name: petyr
Sentence: The past is gone for good. You can sit here mourning its departure or you can prepare for the future. You, my love, are the future of House Stark. Who should the North rally behind? A trueborn daughter of Ned and Catelyn Stark born here at Winterfell or a motherless bastard born in the south?

Name: benjen
Sentence: This is where I leave you.

Name: meera
Sentence: You're not coming with us?

Name: benjen
Sentence: The Wall is not just ice and stone. Ancient spells were carved into its foundations. Strong magic to protect men from what lies beyond. And while it stands, the dead cannot pass. I cannot pass.

Name: meera
Sentence: Where will you go?

Name: benjen
Sentence: The great war is coming and I still fight for the living. I'll do what I can… as long as I can.

Name: bran stark
Sentence: Thank you, Uncle Benjen.

Name: benjen
Sentence: I wish you both good fortune.

Name: meera
Sentence: Are you sure you're ready for this?

Name: bran stark
Sentence: I'm the Three-Eyed Raven now. I have to be ready for this.

Name: lyanna
Sentence: Ned?

Name: eddard stark
Sentence: Lyanna.

Name: lyanna
Sentence: Is that you? Is that really you?

Name: lyanna
Sentence: You're not a dream.

Name: eddard stark
Sentence: No, I'm not a dream. I'm here. Right here.

Name: lyanna
Sentence: I've missed you, big brother.

Name: eddard stark
Sentence: I've missed you, too.

Name: lyanna
Sentence: I want to be brave.

Name: eddard stark
Sentence: Shh. You are.

Name: lyanna
Sentence: I'm not.

Name: lyanna
Sentence: I don't want to die.

Name: eddard stark
Sentence: You're not going to die.

Name: eddard stark
Sentence: Get her some water!

Name: lyanna
Sentence: No, no water.

Name: eddard stark
Sentence: Is there a maester?

Name: lyanna
Sentence: Please. Listen to me, Ned.

Name: lyanna
Sentence: If Robert finds out, he'll kill him, you know he will. You have to protect him. Promise me, Ned. Promise me.

Name: lyanna
Sentence: Promise me, Ned. Promise me.

Name: vale knight
Sentence: You can't expect Knights of the Vale to side with wildling invaders.

Name: tormund
Sentence: We didn't invade. We were invited.

Name: vale knight
Sentence: Not by me.

Name: jon snow
Sentence: The free folk, the northerners, and the Knights of the Vale fought bravely, fought together, and we won. My father uses to say we find our true friends on the battlefield.

Name: man
Sentence: The Boltons are defeated. The war is over. Winter has come. If the maesters are right, it'll be the coldest one in a thousand years. We should ride home and wait out the coming storms.

Name: jon snow
Sentence: The war is not over. And I promise you, friend, the true enemy won't wait out the storm. He brings the storm.

Name: lyanna
Sentence: Your son was butchered at the Red Wedding, Lord Manderly. But you refused the call. You swore allegiance to House Stark, Lord Glover, but in their hour of greatest need, you refused the call. And you, Lord Cerwyn, your father was skinned alive by Ramsay Bolton. Still you refuse the call. But House Mormont remembers. The North remembers. We know no king but the King in the North whose name is Stark. I don't care if he's a bastard. Ned Stark's blood runs through his veins. He's my king from this day until his last day.

Name: manderly
Sentence: Lady Mormont speaks harshly and truly. My son died for Robb Stark, the Young Wolf. I didn't think we'd find another king in my lifetime. I didn't commit my men to your cause ‘cause I didn't want more Manderlys dying for nothing. But I was wrong. Jon Snow avenged the Red Wedding. He is the White Wolf. The King in the North.

Name: glover
Sentence: I did not fight beside you on the field and I will regret that until my dying day. A man can only admit when he was wrong and ask forgiveness.

Name: jon snow
Sentence: There's nothing to forgive, my lord.

Name: glover
Sentence: There will be more fights to come. House Glover will stand behind House Stark as we have for a thousands years. And I will stand behind Jon Snow… the King in the North!

Name: glover
Sentence: The King in the North!

Name: all
Sentence: The King in the North! The King in the North! The King in the North! The King in the North! The King in the North! The King in the North! The King in the North! The King in the North!

Name: jaime lannister
Sentence: Come on.

Name: qyburn
Sentence: I now proclaim Cersei of the House Lannister First of Her Name, Queen of the Andals and the First Men, Protector of the Seven Kingdoms.

Name: qyburn
Sentence: Long may she reign.

Name: all
Sentence: Long may she reign.

Name: walder frey
Sentence: You're wonder why I brought you all here. After all, we just had a feast. Since when does old Walder give us two feasts in a single fortnight?

Name: walder frey
Sentence: Well, it's no good being lord of the Riverlands if you can't celebrate with your family. That's what I say!

Name: walder frey
Sentence: I've gathered every Frey who means a damn thing so I can tell you my plans for this great house now that winter has come. But first, a toast! No more of that Dornish horse piss! This is the finest Arbor gold! Proper wine for proper heroes!

Name: waldery frey
Sentence: Stand together!

Name: all
Sentence: Stand together!

Name: walder
Sentence: Not you. I'm not wasting good wine on a damn woman.

Name: walder
Sentence: Maybe I'm not the most pleasant man. I'll admit it. But I'm proud of you lot. You're my family, the men who helped me slaughter the Starks at the Red Wedding.

Name: walder
Sentence: Yes, yes. Cheer. Brave men, all of you. Butchered a woman pregnant with her babe. Cut the throat of a mother of five. Slaughtered your guests after inviting them into your home. But you didn't slaughter every one of the Starks.

Name: walder
Sentence: No, no, that was your mistake. You should have ripped them all out, root and stem.

Name: walder
Sentence: Leave one wolf alive and the sheep are never safe.

Name: arya stark
Sentence: When people ask you what happened here, tell them the North remembers. Tell them winter came for House Frey.

Name: edd
Sentence: You wildlings?

Name: meera
Sentence: I'm Meera Reed, daughter of Howland Reed. This is Brandon Stark, son of Ned Stark.

Name: edd
Sentence: How do I know that's true?

Name: bran stark
Sentence: You were at the Fist of the First Men. You were at Hardhome. You've seen the Army of the Dead. You've seen the Night King. He's coming for us. For all of us.

Name: edd
Sentence: Okay, come on. Let's get them inside.

Name: jon snow
Sentence: I want every northern maester to scour their records for any mention of dragonglass. Dragonglass kills white walkers. It's more valuable to us now than gold. We need to find it, we need to mine it, we need to make weapons from it. Everyone aged 10 to 60 will drill daily with spears, pikes, bow and arrow.

Name: robett
Sentence: It's about time we taught these boys of summer how to fight.

Name: jon snow
Sentence: Not just the boys.

Name: jon snow
Sentence: We can't defend the North if only half the population is fighting.

Name: robett
Sentence: You expect me to put a spear in my granddaughter's hand?

Name: lyanna
Sentence: I don't plan on knitting by the fire while men fight for me. I might be small, Lord Glover, and I might be a girl, but I am every bit as much a Northerner as you.

Name: robett
Sentence: Indeed you are, my lady. No one has questioned--

Name: lyanna
Sentence: And I don't need your permission to defend the North.

Name: lyanna
Sentence: We'll begin training every man, woman, boy, and girl on Bear Island.

Name: jon snow
Sentence: While we're preparing for attack, we need to shore up our defenses. The only thing standing between us and the Army of the Dead is the Wall and the Wall hasn't been properly manned in centuries. I'm not the king of the Free Folk.

Name: jon snow
Sentence: But if we're going to survive this winter together...

Name: tormund
Sentence: You want us to man the castles for you?

Name: jon snow
Sentence: Last time we saw the Night King was at Hardhome. The closest castle to Hardhome is Eastwatch-by-the-Sea.

Name: tormund
Sentence: Then that's where I'll go. Looks like we're the Night's Watch now.

Name: jon snow
Sentence: If they breach the wall, the first two castles in their path are Last Hearth and Karhold.

Name: yohn
Sentence: The Umbers and the Karstarks betrayed the North. Their castles should be torn down with not a stone left standing.

Name: sansa stark
Sentence: The castles committed no crimes. And we need every fortress we have for the war to come. We should give the Last Hearth and Karhold to new families, loyal families who supported us against Ramsay.

Name: all
Sentence: Aye!

Name: jon snow
Sentence: The Umbers and the Karstarks have fought beside the Starks for centuries. They've kept faith for generation after generation.

Name: sansa stark
Sentence: And then they broke faith.

Name: jon snow
Sentence: I'm not going to strip these families of their ancestral homes because of the crimes of a few reckless sons.

Name: sansa stark
Sentence: So there's no punishment for treason and no reward for loyalty?

Name: jon snow
Sentence: The punishment for treason is death. Smalljon Umber died on the field of battle. Harald Karstark died on the field of battle.

Name: sansa stark
Sentence: They died fighting for Ramsay. Give the castles to the families of the men who died fighting for you.

Name: jon snow
Sentence: When I was Lord Commander of the Night's Watch I executed men who betrayed me. I executed men who refused to follow orders. My father always said, "The man who passes the sentence should swing the sword," and I have tried to live by those words. But I will not punish a son for his father's sins, and I will not take a family home away from a family it has belonged to for centuries. That is my decision, and my decision is final.

Name: jon snow
Sentence: Ned Umber.

Name: jon snow
Sentence: Alys Karstark.

Name: jon snow
Sentence: For centuries, our families fought side by side on the battlefield. I ask you to pledge your loyalty once again to House Stark, to serve as our bannermen and come to our aid whenever called upon.

Name: jon snow
Sentence: Stand.

Name: jon snow
Sentence: Yesterday's wars don't matter anymore. The North needs to band together, all the living north. Will you stand beside me, Ned and Alys, now and always?

Name: ned alys
Sentence: Now and always!

Name: jon snow
Sentence: You are my sister, but I am king now.

Name: sansa stark
Sentence: Will you start wearing a crown?

Name: jon snow
Sentence: When you question my decisions in front of the other lords and ladies, you undermine me.

Name: sansa stark
Sentence: So I can't question your decisions anymore?

Name: jon snow
Sentence: Of course you can, but--

Name: sansa stark
Sentence: Joffrey never let anyone question his authority. You think he was a good king?

Name: jon snow
Sentence: Do you think I'm Joffrey?

Name: sansa stark
Sentence: You're as far from Joffrey as anyone I've ever met.

Name: jon snow
Sentence: Thank you.

Name: sansa stark
Sentence: You're good at this, you know.

Name: jon snow
Sentence: At what?

Name: sansa stark
Sentence: At ruling.

Name: jon snow
Sentence: No.

Name: sansa stark
Sentence: You are. You are. They respect you, they really do, but you have to--

Name: sansa stark
Sentence: Why are you laughing?

Name: jon snow
Sentence: What did father used to say? Everything before the word "but" is horse shit.

Name: sansa stark
Sentence: He never said that to me.

Name: jon snow
Sentence: No. No, he never cursed in front of his girls.

Name: sansa stark
Sentence: Because he was trying to protect us. He never wanted us to see how dirty the world really is, but Father couldn't protect me and neither can you. Stop trying.

Name: jon snow
Sentence: All right, I'll stop trying to protect you and you stop trying to undermine me.

Name: sansa stark
Sentence: I'm not trying to undermine you.

Name: sansa stark
Sentence: You have to be smarter than Father. You need to be smarter than Robb. I loved them, I miss them, but they made stupid mistakes, and they both lost their heads for it.

Name: jon snow
Sentence: And how should I be smarter? By listening to you?

Name: sansa stark
Sentence: Would that be so terrible?

Name: wolkan
Sentence: A raven from King's Landing, Your Grace.

Name: jon snow
Sentence: Cersei of House Lannister, First of Her Name, Queen of the Andals and the First Men, Protector of the Seven Kingdoms--

Name: sansa stark
Sentence: What does she want?

Name: jon snow
Sentence: Come to King's Landing. Bend the knee or suffer the fate of all traitors.

Name: sansa stark
Sentence: You've been so consumed with the enemy to the north, you've forgotten about the one to the south.

Name: jon snow
Sentence: I'm consumed with the Night King because I've seen him. And believe me, you'd think of little else if you had, too.

Name: sansa stark
Sentence: We still have a wall between us and the Night King. Theres nothing between us and Cersei.

Name: jon snow
Sentence: There's a thousand miles between us and Cersei. Winter is here. The Lannisters are a southern army. They've never ranged this far north.

Name: sansa stark
Sentence: You're the military man, but I know her. If you're her enemy, she'll never stop until she's destroyed you. Everyone who's ever crossed her, she's found a way to murder.

Name: jon snow
Sentence: You almost sound as if you admire her.

Name: sansa stark
Sentence: I learned a great deal from her.

Name: jaime lannister
Sentence: What is this?

Name: cersei lannister
Sentence: Its what we've been waiting for our whole lives. It's what Father trained us for, whether he knew it or not.

Name: jaime lannister
Sentence: He knew it. Made me memorize every damn city, town, lake, forest, and mountain.

Name: cersei lannister
Sentence: It's ours now, we just have to take it.

Name: cersei lannister
Sentence: You've been quiet since you came home. Are you angry with me?

Name: jaime lannister
Sentence: No, not angry.

Name: cersei lannister
Sentence: Are you afraid of me?

Name: jaime lannister
Sentence: Should I be?

Name: cersei lannister
Sentence: Daenerys Targaryen has chosen Tyrion to be her Hand. Right now, they're sailing across the Narrow Sea, hoping to take back her father's throne. Our little brother, the one you love so much, the one you set free, the one who murdered our father and our first-born son, now he stands beside our enemies and gives them counsel. He's out there somewhere at the head of an armada. Where will they land?

Name: jaime lannister
Sentence: Dragonstone.

Name: jaime lannister
Sentence: They have deep-water ports for the ships. Stannis left the castle unoccupied, and that's where she was born.

Name: cersei lannister
Sentence: Enemies to the east.

Name: cersei lannister
Sentence: Enemies to the south--Ellaria Sand and her brood of bitches.

Name: cersei lannister
Sentence: Enemies to the west--Olenna, the old cunt. Another traitor.

Name: cersei lannister
Sentence: Enemies to the north. Ned Stark's bastard has been named King in the North and that murdering whore Sansa stands beside him. Enemies everywhere. We're surrounded by traitors. You're in command of the Lannister army now. How do we proceed?

Name: jaime lannister
Sentence: Winter is here. We can't win a war if we can't feed our men and our horses. The Tyrells have the grain, the Tyrells have the livestock.

Name: cersei lannister
Sentence: Will the Tyrell bannermen stand alongside a Dothraki horde and Unsullied slave soldiers?

Name: jaime lannister
Sentence: If they think Daenerys will win. No one wants to fight on the losing side. Right now, we look like the losing side.

Name: cersei lannister
Sentence: I'm the Queen of the Seven Kingdoms.

Name: jaime lannister
Sentence: Three kingdoms, at best. I'm not sure you understand how much danger we're in.

Name: cersei lannister
Sentence: I understand we're in a war for survival. I understand whoever loses dies. I understand whoever wins could launch a dynasty that lasts a thousand years.

Name: jaime lannister
Sentence: A dynasty for whom? Our children are dead. We're the last of us.

Name: cersei lannister
Sentence: A dynasty for us, then.

Name: jaime lannister
Sentence: We never talked about Tommen.

Name: cersei lannister
Sentence: There's nothing to say.

Name: jaime lannister
Sentence: Our baby boy killed himself.

Name: cersei lannister
Sentence: He betrayed me. He betrayed us both. Should we spend our days mourning the dead--mother, father, and all our children?

Name: jaime lannister
Sentence: Cersei--

Name: cersei lannister
Sentence: I loved them. I did. But they're ashes now and we're still flesh and blood. We're the last Lannisters, the last ones who count.

Name: jaime lannister
Sentence: Even Lannisters can't survive without allies. Where are our allies now? You saw what happened to Walder Frey and his family.

Name: cersei lannister
Sentence: I heard. How could we ever trust a man like that?

Name: jaime lannister
Sentence: We couldn't. He was a useless, old coward, but the Freys supported us. Now they're all dead. Whoever killed them is no friend of ours. We need allies. Stronger, better allies. We can't win this war alone.

Name: cersei lannister
Sentence: You think I listened to Father for 40 years and learned nothing?

Name: jaime lannister
Sentence: The Greyjoys? You invited the Greyjoys to King's Landing?

Name: cersei lannister
Sentence: Not all of them.

Name: jaime lannister
Sentence: Well, it looks like all of them.

Name: cersei lannister
Sentence: I invited Euron Greyjoy, the new King of the Iron Islands. You said yourself we needed stronger, better allies. There you are.

Name: jaime lannister
Sentence: How are they better allies? How are they different from the Freys? They both broke their promises and murdered their former friends as soon as it suited them.

Name: cersei lannister
Sentence: So does everyone when it suits them. Unlike the Freys, they have ships. And they're good at killing.

Name: jaime lannister
Sentence: They're not good at anything. I know the Ironborn. They're bitter, angry little people. All they know how to do is steal things they can't build or grow themselves.

Name: cersei lannister
Sentence: Euron Greyjoy didn't come here for that.

Name: jaime lannister
Sentence: Oh, what did he come here for, then?

Name: cersei lannister
Sentence: A queen.

Name: euron greyjoy
Sentence: The moment I was chosen Lord of the Iron Islands, they turned on me. Their own uncle. They stole my best ships and ran. Sailed the right across the world and gave them to the Dragon Queen so she could bring her armies here to attack you.

Name: euron greyjoy
Sentence: It's nothing compares to the treason you suffered at the hands of a family members, from what I hear. But still, it bothers me. Murdering them would make me feel a lot better. And since it appears that all our treasonous family members are fighting for the same side, I thought we rightful monarchs could murder them together.

Name: jaime lannister
Sentence: You're not a rightful monarch, though, are you?

Name: jaime lannister
Sentence: The Greyjoys rebelled agains the throne for the right to be monarchs, but as I recall, you were soundly defeated. Come to mention it, weren't you the one who started that rebellion by sailing to Casterly Rock and burning the Lannister fleet? You certainly caught us there. Very smart move on your part. Of course, we all made it to the Iron Islands anyway. I was there.

Name: euron greyjoy
Sentence: I remember very well. I saw you. I heard so much talk. The best in the world. No one can stop him. I didn't believe it, to be honesty. But I must say, when you rushed through the breach and started cutting people down...it was glorious. Like a dance.

Name: jaime lannister
Sentence: The people I was cutting down were your own kin.

Name: euron greyjoy
Sentence: The place was getting crowded. I enjoyed watching it. I truly did.

Name: jaime lannister
Sentence: And I enjoyed killing Greyjoys.

Name: euron greyjoy
Sentence: A good thing for me. If you hadn't crushed us, I wouldn't have gone into exile. If I hadn't done that, I wouldn't be the greatest captain on the 14 seas.

Name: cersei lannister
Sentence: If not the most humble.

Name: euron greyjoy
Sentence: You're not humble. You're the queen of a great nation. You don't care about the Iron Islands. They're nothing but rocks and bird shit and--and a lot of very unattractive people. The Iron Fleet, on the other hand, that's something else entirely. It's the greatest armada Westeros has ever seen. With the Iron Fleet, you own the seas. You can defeat the invaders of the east and the pretenders of the north and south.

Name: cersei lannister
Sentence: What do you want in return?

Name: euron greyjoy
Sentence: Ever since I was a little boy, I wanted to grow up and mary the most beautiful woman in the world. So here I am, with a thousand ships and two good hands.

Name: cersei lannister
Sentence: I decline your proposal.

Name: euron greyjoy
Sentence: Why?

Name: cersei lannister
Sentence: You're not trustworthy. You've broken promises to allies before and murdered them at the nearest opportunity. You murdered your own brother.

Name: euron greyjoy
Sentence: You should try it. Feels wonderful.

Name: euron greyjoy
Sentence: I don't expect you to trust me outright. You need proof of my honest intentions. In my experience, the surest way to a woman's heart is with a gift. A priceless gift. I won't return to King's Landing until I have that for you.

Name: marwyn
Sentence: Ah, Maester Weyland. A drinker's liver if ever I saw one.

Name: marwyn
Sentence: Weigh that.

Name: marwyn
Sentence: The triumph of transitory pleasures. Mankindo s curse.

Name: sam
Sentence: Archmaester, I was wondering...

Name: marwyn
Sentence: What's the weight?

Name: sam
Sentence: I was wondering if you had considered my proposition.

Name: marwyn
Sentence: I don't remember your proposition.

Name: sam
Sentence: I asked you if, in light of what I've seen in the North, if I could have access to the restricted area of the library.

Name: marwyn
Sentence: That area is reserved for maesters. Are you a maester?

Name: sam
Sentence: No.

Name: marwyn
Sentence: Not a very strong proposition, is it?

Name: sam
Sentence: Archmaester, with respect, I've seen them--the Army of the Dead. The white walkers. W was sent here to learn how to defeat them, but everyone in the Citadel, those who will even talk to me, they all doubt the walkers ever existed in the first place.

Name: marwyn
Sentence: Everyone in the Citadel doubts everything. It's their job. But the tales of the Long Night can't be pure fabrication. Too many similarities from unconnected sources.

Name: sam
Sentence: Sources in the restricted area?

Name: marwyn
Sentence: The very same. And the simplest explanation for your grating obsession with the white walkers is that you're telling the truth and that you saw what you say you saw.

Name: sam
Sentence: So, you believe me.

Name: marwyn
Sentence: I do. You'll finish weighing that heart?

Name: sam
Sentence: That makes you the only person south of the Twins who does.

Name: marwyn
Sentence: We're not lie the people south of the Twins. And we're not like the people north of the Twins. In the Citadel, we lead different lives for different reasons. We are this worldo s memory, Samwell Tarly. Without us, men would be little better than dogs. Don't remember any meal but the last, can't see forward to any but the next. And every time you leave the house and shut the door, they howl like you're gone forever. When Robert's Rebellion was raging, people that the end was near. The end of the Targaryen dynasty. "How will we survive?" When Aegon Targaryen turned his eye westward and flew his dragons to Blackwater Rush--"The end is near! How will we survive?" And thousands of year before that, during the Long Night, we can forgive them for thinking it truly was the end. But it wasn't. None of it was. The Wall has stood through it all. And every winter that ever came has ended.

Name: marwyn
Sentence: Be a good lad. Clean this up.

Name: brienne
Sentence: Nope.

Name: tormund
Sentence: You're a lucky man.

Sentence: I've heard she beat the Hound in single combat. She's a very impressive woman.

Sentence: What do you want, Lord Baelish?

Name: petyr
Sentence: I want you to be happy. I want you to be safe.

Sentence: I am safe. I'm at home, surrounded by friends. I have Brienne to protect me from anyone who would harm me.

Name: petyr
Sentence: What about happy? Why aren't you happy? What do you want that you do not have?

Name: sansa stark
Sentence: At the moment, peace and quiet.

Name: sansa stark
Sentence: No need to seize the last word, Lord Baelish. I'll assume it was something clever.

Name: petyr
Sentence: My lady.

Name: brienne
Sentence: Why is he still here?

Sentence: We need his men. Without the Vale, Ramsay Bolton would still hold this castle. Littlefinger saved us.

Sentence: He wants something.

Name: man
Sentence: He rode through the streets of the city / Down from his hill on high / O'er the winds and the steps and the cobble / He rode to a woman's sigh / For she was his secret treasure / She was his shame and his bliss / And a chain and a keep are nothing / Compared to a woman's kiss / For hands of gold are always cold / But a woman's hands are warm / For hands of gold are always cold / But a woman's hands are--

Name: arya stark
Sentence: That's a pretty song. I've never heard it before.

Name: man
Sentence: It's a new one.

Name: man
Sentence: Are you hungry? We've got some rabbit.

Name: arya stark
Sentence: I don't want to steal your food.

Name: man
Sentence: You're not stealing, we're offering. Come on, it's gonna be a cold night.

Name: man
Sentence: You heading south?

Name: arya stark
Sentence: King's Landing.

Name: man
Sentence: Poor girl.

Name: arya stark
Sentence: Not so bad, is it?

Name: man
Sentence: Depends on your taste, I guess. If you like your streets covered in shit and pig's blood, it's the town for you.

Name: man
Sentence: All my life, I wanted to see the Red Keep, the Sept of Baelor, the Dragonpit. Then when I finally make it, they wouldn't let me within a mile of the Red Keep, the Sept of Baelor's blown to hell, and the Dragonpit is a damn ruin.

Name: man
Sentence: The people who live there, they'd skin you alive if they could make two coppers off your hide.

Name: man
Sentence: Worst place in the world.

Name: arya stark
Sentence: What are you doing in the Riverlands?

Name: man
Sentence: There's been some trouble with the Freys up at The Twins, so we're part of the army that's been sent to keep the peace.

Name: man
Sentence: Here you go. Guests first.

Name: arya stark
Sentence: Oh, no, I couldn't. You don't have enough.

Name: man
Sentence: My mother always told me to be kind to strangers. Strangers will be kind to you.

Name: arya stark
Sentence: You're a long way from home. I'm sure you've had some adventures, though.

Name: man
Sentence: Yeah, endless adventures. They'll be singing about us for a thousand years.

Name: man
Sentence: 3; The truth is when we left home, we couldn't wait to get away. But now we've been gone a while, we can't wait to get home.

Name: man
Sentence: I just think about my dad out there on his boat all alone. I ought o be out there with him.

Name: man
Sentence: My wife's just had our first baby.

Name: arya stark
Sentence: Boy or girl?

Name: man
Sentence: Oh, who knows? You think soldiers get ravens with news from home?

Name: man
Sentence: I hope it's a girl.

Name: arya stark
Sentence: Why?

Name: man
Sentence: Girls take care of their papas when their papas grow old. Boys just go off to fight in someone else's wars.

Name: man
Sentence: Are you old enough to drink?

Name: man
Sentence: It's blackberry wine. I made it myself.

Name: arya stark
Sentence: It's really good.

Name: man
Sentence: So, why is a nice girl on her own heading to King's Landing?

Name: arya stark
Sentence: I'm going to kill the queen.

Name: thoros
Sentence: Bad night to be outdoors.

Name: sandor
Sentence: You've got real powerful magic to figure that out. Did the Lord of Light whisper that in your ear? "It's snowing, Thoros. It's windy. It's gonna be a cold night."

Name: thoros
Sentence: You're a grouchy old bear, aren't you, Clegane? You want some rum?

Name: sandor
Sentence: Don't like that shit. It's too sweet.

Name: thoros
Sentence: Why are you always in such a foul mood?

Name: sandor
Sentence: Experience.

Name: beric
Sentence: This seems like a good place to spend the night.

Name: sandor
Sentence: These people don't want us here.

Name: beric
Sentence: Seems deserted to me. No livestock. No smoke coming from the chimney.

Name: sandor
Sentence: I don't like the look of it.

Name: thoros
Sentence: For a big, hard man, you scare easy.

Name: sandor
Sentence: I'll tell you what doesn't scare me

Name: thoros
Sentence: Come on. Maybe they've got some ale hidden away.

Name: sandor
Sentence: They don't.

Name: thoros
Sentence: See if there's a larder. They always leave something behind.

Name: beric
Sentence: How do you think it ended for them?

Name: sandor
Sentence: With death.

Name: beric
Sentence: Girl died in her father's arms. Both of them covered in blood and a knife at their feet. I'd say they were starving. And rather than letting his little girl suffer, he ended it for both of them.

Name: sandor
Sentence: Doesn't matter now.

Name: beric
Sentence: No, doesn't matter now.

Name: sandor
Sentence: I've known you a long time, Dondarrion.

Name: beric
Sentence: Aye. I think the first time we met was at that tournament--

Name: sandor
Sentence: And I always thought you were dull as dirt.

Name: sandor
Sentence: You're not bad. I don't hate you. Don't like, but you're not bad.

Name: beric
Sentence: Thank you, Clegane. That warms the heart.

Name: sandor
Sentence: But there's nothing special about you.

Name: beric
Sentence: You're right about that.

Name: sandor
Sentence: So why does the Lord of Light keep bringing you back? I've met better men than you, and they've been hanged from crossbeams, or beheaded, or just shat themselves to death in a field somewhere. None of them came back. So, why you?

Name: beric
Sentence: You think I don't ask myself that? Every hour of every day? Why am I here? What am I supposed to do? What does the Lord see in me?

Name: sandor
Sentence: And?

Name: beric
Sentence: I don't know. I don't understand our Lord.

Name: sandor
Sentence: Your Lord.

Name: beric
Sentence: I don't know what He wants from me. I only know that He wants me alive.

Name: sandor
Sentence: If he's so all-powerful, why doesn't he just tell you what the fuck he wants?

Name: thoros
Sentence: Clegane.

Name: thoros
Sentence: Come over here. Don't worry. The fire won't bite. I want to show you something.

Name: sandor
Sentence: It's my fucking luck I end up with a band of fire worshippers.

Name: beric
Sentence: Aye. Almost seems like divine justice.

Name: sandor
Sentence: There's no divine justice, you dumb cunt. If there was, you'd be dead...and that girl would be alive.

Name: sandor
Sentence: What do you want?

Name: thoros
Sentence: Look into the flames.

Name: sandor
Sentence: I don't want to look in the damn flames.

Name: thoros
Sentence: You saw me bring him back from the dead after you cut him down. Don't you want to know what gave me the power?

Name: sandor
Sentence: I keep asking and no one wants to tell me.

Name: thoros
Sentence: We can't tell you. Only the fire can tell you.

Name: thoros
Sentence: What do you see?

Name: sandor
Sentence: Logs burning.

Name: thoros
Sentence: Keep looking. What do you see?

Name: sandor
Sentence: Ice. A wall of ice. The Wall.

Name: thoros
Sentence: What else?

Name: sandor
Sentence: It's where the Wall meets the sea. There's a castle there.

Name: sandor
Sentence: There's a mountain. Looks like an arrowhead. The dead are marching past.

Name: sandor
Sentence: Thousands of them.

Name: beric
Sentence: Do you believe me now, Clegane? Do you believe we're here for a reason?

Name: thoros
Sentence: What the hell are you doing, Clegane?

Name: sandor
Sentence: Burying the dead.

Name: thoros
Sentence: You knew these people.

Name: sandor
Sentence: Not really.

Name: sandor
Sentence: We ask the Father to judge us with mercy. We ask the Mother to... Fuck it, I don't remember the rest. I'm sorry you're dead. You deserved better. Both of you.

Name: little sam
Sentence: Mom.

Name: gilly
Sentence: You should really sleep, Sam.

Name: sam
Sentence: The dead don't.

Name: gilly
Sentence: Legends of the Long Night.

Name: sam
Sentence: The Targaryens used dragonglass to decorate their weapons without even knowing what the First Men used it for.

Name: gilly
Sentence: What is it?

Name: sam
Sentence: It's a map of Dragonstone. The Targaryens built their first stronghold there when they invaded Westeros.

Name: gilly
Sentence: That's dragonglass?

Name: sam
Sentence: A mountain of it. Beneath the ground. Stannis told me, but I didn't think... This is important. Jon needs to know.

Name: jorah mormont
Sentence: Has she come yet?

Name: sam
Sentence: Who?

Name: jorah mormont
Sentence: The Dragon Queen. Daenerys Stormborn.

Name: sam
Sentence: Haven't heard anything.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Sentence: Shall we begin?

Name: tyrion lannister
Sentence: On a night like this, you came into the world.

Name: varys
Sentence: I remember that storm. All the dogs in King's Landing howled through the night.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Sentence: I wish I could remember it.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Sentence: I always thought this would be a homecoming. It doesn't feel like home.

Name: tyrion lannister
Sentence: We won't stay on Dragonstone for long.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Sentence: Good.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Sentence: Not so many lions.

Name: varys
Sentence: Cersei controls fewer than half the Seven Kingdoms. The lord of Westeros despise her. Even before your arrival, they plotted against her. Now...

Name: daenerys targaryen
Sentence: They cry out for their true queen? They drink secret toasts to my health?

Name: daenerys targaryen
Sentence: People used to tell my brother that sort of thing, and he was stupid enough to believe them.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Sentence: If Viserys had three dragons and an army at his back, he'd have invaded King's Landing already.

Name: tyrion lannister
Sentence: Conquering Westeros would be easy for you. But you're not here to be queen of the ashes.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Sentence: No.

Name: tyrion lannister
Sentence: We can take the Seven Kingdoms without turning it into a slaughterhouse. If the great houses support your claim against Cersei, the game is won. With the Tyrell army and the Dornish on our side, we have powerful allies in the south.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Sentence: I never properly thanked you for that.

Name: varys
Sentence: They joined our side, my queen, because they believe in you.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Sentence: You served my father, didn't you, Lord Varys?

Name: varys
Sentence: I did.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Sentence: And then you served the man who overthrew him?

Name: varys
Sentence: I had a choice, Your Grace--serve Robert Baratheon or face the headman's axe.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Sentence: But you didn't serve him long. You turned against him.

Name: varys
Sentence: Robert was an improvement on your father, to be sure. There have been few rulers in history as cruel as the Mad King. Robert was neither mad nor cruel. He simply had no interest in being king.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Sentence: So you took it upon yourself to find a better one.

Name: tyrion lannister
Sentence: Your Grace, when I was ready to drink myself into a small coffin, Lord Varys told me about a queen in the east who--

Name: daenerys targaryen
Sentence: Before I came to power, you favored my brother. All your spies, your little birds, did they tell you Viserys was cruel, stupid, and weak? Would those qualities have made for a good king in your learned opinion?

Name: varys
Sentence: Until your marriage to Khal Drogo, Your Grace, I knew nothing about you, save your existence and that you were said to be beautiful.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Sentence: So you and your friends traded me like a prized horse to the Dothraki.

Name: varys
Sentence: Which you turned to your advantage.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Sentence: Who gave the order to kill me?

Name: varys
Sentence: King Robert.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Sentence: Who hired the assassins?

Name: daenerys targaryen
Sentence: Who sent word to Essos to murder Daenerys Targaryen?

Name: varys
Sentence: Your Grace, I did what had to be done to--

Name: daenerys targaryen
Sentence: To keep yourself alive.

Name: tyrion lannister
Sentence: Lord Varys has proven himself a loyal servant.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Sentence: Proven himself loyal? Quite the opposite. If he dislikes one monarch, he conspires to crown the next one. What king of a servant is that?

Name: varys
Sentence: The kind the realm needs. Incompetence should not be rewarded with blind loyalty. As long as I have my eyes, I'll use them. I wasn't born into a great house. I came from nothing. I was sold as a slave and carved up as an offering. When I was a child, I lived in alleys, gutters, abandoned houses. You wish to know where my true loyalties lie? Not with any king or queen, but with the people. The people who suffer under despots and prosper under just rule. The people whose hearts you aim to win. If you demand blind allegiance, I respect your wishes. Grey Worm can behead me or your dragons can devour me. But if you let me live, I will serve you well. I will dedicate myself to seeing you on the Iron Throne because I choose you. Because I know the people have no better chance than you.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Sentence: Swear this to me, Varys. If you ever think I'm failing the people, you won't conspire behind my back. You'll look me in the eye as you have done today, and you'll tell me how I'm failing them.

Name: varys
Sentence: I swear it, my queen.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Sentence: And I swear this--if you ever betray me, I'll burn you alive.

Name: varys
Sentence: I would expect nothing less from the Mother of Dragons.

Name: grey worm
Sentence: Forgive me, my queen. A red priestess from As'shai has come to see you.

Name: melisandre
Sentence: Queen Daeneys, I was a slave once, bought and sold, scourged and branded. It is an honor to meet the Breaker of Chains.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Sentence: The Red Priests helped bring peace to Meereen. You are very welcome here. What is your name?

Name: melisandre
Sentence: I am called Melisandre.

Name: varys
Sentence: She once served another who wanted the Iron Throne. It didn't end well for Stannis Baratheon, did it?

Name: melisandre
Sentence: No, it didn't.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Sentence: You chose an auspicious day to arrive at Dragonstone.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Sentence: We've just decided to pardon those who served the wrong king.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Sentence: The Lord of Light doesn't have many followers in Westeros, does he?

Name: melisandre
Sentence: Not yet. But even those who don't worship the Lord can serve his cause.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Sentence: What does your Lord expect from me?

Name: melisandre
Sentence: The Long Night is coming. Only the prince who was promised can bring the dawn.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Sentence: The prince who was promised will bring the dawn. I'm afraid I'm not a prince.

Name: missandei
Sentence: Your Grace, forgive me, but your translation is not quite accurate. That noun has no gender in High Valyrian, so the proper translation for that prophecy would be the prince or princess who was promised will bring the dawn.

Name: tyrion lannister
Sentence: Doesn't really roll off the tongue, does it?

Name: daenerys targaryen
Sentence: No, but I like it better.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Sentence: And you believe this prophecy refers to me?

Name: melisandre
Sentence: Prophecies are dangerous things. I believe you have a role to play, as does another. The King in the North, Jon Snow.

Name: tyrion lannister
Sentence: Jon Snow? Ned Stark's bastard?

Name: daenerys targaryen
Sentence: You know him?

Name: tyrion lannister
Sentence: I traveled with him to the Wall when he joined the Night's Watch.

Name: varys
Sentence: And why do you think the Lord of Light singled out this Jon Snow aside from the visions you've seen in the flames, that is?

Name: melisandre
Sentence: As Lord Commander of the Night's Watch he allowed the Wildlings south of the Wall to protect them from great danger. As King in the North he has united those Wildlings with the northern houses so together they may face their common enemy.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Sentence: He sounds like quite a man.

Name: melisandre
Sentence: Summon Jon Snow. Let him stand before you and tell you things that have happened to him, the things that he has seen with his own eyes.

Name: tyrion lannister
Sentence: I can't speak to prophecies or visions in the flames, but I like Jon Snow and I trusted him, and I am an excellent judge of character.

Name: tyrion lannister
Sentence: If he does rule the north, he would make a valuable ally. The Lannisters executed his father and conspired to murder his brother. Jon Snow has even more reason to hate Cersei than you do.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Sentence: Very well. Send a raven north. Tell Jon Snow that his Queen invites him to come to Drangonstone...and bend the knee.

Name: sansa stark
Sentence: Do you think it's really Tyrion? It could be someone trying to lure you into a trap.

Name: jon snow
Sentence: Read the last bit.

Name: sansa stark
Sentence: All dwarfs are bastards in their father's eyes." What does that mean?

Name: jon snow
Sentence: It's something he said to me the first night we met. You know him better than any of us. What do you think?

Name: sansa stark
Sentence: Tyrion is not like the other Lannisters. He was always kind to me, but it's too great a risk. "The Seven Kingdoms will bleed as long as Cersei sits on the Iron Throne. Join us. Together we can end her tyranny."

Name: davos
Sentence: Sounds like a charmer. Of course, the casual mention of a Dothraki horde, a legion of Unsullied and three dragons, a bit less charming.

Name: jon snow
Sentence: What?

Name: davos
Sentence: Fire kills Whites, you told me. What breathes fire?

Name: sansa stark
Sentence: You're not suggesting Jon meet with her?

Name: davos
Sentence: No, too dangerous.

Name: jon snow
Sentence: But?

Name: davos
Sentence: But if the Army of the Dead makes it passed the Wall, do we have enough men to fight them?

Name: cersei lannister
Sentence: If the Mad King's daughter takes the Iron Throne, she will destroy the Realm as we know it. Some of you are bannermen of House Tyrell. But House Tyrell is in open rebellion against the Crown. With their help the Mad King's daughter has ferried an army of savages to our shores. Mindless Unsullied soldiers who will destroy your castles and your holdfasts. Dothraki heathens who will burn your villages to the ground, rape and enslave your women, and butcher your children without a second thought. This is how Olenna Tyrell rewards centuries of service and loyalty.

Name: cersei lannister
Sentence: You all remember the Mad King. You remember the horrors he inflicted upon his people. His daughter is no different. In Essos her brutality is already legendary. She crucified hundreds of noblemen in Slaver's Bay. And when she grew bored of that, she fed them to her dragons.

Name: cersei lannister
Sentence: It is my solemn duty to protect the people, and I will but I need your help, My Lords. We must stand together, all of us, if we hope to stop her.

Name: randyll
Sentence: She has three full-grown dragons, Your Grace. The same as Aegon when he conquered the Seven Kingdoms. How do you propose to stop them?

Name: qyburn
Sentence: We are currently at work on a solution, My Lord.

Name: jaime lannister
Sentence: Lord Tarley.

Name: randyll
Sentence: Ser, Jaime. I believe you know my son.

Name: dickon
Sentence: Ser, Jaime.

Name: jaime lannister
Sentence: Rickon, isn't it?

Name: dickon
Sentence: Dickon.

Name: jaime lannister
Sentence: That's it.

Name: jaime lannister
Sentence: Thank you for coming. The other lords of the Reach look to you for guidance now more than ever. They might not have come if you hadn't.

Name: randyll
Sentence: If my queen summons me, I answer the call. And I've heard what she does to those that defy her.

Name: jaime lannister
Sentence: Do you ride for Hornhill today?

Name: randyll
Sentence: I have an army to mobilize. It won't be long until the fighting starts.

Name: jaime lannister
Sentence: And what side will you be fighting for? You were the only man to defeat Robert Baratheon in battle. Not even Rhaegar Targaryen could --

Name: randyll
Sentence: It's a long ride back to the reach, Ser Jaime. How may I serve?

Name: jaime lannister
Sentence: I want you to be my ranking general in the wars to come. I want you to swear allegiance to Cersei and I want you to help her destroy her enemies. All of her enemies.

Name: randyll
Sentence: Including Olenna Tyrell? I'm a Tarley. That name means something. We're not oath breakers. We're not schemers. We don't stab our rivals in the back or cut their throats at weddings. I swore an oath to House Tyrell.

Name: jaime lannister
Sentence: You swore an oath to the Crown as well, Lord Tarley.

Name: randyll
Sentence: I've known Olenna since I was a child.

Name: jaime lannister
Sentence: She was a great woman, once. Now she's broken. She wants revenge so badly she brought the Dothraki to our shores. The Dothraki in Westeros for the first time in history. I know you don't like my sister, but you have to make a choice. Do you fight with us or with the foreign savages and eunuchs?

Name: jaime lannister
Sentence: When the war is won the queen will need a new warden of the south. I can think of no better man than Randyll Tarley.

Name: marwyn
Sentence: The infection has spread too far. You should have cut off your arm the moment you were touched.

Name: jorah mormont
Sentence: How long?

Name: marwyn
Sentence: It will be years before it kills you. It could be 10, could be 20.

Name: jorah mormont
Sentence: But how long 'till...

Name: marwyn
Sentence: Your mind? Six months, maybe fewer.

Name: sam tarly
Sentence: Pardon, Archmaester. I met Stannis Baratheon's daughter at Castle Black. She had Greyscale as a baby and was cured. Isn't there some way --

Name: marwyn
Sentence: Does this look like a baby to you?

Name: sam tarly
Sentence: No.

Name: marwyn
Sentence: Have you studied the varying rates of Greyscale progression in infants and fully grown men?

Name: marwyn
Sentence: Maester Chrissen discovered Shireen Baratheon's affliction immediately.

Name: marwyn
Sentence: This is quite advanced and beyond our skills, Ser. Were you a commoner I'd have you shipped to Valyria at once to live out your life with the Stone Men. As an anointed Knight I'll allow you one more day. How you choose to spend that time is up to you.

Name: marwyn
Sentence: Come, Samwell.

Name: sam tarly
Sentence: Should we send word to your family, Ser...

Name: jorah mormont
Sentence: Jorah. Jorah Mormont.

Name: sam tarly
Sentence: Mormont?

Name: jorah mormont
Sentence: There's no need. I've been dead to them for years.

Name: qyburn
Sentence: Have you ever been down here, Your Grace?

Name: cersei lannister
Sentence: No, I can't say I have. I haven't seen these since Robert had them removed from the Throne Room.

Name: qyburn
Sentence: Curious that King Robert did not have them destroyed.

Name: cersei lannister
Sentence: They were his trophies. He couldn't keep them around. They would have made him look small. Sometimes he would come down here and look at them. I believe he brought his whores on occasion.

Name: qyburn
Sentence: Balerion the Dread. The beast that Aegon rode across the sea. Its flames forged the Iron Throne and brought the Seven Kingdoms to heel. Powerful, but not invincible.

Name: qyburn
Sentence: Apparently one of Daenarys' dragons was wounded by spears in the fighting pits of Meereen. If they can be wounded, they can be killed.

Name: qyburn
Sentence: The finest artilleters and blacksmiths in King's Landing have been laboring day and night, Your Grace. If you'd kindly pull that lever.

Name: yara greyjoy
Sentence: If you want the Iron Throne, take it. We have an army, a fleet, and three dragons. We should hit King's Landing now. Hard. With everything we have. The city will fall within a day.

Name: tyrion lannister
Sentence: If we turn the dragons loose, tens of thousands will die in the firestorms.

Name: ellaria
Sentence: It's called war. You don't have the stomach for it, scurry back into hiding.

Name: tyrion lannister
Sentence: I know how you wage war. We don't poison little girls here. Myrcella was innocent.

Name: ellaria
Sentence: She was a Lannister. There are no innocent Lannisters. My greatest regret is that Oberyn died fighting for you.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Sentence: That's enough. Tyrion is the Hand of the Queen. You will treat him with respect.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Sentence: I am not here to be queen of the ashes.

Name: olenna tyrell
Sentence: That's very nice to hear. Of course, I can't remember a queen who was better loved than my grand daughter. The common people loved her, the nobles loved her. And what is left of her now? Ashes. Commoners, nobles, they're all just children really. They won't obey you unless they fear you.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Sentence: I'm grateful to you, Lady Olenna, for your council. I'm grateful to all of you. But you have chosen to follow me. I will not attack King's Landing. We will not attack King's Landing.

Name: olenna tyrell
Sentence: Then how do you mean to take the Iron Throne? By asking nicely?

Name: daenerys targaryen
Sentence: We will lay siege to the capital surrounding the city on all sides. Cersei will have the Iron Throne but no food for her army or the people.

Name: tyrion lannister
Sentence: But we won't use Dothraki and Unsullied.

Name: tyrion lannister
Sentence: Cersei will try to rally the lords of Westeros by appealing to their loyalty, their love for their country. If we besiege the city with foreigners, we prove her point. Our army should be Westerosi.

Name: ellia
Sentence: And I suppose we're providing the Westerosi?

Name: tyrion lannister
Sentence: You are.

Name: tyrion lannister
Sentence: Lady Greyjoy will escort you home to Sunspear and her Iron Fleet will ferry the Dornish army back up to King's Landing.

Name: tyrion lannister
Sentence: The Dornish will lay siege to the capital alongside the Tyrell army. Two great kingdoms united against Cersei.

Name: olenna tyrell
Sentence: So, your master plan is to use our armies? Forgive me for asking, but why did you bother to bring your own?

Name: tyrion lannister
Sentence: The unsullied will have another objective. For decades House Lannister has been the true power in Westeros. And the seat of that power is Casterly Rock. Grey Worm and the Unsullied will sail for the Rock and take it.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Sentence: Do I have your support?

Name: yara greyjoy
Sentence: You have mine.

Name: ellia
Sentence: Dorne is with you, Your Grace.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Sentence: Thank you all. Lady Olenna, may I speak with you alone?

Name: daenerys targaryen
Sentence: I realize you're here out of hatred for Cersei and not love for me. But I swear to you she will pay for what she's done and we will bring peace back to Westeros.

Name: olenna tyrell
Sentence: Peace. Do you think that's what we had under your father or his father or his? Peace never lasts, my dear. Would you take a bit of advice from an old woman?

Name: olenna tyrell
Sentence: He's a clever man, your Hand. I've known a great many clever men. I've outlived them all. Do you know why? I ignored them. The lords of Westeros are sheep. Are you a sheep? No. You're a dragon. Be a dragon.

Name: grey worm
Sentence: Enter.

Name: missandei
Sentence: You leave tomorrow. Were you going to say goodbye?

Name: grey worm
Sentence: I will see you when I return.

Name: missandei
Sentence: But you don't know when that will be.

Name: grey worm
Sentence: No one knows.

Name: missandei
Sentence: I wish you good fortune.

Name: grey worm
Sentence: Missandei --

Name: grey worm
Sentence: It is hard for me to say goodbye to you.

Name: missandei
Sentence: Why?

Name: grey worm
Sentence: You know why.

Name: missandei
Sentence: I don't.

Name: grey worm
Sentence: You are my weakness.

Name: missandei
Sentence: That's what I am? Your weakness?

Name: grey worm
Sentence: When Unsullied are young their masters learn their fears. One boy is scared of dogs. One boy hates high places. One is frightened of the ocean. They make the boy sleep with dogs or climb a cliff. They throw him in the water. If he learns to swim, good. If he drowns, good. Either way, strong Unsullied. But I had no fears. I was never the biggest, never the strongest, but I was bravest always.

Name: missandei
Sentence: I believe it.

Name: grey worm
Sentence: Until I meet Missandei from the Isle of Naarth. Now I have fear.

Name: missandei
Sentence: I do too.

Name: grey worm
Sentence: No.

Name: missandei
Sentence: I want to see you. Please.

Name: marwyn
Sentence: It might be useful. Fouthen was a dreadful writer but an excellent researcher.

Name: sam tarly
Sentence: Archmaester, I wanted to --

Name: marwyn
Sentence: And this one.

Name: marwyn
Sentence: Maester Faol was quite the opposite. A brilliant stylist who invented half the stories he tells.

Name: sam tarly
Sentence: I wanted to ask you --

Name: marwyn
Sentence: If you need to write histories, Tarley, you have to do the research. If you want people to read your histories, you need a bit of style. I'm not writing the Chronicle of the Wars Following the Death of King Robert the First so it can sit on a shelf unread.

Name: marwyn
Sentence: What? You don't like the title? What would you call it then?

Name: sam tarly
Sentence: Possibly something a bit more poetic?

Name: marwyn
Sentence: We're not poets, Tarley.

Name: sam tarly
Sentence: Archmaester, if I could just have a moment.

Name: marwyn
Sentence: This is your moment. Use it wisely.

Name: sam tarly
Sentence: I may have found a way to treat Ser Jorah. There are two recorded cases of advanced Greyscale being cured. I found the procedure in the Study of Rare Diseases by Archmaester Pilos.

Name: marwyn
Sentence: I'm familiar with Archmaester Pylos and the Study of Rare Diseases.

Name: sam tarly
Sentence: Oh, you are?

Name: marwyn
Sentence: Yes. Should I tell you how he died? From Greyscale.

Name: sam tarly
Sentence: Oh.

Name: marwyn
Sentence: The procedure is far too dangerous which is why it's now forbidden.

Name: sam tarly
Sentence: Hello.

Name: jorah mormont
Sentence: What are you doing?

Name: sam tarly
Sentence: You're Jorah Mormont. You're the only son of Jeor Mormont.

Name: sam tarly
Sentence: My name is Samwell Tarley. I'm a sworn brother of the Night's Watch training to serve as maester of Castle Black. I knew your father. I was with him when he died. You're not dying today, Ser Jorah.

Name: sam tarly
Sentence: Drink this.

Name: jorah mormont
Sentence: What is it?

Name: sam tarly
Sentence: Rum. Drink it all, please. I'm afraid this is going to hurt.

Name: sam tarly
Sentence: If you could take off your shirt.

Name: sam tarly
Sentence: If you wouldn't mind, bite down hard. I'm sorry but no one knows I'm here. If they hear you screaming then we're both finished.

Name: jorah mormont
Sentence: Have you ever done this before?

Name: sam tarly
Sentence: No. No one else will try, so I'm the best you've got. Have a seat. I'm going to remove the entire layer of infected tissue, then apply a medicinal ointment to the --

Name: sam tarly
Sentence: Shh, shhh. Again, I'm sorry. Please try not to scream.

Name: man
Sentence: They say her dragons are bigger than Aegons.

Name: man
Sentence: Horse shit. Cersei is just trying to frighten us.

Name: man
Sentence: If it's true, if she lays siege to King's Landing prices will triple.

Name: man
Sentence: As long as we get back there before they start.

Name: man
Sentence: One more round. It's a long ride.

Name: hot pie
Sentence: Ary!

Name: arya stark
Sentence: Hello, Hot Pie. Sit down. Who's that for?

Name: arya stark
Sentence: Mmm. This is good.

Name: hot pie
Sentence: You think so? The secret is browning the butter before making the dough. Most people don't don't do that because it takes up too much time.

Name: arya stark
Sentence: I didn't do that.

Name: hot pie
Sentence: You've been making pies?

Name: arya stark
Sentence: One or two.

Name: hot pie
Sentence: I can't believe you're here. Did you meet the big lady?

Name: arya stark
Sentence: Big lady?

Name: hot pie
Sentence: The lady knight. I figured she was a knight because she had armor on. She was looking for your sister but I told her about you. Did she ever find you?

Name: arya stark
Sentence: She found me.

Name: hot pie
Sentence: What happened to you Ary?

Name: arya stark
Sentence: You got any ale?

Name: hot pie
Sentence: Where are you heading?

Name: arya stark
Sentence: King's Landing.

Name: hot pie
Sentence: Why?

Name: arya stark
Sentence: I heard Cersei's queen now.

Name: hot pie
Sentence: I heard she blew up the Great Sept. That must have been something to see. Boom.

Name: arya stark
Sentence: Hmm.

Name: hot pie
Sentence: I can't believe someone could do that.

Name: arya stark
Sentence: Cersei would do that.

Name: hot pie
Sentence: I thought you'd be heading for Winterfell.

Name: arya stark
Sentence: Why would I go there? The Boltons have it.

Name: hot pie
Sentence: No. The Boltons are dead.

Name: arya stark
Sentence: What?

Name: hot pie
Sentence: Jon Snow came down from Castle Black with a Wildling army and won the Battle of the Bastards. He's King in the North now.

Name: arya stark
Sentence: You're lying.

Name: hot pie
Sentence: Why would I lie about that? He's your brother right?

Name: arya stark
Sentence: Thanks for the pie.

Name: hot pie
Sentence: Friends don't pay. I can't believe I thought you were a boy. You're pretty.

Name: arya stark
Sentence: Thanks.

Name: arya stark
Sentence: Take care of yourself, Hot Pie. Try not to get killed.

Name: hot pie
Sentence: No, I won't. I'm like you, Ary. I'm a survivor.

Name: jon snow
Sentence: Come in.

Name: wolkan
Sentence: A raven, My King, from the Citadel.

Name: jon snow
Sentence: This message was sent to me by Samwell Tarley. He was my brother at the Night's Watch. A man I trust as much as anyone in this world. He's discovered proof that Dragonstone sits on a mountain of Dragonglass.

Name: jon snow
Sentence: I received this a few days ago from Dragonstone. It was sent to me by Tyrion Lannister.

Name: jon snow
Sentence: He's now Hand of the Queen to Daenerys Targaryen. She intends to take the Iron Throne from Cersei Lannister. She has a powerful army at her back and if this message is to be believed, three dragons.

Name: jon snow
Sentence: Lord Tyrion has invited me to Dragonstone to meet with Daenerys and I'm going to accept.

Name: jon snow
Sentence: We need this Dragonglass, My Lords. We know that Dragonglass can destroy both White Walkers and their army. We need to mine it and turn it into weapons.

Name: jon snow
Sentence: But more importantly, we need allies. The Night King's army grows larger by the day. We can't defeat them on our own. We don't have the numbers. Daenerys has her own army and she has dragon fire. I need to try and persuade her to fight with us. Ser Davos and I will ride for White Harbor tomorrow, then sail for Dragonstone.

Name: sansa stark
Sentence: Have you forgotten what happened to our grandfather? The Mad King invited him to King's Landing and roasted him alive.

Name: jon snow
Sentence: I know that.

Name: sansa stark
Sentence: She is here to reclaim the Iron Throne and the Seven Kingdoms. The north is one of those seven kingdoms. This isn't an invitation, it's a trap.

Name: jon snow
Sentence: It could be, but I don't believe Tyrion would do that. You know him. He's a good man.

Name: yohn royce
Sentence: Your Grace, with respect I must agree with Lady Sansa. I remember the Mad King all too well. A Targaryen cannot be trusted, nor can a Lannister.

Name: robett glover
Sentence: We called your brother king, and then he rode south and lost his kingdom.

Name: lyanna mormont
Sentence: Winter is here, Your Grace. We need the King in the North in the north.

Name: jon snow
Sentence: You all crowned me your king. I never wanted it, I never asked for it, but I accepted it because the north is my home. It's part of me and I will never stop fighting for it, no matter the odds. But the odds are against us. None of you have seen the Army of the Dead. None of you. We can never hope to defeat them alone. We need allies, powerful allies. I know it's a risk. But I have to take it.

Name: sansa stark
Sentence: Then send an emissary. Don't go yourself.

Name: jon snow
Sentence: Daenerys is a queen. Only a king can convince her to help us. It has to be me.

Name: sansa stark
Sentence: You're abandoning your people. Your abandoning your home.

Name: jon snow
Sentence: I'm leaving both in good hands.

Name: sansa stark
Sentence: Whose?

Name: jon snow
Sentence: Yours. You are my sister. You are the only Stark in Winterfell. Until I return, the north is yours.

Name: petyr baelish
Sentence: I delivered his bones myself. I presented them to Lady Catlyn as a gesture of goodwill from Tyrion Lannister. It seems like a lifetime ago. Do give Lord Tyrion my best when you see him.

Name: petyr baelish
Sentence: I was sorry when he died. Your father and I had our differences but he loved Cat very much. So did I. She wasn't fond of you, was she? Well, it appears she vastly underestimated you. Your father and brothers are gone, yet here you stand King in the North. Last best hope against the coming storm.

Name: jon snow
Sentence: You don't belong down here.

Name: petyr baelish
Sentence: Forgive me. We have never talked properly. I wanted to remedy that.

Name: jon snow
Sentence: I have nothing to say to you.

Name: petyr baelish
Sentence: Not even thank you? If it weren't for me you'd have been slaughtered at that battlefield. You have many enemies, My King, but I swear to you I'm not one of them. I love Sansa as I loved her mother.

Name: jon snow
Sentence: Touch my sister and I'll kill you myself.

Name: arya stark
Sentence: Nymeria?

Name: arya stark
