Sentence: Nymeria, it's me, Arya. I'm heading north, girl, back to Winterfell. I'm finally going home. Come with me.

Name: arya stark
Sentence: Come with me.

Name: arya stark
Sentence: That's not you.

Name: nymeria
Sentence: You can't have them all. It's not fair.

Name: obara
Sentence: I'm oldest.

Name: tyene
Sentence: Momma will want Cersei for herself.

Name: obara
Sentence: She's not my momma. You can have Cersei. I want The Mountain.

Name: nymeria
Sentence: The Mountain killed father. He'll crush you with one hand.

Name: tyene
Sentence: Father got careless. That's what Momma says.

Name: obara
Sentence: Will you shut up about Momma? Momma, momma.

Name: tyene
Sentence: Maybe I'll kill you both before we take King's Landing and then I won't have to share.

Name: ellaria
Sentence: How can you drink this piss? When we reach Sunspear I'll treat you to a Dornish red, the best in the world. Have you ever been to Dorne?

Name: yara greyjoy
Sentence: A few times. Never stayed long.

Name: ellaria
Sentence: A boy in every port?

Name: yara greyjoy
Sentence: A boy, a girl. Depends on the port.

Name: ellaria
Sentence: Could we get some more?

Name: yara greyjoy
Sentence: I thought it wasn't for you.

Name: ellaria
Sentence: I'm developing a taste for it.

Name: yara greyjoy
Sentence: He's not your servant.

Name: theon greyjoy
Sentence: It's fine.

Name: ellaria
Sentence: So, you're going to be Queen of the Iron Islands.

Name: yara greyjoy
Sentence: Once I kill my uncle.

Name: ellaria
Sentence: And what will you be, handsome?

Name: theon greyjoy
Sentence: Whatever my queen demands.

Name: yara greyjoy
Sentence: He'll be my advisor, my protector.

Name: ellaria
Sentence: Oh, I see. Your protector.

Name: ellaria
Sentence: So if someone gets too close to you --

Name: yara greyjoy
Sentence: He might have to intervene.

Name: ellaria
Sentence: hold that person back.

Name: yara greyjoy
Sentence: Until they've made their intentions known.

Name: ellaria
Sentence: Why are you standing all the way over there then? A foreign invasion is under way. It seems like you don't need a protector.

Name: yara greyjoy
Sentence: Stay here.

Name: yara greyjoy
Sentence: Euron.

Name: yara greyjoy
Sentence: Your mother is below deck. Keep her safe.

Name: ellaria
Sentence: Kill us! Get it over with!

Name: euron greyjoy
Sentence: Give your uncle a kiss.

Name: euron greyjoy
Sentence: Theon!

Name: euron greyjoy
Sentence: Ah, come on your cockless hound. I have her. Come and get her.

Name: end
Sentence: CREDITS

Name: tyrion lannister
Sentence: The bastard of Winterfell.

Name: jon snow
Sentence: The dwarf of Casterly Rock.

Name: tyrion lannister
Sentence: I believe we last saw each other on top of the wall.

Name: jon snow
Sentence: You were pissing off the edge, if I remember right. You picked up some scars along the road.

Name: tyrion lannister
Sentence: It's been a long road. But we're both still here.

Name: tyrion lannister
Sentence: I'm Tyrion Lannister.

Name: davos
Sentence: Davos Seaworth.

Name: tyrion lannister
Sentence: and DAVOS shake hands.

Name: tyrion lannister
Sentence: Ah, the Onion Knight. We fought on opposite sides at the Battle of Blackwater Bay.

Name: davos
Sentence: Unluckily for me.

Name: tyrion lannister
Sentence: Missandei is the queen's most trusted advisor.

Name: missandei
Sentence: Welcome to Dragonstone. Our queen knows this is a long journey. She appreciates the effort you have made on her behalf. If you wouldn't mind handing over your weapons.

Name: jon snow
Sentence: Of course.

Name: missandei
Sentence: Please, this way.

Name: davos
Sentence: Where are you from? I can't place the accent.

Name: missandei
Sentence: I was born on the Island of Naarth.

Name: davos
Sentence: Ah. I hear it's beautiful down there. Palm trees and butterflies. I haven't been myself.

Name: davos
Sentence: This place has changed.

Name: tyrion lannister
Sentence: And Sansa, I hear she's alive and well.

Name: jon snow
Sentence: She is.

Name: tyrion lannister
Sentence: Does she miss me terribly?

Name: tyrion lannister
Sentence: A sham marriage and unconsummated.

Name: jon snow
Sentence: I didn't ask --

Name: tyrion lannister
Sentence: Well, it was. It wasn't. Anyway, she's much smarter than she lets on.

Name: jon snow
Sentence: She's starting to let on.

Name: tyrion lannister
Sentence: Good. At some point I want to hear how a Knight's Watch recruit became King in the North.

Name: jon snow
Sentence: As long as you tell me how a Lannister became Hand to Daenerys Targaryen.

Name: tyrion lannister
Sentence: A long and bloody tale. To be honest, I was drunk for most of it.

Name: jon snow
Sentence: My bannermen think I'm a fool for coming here.

Name: tyrion lannister
Sentence: Of course they do. If I was your hand I would have advised against it. General rule of thumb, Stark men don't fare well when they travel south.

Name: jon snow
Sentence: True. But I'm not a Stark.

Name: tyrion lannister
Sentence: I'd say you get used to them, but you never really do.

Name: tyrion lannister
Sentence: Come. Their mother is waiting for you.

Name: varys
Sentence: I wondered why you weren't there to meet our guests. You begged us to summon the King in the North. Don't you want to see him again?

Name: melisandre
Sentence: I've done my part. I've brought ice and fire together.

Name: varys
Sentence: Strange. You spoke so highly of Jon Snow but when he arrives you hide on a cliff. I didn't take you for a bashful girl.

Name: melisandre
Sentence: My time whispering in the ears of kings has come to an end.

Name: varys
Sentence: Oh, I doubt that. Give us common folk one taste of power we're like the lion who tasted man. Nothing is ever so sweet again.

Name: melisandre
Sentence: Neither of us is common folk anymore. I did not part on good terms with the King in the North, or his advisor.

Name: varys
Sentence: Why?

Name: melisandre
Sentence: Because of mistakes I made. Terrible mistakes. I would only be a distraction if I stayed.

Name: varys
Sentence: So where will you go?

Name: melisandre
Sentence: Volantis.

Name: varys
Sentence: Good. If you don't mind my saying, I don't think you should return to Westeros. I'm not sure you'd be safe here.

Name: melisandre
Sentence: I will return, dear spider. One last time.

Name: varys
Sentence: My Lady --

Name: melisandre
Sentence: I have to die in this strange country, just like you.

Name: missandei
Sentence: You stand in the presence of Daenerys Stormborn of House Targaryen, rightful heir to the Iron Throne, rightful Queen of the Andals and the First Men, Protector of the Seven Kingdoms, the Mother of Dragons, the Khaleesi of the Great Grass Sea, The Unburnt, The Breaker of Chains.

Name: davos
Sentence: This is Jon Snow.

Name: davos
Sentence: He's King in the North.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Sentence: Thank you for traveling so far, My Lords. I hope the seas weren't too rough.

Name: jon snow
Sentence: The winds were kind, Your Grace.

Name: davos
Sentence: Apologies. I have a Flea Bottom accent, I know. But Jon Snow is King in the North, Your Grace. He's not a lord.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Sentence: Forgive me --

Name: tyrion lannister
Sentence: Your Grace, this is Ser Davos Seaworth.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Sentence: Forgive me, Ser Davos. I never did receive a formal education, but I could have sworn the last King in the North was Torren Stark who bent the knee to my ancestor Aegon Targaryen in exchange for his life and the lives of the northmen. Torren Stark swore fealty to House Targaryen in perpetuity. But do I have my facts wrong?

Name: davos
Sentence: I wasn't there, Your Grace.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Sentence: No. Of course not. But still, an oath is an oath. In perpetuity means -- what does perpetuity mean, Lord Tyrion?

Name: tyrion lannister
Sentence: Forever.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Sentence: Forever. So I assume, My Lord, that you're here to bend the knee.

Name: jon snow
Sentence: I am not.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Sentence: Oh. Well, that is unfortunate. You've travelled all this way to break faith with House Targaryen?

Name: jon snow
Sentence: Break faith? Your father burned my grandfather alive. He burned my uncle alive. He would have burned the Seven Kingdoms.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Sentence: My father was an evil man. On behalf of House Targaryen I ask your forgiveness for the crimes he committed against your family. And I ask you not to judge a daughter by the sins of her father. Our two houses were allies for centuries. Those were the best centuries the kingdom's ever known. Centuries of peace and prosperity with the Targaryens sitting on the Iron Throne and a Stark serving as Warden of the North. I am the last Targaryen, Jon Snow. Honor the pledge your ancestor made to mine. Bend the knee and I will name you Warden of the North. Together we will save this country from those who would destroy it.

Name: jon snow
Sentence: You're right. You're not guilty of your father's crime. And I'm not beholden to my ancestor's vows.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Sentence: Then why are you here?

Name: jon snow
Sentence: Because I need your help and you need mine.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Sentence: Did you see three dragons flying overhead when you arrived?

Name: jon snow
Sentence: I did.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Sentence: And did you see the Dothraki, all of whom have sworn to kill for me?

Name: jon snow
Sentence: They're hard to miss.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Sentence: But still, I need your help?

Name: davos
Sentence: Not to defeat Cersei. You could storm King's Landing tomorrow and the city would fall. Hell, we almost took it and we didn't even have dragons.

Name: tyrion lannister
Sentence: Almost.

Name: jon snow
Sentence: But you haven't stormed King's Landing. Why not? The only reason I can see is you don't want to kill thousands of innocent people. It's the fastest way to win the war but you won't do it. Which means at the very least you're better than Cersei.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Sentence: Still, that doesn't explain why I need your help.

Name: jon snow
Sentence: Because right now you and I and Cersei and everyone else, we're children playing at a game screaming that the rules aren't fair.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Sentence: You told me you liked this man.

Name: tyrion lannister
Sentence: I do.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Sentence: In the time since he's met me he's refused to call me queen, he's refused to bow and now he's calling me a child.

Name: tyrion lannister
Sentence: I believe he's calling all of us children. Figure of speech.

Name: jon snow
Sentence: Your Grace, everone you know will die before winter is over if we don't defeat the enemy to the north.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Sentence: As far as I can see, you are the enemy to the north.

Name: jon snow
Sentence: I am not your enemy. The dead are the enemy.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Sentence: The dead?

Name: daenerys targaryen
Sentence: Is that another figure of speech?

Name: jon snow
Sentence: The Army of the Dead is on the march.

Name: tyrion lannister
Sentence: The Army of the Dead?

Name: jon snow
Sentence: You don't know me well, My Lord, but do you think I am a liar or a madman?

Name: tyrion lannister
Sentence: No, I don't think you're either of those things.

Name: jon snow
Sentence: The Army of the Dead is real. The White Walkers are real. The Knight King is real. I've seen them. If they get past the wall and we're squabbling amongst ourselves --

Name: jon snow
Sentence: we're finished.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Sentence: I was born at Dragonstone. Not that I can remember it.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Sentence: We fled before Robert's assassins could find us. Robert was your father's best friend, no? I wonder if your father knew his best friend sent assassins to murder a baby girl in her crib. Not that it matters now of course. I spent my life in foreign lands. So many men have tried to kill me. I don't remember all of their names. I have been sold like a brood mare. I have been chained and betrayed, raped and defiled. Do you know what kept me standing through all those years in exile? Faith. Not in any gods. Not in myths and legends. In myself. In Daenerys Targaryen. The world hadn't seen a dragon in centuries until my children were born. The Dothraki hadn't crossed the sea. Any sea.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Sentence: They did for me. I was born to rule the Seven Kingdoms. And I will.

Name: jon snow
Sentence: You'll be ruling over a graveyard if we don't defeat the Night King.

Name: tyrion lannister
Sentence: The war against my sister has already begun. You can't expect us to halt hostilities and join you in fighting --

Name: tyrion lannister
Sentence: whatever you saw beyond the wall.

Name: davos
Sentence: You don't believe him. I understand that. It sounds like nonsense.

Name: davos
Sentence: But if destiny has brough Daenerys Targaryen back to our shores, it has also made Jon Snow King in the North. You were the first to bring Dothraki to Westeros. He was the first to make allies with Wildlings and northmen. He was named Lord Commander of the Night's Watch. He was named King in the North. Not because of his birthright. He has no birthright. He's a damn bastard. All those hard son's of bitches chose him as their leader because they believe in him.

Name: davos
Sentence: All those things you don't believe in, he faced those things. He fought those things for the good of his people. He risked his life for his people. He took a knife in the heart for his people. He gave his own --

Name: davos
Sentence: If we don't put asside our enmities and band together we will die. And then it doesn't matter whose skeleton sits on the Iron Throne.

Name: tyrion lannister
Sentence: If it doesn't matter you might as well kneel.

Name: tyrion lannister
Sentence: Swear your allegiance to Queen Daenerys. Help her to defeat my sister and together our armies will protect the north.

Name: jon snow
Sentence: There's no time for that. There's no time for any of this. While we stand here debating --

Name: tyrion lannister
Sentence: It takes no time to bend the knee. Pledge your sword to her cause.

Name: jon snow
Sentence: And why would I do that?

Name: jon snow
Sentence: I mean no offense, Your Grace, but I don't know you. As far as I can tell your claim to the throne rests entirely on your father's name. And my own father fought to overthrow the Mad King. The lords of the north placed their trust in me to lead them. And I will continue to do so as well as I can.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Sentence: That's fair. It's also fair to point out that I'm the rightful queen of the Seven Kingdoms. By declaring yourself king of the northern most kingdom, you are in open rebellion.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Sentence: You must forgive my manners. You will both be tired after your long journey. We'll have baths drawn for you and supper sent to your rooms.

Name: jon snow
Sentence: Am I your prisoner?

Name: daenerys targaryen
Sentence: Not yet.

Name: varys
Sentence: Our Iron Born and Dornish allies were attacked on route to Dorne.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Sentence: And?

Name: varys
Sentence: Two or three ships escaped. The rest sunk our captured. Ellaria and the sand snakes dead or captured. The Greyjoys are dead or captured.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Sentence: All of them?

Name: captain
Sentence: Your sister's dead?

Name: theon greyjoy
Sentence: Euron has her.

Name: captain
Sentence: You saw him take her? And you got away?

Name: theon greyjoy
Sentence: I couldn't save her. I tried.

Name: captain
Sentence: You wouldn't be here if you tried.

Name: euron greyjoy
Sentence: This is the life. Look at them. Cheering for a Greyjoy.

Name: euron greyjoy
Sentence: I have to be honest, it's making me hard. Did you see little Theon's face right before he jumped overboard?

Name: euron greyjoy
Sentence: Oh no!

Name: euron greyjoy
Sentence: What a twat.

Name: euron greyjoy
Sentence: My queen. Please accept this gift on behalf of all of your loyal subjects in the Iron Islands.

Name: euron greyjoy
Sentence: I give you --

Name: euron greyjoy
Sentence: what no other man could give. Justice. Justice for your murdered daughter.

Name: cersei lannister
Sentence: You've proven yourself the greatest captain on the 14 seas and a true friend to the crown.

Name: euron greyjoy
Sentence: A bit more than a true friend.

Name: cersei lannister
Sentence: And you deserve a proper reward for your heroism.

Name: euron greyjoy
Sentence: There's only one reward I want.

Name: cersei lannister
Sentence: You shall have what your heart desires --

Name: cersei lannister
Sentence: when the war is won.

Name: cersei lannister
Sentence: With Euron Greyjoy commanding our naval forces and Jaime Lannister leading our armies, the sons and daugters of Westeros shall defend our country.

Name: euron greyjoy
Sentence: There's nothing quite like it, is there? The love of the people. I suppose you wouldn't know.

Name: jaime lannister
Sentence: This same mob spat at my sister not long ago, and if you turn on us, they'll cheer to see your head mounted on a spike.

Name: euron greyjoy
Sentence: Or yours. They just like severed heads really. Listen, if you have any advice at all I'd love to hear it when we have an hour or two to speak as brothers.

Name: jaime lannister
Sentence: Advice?

Name: euron greyjoy
Sentence: Does she like it gentle or rough? A finger in the bum?

Name: euron greyjoy
Sentence: Shhh, shhh, shhh, not now. We'll talk later.

Name: cersei lannister
Sentence: I want you to know I understand. Even though we're enemies, you and I, I understand the fear that drives you. I was there that day when Ser Gregor crushed your lover's head. I close my eyes I can hear the sound of Oberyn's skull breaking.

Name: cersei lannister
Sentence: The sound of your scream. I never heard a sound like that. I thought, that's true love. Oberyn looked beautiful that day. He really did. No one moved like him. No one had such skill with a spear. Even Ser Gregor couldn't stop him. If only he hadn't taunted him. He could have walked away and left poor Ser Gregor to die. But that wasn't your lover's way, was it? Now he's burried somewhere. And here Ser Gregor is stronger than ever. That must be difficult for you. When my daughter was taken from me, my only daughter, well, you can't imagine how that feels unless you've lost a child. I fed her at my own breast even though they told me to give her to the wet nurse. I couldn't bear to see her in another woman's arms. I never got to have a mother. But Myrcella did. She was mine and you took her from me. Why did you do that?

Name: cersei lannister
Sentence: It doesn't matter now.

Name: cersei lannister
Sentence: Your daughter is a beauty too. Brown eyes, those lips. A perfect Dornish beauty.

Name: cersei lannister
Sentence: I imagine she is your favorite.

Name: cersei lannister
Sentence: I know, I know, we're not supposed to have favorites. But still, we're only human. We love who we love.

Name: cersei lannister
Sentence: I'm sorry. I can't understand you. The gag makes it difficult to understand what you're saying. It must be frustrating.

Name: cersei lannister
Sentence: We all make our choices. You chose to murder my daughter. You must have felt powerful after you made that choice.

Name: cersei lannister
Sentence: Do you feel powerful now? I don't sleep very well, not at all really. I lie in bed and I stare at the canopy and imagine ways of killing my enemies. How to destroy Ellaria Sand, the woman who murdered my only daughter. I thought about having Ser Gregor crush your skull the way he did Oberyn's. It would be poetic I suppose but fast. Too fast.

Name: cersei lannister
Sentence: I thought about having him crush your daughter's skull.

Name: cersei lannister
Sentence: She's so beautiful. The thought of this lovely face cracking open like a duck egg, no, it's just not right.

Name: tyene
Sentence: Momma!

Name: cersei lannister
Sentence: Qyburn, he's the cleverest man I know. Clever enough to learn what poison you used to murder Myrcella. The long goodbye, was that it?

Name: qyburn
Sentence: The Long Farewell.

Name: cersei lannister
Sentence: That's the one.

Name: cersei lannister
Sentence: How long does the poison take?

Name: qyburn
Sentence: Difficult to say. Hours, days, it depends on the subject's constitution.

Name: cersei lannister
Sentence: But death is certain?

Name: qyburn
Sentence: Oh yes, Your Grace, quite certain.

Name: cersei lannister
Sentence: Your daughter will die here in this cell. You will be here watching when she does. You will be here the rest of your days. If you refuse to eat we will force food down your throat. You will live to watch your daughter rot, to watch that beautiful face collapse to bone and dust all the while contemplating the choices you've made.

Name: cersei lannister
Sentence: Make sure the guards change the torches every few hours. I don't want her to miss a thing.

Name: jaime lannister
Sentence: No.

Name: jaime lannister
Sentence: Don't.

Name: jaime lannister
Sentence: What are you doing? No one can see us like this ?

Name: cersei lannister
Sentence: I am queen of the Seven Kingdoms. I'll do as I please.

Name: messenger
Sentence: Forgive me, Your Grace. The visitor from Braavos has arrived.

Name: cersei lannister
Sentence: Good. And we'll need fresh sheets for the bed.

Name: messenger
Sentence: At once, Your Grace.

Name: tycho
Sentence: No, thank you.

Name: tycho
Sentence: My condolences, Your Grace, on the death of your son. From all reports he was a fine young man.

Name: cersei lannister
Sentence: The Iron Bank didn't send you hear to offer condolences.

Name: tycho
Sentence: Condolences and congratulations. You've become the first ruling queen in the Seven Kingdoms. That's quite an accomplishment. The Iron Bank appreciates how you cast off the yoke of superstition freeing the crown from elements that sought to subvert the rule of law.

Name: cersei lannister
Sentence: The destruction of the Sept of Baelor was a tragic accident.

Name: tycho
Sentence: Indeed. But sometimes tragedies are necessary to restore order and rational leadership.

Name: cersei lannister
Sentence: The Iron Bank wants its gold back.

Name: tycho
Sentence: Your father never minced words either. But, yes, your debts are considerable. And you are now engaged in a conflict on several fronts. We both know how expensive war can be.

Name: cersei lannister
Sentence: And we both know gold wins wars. Your vaults are empty. Your late husbando s profligacy saw to that.

Name: tycho
Sentence: Your wealthiest ally is the Tyrells who are now your enemies. You're surrounded on all sides by rivals for the throne.

Name: cersei lannister
Sentence: And the Iron Bank wants to bet on a winner.

Name: tycho
Sentence: We don't make bets. We invest in endeavors we deem likely to be successful.

Name: cersei lannister
Sentence: That's a fancy way of saying bet. The war has already begun. I've drawn first blood. I decapitated the Dornish snake. My armada owns the Narrow Sea.

Name: tycho
Sentence: Euron Greyjoy's armada owns the Narrow Sea.

Name: cersei lannister
Sentence: Euron Greyjoy is loyal to me.

Name: tycho
Sentence: For now. Daenerys Targaryen has three full grown dragons. How well do wooden ships fare against fire breathing dragons?

Name: cersei lannister
Sentence: Her dragons might not be as invulnerable as some think. Now, let's talk about the Targaryen girl. You want to invest in her? I'm guessing the Iron Bank invested considerable gold in the slave trade. How are you profits now that Daenerys has freed all the slaves?

Name: tycho
Sentence: The slave trade has entered a down turn, it's true.

Name: cersei lannister
Sentence: From what I gather she considers herself more of a revolutionary that a monarch. In your experience how do bankers usually fare with revoltionaries?

Name: cersei lannister
Sentence: The Lannisters owe the Iron Bank quite a lot of money but Lannisters always pay their debts. Do former slaves or Dothraki or dragons?

Name: tycho
Sentence: Your father's daughter indeed.

Name: cersei lannister
Sentence: Give me a fortnight. Stay in King's Landing as my honored guest and when you return to Braavos I swear to you my debt will be paid in full.

Name: tyrion lannister
Sentence: I came out here to brood over my failure to predict the Greyjoy attack. You're making it difficult. You look a lot better brooding than I do. You make me feel like I'm failing at brooding over failing.

Name: jon snow
Sentence: I'm a prisoner on this island.

Name: tyrion lannister
Sentence: I wouldn't say you're a prisoner on this island. You're free to walk the castle, the beaches, to go wherever you want.

Name: jon snow
Sentence: Except to my ship. They took my ship.

Name: tyrion lannister
Sentence: I wouldn't say we took your ship.

Name: jon snow
Sentence: I'm not playing word games with you. The dead are coming for us all.

Name: tyrion lannister
Sentence: Why don't you figure out what to do about my missing fleet and murdered allies, and I'll figure out what to do about your walking dead men.

Name: jon snow
Sentence: It's hard for me to fathom. It really is. If someone told me about the White Walkers and the Night King --

Name: jon snow
Sentence: You probably don't believe me.

Name: tyrion lannister
Sentence: I do actually.

Name: jon snow
Sentence: You didn't before. Grumpkins and snarks you called them. Do you remember? You said it was all nonsense.

Name: tyrion lannister
Sentence: It was all nonsense. Everybody knew it. But then Mormont saw them and you saw them, and I trust the eyes of an honest man more than I trust what everybody knows.

Name: jon snow
Sentence: How do I convince people who don't know me that an enemey they don't believe in is coming to kill them all?

Name: tyrion lannister
Sentence: Good question.

Name: jon snow
Sentence: I know it's a good question. I'm looking for an answer.

Name: tyrion lannister
Sentence: People's minds aren't made for problems that large. White Walkers, the Night King, Army of the Dead, it's almost a relief to confront a familiar monster like my sister.

Name: jon snow
Sentence: I need to help prepare my people for what's coming. I can't help them from here. I'd like to leave.

Name: tyrion lannister
Sentence: It seems unlikely that you became King in the North by giving up that easily.

Name: jon snow
Sentence: Everyone told me to learn from my father's mistakes. Don't go south. Don't answer a summons from the Mad King's daughter, a foreign invader. And here I am. A northern fool.

Name: tyrion lannister
Sentence: Children are not their fathers, luckily for all of us. And sometimes there's more to foreign invaders than northern fools that meets the eye. Daenerys could have sailed for Westeros long ago but she didn't. Instead she stayed where she was and saved many people from horrible fates some of whom are on this island with us right now. While you're our guest here you might consider asking them what they think of the Mad King's daughter. She protects people from monsters, just as you do. That's why she came here. And she's not about to head north to fight an enemy she's never seen on a word of a man she doesn't know after a single meeting. That's not a reasonable thing to ask.

Name: tyrion lannister
Sentence: So do you have anything reasonable to ask?

Name: jon snow
Sentence: What do you mean?

Name: tyrion lannister
Sentence: Maybe you are a northern fool. I'm asking if there's something I can do to help you.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Sentence: Dragonglass?

Name: tyrion lannister
Sentence: Yes. Volcanic glass, obsidian. He says you have a tremendous amount of it here.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Sentence: Why are we talking about glass? We just lost two of our allies.

Name: tyrion lannister
Sentence: Which is why I was speaking to Jon Snow, a potential ally.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Sentence: And what does the King in the North want with Dragonglass?

Name: tyrion lannister
Sentence: Apparently it can be turned into weapons that kill White Walkers and their foot soldiers, or stop them, destroy them. I'm unsure of the nomenclature.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Sentence: And what do you think of this Army of the Dead and White Walkers and Night Kings?

Name: tyrion lannister
Sentence: I'd very much like to believe that Jon Snow is wrong, but a wise man once said that you should never believe a thing simply because you want to believe it.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Sentence: Which wise man said this?

Name: tyrion lannister
Sentence: I don't remember.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Sentence: Are you trying to present your own statements as ancient wisdom?

Name: tyrion lannister
Sentence: I would never do that...to you. The reason I believe Jon Snow is because he's here. All of his advisors would have told him not to come. I would have told him not to come, yet he's here anyway. You don't have to believe him. Let him mine the Dragonglass. If he's wrong it's worthless. You didn't even know it was here. It's nothing to you. Give him something by giving him nothing. Take a step toward a more productive relationship with a possible ally. Keep him occupied while we focus on the task at hand. Casterly Rock.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Sentence: What was that Ser Davos said about taking a knife in the heart for his people? Did you notice that?

Name: tyrion lannister
Sentence: You must allow them their flights of fancy. It's dreary in the north.

Name: jon snow
Sentence: Amazing thing to see.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Sentence: I named them for my brothers Vicerys and Rhaegon. They're both gone now.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Sentence: You lost two brothers as well?

Name: daenerys targaryen
Sentence: People thought dragons were gone forever but here they are. Perhaps we should all be examining what we think we know.

Name: jon snow
Sentence: You've been talking to Tyrion?

Name: daenerys targaryen
Sentence: He is my Hand.

Name: jon snow
Sentence: He enjoys talking.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Sentence: We all enjoy what we're good at.

Name: jon snow
Sentence: I don't.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Sentence: You know I'm not going to let Cersei stay on the Iron Throne.

Name: jon snow
Sentence: I never expected that you would.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Sentence: And I haven't changed my mind about which kingdoms belong to the throne.

Name: jon snow
Sentence: I haven't either.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Sentence: I will allow you to mine the Dragonglass and forge weapons from it. Any resources or men you need I will provide for you.

Name: jon snow
Sentence: Thank you.

Name: jon snow
Sentence: So you believe me then about the Night King and the Army of the Dead?

Name: daenerys targaryen
Sentence: You better get to work, Jon Snow.

Name: sansa stark
Sentence: How much do we have?

Name: wolkan
Sentence: 4,000 bushels, My Lady.

Name: sansa stark
Sentence: What does that mean?

Name: yohn
Sentence: For the current occupants of the castle it's enough food for a year, perhaps more.

Name: sansa stark
Sentence: What's the longest winter in the past 100 years?

Name: wolkan
Sentence: I'm not entirely certain. I'll check Maester Llewyn's records. He kept a copy of every raven scroll.

Name: sansa stark
Sentence: You're telling me we don't have enough food, especially not if the armies of the north come back to defend Winterfell.

Name: wolkan
Sentence: No, My Lady, most likely not.

Name: sansa stark
Sentence: We must prepare for that eventuality. Every direction the threat comes from, this is the best place to be. We need to start building up our grain stores with regular shipments from every keep in the north. If we don't use it by winter's end we'll give it back to them, but if the entire north has to flee to Winterfell there won't be enough time to bring wagonloads of grain with them.

Name: yohn
Sentence: Very wise, My Lady.

Name: sansa stark
Sentence: Maester Wolkan, you'll see to it?

Name: sansa stark
Sentence: Are they covering those breastplates in leather?

Name: yohn
Sentence: No, My Lady.

Name: sansa stark
Sentence: Well, shouldn't they be once the real cold comes?

Name: yohn
Sentence: They should indeed. Pardon me, My Lady.

Name: yohn
Sentence: You there, why isn't there leather on these?

Name: petyr baelish
Sentence: Command suits you. The northerns are all facing north worried about the threat beyond the wall.

Name: sansa stark
Sentence: So they should be.

Name: petyr baelish
Sentence: I know Cersei better than anyone here. If you turn your back on her --

Name: sansa stark
Sentence: You don't know Cersei better than anyone here.

Name: petyr baelish
Sentence: I only meant to say --

Name: sansa stark
Sentence: That the woman who murdered my mother, father and brother is dangerous? Thank you for your wise council.

Name: petyr baelish
Sentence: One of two things will happen. Either the dead will defeat the living, in which case all our troubles come to an end. Or life will win out. And what then?

Name: petyr baelish
Sentence: Don't fight in the north or the south. Fight every battle everywhere always in your mind. Everyone is your enemy, everyone is your friend, every possible series of events is happening all at once. Live that way and nothing will surprise you. Everything that happens will be something that you've seen before.

Name: guard
Sentence: Lady Sansa, at the gate.

Name: bran stark
Sentence: Hello, Sansa.

Name: sansa stark
Sentence: I wish Jon was here.

Name: bran stark
Sentence: Yes. I need to speak to him.

Name: sansa stark
Sentence: Your father's last living true born son. You're Lord of Winterfell.

Name: bran stark
Sentence: I can never be the Lord of Winterfell. I can never be lord of anything. I'm the three-eyed raven.

Name: sansa stark
Sentence: I don't know what that means.

Name: bran stark
Sentence: It's difficult to explain.

Name: sansa stark
Sentence: Try, please, for me.

Name: bran stark
Sentence: It means I can see everything. Everything that's ever happened to everyone. Everything that's happening right now. It's all pieces, fragments. I need to learn to see better. When the long night comes again I need to be ready.

Name: sansa stark
Sentence: How do you know all of this?

Name: bran stark
Sentence: The three-eyed raven taught me.

Name: sansa stark
Sentence: I thought you were the three-eyed raven.

Name: bran stark
Sentence: I told you it's difficult to explain.

Name: sansa stark
Sentence: Bran --

Name: bran stark
Sentence: I'm sorry for all that's happened to you. I'm sorry it had to happen here at our home. It was so beautiful that night. Snow falling just like now. And you were so beautiful in your white wedding dress.

Name: sansa stark
Sentence: I have to go back inside, Bran.

Name: bran stark
Sentence: I'll stay a bit longer.

Name: marwyn
Sentence: Hmm.

Name: marwyn
Sentence: Hmm. Does it hurt?

Name: jorah mormont
Sentence: A bit. Less than before.

Name: marwyn
Sentence: The infection no longer appears to be active.

Name: marwyn
Sentence: Unusual. Unlikely. One could almost be forgiven for thinking the entire upper layer of diseased skin was debrided and the underlying region treated with some sort of ointment.

Name: jorah mormont
Sentence: I don't know anything about that. I just started feeling better. I assumed it was the rest that did it.

Name: jorah mormont
Sentence: And the climate.

Name: marwyn
Sentence: The climate? You're free to go, Ser. This chamber is needed for the infectious, which you are no longer.

Name: marwyn
Sentence: Tarley, I'd like to speak with you in my study this evening.

Name: jorah mormont
Sentence: How bad is it?

Name: sam tarly
Sentence: I suppose I'll find out this evening.

Name: sam tarly
Sentence: Where will you go?

Name: jorah mormont
Sentence: I surrendered to this sickness the moment I first saw it. I knew it would kill me or I'd kill myself before it could. Daenerys Stormborn convinced me otherwise. The only place for me is with her.

Name: jorah mormont
Sentence: I owe my life to her and you.

Name: sam tarly
Sentence: Your father saved me more than once. It's the least I could do.

Name: jorah mormont
Sentence: Perhaps our paths will cross again?

Name: sam tarly
Sentence: I hope they do.

Name: marwyn
Sentence: You treated him?

Name: sam tarly
Sentence: Yes.

Name: marwyn
Sentence: Who told you to treat him?

Name: sam tarly
Sentence: No one.

Name: marwyn
Sentence: Who forbade you or anyone to attempt to treat him?

Name: sam tarly
Sentence: I seem to remember you.

Name: marwyn
Sentence: But you treated him anyway?

Name: sam tarly
Sentence: I did.

Name: marwyn
Sentence: I forbade it because it's dangerous and rarely successful. Especially on someone of that age. You could have infected yourself and others. You could have devastated the entire Citadel. But you didn't. It's a meticulous, difficult procedure. Many maesters whose chains are heavy with healing links have attempted it and failed. But you succeeded. How?

Name: sam tarly
Sentence: I read the books and followed the instructions.

Name: marwyn
Sentence: That man is alive because of you. You should be proud.

Name: sam tarly
Sentence: Thank you, Archmaester.

Name: marwyn
Sentence: Come here.

Name: marwyn
Sentence: All these manuscripts and scrolls and rotting away. I need you to make copies of them.

Name: marwyn
Sentence: You were expecting a reward? Your reward is not being immediately expelled from the Citadel. You'd better get started. Be mindful of the paper mites. They like flesh as well.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Sentence: We need to find Euron Greyjoy's fleet and sink it.

Name: varys
Sentence: Your Grace, he's already destroyed a good portion of our fleet. To send our remaining ships after him --

Name: daenerys targaryen
Sentence: I'm not talking about sending our ships after him.

Name: tyrion lannister
Sentence: But you'll have to go yourself. Euron's ships could be anywhere or in more than one place. You'd be flying around the open seas alone for who knows how long.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Sentence: I wouldn't be alone. I'd have Drogon, Vicerion and Rhaegal. What can anyone do to them?

Name: missandei
Sentence: They can still do something to you. It only takes one arrow.

Name: tyrion lannister
Sentence: It's too great a risk. You're too important.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Sentence: What about Casterly Rock?

Name: varys
Sentence: The Unsullied will be there soon.

Name: missandei
Sentence: And what will they face?

Name: varys
Sentence: A difficult situation. They know we're coming.

Name: tyrion lannister
Sentence: Yes. Cersei believes my sole purpose in life is to destroy House Lannister. She will be ready.

Name: tyrion lannister
Sentence: No one has ever taken the rock.

Name: tyrion lannister
Sentence: The Lannister army is still the army my father built. Well trained and well provisioned. 10,000 men at least. They will see us coming.

Name: tyrion lannister
Sentence: They will be ready.

Name: man
Sentence: Draw! Loose!

Name: tyrion lannister
Sentence: The gates of Casterly Rock are impregnable.

Name: tyrion lannister
Sentence: The fight up the walls will be hard. We'll be at a disadvantage. Many men will die.

Name: tyrion lannister
Sentence: Interesting thing about my father. He built our house up from near ruin. He built our army. He built Casterly Rock as we know it, but he didn't build the sewers. That was beneath him. So he gave the job to the lowest person he could find. Me. He was right. I was low. The company I kept low, women mostly. They weren't welcome at the Rock. Father disapproved of that sort of behavior. I couldn't walk them through the front gates. I couldn't have them in my chambers. So in the process of building the sewers I threw in something for myself.

Name: tyrion lannister
Sentence: It was a passage that began by the sea and ended beneath one of the main guard towers.

Name: tyrion lannister
Sentence: No better place for low pursuits. Casterly Rock, the impregnable fortress.

Name: tyrion lannister
Sentence: As a good friend of mine once said, "give me 10 good men and I'll impregnate the bitch."

Name: tyrion lannister
Sentence: And so it begins. They will face the bulk of the Lannister forces. They will be outnumbered. They will have less armor and fewer weapons.

Name: tyrion lannister
Sentence: But as my sister's armies fights for her, the Unsullied will be fighting for something greater. They will be fighting for freedom and the person who gave it to them. They will be fighting for you. And that is why they will triump.

Name: unsullied
Sentence: There are none left.

Name: grey worm
Sentence: There are supposed to be more than this. Many more.

Name: grey worm
Sentence: Where are they? Where are the rest of the Lannisters?

Name: olenna tyrell
Sentence: It's done?

Name: jaime lannister
Sentence: It is.

Name: olenna tyrell
Sentence: And now the rains weep for our whores. Did we fight well?

Name: jaime lannister
Sentence: I suppose as well as can be expected.

Name: olenna tyrell
Sentence: It was never our forte. Golden roses indeed. Your brother and his new queen thought you would be defending Casterly Rock.

Name: jaime lannister
Sentence: The truth is Casterly Rock isn't worth much anymore. Well, it is to me. My fond childhood memories won't keep Cersei on the throne.

Name: olenna tyrell
Sentence: So you'll just let them take it?

Name: jaime lannister
Sentence: For now. They won't be able to hold it. Euron Greyjoy's navy burned their ships, we emptied the larders before we left. Eventually they'll be forced to abandon their position and march all the way across Westeros.

Name: olenna tyrell
Sentence: And you took your army, your real army, and went where they weren't?

Name: jaime lannister
Sentence: As Robb Stark did to me at Whispering Wood. There are always lessons in failures.

Name: olenna tyrell
Sentence: Yes. You must be very wise by now.

Name: jaime lannister
Sentence: My father always said I was a slow learner.

Name: olenna tyrell
Sentence: If he was so clever why didn't he take Highgarden the moment your gold mines ran dry? I suppose I'll be able to ask him myself soon enough. No more learning from my mistakes, eh? How will you do it? With that sword?

Name: olenna tyrell
Sentence: That was Joffrey's sword, wasn't it? Not that he ever used it. What did he call it?

Name: jaime lannister
Sentence: Widow's Wail.

Name: olenna tyrell
Sentence: He really was a cunt, wasn't he? I did unspeakable things to protect my family, or watched them being done on my orders. I never lost a night's sleep over them. They were necessary. And whatever I imagined necessary for the safety of House Tyrell I did. But your sister has done things I wasn't capable of imagining. That was my prize mistake, a failure of imagination. She's a monster, you do know that?

Name: jaime lannister
Sentence: To you, sure. To others as well. But after we've won and there's no one left to oppose us, the people living peaceful in the world she built, do you really think they'll wring their hands over the way she built it?

Name: olenna tyrell
Sentence: You love her. You really do love her. You poor fool. She'll be the end of you.

Name: jaime lannister
Sentence: Possibly. Not much to be gained from discussing it with you though, is there?

Name: olenna tyrell
Sentence: What better person to discuss it with? What better guarantee could you have that the things you say will never leave this room? But perhaps you're right. If she's driven you this far it's gone beyond your control.

Name: jaime lannister
Sentence: Yes, it has.

Name: olenna tyrell
Sentence: She's a disease. I regret my role in spreading it. You will too.

Name: jaime lannister
Sentence: I think we're done here.

Name: olenna tyrell
Sentence: How will it happen?

Name: jaime lannister
Sentence: Cersei had several ideas. Whipping you through the streets and beheading you in front of the Red Keep. Flaying you alive and hanging you from the walls of King's Landing. I talked her out of those.

Name: olenna tyrell
Sentence: Will there be pain?

Name: jaime lannister
Sentence: No. I made sure of that.

Name: olenna tyrell
Sentence: That's good.

Name: olenna tyrell
Sentence: I'd hate to die like your son clawing at my neck, foam and bile spilling from my mouth, eyes blood red, skin purple. It must have been horrible for you as a Kingsguard, as a father. It was horrible enough for me. A shocking scene. Not at all what I intended. You see, I'd never seen the posion work before. Tell Cersei. I want her to know it was me.

Name: end
Sentence: CREDITS

Name: jaime lannister
Sentence: Halt that wagon!

Name: jaime lannister
Sentence: opens the carriage. It is filled with gold bars and coins. He picks up a large sack and hands it to BRONN.

Name: bronn
Sentence: You just won the biggest prize in the world. What could you possibly have to be upset about? Come on. You can tell me. Queen of Thorns give you one last prick in the balls before saying goodbye?

Name: jaime lannister
Sentence: I'll save my confessions for the High Septon.

Name: bronn
Sentence: There is no more High Septon.

Name: jaime lannister
Sentence: No, there isn't, is there?

Name: bronn
Sentence: There is still the question of my prize.

Name: jaime lannister
Sentence: is putting a padlock on the wagon bearing the gold. He stops and turns to BRONN.

Name: jaime lannister
Sentence: That's a lot of money I just gave you.

Name: bronn
Sentence: It's not a castle.

Name: bronn
Sentence: turns and points to Highgarden.

Name: bronn
Sentence: How about that one? It's available.

Name: jaime lannister
Sentence: You don't want Highgarden.

Name: bronn
Sentence: I beg to differ.

Name: jaime lannister
Sentence: We're at war. Daenerys Targaryen could come take it back the day after you move in. Besides, think of the upkeep. The more you own, the more it weighs you down.

Name: bronn
Sentence: Oh, is that why you're so fucking glum, eh? All your new riches weighing you down?

Name: jaime lannister
Sentence: pounds on the back of the carriage and the horses start trotting.

Name: jaime lannister
Sentence: They're not mine. The gold belongs to the Iron Bank. We pay our debts.

Name: bronn
Sentence: Right. Just not to me.

Name: jaime lannister
Sentence: Bronn of the Blackwater, formerly of whatever nameless shit heap you're from with a saddlebag full of gold complaining about not getting paid. When we win this war all the castles in the Seven Kingdoms will be yours to choose from with no one left to take them away from you.

Name: bronn
Sentence: Yes, I'm sure Queen Cersei's reign will be quiet and peaceful.

Name: jaime lannister
Sentence: Stranger things have happened.

Name: bronn
Sentence: Like what?

Name: randyll
Sentence: TARLEY and his son DICKON come riding up on horseback. RANDYLL addresses JAIME.

Name: randyll
Sentence: The granaries are being emptied and loaded into wagons, My Lord.

Name: jaime lannister
Sentence: The current harvest?

Name: dickon
Sentence: We have teams of men collecting it and more farmers in the Reach.

Name: jaime lannister
Sentence: looks over to BRONN.

Name: jaime lannister
Sentence: Ser Bronn, will you accompany the Tarleys and help them accelerate this process?

Name: bronn
Sentence: I'm not much for shoveling weight.

Name: jaime lannister
Sentence: No, but motivating reluctant farmers to hand over their harvest, I've heard you guys have a real talent for that.

Name: randyll
Sentence: My Lord.

Name: dickon
Sentence: My Lord.

Name: randyll
Sentence: DICKON and BRONN break away from the Lannister army and ride into the distance. Horse drawn carts are carrying spoils from Highgarden and Lannister men are marching down the road.

Name: cersei lannister
Sentence: and TYCHO NESTORIS from the Iron Bank of Braavos are sitting having a discussion.

Name: tycho
Sentence: I must say, I don't think the Iron Bank has ever had a debt of this magnitude repaid in a single installment. I always considered your father a very effective and efficient man, but you appear to be redefining those terms entirely.

Name: cersei lannister
Sentence: You're too kind, My Lord.

Name: tycho
Sentence: I am neither kind, nor a lord, Your Grace. I am merely an instrument of the institution I represent, its wellbeing is a matter of arithmetic, not sentiment. And the current arithmetic is outstanding. The gold --

Name: cersei lannister
Sentence: Is on its way. My brother is supervising its transportation himself.

Name: tycho
Sentence: Some at the Iron Bank will be disappointed. They've grown rather fond of your interest payments.

Name: cersei lannister
Sentence: We must devise a way to raise their spirits.

Name: tycho
Sentence: Yes. Perhaps we could be of assistance in some current venture.

Name: cersei lannister
Sentence: My only venture at the moment is reestablishing control over this continent and every person on it.

Name: tycho
Sentence: I see a great deal of potential in that venture. I imagine that it would require outside investment?

Name: cersei lannister
Sentence: It will indeed. I need to expand my armies, my navies. My hand, Qyburn, had made overtures to the Golden Company in Essos.

Name: tycho
Sentence: I know them well. They've helped us recover significant sums from parties who had fallen into deep arrears.

Name: cersei lannister
Sentence: That's good to hear. I too would like them to recover some things that belong to me.

Name: tycho
Sentence: Rest assured, Your Grace, you can count on the Iron Bank's support, as soon as the gold arrives.

Name: bran stark
Sentence: is sitting in a wheelchair. PETER BAELISH is sitting next to him. BAELISH unsheathes a Valyrian steel dagger and shows it to BRAN. It's the same dagger used in the attempt to assassinate BRAN years ago.

Name: petyr baelish
Sentence: This is for you.

Name: petyr baelish
Sentence: flips the knife in his hand and extends it towards BRAN.

Name: petyr baelish
Sentence: The last man who wielded it meant to cut your throat, but your mother fought him off.

Name: bran stark
Sentence: reaches out and takes the knife, turning it and looking it over carefully.

Name: petyr baelish
Sentence: The other dagger, the one that took her life, I would have stopped that dagger with my own heart if I could have. I wasn't there for her when she needed me most. But I am here for her now. To do what she would have done, to protect her children. Anything I can do for you, Brandon, you need only ask.

Name: bran stark
Sentence: Do you know who this belonged to?

Name: petyr baelish
Sentence: No. That very question was what started the War of the Five Kings. In a way, that dagger made you what you are today. Forced from your home, driven out to the wilds beyond the Wall. I imagine you've seen things most men wouldn't believe.

Name: petyr baelish
Sentence: hands the sheath of the knife to BRAN. BRAN slides the knife into the sheath.

Name: petyr baelish
Sentence: To go through all of that and make your way home again only to find such chaos in the world, I can only imagine --

Name: bran stark
Sentence: Chaos is a ladder.

Name: bran stark
Sentence: is staring at BAELISH. BAELISH stops speaking. The door opens and Meera appears.

Name: petyr baelish
Sentence: I'm sorry to have disturbed you, Lord Stark.

Name: petyr baelish
Sentence: stands up to leave.

Name: bran stark
Sentence: I'm not Lord Stark.

Name: petyr baelish
Sentence: bows and walks past Meera and closes the door.

Name: meera
Sentence: notices BRAN sitting in a wheelchair.

Name: meera
Sentence: What's that?

Name: bran stark
Sentence: Maester Wolkan built it for me so I can move around more easily.

Name: meera
Sentence: It's a very good idea.

Name: bran stark
Sentence: You're leaving?

Name: meera
Sentence: I don't want to leave you, but when they come I need to be with my family. And you're safe, safe as anyone can be now. You don't need me anymore.

Name: bran stark
Sentence: No, I don't.

Name: meera
Sentence: That's all you've got to say?

Name: bran stark
Sentence: Thank you.

Name: meera
Sentence: Thank you?

Name: bran stark
Sentence: For helping me.

Name: meera
Sentence: My brother died for you. Hodor and Summer died for you. I almost died for you. Bran!

Name: bran stark
Sentence: I'm not really, not anymore. I remember what it felt like to be Brandon Stark, but I remember so much else now.

Name: meera
Sentence: begins to cry.

Name: meera
Sentence: You died in that cave.

Name: meera
Sentence: turns to walk out the door. She hesitates looking at BRAN, then walks out.

Name: arya stark
Sentence: approaches the main gate on foot. Two guards are huddled by a brazier getting warm. There's indistinct chatter. One of the men notice ARYA walking to the gate and approach her.

Name: man
Sentence: Hey, oh. Where are you going?

Name: arya stark
Sentence: In there. I live here.

Name: man
Sentence: Fuck off.

Name: arya stark
Sentence: I'm Arya Stark. This is my home.

Name: man
Sentence: Arya Stark is dead.

Name: arya stark
Sentence: Send for Maester Llewyn or Ser Rodrick. They'll tell you who I am.

Name: man
Sentence: There's no Rodrick here.

Name: man
Sentence: Maester's name is Wolkan.

Name: arya stark
Sentence: Go ask Jon Snow then, the King in the North. He's my brother

Name: man
Sentence: He's a thousand miles away.

Name: man
Sentence: It's cold. We're busy. So, you know, best fuck off.

Name: man
Sentence: Mm-hmm.

Name: arya stark
Sentence: If Jon Snow is gone who is in charge of Winterfell?

Name: man
Sentence: The Lady of Winterfell, Lady Stark.

Name: arya stark
Sentence: Which Lady Stark?

Name: man
Sentence: You tell us. You're the one impersonating her sister.

Name: arya stark
Sentence: Tell Sansa her sister is home.

Name: man
Sentence: Lady Sansa is too busy to waster her breath on you, just like us. So for the last time, fuck off.

Name: man
Sentence: 1 goes to grab Arya but she easily dodges out of his grasp.

Name: arya stark
Sentence: I'm getting into this castle one way or another. If I'm not who I say I am, I won't last long. But if I am, and Sansa finds out that you turned me away...

Name: arya stark
Sentence: keeps glancing at the men. They look uneasy. They bring her inside of the gate. They indicate towards a cart near the entrance.

Name: man
Sentence: You sit there. Right there. Don't move.

Name: man
Sentence: Go tell Lady Stark. I'll watch her.

Name: arya stark
Sentence: is glancing around Winterfell. Men are working building tools and cutting wood. ARYA looks over and sees a Winterfell flag sigil hanging from the wall. The two guards are still arguing.

Name: man
Sentence: You tell her.

Name: man
Sentence: I'm not.

Name: man
Sentence: Because if you don't I'll hit you right in the fucking face as hard as I can.

Name: man
Sentence: We told her to wait. We were standing right next to her.

Name: sansa stark
Sentence: sighs.

Name: man
Sentence: When we turned around she had gone, My Lady. She was nothing. Some winter town girl.

Name: man
Sentence: She comes in asking for Ser Rodrick and Maester Llewyn.

Name: man
Sentence: Don't trouble yourself over it, My Lady. We'll find her.

Name: sansa stark
Sentence: You don't have to. I know where she is.

Name: arya stark
Sentence: is standing look at a statue of Ned Stark holding his sword. ARYA hears a sound and turns to see SANSA approaching. SANSA stops when she sees ARYA.

Name: arya stark
Sentence: Do I have to call you Lady Stark now?

Name: sansa stark
Sentence: hesitates for a moment.

Name: sansa stark
Sentence: Yes.

Name: sansa stark
Sentence: begins smiling then walking towards ARYA. SANSA reaches out and hugs ARYA.

Name: sansa stark
Sentence: You shouldn't have run from the guards.

Name: arya stark
Sentence: I didn't run. You need better guards.

Name: sansa stark
Sentence: smirks at ARYA.

Name: arya stark
Sentence: It suits you, Lady Stark. Jon left you in charge?

Name: sansa stark
Sentence: He did. I hope he comes back soon. I remember how happy he was to see me. When he sees you, his heart will probably stop.

Name: arya stark
Sentence: That doesn't look like him. It should have been carved by someone who knew his face.

Name: sansa stark
Sentence: Everyone who knew his face is dead.

Name: arya stark
Sentence: We're not.

Name: arya stark
Sentence: turns to face SANSA.

Name: arya stark
Sentence: They say you killed Joffrey. Did you?

Name: sansa stark
Sentence: I wish I had.

Name: arya stark
Sentence: Me too. I was angry when I heard someone else had done it. However long my list got he was always first.

Name: sansa stark
Sentence: Your list?

Name: arya stark
Sentence: Of people I'm going to kill.

Name: sansa stark
Sentence: begins to laugh. ARYA joins her.

Name: sansa stark
Sentence: How did you get back to Winterfell?

Name: arya stark
Sentence: It's a long story. I imagine yours is too.

Name: sansa stark
Sentence: Yes. It's not a very pleasant one.

Name: arya stark
Sentence: Mine neither, but our stories aren't over yet.

Name: sansa stark
Sentence: No, they're not.

Name: sansa stark
Sentence: Arya, Bran's home too.

Name: arya stark
Sentence: smiles and looks at SANSA. SANSA doesn't smile back. The smile fades from ARYA's face.

Name: bran stark
Sentence: is sitting next to the Weirwood tree. SANSA and ARYA approach. BRAN turns to look at them. BRAN begins speaking to ARYA.

Name: bran stark
Sentence: You came home.

Name: arya stark
Sentence: steps forward and throws her arms around BRAN. SANSA smiles in the background. ARYA lets go and steps back.

Name: bran stark
Sentence: I saw you at the crossroads.

Name: arya stark
Sentence: You saw me?

Name: bran stark
Sentence: I see quite a lot now.

Name: sansa stark
Sentence: Bran has visions.

Name: bran stark
Sentence: I thought you might go to King's Landing.

Name: arya stark
Sentence: So did I.

Name: sansa stark
Sentence: Why would you go back there?

Name: bran stark
Sentence: Cersei is on her list of names.

Name: arya stark
Sentence: stares at BRAN. ARYA turns to look at SANSA.

Name: sansa stark
Sentence: Who else is on your list?

Name: arya stark
Sentence: Most of them are dead already.

Name: bran stark
Sentence: produces the Valyrian dagger that BAELISH gave him and unsheathes it.

Name: arya stark
Sentence: Where did you get this?

Name: bran stark
Sentence: Littlefinger gave it to me.

Name: arya stark
Sentence: Littlefinger, he's here?

Name: arya stark
Sentence: turns to look at SANSA.

Name: sansa stark
Sentence: He's declared for House Stark.

Name: sansa stark
Sentence: steps up closer to BRAN and speaks to him.

Name: sansa stark
Sentence: Why would he give you a dagger?

Name: bran stark
Sentence: He thought I'd want it.

Name: sansa stark
Sentence: Why?

Name: bran stark
Sentence: Because it was meant to kill me.

Name: sansa stark
Sentence: The cutthroat after your fall?

Name: arya stark
Sentence: Why would a cutthroat have a Valyrian steel dagger?

Name: bran stark
Sentence: Someone very wealthy wanted me dead.

Name: sansa stark
Sentence: He's not a generous man. He wouldn't give you anything unless he thought he was getting something back.

Name: bran stark
Sentence: It doesn't matter.

Name: sansa stark
Sentence: What do you mean it doesn't matter?

Name: bran stark
Sentence: I don't want it.

Name: bran stark
Sentence: holds the knife out to ARYA. ARYA looks at BRAN.

Name: arya stark
Sentence: Are you sure? It's Valyrian steel.

Name: bran stark
Sentence: It's wasted on a cripple.

Name: arya stark
Sentence: looks down at the dagger. She steps forward and takes it from BRAN.

Name: arya stark
Sentence: is pushing BRAN in his wheelchair and SANSA is next to them. The Stark children are walking back through the gate of Winterfell. Men are milling around doing various jobs. BRIENNE and PODRICK see the Stark children all back at Winterfell together.

Name: podrick
Sentence: Catelyn Stark would be proud. You kept your vow.

Name: brienne
Sentence: I did next to nothing.

Name: podrick
Sentence: You're too hard on yourself, My Lady.

Name: brienne
Sentence: I'm not a --

Name: brienne
Sentence: pauses for a moment.

Name: brienne
Sentence: Thank you, Podrick.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Sentence: and MISSANDEI are walking along a path outside of Dragonstone followed by members of the Queensguard.

Name: missandei
Sentence: Your Grace, there's still no word from the Unsullied.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Sentence: Soon. They will come back to me.

Name: missandei
Sentence: He better.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Sentence: stops and turns to look at MISSANDEI. She then continues walking.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Sentence: What happened?

Name: missandei
Sentence: begins smirking.

Name: missandei
Sentence: Many things.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Sentence: Many things?

Name: jon snow
Sentence: Your Grace.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Sentence: looks at MISSANDEI then her Queensguard. She speaks in Valyrian and motions to her guard to stand down.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Sentence: It's all right.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Sentence: descends the stairs with MISSANDEI and they begin walking with JON. They walk along the beach until they reach a cave. DAVOS is waiting for them with a lit torch.

Name: jon snow
Sentence: I wanted you to see it before we start hacking it to bits.

Name: jon snow
Sentence: leads DAENERYS and MISSANDEI into the cave. He lights a brazier and illuminates the Dragonglass along the walls. He continues walking deeper into the cave.

Name: jon snow
Sentence: So this is it, all we'll ever need.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Sentence: is looking up at the walls of Dragonglass.

Name: jon snow
Sentence: There is something else I want to show your, Your Grace.

Name: jon snow
Sentence: and DAENERYS go to a further chamber in the cave. There are murals painted on the walls of Dragonglass.

Name: jon snow
Sentence: The Children of the Forest made these.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Sentence: When?

Name: jon snow
Sentence: A very long time ago.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Sentence: They were right here standing where we're standing before there were Targaryens or Starks or Lannisters. Maybe even before there were men.

Name: jon snow
Sentence: No.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Sentence: stops looking at the walls and turns to look at JON. JON walks to another wall and begins to examine the murals. The murals depict Children of the Forest and the First Men standing together.

Name: jon snow
Sentence: They were here together the Children and the First Men.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Sentence: Doing what? Fighting each other?

Name: jon snow
Sentence: takes DAENERYS by the arm and swings her torch to another part of the wall. There is a mural of the Night King and White Walkers.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Sentence: They fought together against their common enemy. Despite their differences, despite their suspicions, together. We need to do the same if we're going to survive.

Name: jon snow
Sentence: and DAENERYS look back at the wall with the Night King.

Name: jon snow
Sentence: Because the enemy is real. It's always been real.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Sentence: turns to look at JON.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Sentence: And you say you can't defeat them without my armies and my dragons?

Name: jon snow
Sentence: No, I don't think I can.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Sentence: steps forward closer to JON.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Sentence: I will fight for you. I will fight for the north...when you bend the knee.

Name: jon snow
Sentence: My people won't accept a southern ruler, not after everything they've suffered.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Sentence: steps even closer to JON until they're face to face.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Sentence: They will if their king does. They chose you to lead them. They chose you to protect them. Isn't their survival more important than your pride?

Name: jon snow
Sentence: and DAENERYS, DAVOS and MISSANDEI are walking out of the cave. As they exit TYRION and VARYS are standing on the beach awaiting them. DAENERYS begins addressing Tyrion.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Sentence: What is it?

Name: tyrion lannister
Sentence: We took Casterly Rock.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Sentence: That's very good to hear.

Name: tyrion lannister
Sentence: and VARYS look at each other. They aren't eager to deliver the bad news.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Sentence: Isn't it?

Name: davos
Sentence: You'll want to discuss this amongst yourselves. Perhaps --

Name: daenerys targaryen
Sentence: You will stay. All my allies are gone. They've been taken from me while I've been sitting here on this island.

Name: tyrion lannister
Sentence: We still have the largest army.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Sentence: Who won't be able to eat because Cersei has taken all the food from the Reach.

Name: tyrion lannister
Sentence: Call Grey Worm and the Unsullied back. We still have enough ships to carry the Dothraki to the mainland. Commit to the blockade of King's Landing. We have a plan. It's still the right plan.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Sentence: stops walking, turns and speaks harshly to Tyrion.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Sentence: The right plan? Your strategy has lost us Dorne, the Iron Islands and the Reach.

Name: tyrion lannister
Sentence: If I've underestimated our enemies --

Name: daenerys targaryen
Sentence: Our enemies? Your family, you mean. Perhaps you don't want to hurt them after all.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Sentence: begins looking out to the ocean. Three dragons are flying in the sky over the water.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Sentence: Enough with the clever plans.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Sentence: turns back and looks at TYRION.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Sentence: I have three large dragons. I'm going to fly them to the Red Keep.

Name: tyrion lannister
Sentence: We've discussed this.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Sentence: My enemies are in the Red Keep. What kind of a queen am I if I'm not willing to risk my life to fight them?

Name: tyrion lannister
Sentence: A smart one.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Sentence: looks over to JON SNOW.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Sentence: What do you think I should do?

Name: jon snow
Sentence: I would never presume to --

Name: daenerys targaryen
Sentence: I'm at war. I'm losing.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Sentence: begins walking close to JON.

Name: jon snow
Sentence: looks over the ocean at the dragons flying.

Name: jon snow
Sentence: I never thought that dragons would exist again. No one did. The people who follow you know that you made something impossible happen. Maybe that helps them believe that you can make other impossible things happen. Build a world that's different from the shit one they've always known.

Name: jon snow
Sentence: glances back towards the dragons.

Name: jon snow
Sentence: But if you use them to melt castles and burn cities, you're not different. You're just more of the same.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Sentence: looks back out to her dragons flying along the water.

Name: brienne
Sentence: and PODRICK are sparring. BRIENNE kicks PODS foot out from under him and he lands face first in the dirt.

Name: brienne
Sentence: Don't lunge.

Name: podrick
Sentence: pushes himself back up and picks up his sword. PODRICK attacks again. Brienne blocks his blows and kicks his foot out again.

Name: brienne
Sentence: Don't go where your enemy leads you.
