Sentence: is watching the sparring session from across the courtyard. She begins to approach Brienne.

Name: brienne
Sentence: Up.

Name: brienne
Sentence: begins striking at PODRICK while he blocks her blows. BRIENNE hits PODRICK in the stomach with the hilt of her sword and PODRICK lands on the ground.

Name: brienne
Sentence: And don't --

Name: arya stark
Sentence: Don't fight someone like her in the first place.

Name: podrick
Sentence: stands up and retrieves his sword. ARYA walks closer to speak to BRIENNE.

Name: brienne
Sentence: Nice sword. Very nice dagger.

Name: arya stark
Sentence: looks down at the Valyrian dagger and unsheathes it. She approaches BRIENNE flipping the knife several times in her fingers. BRIENNE takes the dagger and examines it.

Name: sansa stark
Sentence: and BAELISH are walking along the upper section of the courtyard having a conversation.

Name: sansa stark
Sentence: If they haven't contributed the right amount of grain to the stores then I'm afraid they'll have to make due with --

Name: sansa stark
Sentence: sees ARYA in the courtyard speaking with BRIENNE and stops to watch her.

Name: arya stark
Sentence: It's been awhile since I've trained.

Name: brienne
Sentence: I can go and find the Master of Arms for you, My Lady.

Name: arya stark
Sentence: He didn't beat the hound. You did. I want to train with you.

Name: brienne
Sentence: chuckles.

Name: arya stark
Sentence: You swore to serve both of my mother's daughters, didn't you?

Name: brienne
Sentence: nods her head in agreement.

Name: brienne
Sentence: Move aside, Podrick.

Name: podrick
Sentence: backs away. ARYA draws her sword, Needle.

Name: brienne
Sentence: You can't use that, My Lady. It's too small.

Name: arya stark
Sentence: I won't cut you. Don't worry.

Name: brienne
Sentence: smirks and raises her sword to a fighting posture.

Name: brienne
Sentence: I'll try not to.

Name: brienne
Sentence: strikes at ARYA who quickly sidesteps and parries the attack. BRIENNE attacks again and ARYA sidesteps, dodges multiple strikes and parries BRIENNE while smiling. ARYA strikes at BRIENNE and hits her hand causing BRIENNE to flinch and lose her two-handed grip on her sword. BRIENNE regains composure and starts to circle ARYA. BAELISH and SANSA are still watching from the upper balcony. ARYA is waiting for an attack with her sword behind her back. BRIENNE strikes and ARYA blocks her attacks, spins and stabs behind her back and hits BRIENNE in the knee causing BRIENNE's sword to strike the dirt. BRIENNE kicks ARYA in the stomach and sends ARYA to the ground. ARYA quickly gets back to her feet. BRIENNE overpowers ARYA and ARYA drops her sword on the ground. BRIENNE strikes again but ARYA dodges, draws her Valyrian dagger and puts it near BRIENNE's neck. BRIENNE and ARYA both stop fighting and sheathe their weapons smiling.

Name: brienne
Sentence: Who taught you to do that?

Name: arya stark
Sentence: No one.

Name: arya stark
Sentence: collects her sword. SANSA walks away. BAELISH remains on the balcony staring at ARYA who looks up at him. BAELISH bows to ARYA and walks away.

Name: jon snow
Sentence: and DAVOS are walking along the paths outside of Dragonstone having a discussion.

Name: davos
Sentence: What do you think of her?

Name: jon snow
Sentence: Who?

Name: davos
Sentence: sighs

Name: davos
Sentence: I believe you know of whom I speak.

Name: jon snow
Sentence: I think she has a good heart.

Name: davos
Sentence: A good heart? I've noticed you starring at that good heart.

Name: jon snow
Sentence: There's no time for that. I saw the Night King, Davos. I looked into his eyes. How many men do we have in the north to fight him? 10,000? Less?

Name: davos
Sentence: Fewer.

Name: jon snow
Sentence: What?

Name: davos
Sentence: and JON near the end of the path. MISSANDEI is standing along the path looking at the ocean.

Name: davos
Sentence: Speaking of good hearts, Missandei of Naarth.

Name: missandei
Sentence: turns to looks at DAVOS and JON.

Name: missandei
Sentence: Ser Davos, Lord Snow.

Name: davos
Sentence: King Snow, isn't it? No? That doesn't sound right. King Jon?

Name: jon snow
Sentence: It doesn't matter.

Name: missandei
Sentence: Forgive me, but may I ask a question?

Name: jon snow
Sentence: Of course.

Name: missandei
Sentence: Your name is Jon Snow, but your father's name was Ned Stark?

Name: jon snow
Sentence: I'm a bastard. My mother and father weren't married.

Name: davos
Sentence: Is the custom different in Naarth?

Name: missandei
Sentence: We don't have marriage in Naarth so the concept of a bastard doesn't exist.

Name: davos
Sentence: The sounds liberating.

Name: jon snow
Sentence: Why did you leave your homeland?

Name: missandei
Sentence: I was stolen away by slavers.

Name: jon snow
Sentence: I'm sorry.

Name: davos
Sentence: If I may, how did a slave girl come to advise Daenerys Targaryen?

Name: missandei
Sentence: She bought me from my master and set me free.

Name: davos
Sentence: That was good of her. Of course you're serving her now, aren't you?

Name: missandei
Sentence: I serve my queen because I want to serve my queen. Because I believe in her.

Name: jon snow
Sentence: And if you wanted to sail home to Naarth tomorrow --

Name: missandei
Sentence: Then she would give me a ship and wish me good fortune.

Name: jon snow
Sentence: You believe that?

Name: missandei
Sentence: I know it. All of us who came with her from Essos, we believe in her. She's not our queen because she's the daughter of some king we never knew. She's the queen we chose.

Name: davos
Sentence: You'll forgive me if I switch sides.

Name: jon snow
Sentence: notices a single ship sailing into the bay. It has a kraken sigil. MISSANDEI turns to look.

Name: jon snow
Sentence: Is that a Greyjoy ship?

Name: theon greyjoy
Sentence: GREYJOY and other Iron Born are pulling their landing boat onto the beach wading through the surf. They pull the boat onto the sand. JON SNOW, MISSANDEI, DAVOS and Dothraki guards are waiting to meet them. JON sees THEON and both men freeze and stare at each other. JON steps forward towards THEON.

Name: theon greyjoy
Sentence: Jon. I didn't know you were here.

Name: theon greyjoy
Sentence: steps closer to JON.

Name: theon greyjoy
Sentence: Sansa, is she all right?

Name: jon snow
Sentence: grabs THEON by his shirt and pulls him face to face.

Name: jon snow
Sentence: What you did for her is the only reason I'm not killing you.

Name: jon snow
Sentence: releases THEON.

Name: davos
Sentence: We heard your uncle attacked your fleet. We thought you were dead.

Name: theon greyjoy
Sentence: I should be.

Name: davos
Sentence: Your sister?

Name: theon greyjoy
Sentence: Euron has her. I came to ask the queen to help get her back.

Name: jon snow
Sentence: The queen is gone.

Name: theon greyjoy
Sentence: Where did she go?

Name: randyll
Sentence: All of the gold is safely through the gates of King's Landing.

Name: jaime lannister
Sentence: Good.

Name: randyll
Sentence: We need to get the last of these wagons over the Blackwater Rush before nightfall. If the head of the line is ambushed, the tail will never be able to reinforce in time.

Name: jaime lannister
Sentence: We are stretched a bit thin.

Name: randyll
Sentence: With your permission, flogging stragglers has a marked effect on mobility.

Name: jaime lannister
Sentence: Let's give them fair warning first. These men fought well at Highgarden.

Name: randyll
Sentence: is clearly disappointed. He turns and rides off back to the line of soldiers. JAIME and BRONN exchange glances, then follow RANDYLL. BRONN and JAIME are riding through the ranks. DICKON TARLEY sees JAIME and starts a conversation.

Name: dickon
Sentence: Ser Jaime.

Name: jaime lannister
Sentence: Rickon.

Name: dickon
Sentence: Dickon.

Name: bronn
Sentence: openly laughs in DICKON's face and looks at JAIME.

Name: jaime lannister
Sentence: I hear you fought bravely at Highgarden. Your first battle?

Name: dickon
Sentence: nods his head in agreement.

Name: jaime lannister
Sentence: And?

Name: dickon
Sentence: It was glorious.

Name: bronn
Sentence: Come on. Your father's not here.

Name: dickon
Sentence: All my life we've been pledged to House Tyrell. I knew some of those men. I hunted with them.

Name: jaime lannister
Sentence: They didn't deserve to die. But Lady Olenna chose to betray the queen and support the Targaryen girl. So here we are.

Name: dickon
Sentence: I didn't expect it to smell like that.

Name: bronn
Sentence: Men shit themselves when they die. Didn't they teach you that at fancy lad school?

Name: jaime lannister
Sentence: looks over at BRONN

Name: bronn
Sentence: Well, I learned it when I was 5.

Name: bronn
Sentence: pauses and strains to hear a noise far in the distance.

Name: jaime lannister
Sentence: What?

Name: bronn
Sentence: Listen.

Name: jaime lannister
Sentence: Spears and shields! Spears and shields!

Name: jaime lannister
Sentence: Spears and shields!

Name: bronn
Sentence: In line now!

Name: randyll
Sentence: is riding across the battlefield yelling orders to men.

Name: randyll
Sentence: Come on, lads. Not those wagons. Fall in line. Fall in line.

Name: dickon
Sentence: draws his sword. RANDYLL is yelling orders to the men.

Name: randyll
Sentence: Spears armed!

Name: bronn
Sentence: Get back to King's Landing.

Name: jaime lannister
Sentence: I'm not abandoning my army.

Name: bronn
Sentence: You're a commander, not a damned infantryman. These fuckers are about to swamp us.

Name: jaime lannister
Sentence: We can hold them off.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Sentence: Dracarys!

Name: drogon
Sentence: breathes fire into the first line of Lannister soldiers. The men burst into flames and start screaming. DICKON looks on in shock. A flanking group of Dothraki Screamers ride over the flames through the hole created by Drogon and start cutting men down. JAIME attempts to issue orders to the men.

Name: jaime lannister
Sentence: Hold the line!

Name: jaime lannister
Sentence: Archers! Archers with me!

Name: jaime lannister
Sentence: Knock!

Name: archers
Sentence: Knock! Draw!

Name: drogon
Sentence: loops around and is making a pass on JAIME and the archers. DAENERYS and DROGON are diving at the group of men.

Name: jaime lannister
Sentence: Loose!

Name: jaime lannister
Sentence: Qyburn's scorpion is over there.

Name: bronn
Sentence: Go get it then.

Name: jaime lannister
Sentence: I can't shoot with one hand.

Name: jaime lannister
Sentence: holds up his gold hand to illustrate his point.

Name: bronn
Sentence: hesitates for a moment. He turns his horse and rides to man the artillery crossbow. JAIME draws his sword and rides into battle.

Name: jaime lannister
Sentence: Come on!

Name: bronn
Sentence: Where are you?

Name: tyrion lannister
Sentence: walks to the edge of the battlefield accompanied by Dothraki guards. He can see Lannisters being slaughtered. One of the Dothraki guards begin to speak.

Name: guard
Sentence: Your people can't fight.

Name: tyrion lannister
Sentence: is watching the mayhem. Men are screaming and engulfed in flames. Horses and carriages run wild with no driver. JAIME is still on the battlefield struggling against the horde. Burning Lannister men are taking off their helmets revealing melted faces. Men crawl to the river in search of relief from the dragonfire. DROGON and DAENERYS are flying over the river creating wake in the water. JAIME sees her approaching his position.

Name: jaime lannister
Sentence: Take cover!

Name: drogon
Sentence: spits flames into the Lannister position. The men standing there are reduced to standing ash. The wind blows them away. BRONN is lining up DROGON in the sights of the crossbow. He reaches down and pulls the lever to fire. A bolt sails past DROGON and misses. BRONN reloads the machine. DROGON and DAENERYS circle around and dive on the crossbow. BRONN takes his time aiming his shot.

Name: bronn
Sentence: Come on you fucker.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Sentence: commands DROGON to fire at the crossbow.

Name: tyrion lannister
Sentence: Flee, you idiot!

Name: jaime lannister
Sentence: looks at DAENERYS and readies himself. He spurs his horse onward.

Name: jaime lannister
Sentence: Come on, boy. Come on!

Name: jaime lannister
Sentence: grabs the spear as he rides by and brings it up to position. JAIME's horse is galloping full speed on the edge of the river kicking up water. TYRION is watching JAIME's attempt to kill DAENERYS.

Name: tyrion lannister
Sentence: You fucking idiot.

Name: jaime lannister
Sentence: is getting close. DAENERYS turns at the last moment to see JAIME bearing down on her spear in hand. DROGON notices JAIME, turns his head and spews flames. BRONN appears from nowhere and manages to dive off of his horse and knock JAIME and himself in the water before they're both consumed by fire. Their horses are instantly burned to death. JAIME is being dragged down by a full set of armor into the dark water. JAIME sinks into blackness and out of sight.

Name: end
Sentence: CREDITS

Name: jaime lannister
Sentence: You could have killed me.

Sentence: What the fuck were you doing back there?

Name: jaime lannister
Sentence: Ending the war by killing her.

Name: bronn
Sentence: You saw the dragon between you and her?

Name: bronn
Sentence: looks incredulously at JAIME.

Name: bronn
Sentence: And?

Name: jaime lannister
Sentence: sits up and says nothing to BRONN. BRONN sits up and faces JAIME.

Name: bronn
Sentence: Listen to me, cunt. Till I get what I'm owed, a dragon doesn't get to kill you. You don't get to kill you. Only I get to kill you.

Name: jaime lannister
Sentence: That was only one of them. She has two more. If she decides to use them, to really use them --

Name: bronn
Sentence: You're fucked.

Name: jaime lannister
Sentence: Don't you mean we're fucked?

Name: bronn
Sentence: No, I do not. Dragons are where our partnership ends. I'm not going to be around when those things start spitting fire on King's Landing.

Name: jaime lannister
Sentence: I have to tell Cersei.

Name: bronn
Sentence: pauses and looks at JAIME.

Name: bronn
Sentence: Best well jump back in that river.

Name: bronn
Sentence: stands up and walks away. JAIME continues sitting on the shore looking at the smoke and fire from the distant battle.

Name: tyrion lannister
Sentence: is walking over an ash covered ground. There are burned bodies and cargo strewn about. Dothraki are looting dead Lannister soldies. A group of mounted Dothraki are escorting captured Lannister soldiers to where DAENERYS and DROGON are awaiting the prisoners. DAENERYS addresses the captured soldiers.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Sentence: I know what Cersei has told you, that I've come to destroy your cities --

Name: daenerys targaryen
Sentence: burn down your homes, murder you and orphan your children. That's Cersei Lannister, not me. I'm not here to murder. And all I want to destroy is the wheel that is rolled over rich and poor to the benefit of no one but the Cersei Lannisters of the world. I offer you a choice. Bend the knee and join me. Together we will leave the world a better place than we found it, or refuse and die.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Sentence: Step forward, My Lord.

Name: randyll
Sentence: takes several steps towards DAENERYS and stands in front of the kneeling Lannister men.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Sentence: You will not kneel?

Name: randyll
Sentence: I already have a queen.

Name: tyrion lannister
Sentence: My sister, she wasn't your queen until recently though, was she, until she murdered your rightful queen and destroyed House Tyrell for all time. So it appears your allegiances are somewhat flexible.

Name: randyll
Sentence: There are no easy choices in war. Say what you will about your sister, she was born in Westeros, has lived here all her life. You on the other hand, you murdered your own father and chose to support a foreign invader. One with no ties to this land, an army of savages at her back.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Sentence: You will not trade your honor for your life. I respect that.

Name: tyrion lannister
Sentence: turns to speak to DAENERYS.

Name: tyrion lannister
Sentence: Perhaps he could take the black, Your Grace. Whatever else he is, he is a true soldier. He would be invaluable at the Wall.

Name: randyll
Sentence: You cannot send me to the Wall. You are not my queen.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Sentence: turns to look at her Dothraki escort. The Dothraki walk forward to collect RANDYLL. As the men are pulling RANDYLL away DICKON steps forward.

Name: dickon
Sentence: You will have to kill me too.

Name: randyll
Sentence: pulls away from the Dothraki and turns to face his son.

Name: randyll
Sentence: Step back and shut your mouth.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Sentence: Who are you?

Name: randyll
Sentence: A stupid boy.

Name: dickon
Sentence: I'm Dickon Tarley, son of Randyll Tarley.

Name: tyrion lannister
Sentence: You are the future of your house. This war has already wiped one great house from the world. Don't let it happen again. Bend the knee.

Name: dickon
Sentence: looks to RANDYLL. RANDYLL nods to his son.

Name: dickon
Sentence: I will not.

Name: tyrion lannister
Sentence: turns to speak to DAENERYS. He speaks softly so no one but the queen can hear.

Name: tyrion lannister
Sentence: Your Grace, nothing strips bold notions from a man's head like a few weeks in a dark cell.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Sentence: I meant what I said. I'm not here to put men in chains. If that becomes an option many will take it. I gave them a choice. They made it.

Name: tyrion lannister
Sentence: Your Grace, if you begin beheading entire families --

Name: daenerys targaryen
Sentence: I'm not beheading anyone.

Name: tyrion lannister
Sentence: pauses and looks over the DROGON. DRGON roars and shakes his head and flexes his wings.

Name: tyrion lannister
Sentence: Your Grace --

Name: daenerys targaryen
Sentence: looks to her Dothraki escort and gives a signal. The men grab RANDYLL and DICKON and walk them over to DROGON. RANDYLL takes DICKON by the arm.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Sentence: Lord Randyll Tarley, Dickon Tarley, I, Daenerys of House Targaryen, First of my name, Breaker of Chains and Mother of Dragons, sentence you to die.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Sentence: pauses a moment and looks at RANDYLL and DICKON.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Sentence: Dracarys.

Name: drogon
Sentence: draws a deep breath and begins spewing dragonfire at the two men. They are instantly engulfed in flames. They both collapse into ash after a few seconds. There are two craters left where RANDYLL and DICKON stood. The Lannister men recoil in horror. Any Lannister soldier that was still standing kneels to the ground. DAENERYS silently turns and begins to walk off the battlefield.

Name: jaime lannister
Sentence: is quickly walking down the hall leading to CERSEI's room. As he approaches, QYBURN exits the queen's chambers.

Name: qyburn
Sentence: My Lord.

Name: jaime lannister
Sentence: passes by QYBURN without saying a word and barges into CERSEI's quarters. CERSEI stand and walks over to JAIME.

Name: cersei lannister
Sentence: How many men did we lose?

Name: jaime lannister
Sentence: We haven't done a full counting.

Name: cersei lannister
Sentence: It's armies that win wars. We have the Tyrell gold, we have the Iron Bank behind us. We can buy mercenaries.

Name: jaime lannister
Sentence: shakes his head.

Name: cersei lannister
Sentence: They're not the same as our men but they'll fight if they're well paid, which they will be.

Name: jaime lannister
Sentence: I just saw the Dothraki fight. They'll beat any mercenary army. They'll beat any army I've ever seen. Killing our men wasn't war for them, it was sport. Her dragon burned a thousand wagons. Qyburn's scorpion fired bolts bigger than you. They couldn't stop it. And she has three of them. This isn't a war we can win.

Name: cersei lannister
Sentence: So what do we do? Sue for peace? I sit on her father's throne, the father you betrayed and murdered. And in her mind she's winning. What sort of offer do you think she'd make?

Name: cersei lannister
Sentence: turns and walks away from JAIME.

Name: cersei lannister
Sentence: Maybe we can count on Tyrion to intercede on our behalf by way of apology for murdering our father and our son.

Name: jaime lannister
Sentence: He didn't.

Name: cersei lannister
Sentence: You saw the crossbow, you saw his body.

Name: jaime lannister
Sentence: walks across the room to where CERSEI is standing.

Name: jaime lannister
Sentence: I'm not talking about father. Tyrion didn't kill Joffrey. He had nothing to do with it.

Name: cersei lannister
Sentence: After all this time it still amazes me --

Name: jaime lannister
Sentence: It was Olenna. She confessed before she died.

Name: cersei lannister
Sentence: And this was before or after she drank the poison you so kindly provided her?

Name: jaime lannister
Sentence: After.

Name: cersei lannister
Sentence: And you believed her?

Name: jaime lannister
Sentence: If you were Olenna would you rather have seen your granddaughter married to Joffrey or Tommen? Which one would Margerey been better able to control? Which one would have made Olenna the true ruler of the Seven Kingdoms? She was telling the truth.

Name: cersei lannister
Sentence: looks away, then sits down.

Name: cersei lannister
Sentence: I shouldn't have listened to you. She should have died screaming.

Name: jaime lannister
Sentence: She's dead like her son, her grandchildren, her whole house. And if we don't find a way out of this war we'll follow them.

Name: cersei lannister
Sentence: So we fight and die or we submit and die. I know my choice. A soldier should know his.

Name: jon snow
Sentence: SNOW is standing on the edge of a cliff looking towards the ocean. DROGON roars and flies over him with DAENERYS on his back. DROGON lands next to JON and charges towards him. DROGON opens his jaws and roars in JON's face. DROGON creeps closer until he is inches from JON. JON removes his glove and slowly extends his hand toward DROGON. DROGON lowers his head and allows JON to touch him. DAENERYS looks surprised and steps down from her mount. DROGON turns and flies away.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Sentence: They're beautiful, aren't they?

Name: jon snow
Sentence: That wasn't the word I was thinking of, but, yes, they are. Gorgeous beasts.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Sentence: They're not beasts to me. No matter how big they get, how terrifying to everyone else, they're my children.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Sentence: turns to look at her three dragons as they fly over Dragonstone in the distance.

Name: jon snow
Sentence: You weren't gone long.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Sentence: turns back to JON.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Sentence: No.

Name: jon snow
Sentence: And?

Name: daenerys targaryen
Sentence: And I have fewer enemies today than I did yesterday.

Name: jon snow
Sentence: pauses and doesn't say anything.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Sentence: You're not sure how you feel about that?

Name: jon snow
Sentence: No, I'm not.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Sentence: turns and starts walking towards the castle, JON follows.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Sentence: How many men did your army kill taking Winterfell back from the Boltons?

Name: jon snow
Sentence: Thousands.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Sentence: We both want to help people. We can only help them from a position of strength. Sometimes strength is terrible. When you first came here Ser Davos said you took a knife in the heart for your people.

Name: jon snow
Sentence: Ser Davos gets carried away.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Sentence: So it was a figure of speech?

Name: jon snow
Sentence: doesn't say anything. A group of Dothraki guards approach DAENERYS and speak in their native tongue.

Name: guard
Sentence: This man says he is your friend, Khaleesi.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Sentence: He is my friend.

Name: jorah mormont
Sentence: kneels before DAENERYS.

Name: jorah mormont
Sentence: Your Grace.

Name: jorah mormont
Sentence: stands.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Sentence: Jon Snow, this is Ser Jorah Mormont, an old friend.

Name: jon snow
Sentence: I served with your father. He was a great man.

Name: jorah mormont
Sentence: nods to JON.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Sentence: You look strong. You found a cure?

Name: jorah mormont
Sentence: I wouldn't be here if I hadn't. I return to your service, my queen, if you'll have me.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Sentence: It would be my honor.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Sentence: steps forward and hugs JORAH.

Name: bran stark
Sentence: s eyes are pure white. They wash back to their normal color. He is sitting in front of the Weirwood. Maester Wolkan stands next to him.

Name: bran stark
Sentence: Ravens. We need to send ravens.

Name: wolkan
Sentence: nods his head to BRAN.

Name: archmaester
Sentence: MARWYN and other citadel maesters are seated at a council table. MARWYN has a raven scroll in his hand and the maesters are discussing the contents. SAMWELL enters the room carrying a large stock of books and scrolls. MARWYN points SAM to a nearby table to offload the books.

Name: maester
Sentence: I put very little stock in it myself. Prophecies of doom are never in short supply, especially when winter comes.

Name: marwyn
Sentence: I remember Wolkan. A bit timid but a sharp mind.

Name: maester
Sentence: The north has dulled many good maester's wits. I'm not sure if it's the cold, the drink, or the company.

Name: maester
Sentence: A crippled boy claims to have seen dead men on the march beyond the wall thanks to the magical help of a raven with three eyes.

Name: sam
Sentence: stops working and turns around.

Name: marwyn
Sentence: It is a bit much. Still we ought to --

Name: sam tarly
Sentence: Brandon Stark --

Name: sam tarly
Sentence: the crippled boy.

Name: marwyn
Sentence: Do you know him?

Name: sam tarly
Sentence: I let him through the Wall years ago. I saw him go beyond the wall.

Name: marwyn
Sentence: And?

Name: sam tarly
Sentence: Somehow a crippled boy survived for years beyond the wall when no one else could. Not the Night's Watch, not the Wildlings, no one. Perhaps we ought to listen to what he has to say.

Name: maester
Sentence: Perhaps you need more scribing work to discipline your mind.

Name: marwyn
Sentence: I sense a more detailed proposal is forthcoming.

Name: sam tarly
Sentence: steps forward and clears his throat.

Name: sam tarly
Sentence: Everyone in Westeros trusts and respects you. If you tell people the threat is real they'll believe it. If you advise all the lords to send their men north to hold the wall they'll do it. And if you tell every maester in the Citadel to search every word of every faded scroll about the long night, they may find something that lets us defeat the Army of the Dead for good.

Name: marwyn
Sentence: It could be done. And this news could be authentic. It's possible. It's also possible this message is part of a ploy by the dragon queen to lure southern armies away from the lands they are currently defending to open those lands to easy conquest.

Name: maester
Sentence: That does seem far more likely than magic birds talking to cripples.

Name: sam tarly
Sentence: Archmaester, please. It's real. I've seen it.

Name: marwyn
Sentence: We will write to Maester Wolkan at Winterfell for clarification. I promise you we will get to the truth of it one way or another.

Name: sam tarly
Sentence: Archmaester --

Name: marwyn
Sentence: That will be all, Tarley.

Name: sam
Sentence: turns to collect his work and leave. The maesters begin talking to one another.

Name: maester
Sentence: It brings to mind the work of Davy Moonstone, the charlatan who claimed to see the children of the forest.

Name: maester
Sentence: Don't forget the Prophet Lodock that promised the Drowned God would rise up and destroy Aegon the Conquerer.

Name: maester
Sentence: Is he the one whose father and brother were just burned alive?

Name: marwyn
Sentence: I'm afraid so.

Name: maester
Sentence: Horrible business.

Name: marwyn
Sentence: I don't have the heart to tell him yet. He's a good lad.

Name: marwyn
Sentence: crumples the raven scroll and throws it dismissevely on the table.

Name: marwyn
Sentence: Right. The ravenry was falling apart last time I checked...

Name: varys
Sentence: and TYRION are sitting on the stairs of the Throne Room alone. VARYS has a sealed raven scroll in his hand tapping it on the stone. TYRION is drinking a glass of wine having a discussion with VARYS.

Name: tyrion lannister
Sentence: All rulers demand that people bend the knee. It's why they're rulers. She gave Tarley a choice. A man who had taken up arms against her. What else could she do?

Name: varys
Sentence: Not burn him alive alongside his son.

Name: tyrion lannister
Sentence: I am her hand, not her head. I can't make her decisions for her.

Name: varys
Sentence: That's what I used to tell myself about her father. I found the traitors but I wasn't the one burning them alive. I was only a purveyor of information.

Name: varys
Sentence: reaches over to TYRION's cup of wine, picks it up and begins to drink from it. He grimaces as he drinks.

Name: varys
Sentence: It's what I told myself when I watched them beg for mercy, "I'm not the one doing it." As the pitch of their screams rose higher, "I'm not the one doing it." When their hair caught fire and the smell of the burning flesh filled the Thone Room, "I'm not the one doing it."

Name: varys
Sentence: drinks again and sets the cup down next to TYRION. TYRION picks it up.

Name: tyrion lannister
Sentence: Daenerys is not her father.

Name: varys
Sentence: And she never will be... with the right counsel. You need to find a way to make her listen.

Name: tyrion lannister
Sentence: looks down at the note in VARYS's hand.

Name: tyrion lannister
Sentence: Who is that for?

Name: varys
Sentence: Jon Snow.

Name: tyrion lannister
Sentence: Did you read it?

Name: varys
Sentence: It's a sealed scroll for the King in the North.

Name: tyrion lannister
Sentence: pauses and drinks from his cup of wine.

Name: tyrion lannister
Sentence: What's it say?

Name: varys
Sentence: Nothing good.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Sentence: and VARYS are seated at the painted table. TYRION and JORAH stand near the queen. DAVOS and JON SNOW are standing on the other end of the table. JON is holding a raven scroll and reading it.

Name: jon snow
Sentence: I thought Arya was dead. I thought Bran was dead.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Sentence: I'm happy for you. You don't look happy.

Name: jon snow
Sentence: Bran saw the Night King and his army marching towards Eastwatch. If they make it past the wall --

Name: varys
Sentence: The Wall has kept them out for thousands of years. Presumably --

Name: jon snow
Sentence: interrupts VARYS.

Name: jon snow
Sentence: I need to go home.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Sentence: You said you don't have enough men.

Name: jon snow
Sentence: We'll fight with the men we have. Unless you'll join us.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Sentence: And give the country to Cersei? As soon as I march away she marches in.

Name: tyrion lannister
Sentence: Perhaps not. Cersei thinks the Army of the Dead is nothing but a story made up by wet nurses to frighten children. What if we prove her wrong?

Name: jon snow
Sentence: I don't think she'll come see the dead at my invitation.

Name: tyrion lannister
Sentence: begins walking around the table closer to JON.

Name: tyrion lannister
Sentence: So bring the dead to her.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Sentence: I thought that was what we are trying to avoid.

Name: tyrion lannister
Sentence: We don't have to bring the whole army. Only one soldier.

Name: davos
Sentence: Is that possible?

Name: jon snow
Sentence: The first White I ever saw was brought into Castle Black from beyond the Wall.

Name: tyrion lannister
Sentence: Bring one of these things down to King's Landing and show her the truth.

Name: varys
Sentence: Anything you bring back will be useless unless Cersei grants us an audience and is somehow convinced not to murder us the moment we set foot in the capital.

Name: tyrion lannister
Sentence: The only person she listens to is Jaime. He may listen to me.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Sentence: And how would you get into King's Landing.

Name: davos
Sentence: I can smuggle you in, but if the Goldcloaks were to recognize you, I'm warning you, I'm not a fighter.

Name: tyrion lannister
Sentence: nods his head.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Sentence: Well, it will all be for nothing if we don't have one of these dead men.

Name: varys
Sentence: Fair point. How do you propose to find one?

Name: jon snow
Sentence: pauses and stares at the ground. JORAH breaks the silence.

Name: jorah mormont
Sentence: With the queen's permission I'll go north and take one.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Sentence: turns to look at JORAH.

Name: jorah mormont
Sentence: You asked me to find a cure so I could serve you. Allow me to serve you.

Name: jon snow
Sentence: The free folk will help us. They know the real north better than anyone.

Name: davos
Sentence: They won't follow Ser Jorah.

Name: jon snow
Sentence: They won't have to.

Name: davos
Sentence: You can't lead a raid beyond the wall. You're not in the Night's Watch anymore. You're King in the North.

Name: jon snow
Sentence: I'm the only one here whose fought them. I'm the only one here who knows them.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Sentence: I haven't given you permission to leave.

Name: jon snow
Sentence: With respect, Your Grace, I don't need your permission. I am a king. And I came here knowing that you could have your men behead me or your dragons burn me alive. I put my trust in you, a stranger, because I knew it was the best chance for my people, for all our people. Now I'm asking you to trust in a stranger because it's our best chance.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Sentence: pauses for a moment then nods her head in agreement.

Name: robett
Sentence: The King in the North should stay in the north. We did not choose you to rule us, My Lady, but perhaps we should have.

Name: yohn
Sentence: The Knights of the Vale came here for you, Lady Stark.

Name: sansa stark
Sentence: You're very kind, my lords, but Jon is our king. He is doing what he thinks is best.

Name: sansa stark
Sentence: and ARYA are walking through the hall to SANSA's quarters having a discussion.

Name: sansa stark
Sentence: I warned Jon this would happen. He can't leave the north and expect it to just sit and wait for him like Ghost.

Name: arya stark
Sentence: He didn't. He trusted you to hold it for him.

Name: sansa stark
Sentence: Well, he's not making it easy. The northern lords are proud.

Name: arya stark
Sentence: These are mother and father's chambers.

Name: sansa stark
Sentence: And?

Name: arya stark
Sentence: Nothing.

Name: sansa stark
Sentence: Don't do that.

Name: sansa stark
Sentence: turns around to face ARYA.

Name: arya stark
Sentence: What?

Name: sansa stark
Sentence: Say what you mean.

Name: arya stark
Sentence: You always liked nice things. It made you feel better than everyone.

Name: sansa stark
Sentence: drops the papers in her hand on a table and looks at ARYA.

Name: sansa stark
Sentence: Are you angry with me?

Name: arya stark
Sentence: They were insulting Jon and you sat there and listened.

Name: sansa stark
Sentence: I listened to their complaints, which is my responsibility as Lady of Winterfell.

Name: arya stark
Sentence: Their opinions are important to you?

Name: sansa stark
Sentence: Glover has 500 men. Royce has 2,000. Offend them and Jon loses his army.

Name: arya stark
Sentence: Not if they lose their heads first.

Name: sansa stark
Sentence: Winterfell didn't just fall into our hands. We took it back, and the Mormonts and the Hornwoods and the Wildlings and the Vale, all of us working together. Now, I'm sure cutting off heads is very satisfying, but that's not the way you get people to work together.

Name: arya stark
Sentence: And if Jon doesn't come back, you'll need their support, so you can work together to give you what you really want.

Name: sansa stark
Sentence: How can you even think such a horrible thing?

Name: arya stark
Sentence: You're thinking it right now. You don't want to be, but the thought just won't go away.

Name: sansa stark
Sentence: and ARYA stare at each in silence for a moment.

Name: sansa stark
Sentence: I have work to do.

Name: sansa stark
Sentence: turns and walks away from ARYA.

Name: arya stark
Sentence: My lady.

Name: arya stark
Sentence: exits the room.

Name: davos
Sentence: and TYRION are standing on the beach of King's Landing. DAVOS is securing a small row boat. TYRION is looking up towards the city walls.

Name: tyrion lannister
Sentence: Last time I was here I killed my father with a crossbow.

Name: davos
Sentence: Last time I was here you killed my son with wildfire.

Name: tyrion lannister
Sentence: turns to look at DAVOS. DAVOS walks next to TYRION and stakes the boat anchor into the sand.

Name: davos
Sentence: There's a path to the left that hugs the cliff. The guards hardly ever patrol it. Too many steps.

Name: tyrion lannister
Sentence: begins walking towards the path. DAVOS follows him and quickly takes the lead. TYRION stops and looks back towards the unattended boat.

Name: tyrion lannister
Sentence: You're not staying here?

Name: davos
Sentence: I've got my own business in Flea Bottom.

Name: tyrion lannister
Sentence: What if someone takes the boat?

Name: davos
Sentence: Then we're fucked. Best hurry.

Name: bronn
Sentence: and JAIME are walking by the dragon skulls. Both men have sparring swords in their hand.

Name: jaime lannister
Sentence: We don't have time for this. We should be preparing the city for a siege. The Dothraki are coming.

Name: bronn
Sentence: All the more reason for you to train. Unless you plan on fighting Dothraki 12 year olds.

Name: jaime lannister
Sentence: I seem to recall them giving you a bit of trouble as well.

Name: bronn
Sentence: And here I am ready to train.

Name: jaime lannister
Sentence: Why down here?

Name: bronn
Sentence: I don't think you want people to see how you look swinging that thing yet.

Name: jaime lannister
Sentence: Today might be the day I kill you by accident.

Name: bronn
Sentence: Oh, you won't be swinging it at me.

Name: bronn
Sentence: stops walking and holds his torch out. TYRION steps from around a pillar and looks at JAIME. JAIME looks angrily at BRONN.

Name: bronn
Sentence: I'll leave you to it.

Name: bronn
Sentence: turns and walks away leaving JAIME and TYRION alone.

Name: tyrion lannister
Sentence: I needed to see you and I knew you'd never agree to meet.

Name: jaime lannister
Sentence: remains silent and stares at TYRION.

Name: tyrion lannister
Sentence: You made me look like a complete fool. I thought I'd surprise you by hitting Casterly Rock, but you were three steps ahead of me. You abandoned the family home. Completely unsentimental. Father would have been proud.

Name: jaime lannister
Sentence: Don't talk about our father.

Name: tyrion lannister
Sentence: Listen to me --

Name: jaime lannister
Sentence: I once told Bronn that if I ever saw you again I'd cut you in half.

Name: tyrion lannister
Sentence: glances down at the sword in JAIME's hand.

Name: tyrion lannister
Sentence: It would take you awhile with a sparring sword.

Name: jaime lannister
Sentence: shakes his head and says nothing.

Name: tyrion lannister
Sentence: He was going to execute me. He knew I was innocent. He didn't hate me because of anything I did, he hated me because of what I am. The little monster sent to punish him. Do you think I wanted to be born this way? Did he think I chose --

Name: jaime lannister
Sentence: What do you want?

Name: tyrion lannister
Sentence: Daenerys will win this war. You're a military man. You must know there is no way around it. Daenerys is not her father. She's even willing to suspend hostilities if Cersei agrees to certain terms.

Name: jaime lannister
Sentence: You want Cersei to bend the knee you can ask her yourself.

Name: tyrion lannister
Sentence: I -- I don't. Daenerys doesn't. Not right now anyway. She has a more important request.

Name: davos
Sentence: I wasn't sure I'd find you.

Name: davos
Sentence: I thought you might still be rowing.

Name: gendry baratheon
Sentence: chuckles and DAVOS smiles.

Name: davos
Sentence: I looked in shops, taverns, brothels. I should have known to come straight to the Street of Steel.

Name: gendry baratheon
Sentence: Weren't you worried about the Goldcloaks?

Name: davos
Sentence: I haven't been here in years. Why should they recognize me? Sometimes I hardly do. Nothing fucks you harder than time.

Name: davos
Sentence: walks to the side of the shop and inspects a rack of swords. He pulls one, nods in approval and puts it back in its place. He turns back to GENDRY.

Name: davos
Sentence: Anybody give you any trouble?

Name: gendry baratheon
Sentence: Here I am arming Lannisters. I never get a second look. You were right. Safest place for me was right under the queen's nose.

Name: davos
Sentence: Don't be so sure. Safety is never a permanent state of affairs. Bad things are coming.

Name: gendry baratheon
Sentence: nods.

Name: gendry baratheon
Sentence: You came to get me. You want me to come with you.

Name: davos
Sentence: I think you need to understand --

Name: gendry baratheon
Sentence: I'm ready. Let's go.

Name: davos
Sentence: You should know what you're heading into.

Name: gendry baratheon
Sentence: Don't you think I've been thinking about it every swing of the hammer... how happy I am making weapons for the family that killed my father? They tried to kill me.

Name: gendry baratheon
Sentence: is tossing his tools and apron to the side. He picks up a satchel and swings it over his head.

Name: gendry baratheon
Sentence: I've been getting ready. I never knew what for, but I've always known I'd know it when it comes.

Name: davos
Sentence: You might want to bring one of those swords.

Name: gendry baratheon
Sentence: smiles at DAVOS and begins walking towards the weapons.

Name: gendry baratheon
Sentence: I don't know much about swinging swords, but this --

Name: gendry baratheon
Sentence: removes a giant war hammer from the wall.

Name: gendry baratheon
Sentence: this I know.

Name: gendry baratheon
Sentence: and DAVOS turn and walk out of the shop.

Name: davos
Sentence: and GENDRY are walking towards the boat DAVOS left on the beach.

Name: davos
Sentence: Keep your father's name to yourself. The situation is complicated enough already.

Name: gendry baratheon
Sentence: and DAVOS arrive at the boat. GENDRY lays his hammer on top of the boat cargo. DAVOS is gathering the anchor and rope. Two Goldcloaks begin walking down the beach towards the boat unnoticed by DAVOS and GENDRY.

Name: gendry baratheon
Sentence: Who should I say I am?

Name: davos
Sentence: turns and notices the two guards approaching the boat. He turns and loudly addresses GENDRY.

Name: davos
Sentence: I told you, Clovis, if we don't get out of here soon someone is going to --

Name: guard
Sentence: You there.

Name: davos
Sentence: No weapons, friends. I promise. What can I do for you?

Name: guard
Sentence: Is that your boat?

Name: davos
Sentence: It is.

Name: gendry baratheon
Sentence: looks down into the boat and sees his weapon in plain view.

Name: guard
Sentence: The docks are that way.

Name: gendry baratheon
Sentence: That they are. I try to stay away from them to avoid good men such as yourselves.

Name: davos
Sentence: Still five gold dragons?

Name: guard
Sentence: Are you joking?

Name: guard
Sentence: You must be even older than you look. 15.

Name: guard
Sentence: Apiece.

Name: davos
Sentence: angrily reaches into his pouch and pays the men.

Name: davos
Sentence: I can't say it was a pleasure doing business with you.

Name: davos
Sentence: turns and begins walking back to his boat.

Name: guard
Sentence: What's in the boat?

Name: davos
Sentence: pauses and turns back to the guards.

Name: davos
Sentence: Not more gold.

Name: guard
Sentence: Wine?

Name: guard
Sentence: Mmm.

Name: guard
Sentence: I like wine.

Name: guard
Sentence: Or hams.

Name: davos
Sentence: Come and have a look.

Name: davos
Sentence: Fermented crab.

Name: guard
Sentence: What?

Name: davos
Sentence: Fermented crab. One bucket of this triples the brothel's earnings for the week. A man thinks he's done, he's ready to go back to his loving family, but before he gets his britches up his lady of the hour pops a tiny spoon of that into his mouth. Five minutes later, he's back in the race. Here, have a taste.

Name: davos
Sentence: scoops up a bit of fermented crab and offers it to the guards. Both men reach out and take a pinch. The guards sniff the crab and put it in their mouth. They both recoil from the taste and look at each other.

Name: davos
Sentence: I'd hurry to your favorite establishment or you'll put a whole in that chainmail.

Name: guard
Sentence: Oi, Dwarf!

Name: davos
Sentence: quickly walks to cut the guards off.

Name: davos
Sentence: I really wouldn't try anymore until you see how the first bite hits you.

Name: guard
Sentence: That dwarf --

Name: guard
Sentence: Where did you get that scar?

Name: tyrion lannister
Sentence: Fish hook. Some men you just can't teach.

Name: guard
Sentence: We was looking for a dwarf with a scar like that awhile back.

Name: davos
Sentence: is still standing behind the guards. He retrieves his gold pouch again and holds it up shaking it.

Name: davos
Sentence: Perhaps there's some arrangement?

Name: guard
Sentence: Arrangement? You gonna arrange to pay us more than Queen Cersei?

Name: gendry baratheon
Sentence: can be seen behind the backs of the guards. He slowly retrieves his hammer and creeps up behind GUARD 2. He swings his hammer and connects with the side of the guardo s head. The man drops. As GENDRY transitions onto the second guard and swings his hammer, GUARD 1 turns to look and catches a hammer blow to the face.

Name: davos
Sentence: is looking at TYRION and motions towards GENDRY.

Name: davos
Sentence: This is Gendry.

Name: tyrion lannister
Sentence: He'll do.

Name: jaime lannister
Sentence: opens the door and step into the queen's room. CERSEI is seated near a window speaking to QYBURN.

Name: cersei lannister
Sentence: That won't be necessary.

Name: qyburn
Sentence: bows his head and walks to leave the room. As he passes by JAIME he addresses him.

Name: qyburn
Sentence: Ser Jaime.

Name: qyburn
Sentence: closes the door as he leaves. JAIME and CERSEI are alone. CERSEI begins walking over to a chair in front of JAIME and sits.

Name: jaime lannister
Sentence: Why was QYBURN here?

Name: cersei lannister
Sentence: He's Hand of the Queen. Why are you here?

Name: jaime lannister
Sentence: I met with Tyrion.

Name: cersei lannister
Sentence: pauses for a moment making JAIME uncomfortable.

Name: cersei lannister
Sentence: What did our brother have to say?

Name: jaime lannister
Sentence: Daenerys wants to meet.

Name: cersei lannister
Sentence: To discuss a surrender?

Name: jaime lannister
Sentence: To discuss an armistice.

Name: cersei lannister
Sentence: She just won a great victory. Why would she want a truce now?

Name: jaime lannister
Sentence: Because an army of dead men is marching on the Seven Kingdoms. Tyrion claims he'll have proof.

Name: cersei lannister
Sentence: smirks and looks away from JAIME.

Name: cersei lannister
Sentence: Are you going to punish him?

Name: jaime lannister
Sentence: Tyrion?

Name: cersei lannister
Sentence: Bronn.

Name: jaime lannister
Sentence: looks confused.

Name: cersei lannister
Sentence: He betrayed you. He set up a meeting without your knowledge or consent. Do you think anything of importance happens in this city without me knowing?

Name: jaime lannister
Sentence: You let it happen. Why?

Name: cersei lannister
Sentence: I've come to believe that accomodation with the Dragon Queen could be in our immediate interest. She has the numbers. If we want to beat her we have to be clever. We have to fight her like father would have. Dead men, dragons and Dragon Queens, whatever stands in our way we will defeat it ourselves for our house. For this.

Name: cersei lannister
Sentence: lifts her hands from the chair and places them both on her stomach indicating she's pregnant. JAIME looks shocked.

Name: jaime lannister
Sentence: Who will you say is the father?

Name: cersei lannister
Sentence: You.

Name: jaime lannister
Sentence: People won't like that.

Name: cersei lannister
Sentence: stands from her chair and walks in front of JAIME.

Name: cersei lannister
Sentence: Do you remember what father used to say about people?

Name: jaime lannister
Sentence: The lion doesn't concern himself with the opinions of the sheep.

Name: jaime lannister
Sentence: reaches forward and takes CERSEI and kisses her. While they embrace CERSEI speaks to JAIME.

Name: cersei lannister
Sentence: Never betray me again.

Name: gendry baratheon
Sentence: and DAVOS are walking down the beach near the Dragonglass cave. Groups of men are carrying boxes filled with Dragonglass out of the cave. DAVOS and GENDRY are having a discussion.

Name: davos
Sentence: We're leaving today. The king's got a lot on his mind.

Name: gendry baratheon
Sentence: I understand.

Name: davos
Sentence: He doesn't need to be thinking about harboring the bastard of a dead king.

Name: gendry baratheon
Sentence: You don't have to worry.

Name: davos
Sentence: You're just Clovis, a smith who's come to pay his respects before he heads off to work at the Winterfell forges.

Name: gendry baratheon
Sentence: Understood.

Name: davos
Sentence: and GENDRY enter the mouth of the cave. JON is walking along the corridor.

Name: davos
Sentence: Begging your pardon, Your Grace.

Name: jon snow
Sentence: stops and turns around to face DAVOS.

Name: jon snow
Sentence: You survived King's Landing.

Name: davos
Sentence: Yet again.

Name: jon snow
Sentence: Your Grace, this is --

Name: gendry baratheon
Sentence: steps forward in front of DAVOS.

Name: gendry baratheon
Sentence: It's Gendry, Your Grace. I'm Robert Baratheon's son. Bastard son.

Name: jon snow
Sentence: looks to DAVOS.

Name: davos
Sentence: He was meant to keep that to himself.

Name: gendry baratheon
Sentence: Our fathers trusted each other. Why shouldn't we?

Name: jon snow
Sentence: I saw your father once at Winterfell.

Name: gendry baratheon
Sentence: I met yours in my shop.

Name: jon snow
Sentence: You're a lot leaner.

Name: gendry baratheon
Sentence: You're a lot shorter.

Name: jon snow
Sentence: stops smiling and pauses a moment. Then he chuckles.

Name: jon snow
Sentence: I grew up on stories about them.

Name: gendry baratheon
Sentence: All I ever knew was they fought together and won. Ser Davos told me where you're going, Your Grace, and why. Let me come with you.

Name: davos
Sentence: Don't be a fool. You're not a soldier.

Name: gendry baratheon
Sentence: No, but I'm a fighter. And he won't be needing a smith with a sword like that.

Name: jon snow
Sentence: Do you know how to use one?

Name: gendry baratheon
Sentence: shakes his head.

Name: jon snow
Sentence: Well, that's a problem.

Name: gendry baratheon
Sentence: I prefer a hammer.

Name: gendry baratheon
Sentence: looks to DAVOS.

Name: davos
Sentence: He can handle himself.

Name: jon snow
Sentence: nods.

Name: jon snow
Sentence: We could use the help.

Name: davos
Sentence: As my father used to say, it's better to be a coward for a minute than dead for the rest of your life.

Name: gendry baratheon
Sentence: I owe you my life. Twice over. But if what you said is true about what's out there, I can't wait out this war.

Name: davos
Sentence: Yeah. Nobody mind me. All I've ever done is live to a ripe old age.

Name: tyrion lannister
Sentence: You may not believe it, but I've missed you Mormont. Nobody glowers quite like you. Not even Grey Worm.

Name: tyrion lannister
Sentence: retrieves a gold coin from his pocket and turns it in his hands.

Name: tyrion lannister
Sentence: This is the coin the slaver gave me when I suggested he free us and pay us. Remember?

Name: jorah mormont
Sentence: It was supposed to last us the rest of our lives.

Name: tyrion lannister
Sentence: smiles and hands the coin to JORAH.

Name: tyrion lannister
Sentence: Take it with you. You'll bring it back. Our queen needs you.

Name: jorah mormont
Sentence: nods to TYRION. DAENERYS appears and walks up to JORAH.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Sentence: We should be better at saying farewell by now.

Name: jorah mormont
Sentence: Your Grace, I --

Name: daenerys targaryen
Sentence: reaches forward and takes JORAH by his hands. JON SNOW, DAVOS and GENDRY exit the cave and walk towards the boats. JORAH bends and kisses DAENERY's hand. He turns and continues readying the boat. JON stands in front of DAENERYS.

Name: jon snow
Sentence: If I don't return at least you won't have to deal with the King in the North anymore.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Sentence: smiles.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Sentence: But I've grown used to him.

Name: jon snow
Sentence: I wish you good fortune in the wars to come, Your Grace.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Sentence: nods to JON. JON turns and walks to the head of the boat. The men take hold of it.

Name: jon snow
Sentence: Heave!

Name: sam
Sentence: is seated at a table surround by papers and candles. He is writing notes into a book. Gilly is seated across from him reading aloud from a tome. SAM JR. is playing on the bed.

Name: gilly
Sentence: Do you know how many steps there are in the Citadel?

Name: sam
Sentence: No.

Name: sam
Sentence: looks up from his work annoyed. He remains silent and continues working.

Name: gilly
Sentence: Guess how many windows are in the Great Sept of Baelor.

Name: sam tarly
Sentence: looks away and pauses.

Name: sam tarly
Sentence: None anymore.

Name: gilly
Sentence: That's true. This High Septon Meynard, he recorded everything. He even recorded his own bowel movements. What does "annulment" mean?

Name: sam tarly
Sentence: It's when a man sets asside his lawful wife.

Name: gilly
Sentence: Meynard says here that he issued an anullment for Prince Rhaegar and remarried him to someone else at the same time in a secret ceremony in Dorne. Is that a common thing --

Name: sam tarly
Sentence: isn't paying much attention to GILLY. He loudly interrupts her.

Name: sam tarly
Sentence: These maesters, they set me to the task of preserving that man's window counting and anullments and bowel movements for all eternity while the secret to defeating the Night King's probably sitting on some dusty shelf somewhere completely ignored. But that's all right, isn't it. We could all become slavering, murderous imbecils enthralled to evil incarnate as long as we can have access to the full records of High Septon Meynardo s 15,782 shits.

Name: gilly
Sentence: Steps. That number was steps.

Name: sam tarly
Sentence: is dismayed. He sets his quill down and grabs the book he was writing in and hands it to SAM Jr. He retrieves his cloak and walks out the door.

Name: sam
Sentence: is walking through a dark library. He heads to the restricted section and unlocks the barred gate. He begins removing books and scrolls from shelfs and stuff them in his satchel. After retrieving what he needs, SAM quickly walks to the exit of the library. He pauses before he leaves and turns around. He glances back at the library. It is many stories tall lined with countless shelves of books. SAMWELL looks at the library one last time, turns and walks out of the door.

Name: sam tarly
Sentence: is loading a wagon with his things. He walks around to the driver seat. GILLY and SAM JR. are already in the wagon dressed for the road. SAM climbs aboard and takes the reins in his hand.

Name: gilly
Sentence: Are you sure you want to do this? You always wanted to be a maester.

Name: sam tarly
Sentence: I'm tired of reading about the achievements of better men.

Name: arya stark
Sentence: is in the kennels observing PETER BAELISH and a Winterfell servant having a conversation. The servent is whispering in BAELISH's ear. ARYA can't hear the conversation. ARYA sees BAELISH hand the servant a raven scroll. The servant turns to leave. BAELISH senses someone is watching him and he looks to where ARYA stood but she has already vanished. BAELISH turns and leaves the kennels.

Name: arya stark
Sentence: is on the upper level looking down at BAELISH. He is having a conversation with ROBETT GLOVER and YOHN ROYCE. She can't hear what's being said. BAELISH finishes his conversation and walks away from the men. ARYA disappears behind the corner and continues following BAELISH.

Name: arya stark
Sentence: is walking down the hallway. She pauses, peers around a corner and looks towards the door of BAELISH's quarters. BAELISH appears and unlocks his door. Before he walks in MAESTER WOLKAN approaches him. She continues watching the men.

Name: wolkan
Sentence: I found it, my Lord.

Name: wolkan
Sentence: hands BAELISH a raven scroll.

Name: wolkan
Sentence: It took some searching. Maester Llewyn's archives are thorough.

Name: petyr baelish
Sentence: reads the note then looks at WOLKAN.

Name: petyr baelish
Sentence: Are you sure this is the only copy at Winterfell?

Name: wolkan
Sentence: Yes, my Lord.

Name: petyr baelish
Sentence: Lady Stark thanks you for your service.

Name: wolkan
Sentence: turns and walks away. BAELISH enters his room and shuts the door. ARYA continues watching. A moment later BAELISH opens the door and exits the room, locking the door as he leaves. After he is gone ARYA walks to the door and produces a lockpick from her sleeve. She enters the room and begins searching for the raven scroll. She opens a cabinet but finds nothing of value. She checks another cabinet, then looks in the fireplace and above the mantle finding nothing. She lifts up the mattress and finds a small hole cut into the bedding. She reaches in and retrives the raven scroll. She unrolls it and reads the contents.

Name: jon snow
Sentence: and the raiding party land on the Beach of Eastwatch. JON looks up at the castle. The men collect their equipment and make for the castle.

Name: tormund
Sentence: JON, DAVOS, GENDRY, and JORAH sit at a table having a conversation.

Name: tormund
Sentence: Isn't it your job to talk him out of stupid fucking ideas like this?

Name: davos
Sentence: I've been failing at that job of late.

Name: tormund
Sentence: How many queens are there now?

Name: jon snow
Sentence: Two.

Name: tormund
Sentence: And you need to convince the one with the dragons or the one who fucks her brother?

Name: jon snow
Sentence: Both.

Name: tormund
Sentence: How many men did you bring?

Name: jon snow
Sentence: looks around the table.

Name: jon snow
Sentence: Not enough.

Name: tormund
Sentence: The big woman?

Name: jon snow
Sentence: smiles and shakes his head. TORMUND is disappointed.

Name: jorah mormont
Sentence: We were hoping some of your men could help.

Name: davos
Sentence: I'll be staying behind. I'm a liability out there as you well know.

Name: tormund
Sentence: nods his head.

Name: tormund
Sentence: You are.

Name: tormund
Sentence: turns to look at JON.

Name: tormund
Sentence: You really want to go out there again?

Name: tormund
Sentence: You're not the only ones.

Name: tormund
Sentence: My scouts found them a mile south of the Wall. Said they were on their way here.

Name: jon snow
Sentence: You're The Hound. I saw you once at Winterfell.

Name: sandor
Sentence: pulls a blanket tight around himself and sits up from the table he was laying on.

Name: tormund
Sentence: They want to go beyond the Wall too.

Name: beric
Sentence: We don't want to go beyond the Wall, we have to. Our lord told us the great war is coming.

Name: gendry baratheon
Sentence: Don't trust them. Don't trust any of them.

Name: gendry baratheon
Sentence: They're the Brotherhood. And the last thing their Lord told them to do was sell me to a Red Witch to be murdered.

Name: jorah mormont
Sentence: Thoros?

Name: thoros
Sentence: sits up from a dark corner.

Name: jorah mormont
Sentence: I hardly recognized you.

Name: thoros
Sentence: Ser Jorah Mormont --

Name: tormund
Sentence: turns and angrily looks at JORAH.

Name: thoros
Sentence: They won't give me anything to drink down here. I haven't been feeling like myself.

Name: tormund
Sentence: You're a fucking Mormont? Like the last Lord Commander?

Name: jorah mormont
Sentence: He was my father.

Name: tormund
Sentence: He hunted us like animals.

Name: jorah mormont
Sentence: You returned the favor, as I recall.

Name: beric
Sentence: Here we all are at the edge of the world at the same moment heading in the same direction for the same reason.

Name: davos
Sentence: Our reasons aren't your reasons.

Name: beric
Sentence: It doesn't matter what we think our reasons are.

Name: beric
Sentence: stands up and walks towards the bars of the cell.

Name: beric
Sentence: There's a greater purpose at work and we serve it together whether we know it or not. We may take the steps but the Lord of Light --

Name: sandor
Sentence: For fuck's sake, will you shut your hole. Are we coming with you or not?

Name: jorah mormont
Sentence: Don't you want to know what we're doing?

Name: thoros
Sentence: Is it worse than sitting in a freezing cell waiting to die?

Name: jon snow
Sentence: He's right. We're all on the same side.

Name: gendry baratheon
Sentence: How can we be?

Name: jon snow
Sentence: We're all breathing.

Name: tormund
Sentence: hands the cell keys to JON. JON opens the door and let the men out.

Name: end
Sentence: CREDITS

Name: jon snow
Sentence: Are you all right?

Name: gendry baratheon
Sentence: faces JON and grunts.

Name: jon snow
Sentence: Ever been north before?

Name: gendry baratheon
Sentence: Never seen snow before.

Name: tormund
Sentence: Beautiful, eh? I can breath again. Down south the air smells like pig shit.

Name: jon snow
Sentence: You've never been down south.

Name: tormund
Sentence: I've been to Winterfell.

Name: jon snow
Sentence: That's the north.

Name: gendry baratheon
Sentence: How do you live up here? How do you keep your balls from freezing off?

Name: tormund
Sentence: You have to keep moving. That's the secret. Walking is good, fighting is better, fucking is best.

Name: jon snow
Sentence: There's not another woman within 100 miles of here.

Name: tormund
Sentence: turns to look at JON and GENDRY.

Name: tormund
Sentence: We have to make due with what we've got.

Name: jon snow
Sentence: glances at GENDRY. GENDRY backs away from JON and TORMUND.

Name: tormund
Sentence: This one is maybe not so smart.

Name: jon snow
Sentence: Davos says he is a strong fighter.

Name: tormund
Sentence: Good. That's more important than being smart.

Name: tormund
Sentence: looks at JON as they continue to walk.

Name: tormund
Sentence: Smart people don't come up here looking for the dead. So, you met this Dragon Queen, huh? And?

Name: jon snow
Sentence: She'll only fight beside us if I bend the knee.

Name: tormund
Sentence: You spent too much time with the free folk and now you don't like kneeling. Mance Rayder was a great man, a proud man. The king beyond the wall never bent the knee. How many of his people died for his pride?

Name: thoros
Sentence: Are you still mad at us, boy?

Name: gendry baratheon
Sentence: You sold me to a witch.

Name: thoros
Sentence: Priestess. I'll admit, it is a subtle distinction.

Name: beric
Sentence: We're fighting a great war. Wars cost money.

Name: gendry baratheon
Sentence: I wanted to be one of you. I wanted to join the Brotherhood but you sold me off like a slave. Do you know what she did to me? She strapped me down on a bed, she stripped me naked --

Name: sandor
Sentence: Sounds all right so far.

Name: gendry baratheon
Sentence: and put leeches on me.

Name: sandor
Sentence: Was she naked too?

Name: thoros
Sentence: She needed your blood.

Name: gendry baratheon
Sentence: Yes. Thank you. I know that.

Name: sandor
Sentence: steps in front of GENDRY to halt him.

Name: sandor
Sentence: It could have been worse.

Name: gendry baratheon
Sentence: She wanted to kill me. They would have killed me if it wasn't for Davos --

Name: sandor
Sentence: But they didn't, did they? So what you whinging about?

Name: gendry baratheon
Sentence: I'm not whinging.

Name: sandor
Sentence: Your lips are moving and you're complaining about something. That's whinging.

Name: sandor
Sentence: motions to BERIC.

Name: sandor
Sentence: This one's been killed six times. You don't hear him bitching about it.

Name: sandor
Sentence: walks away to join the group. BERIC and THOROS smile to each other. THOROS holds his wine flask out to GENDRY who takes a large gulp and hands it back to THOROS.

Name: thoros
Sentence: Good lad.

Name: jon snow
Sentence: The first time I went north of the wall was with your father.

Name: jorah mormont
Sentence: He was a good man. He deserved a better son. Were you with him at the end?

Name: jon snow
Sentence: I was a prisoner of the Wildlings. But we avenged him. I want you to know that every mutineer found justice.

Name: jorah mormont
Sentence: I can't think of a worse way for him to go. The Night's Watch was his life. He would have died to protect every one of those men, and they butchered him.

Name: jon snow
Sentence: I hate that he died that way. My father was the most honorable man I ever met. He was good all the way through. And he died on the executioner's block.

Name: jorah mormont
Sentence: Your father wanted to execute me.

Name: jon snow
Sentence: I heard.

Name: jorah mormont

Sentence: That thing you dragged here, I know what it is, I know what it means. And when it came at me, I didn't think about the world. Not at all. As soon as it opened its mouth, the world disappeared for me, right down its black throat. All I could think about was keeping those gnashing teeth away from the ones who matter most, away from my family. Maybe Euron Greyjoy had the right idea. Get on a boat, take those who matter.

He crossed beyond the Wall, a crippled boy, and became the Three-Eyed Raven. He is our memory, the keeper of all our stories. The wars, weddings, births, massacres, famines.
